name: Cozy Studio With  Balcony (Free Private Parking)
summary: A gorgeous studio with charming Balcony perfect for 2 to guests and it has a great location it's almost in front of the Cristal Palace and five minutes walking from the famous Lello Bookshop as well as all the main attractions. It also has a bus stop within 2 minutes walking distance with direct connection to the airport. Here you will feel Porto's everyday life.
space: This magnificent studio with 30m2 is located on the second floor, in a traditional building completely renovated, which will allow you to enjoy a relaxing atmosphere after a day walking in the beautiful streets of Oporto.   Everything will surprise you, from the comfort, to the balcony and every details. There is a completed bathroom with towels and hairdryer.     The kitchen is fully equipped with high-quality culinary utensils and all kinds of equipment, including, a stove with 2 ceramic points, kettle, toaster and an expresso coffee machine.

neighborhood_overview: Located in one of the most famous areas of downtown Porto, these Studio is near the main tourist spots of the city. The iconic Livraria Lello and the Clérigos Tower are located 500 meters away. The São Bento Train Station is located 800 meters away and the traditional Bolhão Market 500 meters away. Theatres and show halls like the Rivoli Theatre, Coliseu do Porto or São João National Theatre are also within walking distance. Downtown area known as ''Baixa'', is also where you will find the nightlife, bars and different type of restaurants, from the most traditional to the most sophisticated ones.
notes: Please note that the cleaning service is made every 5 days, with bed and bath linen change. Our cleaning team is always available for any eventuality request.
transit: By bus To find the Studio at the airport you should take bus number 601, direction Cordoaria and leave at the stop of the Crystal Palace. About 100 meters at Rua D. Manuel II you will find the number 70.   By metro If you prefer to use the metro at the airport, you should take the metro to Casa da Música station (Line E - Purple). At the exit, you can take a taxi or Uber with a  cost of about € 4 in 5 minutes you will be at Rua D. Manuel II n ° 70.   By train If arriving by train from Campanhã Station, take the metro - Lines A, B, C or F and leave in station Carolina Michaellis. Then, when you get out of the station, you will be at Oliveira Monteiro street. At this street you turn left to go Anibal Cunha street who will connect with Rosário street. At the end off Rosario street just turn right and you will be at D.Manuel Street that street  number 70.
interaction: In the check-in we will give you all the information to provide a pleasant stay, such as places to visit, ways of transport, restaurants, tours and cultural schedules, among others. In addition, we have the application available to every guests houses with all the information.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Logement très bien situé. Accueil chaleureux et plein d'informations utiles pour visiter la ville.
Such an adorable flat and adorable hosts  perfectly located. highly recommend it.
Magnifique petit studio très bien placé pour découvrir Porto. Je recommande cette adresse à 100%

El estudio es muy cómodo y agradable, las fotos reflejan muy bien el espacio. Fueron muy preocupados con el recibimiento y la hora de llegada, nos dieron datos de la ciudad y donde recorrer, estaban atentos a nuestros requerimientos. Fue una estadía maravillosa y el lugar muy recomendable
Apartamento nuevo, estiloso, pequeño pero muy acogedor. Buena localización. Recomendable

Encontramos el alojamiento tal y como se ve en las fotos. Muy bien equipado para pasar unos días. Natalia nos recibió puntual y nos dio toda la información necesaria sobre el alojamiento, la localización, cómo movernos por la ciudad y recomendaciones sobre restaurantes, etc. Aunque el estudio no está situado en el casco histórico de la ciudad, se encuentra céntrico, por lo que nos fue posible ir a pie a todos los lugares de interés. Muy recomendable.
Perfect place to stay in Porto center. Perfect host and clean apartment. Totally recommend it!

excelente lugar, muy centrico al lado de todo lo interesante, el apartamento tiene todas las comodidades para una estadia excelente, tieme una terraza para desatunar o estar. me ayudaron con indicaciones de que hacer a donde ir fue excelente!! recomiendo este lugar ampliamente

Wir sind sehr herzlich empfangen worden und uns wurde alles super toll erklärt. Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral und wenn man mit dem Auto anreist hat man einen perfekten Parkplatz. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und mit einfachen Details gestaltet. Einzig das Licht im Badezimmer könnte heller sein. Sehr gefreut hab ich mich über das super bequeme Bett. Ich werde diese Wohnung wieder Mieten wollen beim nächsten Aufenthalt in Porto.

Appartement bien placé proche du centre de Porto. Il est situé à l'arrière de l'immeuble ce qui évite les nuisances sonores de la rue très passante à certaines heures de la journée et permet de disposer d'une terrasse. Mais en avril le matin et le soir, le soleil ne donne pas sur celle-ci, c'est dommage. L'appartement est bien équipé.
Great place to stay in Porto. Close to the city center. The apartment was very clean and cosy and it had everything you need. The hosts are very kind. Would definitely recommend this place.
Appartement fonctionnel, calme et très bien situé( centre ville, liaison aéroport) idéal pour découvrir Porto.
Localização maravilhosa , limpeza perfeita , ambiente confortável e completo de utensílios .

Great location with local bars and eateries. Easy walk down though historical part of the city to Douro  river frontage and port warehouses. Tidy warm studio apartment has great coffee machine and we were very comfortable here

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans ce studio. Il est très bien équipé, avec une place de parc privé, et donne sur cours donc très calme. L'emplacement est idéal, à 5min des restaurants, de la cathédrale... Je recommande !
Nice flat with great terrasse. Very close to historical city center and thus perfect to visit porto
The place was the perfect location for our trip to Porto. Everything was outstanding from the check in to check out. I would highly recommend!
Great location and communication with the host
The apartment is small but clean and very well located. It's close to the center and I actually liked the neighbourhood around it very much too.

Accueil formidable. Appartement à proximité des lieux touristiques facile d’accès à pied. Bonus, un beau et grand stationnement gratuit à l’arrière. 
Endroit paisible et silencieux, on y dort bien.
Je le recommande sans hésitation à tous.
Beau studio, très propre et parfaitement situé à côté du vieux Porto.

Lovely apartment in walking distance the old town of Porto. Extremely clean and all amenities as advertised. We had a lovely welcome and were briefed on local restaurants and bars. Would definitely stay here again!
This studio is perfect for a short visit in Porto, with an excellent location to reach the center by foot. Confortable bed, nice bathroom with shower. Highly recommendable for tourism.
Fenomenal
Cossy apparent in a great location. recommended for anyone visiting Porto

Our stay at Jose place was brilliant. It was just a short walk down to the river and very close to other tourist spots. The apparent is a nice size and having free parking so close to central Porto is a great bonus! Also we arrived early and they kindly let us park and gave us some tips for what to do and see which was very helpful. Would definitely recommend. 
Sam
Schöne Unterkunft, das Bad ist eher klein aber für 2 Tage war es für uns in Ordnung. Die Lage ist wirklich gut und der private Parkplatz war super. Wir würden die Unterkunft wieder buchen.

Superbe logement, très propre et fonctionnel, décoré avec goût. 
Assez proche du centre de Porto (10-15min à pieds) et assez tranquille. Parfait pour quelques jours !

Natalia est une femme sympathique, arrangeante et toujours disponible. 

Je recommande cet appartement sans hésiter !

L’appartement est idéalement situé, à proximité de tous les endroits incontournables de Porto. Durant notre séjour nous nous sommes déplacés en majorité à pieds, sans aucun souci.
L’appartement est très bien équipé et le balcon est top pour les petits déjeuners et les repas en extérieur. La résidence est calme et les voisins sont gentils.
José et Natalia sont disponibles et réactifs, l’accueil a été très chaleureux.
Nous avons passé un séjour super, je recommande vivement!

쫄때 요게 짜지막세이요
체아깁니다
This place was exactly as advertised. Great location. Great communication from the hosts. I highly recommend it.

We cannot recommend this place. The apartment units were definitely built on the cheap. While the balcony is okay, it faces the parking lot and makes for a lousy view. It is the interior of the apartment, however, that made us miserable. WiFi is spotty. The bed is funky for two people; one will have to climb over the other to get out. There is no place to hang towels in the bathroom save for a small hook draped over the  door. There is nowhere to place soap or shampoo in the shower stall but the floor. The wall fixture holding the shower head is loose, meaning that the slightest amount of water pressure makes the shower hose wriggle around like a snake. The water pressure in the super-small bathroom sink is inconsistent. Prepare for your shower to turn cold, as the  water heater seems to go on and off. Porto is AMAZING. It is unfortunate that this apartment, lacking any of its charm, detracted from our enjoyment of the city.
The location and the apartment was great. We had everything that we needed and really enjoyed our stay. Will definitely go back.

Appartement  idéalement placé pour visiter Porto et d'un très bon rapport qualité /prix. Le parking est très appréciable, à condition tout de même d'avoir une voiture assez petite car l'entrée est étroite.  Je recommande

L’alloggio di Josè è eccellente. Si trova in una posizione comoda per visitare ogni parte della città, c’è un posteggio privato, la cucina è perfettamente attrezzata e la casa è piccola ma piacevole! Consigliatissimo!!

Points positifs : très beau design avec couleurs contrastées, parking arrière sécuritaire, précieux conseils + carte fournie à l’arrivée, à moins de 5-10 minutes à pied des quartiers intéressants 

Points négatifs : dans notre cas, prise de possession des lieux laborieuse mais l’élément principal est la grande chaleur dans le condo la nuit. Sans air climatisé ni ventilateur, les portes-fenêtres doivent être entrouvertes. Cependant, ça laisse entrer des moustiques et beaucoup de bruit ; les oiseaux y sont nombreux et très actifs en pleine nuit... Tout cela sans toutefois rendre la chambre suffisamment fraîche pour y dormir bien. L’achat minimalement d’un ventilateur serait un excellent atout pour la période estivale!

Très bel appartement, impeccable et très bien situé, à proximité immédiate de la vieille ville, avec en plus un parking privé et sécurisé très appréciable. Merci à Natalia pour son accueil et sa réactivité à notre arrivée.

Great Flat in the heart of Porto, very easy to walk everywhere. We loved being emerged in the culture, I would recommend this to a single person, couple or friends willing to share a bed or use the couch. Thanks for a wonderful experience in Porto!

This is a great little studio that’s located very close to all the main attractions of Porto. It has everything you need and is tastefully decorated. We especially appreciated the parking space - but be warned - we have an Audi A4 and it only just squeezed into the parking garage, if you have anything bigger I’m not sure you’ll fit. The balcony is lovely and because it overlooks the parking it’s silent - I don’t know why anyone would complain about that! Thanks to Jose and Natalia for always replying quickly to messages too. Highly recommended.

Studio à recommander ! Très bien placé, juste à côté du vieux Porto, vraiment idéal.
Très fonctionnel et propre.
Merci à Mila de nous avoir donner des bonnes à adresses!
Todo perfecto
Very nice flat nicely organized and roomy. Private secure parking, nice welcome. 15mn walk from downtown Porto. I recommend.

Precioso estudio con aparcamiento en la zona trasera del edificio con lo que no podrías tener una mayor tranquilidad, situación inmejorable. 
Volveré a oporto y sin duda volveré a quedarme en este encantador estudio. Más que recomendable para todo el que busque algo por aquí, y más aún si viajáis en coche
Mil gracias por todo!
Compleet en net appartement met winkelgebied en historisch centrum op loopafstand. Tip: de buurman serveert een prima ontbijtje voor € 5,00.

le studio est ok mais le lit est inconfortable et tres petit non adapté a de grandes personnes. il fait tres chaud dans l 'appartement et il n'y a qu"un minuscule ventilateur. ok pour 1 nuit pas plus .nous avons quitte le lieu le 3 em jour ,nous avions payé pour 6.

Well located little apartment with off street parking. We walked everywhere. Given the busy road it is on the apartment was very quiet. The external photos are of the back of the apartment building so not what you're looking for when finding the apartment. It is located two doors down from a little cafe opposite the Crystal Palace shopping centre. Don't miss the park a couple f hundred metres down the road on the opposite side- great views ver the river.
really convenient and very comfortable

Great location, quite area, car parking facilities very secure.
Amazing location for exploring all that Porto had to offer.
Easy access by foot to all central Porto this includes downtown and all other areas.
Be prepared for some steep hills...
Really nice appartment. We really enjoyed our stay there. It was clean and fresh. The location is really nice - you are close to all the sites and caffes.
Tranquillité et confort

Super séjour,  à proximité du centre.  Natalia a toujours été là pour nous,  son français est un plus pour deux personnes comme nous qui ne parlons pas Portugais et ps  si bien l'anglais.  

Il faudrait une passoire dans la cuisine. 

L'appartement est lumineux et spacieux et suffit pour quelques jours. 

Je recommande

The home is lovely, great location and good value. It’s nicely decorated and has everything you need. Also very comfy. The only down side is the parking is tight, there’s no AC which I over looked and it was a little hot at times and it was nice weather. During warmer weather it would not be good. Also the shower goes from hot to cold very fast making it impossible to take a full warm shower. Maybe it’s a Portugal thing I’m not used to...
Die Unterkunft, das gesamte Haus und der private Parkplatz im Innenhof waren perfekt. Eine perfekte Unterkunft für einen Trip in Porto!

die Lage des Appartments ist super. der check in hat super funktioniert. es ist klein aber alles was man braucht. der dazugehörige Parkplatz ist sehr praktisch wenn man mit dem Auto anreist. 
für einen staedtetripp super :)

José's place is tiny and special: the perfect place to stay if you are spending a couple of days in Porto. 
Clean and very well equipped with everything you may need. 
Moreover, the terrace is undoubtedly a plus-value.
Super recommended
Perfect location, very friendly communication and a nice Apartment! Would definitely stay here again!
monolocale favoloso a 5 minuti dalla famosa torre dell'orologio. consigliatissimo

A fantastic little spot right in the middle of everything! The space is efficient and affordable, and only a short walk from everything you want to see in Porto. Natalia made the check-in process super easy, and the parking space was a huge plus.
Inmejorable el trato la comodidad y la ubicación un 10 sin duda
Die Unterkunft ist klein aber fein. Es ist alles vorhanden und der private Parkplatz direkt am Haus ist ein super Pluspunkt. Die Lage ist optimal, um die Stadt fußläufig zu erkunden.
Fantastico apartamento en el centro de Oporto. Ideal para 1 o 2 personas. Bien decorado y con todo lo que se necesita. Parking en el mismo edificio. Super recomendable.
A estadia foi óptima! A Natália foi super atenciosa e agradecemos muito a hospitalidade
A perfect location and stay for two people, couldnt recommend highly enough. Natalia was also gracious enough to show us where to go in town!

Thank you to Jose and Natalie for a great stay in Porto.A modern studio apartment with lift and balcony. Clean, good kitchen equipment. Fantastic location, easily walkable to centre of beautiful Porto. Highly recommend. Thank you.

Merci de réserver chez nous. The studio is very comfortable, fully equipped, great location, you will have access to 2 beautiful parks, restaurants, downtown, Old Port, museums, universities, bars, clubs,subway bus. It is perfect for couples, solo travelers and business travelers. For a great stay, book with us!

house_rules: - NON FUMEUR, interdit de fumer a l’intérieur de l'immeuble.  NO SMOKING, strictly forbidden to smoke inside the building.  Animaux et vélos interdits dans l'immeuble. Animals and bicycles forbidden in the building.  - Le bâtiment est calme, s'il vous plaît respecter cela, parler bas dans les couloirs, réduire le bruit après 22h00. - The building is quiet, please respect that, talk low in the corridors, reduce noise after 22:00.  NOTE IMPORTANTE Pour les séjours de longue durée:  Veuillez noter que selon les normes Airbnb, nous fournirons suffisamment de fournitures domestiques (papier toilette, etc.) pour les premiers jours.    Aussi c'est a vous de changer vos draps et serviettes, de les laver, de maintenir l'appartement propre, car les frais de ménage sont chargés en considération d'une location a court terme, donc 1 a 3 nuits, ensuite c'est a vous de laisser l'appartement propre. On ne doit  pas avoir plus de 2 a 3 heures de nettoyage a faire après un long séjour.    Sinon il pourr

host.host_about:
Je suis une personne sympathique, serviable, sociable et amicale.
J'aime la musique,  la lecture, la méditation, adepte du Feng Shui, Tai-Chi
et autres approches, permettant de trouver l’équilibre et la zénitude.

"J'adore les chats" Ce sont des boules d'amour inconditionnel.

Je suis toujours curieuse de connaitre et d'apprendre, la vie pour moi est un éternel enrichissement, Airbnb contribue grandement a cela, par la diversité des personnes qui croisent mon chemin...

Ma devise: VIVRE ET LAISSER VIVRE

I am a friendly person, helpful and sociable.
I love music, reading, meditation, follower of Feng Shui, Tai Chi
and other approaches for finding balance and zen.

"I love cats" These are unconditional love balls.

I am always curious to know and learn, life for me is an eternal enrichment airbnb contributes greatly to this, by the diversity of people who cross my life ...

My motto: LIVE AND LET LIVE

reviews.comments: Alexia is a really nice landlady. We love the house, so cozy and clean. The location is in downtown. You can walk to the good restaurants, churches, Chinatown and old port. Perfect place to stay in for travel. Highly recommended!
A great space in a great Montreal location. Alexia is a great and well seasoned host. You will pleased staying here!

I loved staying here! It was very quiet at night, even on a Friday night when there was a street festival, and yet you are right in the heart of a great neighborhood! I got in a run to the Mount Royal park, I ate so much food at on Saint Laurent, and there was a funky park right around the corner hosting great local bands for Fringe Fest! I'd definitely stay here again!

Le studio était très propre. Ce dernier est super bien situé et très tranquille. Alexia est très réactive et veille à ce que votre séjour se passe dans de très bonnes conditions. Je recommande vivement.
Great place!
Comfortable, clean, & quiet space in a great location! Alexia answered all our questions & ensured we had an enjoyable stay. Very pleased!

Nice place to stay for several days! Alexia is a very kind and caring host. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed.  The location is perfect - very quiet neighborhood, but close to everything .
Great place, great location, great responsiveness of the host. I would recommend the place when you’re in Montreal!

If you are staying in the Plateau, I found this very central studio to be worth splurging a bit. I have stayed twice with this wonderful host and I had fun activities both times right in the neighborhood. There is lots of attention to detail in her studios with pretty decor and kitchen appliances, and coffee and tea provided. It really suited my needs for both a 2 week stay and a quick overnight on a separate occasion. Really welcoming vibe from host and almost always quick replies to messages. Thank you so much Alexia!

Alexia’s apartments never disappoint. We’ve stayed in the building four times in less than a year. The apartments are clean and have everything we need. We’re looking forward to going again soon. Thanks Alexia!

Appartement bien situé très proche du Boulevard Saint Laurent. Super accueil de la part d'Alexia, prise en main de l'appartement très rapide. L'endroit est très calme avec la proximité de restaurant sympas et de super balade à faire pour découvrir le plateau.
We had a great stay. Location was fab and the place  was very clean and comfortable. Thanks Alexia!

Alexia's place was wonderful. Clean, just enough space, lots of toiletries (I forgot toothpaste!), and she had a handy folder with lots of information about the place and the local area. I would stay here again for sure.

Alexia est une hôte adorable, très réactive et très serviable. Elle a gardé ma valise chez elle pour me permettre de profiter de mon dernier jour à Montréal. La communication est facile et efficace ! Une très bonne hôte ! 
L'appartement est néanmoins assez mal isolé du bruit (bonne isolation thermique en revanche) et le frigo est bruyant. Il faut prendre des bouchons d'oreille pour un séjour un peu long. 
Très bon emplacement !
Very nice studio in a great neighborhood.  Everything you may need and much more was provided

Alexia is an amazing host, the apartment has everything you could ask for and the location is ideal. Montreal is an amazing city and everything is easily accessible from this location. I will book again with her in the very near future! The best part was that this apartment was sparkling clean, animal and smoke free, something that was a must for my as I have allergies.

Alexia went out of her way to communicate with me and allow an early check in. She held my bag in her own apartment at check out so that I could hang out in the city until my later flight and even put the bag in her cabinet so that her adorable kitty Igor could not get hairs on it as I am allergic.

In the apartment there was coffee and tea for guests to enjoy. She has a helpful booklet of how everything works and what is nice in the neighborhood to explore. She provides hand knitted slippers for guests to wear! The apartment is perfect for one person or a couple with plenty of towels, a hair dryer, extra blankets, a tub for soaking and a full kitchen. There is even a balcony and if it wasn't November and freezing outside I would have taken Alexia up on having my tea out there! 

The apartment is a few blocks away from the most incredible park, Mount Royal, and even though it was chilly I went in to walk in the woods everyday. The charming Plateau and Mile End neighborhoods are also right outside the door. It is a quick walk to downtown or a practically instant bus ride on the 55. I particularly enjoyed a gluten free bakery called Boulangerie Baked2Go Allergen Free, the adorable Edmond cafe canteen, and a health food store all within a couple of blocks. Lots of vintage shops on the main drag close by, St Laurent. It was a ten minute walk to Parc La Fontaine and the best poutine that was also able to be gluten free at a super cute cafe La Banquise. This was my first trip to Montreal and I could not have asked for a better host or apartment. I felt like a native coming home to the charming plant filled foyer. What a wonderful city!

I had such a great trip visiting the Manifesto exhibit at MAC, a film festival was going on and I was able to catch a French language movie,  I got a new tattoo at the close by at Minuit Dix Tattoo from outstanding artist Charline Bataille and bought a hand made winter coat at the incredible Kanuk store down the road that had a 50% off sale. A magical first trip thanks to Alexia's charming apartment and it's wonderful location!
Appartement très propre et très bien situé! Alexia réserve un accueil très chaleureux!
Rien à dire, c’était parfait !

Alexia was very helpful in every way, she was very pleasant and the apartment was warm and cozy! It was the perfect location, being in walking distance of many things but still nice and quiet. We’ll be staying here again next time we visit Montreal.

We enjoyed our stay at Alexia’s place. We lucked out and found parking right outside, which was a huge relief and found a great coffee shop just around the corner. The apartment was very clean, warm and and in a great location!
Bonne situation, appartement très propre et tout l'équipement necessaire pour un séjour de courte ou longue durée.

The space is as much as one or two travellers need. Very good value. There are kitchen utensils (pots and pans) as well at cutlery, so you can cook your own food if you prefer. There are also a lot of great places to eat near by and a lot of fun things to do

name: Brand new appartmen in Porto´s heart.
summary: This is the perfect place for your stay in Porto. It is a brand new apartment with good areas inserted in a historic building, totally renewed. The ideal place to enjoy the Oporto´s life. Near from the most importante tourist points in Oporto, lots of services, comerces and tranports (metro, buses and train). São Bento Train Station: 500m Aliados: 600m Nacional Theatre: 100m Porto´s catedral: 500m River side: 600m Majestic café: 400m Santa Catarina Street: 300m Bolhão tradicional market: 600m
space: The apartments is in an old building completly renwed in 2017. It is composed by a livingroom kitchnet, a bedroon and a bathroom. There are an available loundry in the building.

neighborhood_overview: The place is a quiet street in Oporto city centre. There are all kind of comerces and services close. The area is well served of transports.
transit: The closer metro Stations are São Bento and Bolhão, 5 minutes walking. There are also trains in São Bento. There are lotes of buses in the area. The most parte of the turist atractions are close enouth to walk.
access: Guests may use all the apartment and the laundry.
interaction: I allways have my phone on. I use chat and the airbnb app. So I am always ready to answer a message.
house_rules: Smoking is only allowed at the window-sill. Electric devices and water taps should be off before check-out. Dishes should be done and the garbage should be left in the deposit, located in the neighbourhood. Keep the apartment clean and take care of the apartment stuff and equipment. Be careful with noise, after 10pm. No pets allowed. For your safety, you should be carefully with doors and windows.  The check-out must be done until 11am. Oporto's tourist tax (2€/person.night) is not included in the announced price and should be paid at check in.

Welcome Porto.
João will receive you.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
We had a great stay in Porto, Donigo was very welcoming and gave us helpful advice. Clean and well-located appartment. 
I warmly recommend this place.
Elyse

Appartement très bien situé avec un minimum d'équipement. 
Ne songé pas à y faire la cuisine.

Great place. Immediate replies. Is as described. Close to all types of transportation, restaurants, grocery store, etc.  João kindly allowed us to store our suitcases after check-out to pick them up later for a late flight out.

El piso está situado muy bien, cerca del centro a pie y es tal cual aparece en el anuncio. Ideal para pasar unos dias en Oporto. Joao estuvo esperandonos en el piso a la hora acordada y nos facilitó información sobre lo que podriamos encontrar en los alrededores del piso.

Belo apartamento em uma excelente rua em Porto. Localizado próximo a Praça da Batalha o que garante restaurantes e comércio de todos os gostos, podendo se deslocar a pé. O anfitrião é muito educado e atencioso, prestou-nos informações sobre atividades turísticas e foi sempre muito solícito! Recomendo!!!

El lugar es genial, la ubicación es muy céntrica y tiene de todo lo necesario (incluso a veces pensábamos que no había algo y luego lo encontrábamos en alguna puerta que no habíamos abierto). Dónigo fue muy atento, se tomó el tiempo para esperar os, mostrarnos el lugar, darnos recomendaciones y hasta regresó para ayudarnos con el T. V.
Uno de los mejores apartamentos donde nos hemos quedado.

El apartamento está genial, es moderno y luminoso, equipado con todo lo necesario. La ubicación perfecta, a 5 minutos andando del centro y de los sitios a visitar, con un supermercado en la misma calle y cerca de las estaciones de metro y de tren. El apartamento estaba muy limpio cuando llegamos. Joao fue muy atento con nosotras y nos permitió dejar las maletas en otro apartamento hasta la hora de irnos.
The apartment is great, modern and bright, equipped with all the conveniences. The location is perfect, just a 5 minutes walk far from downtown and the sightseeings, with a supermarket in the same street and it is close to the train and metro stations.The apartment was very clean when we arrived. Joao was very kind and helpful and let us keep our lugagge in antoher apartment until we left.
The place is very well located,  very clean. The host is very nice and welcoming. Perfect.
Recomendamos ampliamente el alojamiento, es nuevo, limpio y cómodo. Tiene ademas una excelente ubicación.
Appartement  très agréable ,lumineux et propre.Dommage pour le bruit des marteaux piqueur à longueur de journée.
Todo correcto
Nada mas que añadir

The location of this place really made our trip in Porto. Everything was very walkable and easy to get to. There is a small market on the corner and plenty of bars and restaurants nearby. This flat is a new listing so was quite basic in amenities. It could use some better cleaning supplies and hooks and things, basics that are nice to have. It also gets quite hot from the sun in the apartment and unfortunately the one fan is not enough to cool both rooms. However, the flat was very clean and the host was very kind when we met at check-in. He even allowed us to store our luggage so we could go out and explore some more before leaving. All in all, this is a good place for a short stay.

name: Grand appartement chaleureux idéal pour famille
summary: Grand appartement d'environ 140m2 dans la petite patrie - proche du plateau et du marché jean-talon. Lieu chaleureux avec un très beau jardin l'été.

host.host_about:
Anne-Laure et Christophe sont d'origine française. Installés au Québec depuis plusieurs dizaines d'année, ils ont un garçon de 7 ans nommé Victor et une petite fille Charlotte qui a quatre an. Anne-Laure travaille dans le secteur culturel / innovation montréalais et Christophe est contrebassiste. Ils aiment les arts, la nature, les bons repas, le jazz, le tango et les voyages.
---
Borned in France, Anne-Laure et Christophe moved to Montreal more than ten years ago. They have a little seven years old boy named Victor and four year old girl Charlotte. Anne-Laure works in the innovation / cultural field and Christophe is a musician. They like arts, nature, good meals, jazz, tango and trips.

reviews.comments:
Le séjour chez Anne-Laure s'est bien déroulé .
Appartement spacieux avec jardin bien situé mais ménage pas fait à l'arrivée et voisine du dessus très bruyante. Dommage que nous n'ayons pas eu le plaisir de rencontrer l'hôte bien que nous avons apprécié le service d'un membre de la famille.

name: Porto Downtown Luxury Studio
summary: Very confortable Studio with 2 double beds. Small kitchenette only with essentials. Excelent location, in a quiet street in the city centre, less than 5 minutes walking to some of the main atractions (city hall, Bolhão Market). Main metro station only 2 minutes walking distance.
space: Charming and confortable decoration. It is a large studio with 45 square meters, with separate dining area for 4, living area and 2 double beds. Ideal for families with children or groups of friends. Is has a wardrobe and a kitchenette only with the essentials. Complete bathroom with shower.
description: Very confortable Studio with 2 double beds. Small kitchenette only with essentials. Excelent location, in a quiet street in the city centre, less than 5 minutes walking to some of the main atractions (city hall, Bolhão Market). Main metro station only 2 minutes walking distance. Charming and confortable decoration. It is a large studio with 45 square meters, with separate dining area for 4, living area and 2 double beds. Ideal for families with children or groups of friends. Is has a wardrobe and a kitchenette only with the essentials. Complete bathroom with shower. it is located on a second floor with elevator I'll do my best to welcome you personally. I'll be happy to inform you about restaurants, bars and places to visit. It is a very central but quiet neighborhood. Typical Bolhão market is very close, as is the city hall and Rua Santa Catarina, the main shopping street, which also houses the charming Majestic Café (you shouldn't miss the Belle Epoque atmosphere). Excelent transport

notes: The apartment doesn't have washing machine and the kitchenette only has essentials.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Overall lots of downsides!
Up on arrival the lifts were not working, so we had to take all our luggage and the 2 babies up the stairs (it did not work through our entire stay). The apartment still smell of paint which is very bad!! The shower has no pressure if you use the hot water, it’s very cold in Porto so having a shower was a nightmare. From the 2 second day onwards there was no internet, so we had to go to cafes to do any work needed.
The host was great in the beginning helping us with a crib but did not do anything to fix the internet.
The place is missing lots of things, there was no kettle, no wine opener, no plates... basic things.
Good location but the place is a big let down.
Emplacement parfait pour silloner Porto à pied
The apartment was as we expected and I recommend it to other travelers.
Ricardo's place is spacious and very well located. It had everything we needed for a short stay

name: Bright cosy clean apartment
summary: Very bright brand lovely new apartment
space: Guests are welcome to use everything.
description: Very bright brand lovely new apartment Guests are welcome to use everything.

host.host_about:
I am Vivian, 35 years old, a professional who works full time in Sydney. I'm brazilian, very friendly, honest and clean. I have a big bedroom with a big built in wardrobe and its own bathroom in a brand new modern apartment which is just 3 min walk to Mascot Station. 7 min to Central. 2 min to Domestic Airport. 4 min to International Airport. Woolies (supermarket) at your door. Restaurants ans cafes all around. Only 15 minutes from the Opera House, Harbour Bridge and main attractions in the city. It’s a great option and very convenient, safe and private for everyone.
It would be great to talk to you and have you as a guest.

name: Great 1 bed apartment in the heart of Central HK!
summary: Great 1 bedroom/studio modern and clean apartment.  Has everything you need for your long or short term stay!  Located in the heart of Soho and the famous Staunton street restaurants and bars, mid level escalators and PMQ.
description: Great 1 bedroom/studio modern and clean apartment.  Has everything you need for your long or short term stay!  Located in the heart of Soho and the famous Staunton street restaurants and bars, mid level escalators and PMQ. In the heart of Soho, less than 5 minutes walk to MTR and trams, 100m from the famous mid level escalators.  Lots of great bars and restaurants all around!
neighborhood_overview: In the heart of Soho, less than 5 minutes walk to MTR and trams, 100m from the famous mid level escalators.  Lots of great bars and restaurants all around!

reviews.comments:
I like this place, interior and deco are just like the pictures shown. Lots of windows to enjoy natural lighting and air breeze. Located right in middle of Central with lots of convenient stores, restaurants, bars, coffee shops nearby, making basic living needs easy. Although even after midnight you could still inevitably hear the voice of the crowd from bars downstairs, but that’s the characteristic of Central, I don’t dislike it.  Transporting is somewhat convenient, if not by taxi, the uphill foot travel from subway allows you to enjoy the street arts along the way. Though it says the unit is four stairs up but in reality it’s nearly six floors high, which was alright for me, just caught me by surprise. 

Matt replied to messages promptly and also provided well covered check-in info, along with a map of recommended restaurants nearby. I randomly picked a brunch place from it one day when I was too lazy to look up lunch in HK, and I absolutely loved it!❤️

Our stay with Mats was excellent and exceeded our expectations. The location is awesome with a ton of great restaurant and nightlife options within walking distance. The apartment size was also bigger than expected for Hong Kong and perfect for two people. The only downside was the climb up the stairs after a long day. May not be good for some people, but gotta work off all that food somehow.

It may seem a little far away from the Central MTR station, but the Mid-level escalators make it very easy to get up and down and are fun to use. Would definitely stay here again.
Very convenient location, good for dining, shopping and bar. The house is very clean and smart setup. Feels very cozy stayed here!
Mats place is in an incredible location and he was very helpful in giving us tips.
Can’t get a better location than this one. Everything was easy and great!
Great location and easy access to lots of resturants and the escalators taking you down to Central. Spacious studio, modern and cozy. Really appreciate the washing mashine! Great and helpful host.

Mats was a great host who was quick to respond to messages and sort out any questions we had. The location and space are amazing, in the middle of the action in HK, though be prepared to exercise your lungs and legs!
Mat’s  place was great. He was so kind and helpful thank you!

Everything was clean, great location, we felt really comfortable during our stay. 
Check in was really simple thanks to Mats precised explanation. 
I d stay in one of his places any time again, no doubt. Highly recommend!!!

name: Large Townhouse Prime Location Surry Hills & City
summary: Our charming old heritage townhouse with original features is in a prime location, just off Crown Street and a short walk to Oxford Street, Darling Harbour and the Sydney Harbour - Circular Quay! On one of the most sought after tree lined streets in Surry Hills, out of the hustle and bustle whilst still in amongst the centre of the city. Please note the property is over 150 years old and is updated but shows the charm and wear of old age.
space: Large rooms, with plenty of space to have drinks in our cocktail lounge, or hangout on the large comfy sofa.  Cook dinner in our large kitchen, with 6/8 person seating dining table. The bedrooms are spacious & with master having a large double balcony at the front of the house, the courtyard is a secure area with seating, a bbq, access to the outdoor laundry.
description: Our charming old heritage townhouse with original features is in a prime location, just off Crown Street and a short walk to Oxford Street, Darling Harbour and the Sydney Harbour - Circular Quay! On one of the most sought after tree lined streets in Surry Hills, out of the hustle and bustle whilst still in amongst the centre of the city. Please note the property is over 150 years old and is updated but shows the charm and wear of old age. Large rooms, with plenty of space to have drinks in our cocktail lounge, or hangout on the large comfy sofa.  Cook dinner in our large kitchen, with 6/8 person seating dining table. The bedrooms are spacious & with master having a large double balcony at the front of the house, the courtyard is a secure area with seating, a bbq, access to the outdoor laundry. They will have access to the whole house. We are available via text and calls whilst travelling. The house is a 20min bus ride to Circular Quay and The Opera House, with two bus stops less than a
neighborhood_overview: The house is a 20min bus ride to Circular Quay and The Opera House, with two bus stops less than a 2/3min walk from the front door.  Central station is less than 10 mins walk away.  The main centre of Oxford Street is only a 10 min walk away, perfect to be near the hustle and bustle of Mardi Gras. Maloneys Grocery shop is again a 2/3min walk away and has the tastiest fruit and veg around.  Coles and Aldi are equi-distance from the house if you prefer to do a larger cheaper shop which you can get to either by a 5 min bus trip or 15 min walk.  Surry Hills is one of the main spots in the whole of Sydney for dining and drinking :-)  plus lots of cool shops and boutiques to visit during the day. The house is situated in a street  behind the small/park green so just enough to keep the noise at bay, but also so that you can walk to either The Clock or Dolphin, Cuckoo Calley, Nour etc etc in 3/4 mins flat.
notes: This is our home and our belongings will be present even though we are not. We try to minimise this though and have things packed away but you may see a trace of us around the house.
transit: The house is a 20min bus ride to Circular Quay and The Opera House, with two bus stops less than a 2/3min walk from the front door.  Central station is less than 10 mins walk away.
access: They will have access to the whole house.
interaction: We are available via text and calls whilst travelling.
house_rules: In regards to lights and especially the cool fans and heaters – these are not cheap to run and we are more than happy for you to make use of them whilst you are in the room and at the house but if these are left on when out, charges may incur, please be mindful of this.   You are most welcome to entertain people at the house guests, family, friends etc. but we request that you please be respectful and not to have additional overnight guests stay unless pre organised when booking.   We try to be as ecofriendly as possible, so there is a recycling bin in the pantry separate to the bin in the kitchen.   We ask that you eat your meals downstairs in either the kitchen or lounge, just to keep the bedrooms as clean as possible and minimise odours.   Please be conscious when you come home late or are leaving early to remove hard soled footwear upstairs as the noise can be incredibly loud and disturbing to others as well as not slamming the doors.   Billie Jean is super friendly and loves a cha

reviews.comments: Very good location! The bus stop is just a minute walk from the door. The restaurants and cafes within the area are very, very good! The house is very spacious and Tarah was such a lovely host! I would definitely recommend this location, especially if you are travelling with kids.
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Back-to-Back House II
summary: Back - to - Back House é uma casa totalmente restaurada. Neste projecto de reconstrução foi usado um conceito moderno e arrojado e também alguns objectos reciclados, como se pode verificar em todo o interior da casa, na sua decoração e mobiliário.
space: Os espaços foram transformados em ambientes com apontamentos de cor e conforto, práticos e acolhedores. Todos esses espaços representam alegria, que é isso que pretendo transmitir, que todos hóspedes se sintam muitos felizes ao passarem pelo Porto e pela minha casa. A casa tem capacidade para 6 pessoas:  O piso superior pode receber até 4 pessoas, tem um quarto principal que possui uma cama de casal e outro quarto com duas camas de solteiro. Todos os quartos têm janela, um deles com varanda, são ambos com luz directa e com bastante privacidade. Ainda conta com um WC completo de apoio aos dois quartos.  A casas de banho além de sabonete, gel de banho tem também secador de cabelo.  No piso (email hidden) kitchenette transforma-se de forma muito prática num amplo quarto caso seja necessário. Tem também um outro wc de serviço, de apoio à sala e cozinha.  A casa apresenta as mais variadas comodidades e equipamentos. A sala e cozinha possui também duas janelas, que oferecem à casa uma lumino
description: Back - to - Back House é uma casa totalmente restaurada. Neste projecto de reconstrução foi usado um conceito moderno e arrojado e também alguns objectos reciclados, como se pode verificar em todo o interior da casa, na sua decoração e mobiliário.   Os espaços foram transformados em ambientes com apontamentos de cor e conforto, práticos e acolhedores. Todos esses espaços representam alegria, que é isso que pretendo transmitir, que todos hóspedes se sintam muitos felizes ao passarem pelo Porto e pela minha casa. A casa tem capacidade para 6 pessoas:  O piso superior pode receber até 4 pessoas, tem um quarto principal que possui uma cama de casal e outro quarto com duas camas de solteiro. Todos os quartos têm janela, um deles com varanda, são ambos com luz directa e com bastante privacidade. Ainda conta com um WC completo de apoio aos dois quartos.  A casas de banho além de sabonete, gel de banho tem também secador de cabelo.  No piso (email hidden) kitchenette transforma-se de forma mui
notes: Não aconselhado a pessoas com pouca mobilidade, visto casa ser duplex.
transit: Para quem chega do Aeroporto: metrô ou táxi  Para quem chega de carro: como todos os centros de cidade é difícil estacionar. Podenos reservar um estacionamento para si próximo da casa por 6€ por dia.
access: A localização da casa, é ideal para explorar a pé o centro histórico do Porto, onde se encontram os principais pontos turísticos da cidade (avenida dos aliados, torre dos clérigos, Livraria Lello, ...) e está inserida na zona de Night Spot (zona de restaurantes, bares) embora se encontre num local tranquilo e silencioso. A Back-to-Back House está localizada a apenas 200 metros da Estação de Metro da Trindade bem como a poucos minutos a pé das principais atracções turísticos da Baixa e da zona da Ribeira.
house_rules: Towels and sheets are included.  On stays of 10 nights or longer includes cleaning during the stay.  Guests should be aware at the time of check in and check out: check in after 3:00 pm and check out until 1200 pm. Should combine and warn in advance the time of check in. Be in contact at the time of check in and tell please if there are some delay. Take care of the House as if it were yours. Leave the House clean and minimally organized.  The dishes should be stored after washed in respective places. Put the garbage outside the House at the end of the stay. Turn off the lights and heaters when absent from home and at the end of the stay. Leave the key on the drop box at the end of the stay.  Thanks in advance kind regards  Joana

host.host_about:
Apaixonada por viagens e conhecer pessoas. 
Amo a minha cidade "O Porto" onde nasci e vivo, tenho também um carinho muito especial por Praga onde vivi 6 meses como estudante Erasmus.
Já tive oportunidade de conhecer vários locais do mundo, das melhores passagens que já fiz até hoje foi a Indonésia e Brasil.
Tenho um gosto especial pelo mundo da moda e tudo o que envolve nossas tendências, bem como a área de design, marketing e decoração de interiores.
A arte de criar é algo que me fascina no meu dia a dia. A criação deste projecto foi para mim algo muito muito especial. Toda os pormenores, cores têm significado para mim e espero que em todos eles se retratem de alguma forma e sintam bem estar. 
Gosto de acolher pessoas de outras cidades, países e culturas e partilhar experiências.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Over this Semana Santa, I travelled to Oporto with a couple of friends and we had the pleasure of staying in Joana and Rui Maia's flat.  When we arrived we immediately received help from a neighbor who let us inside (the Portugese were very nice in general) and Joana and Rui Maia came over promptly.  They gave us a lot of good recommendations, many of which we utilized, and they were very nice in giving us an explanation of the city.  The location couldn't be better.  The house itself is quiet and secluded, but you walk out the front gate and you are right in the heart of the nightlife.  The house was great and we kept commenting on how cool the decoration was and how comfortable.  We had everything we needed once in the house and in the end we felt we needed more time to explore Oporto.  It was a great experience staying here, I would recommend it to anyone

Acabo de hacer un viaje a Oporto con un par de amigos y ha sido una experiencia muy buena, alojarnos en ésta casa. Joana fue una anfitriona fantástica; cuando llegamos nos esperaba con un detalle. Nos hizo muchas sugerencias en cuanto a la zona de restaurantes y para tomar copas en Oporto y estaba en contacto con nosotros a través de wassap, para informarnos de cualquier duda que tuviéramos. El alojamiento estaba muy bien situado, cerca del centro histórico, ya que teníamos muy cerca una parada de Metro, restaurantes y bares .  La casa era nueva, decorada con mucho encanto, estaba bien equipada, y nos sentimos muy cómodos los días que estuvimos. Si volviéramos a Oporto, nos alojaríamos aquí de nuevo, sin duda. Gracias Joana.

Very nice house, well decorated and practical. 
The location was great. 
The hosts are very nice and helpful.
Joana and Rui were very nice ans helpful.  They even offered us a bottle of Porto wine. The house was clean, modern and warmful. We were vert pleased of this stay in Porto.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Joana & Rui were so helpful. They provided an overview of the area and what there was to see. This place is within walking distance of so many of the sites, restaurants, bars and shops. The house was spotless with extra pillows (usually don't have enough of those) and blankets. Everything we need for our stay was provided. I would highly recommend this place.
Espectacular. Un sitio ideal para disfrutar de Oporto. Genial ubicación, decoración y... ¡Todo! ¡No se puede pedir nada más!

Joana and Rui welcomed us with great hospitality (a bottle of port as a gift !)
The apartment is newly renovated, tastefully decorated, spotlessly clean and very welcoming. The apartment description written by Joana and Rui is exactly like the original.
The location is central to everything you need to see in Porto.
The metro station and train station are less than a 5 minute walk; the bus stop is in front of the apartment.
Joana has been truly delightful throughout our stay; it is always concerned that all was well.
In a forthcoming holiday in Porto will certainly be in contact Joana and Rui, highly recommend to use their apartment!

We were absolutely staggered by how well decorated this amazing apartment was in the centre of the thriving Porto 'night quarter'. It was a pleasure to stay here and we were able to fit four people in the double and two single beds. The complimentary bottle of Port and amazing recommendations from Rui at the beginning of our stay was a real bonus and we felt very comfortable here. I'd absolutely recommend this stunning, cosy apartment to anyone visiting Porto :)

Tivemos uma ótima experiência nessa casa, limpa, bem organizada e bonita decoração, exatamente como se vê nas fotos, sem nenhuma surpresa desagradável. Joana foi muito atenciosa e prestativa conosco.O local no centro também é muito agradável e cheio de boas opções de alimentação e transporte. Certamente recomendo e voltaria mais vezes se tivesse oportunidade.

Joana nous a accueilli dans ce très bel appartement et nous a donné tous les conseils nécessaires pour passer un agréable séjour à Porto. L'appartement est vraiment idéalement situé. Nous sommes restés que 2 jours à Porto mais c'est sûr nous reviendrons!

We spent two days in this nice appartment well located in the centre of Lisbon.  Quiet and well equiped it is perfect for friends or a family. 
Joana is really friendly and can help you in case of problems.
The house was really nice and clean, we had a lovely stay in Porto. It is very well situated, it is easy to go everywhere. Plus, Joana is a good host

We were very happy with Joana's place. It fitted perfectly the description and picture, and it was very clean and pleasant. The neighbourhood is very nice. We did not meet with Joana, but she gave us a lot of info by mail, and was very accommodating as for arriving/departing time.

Thank you so much for your hospitality, Joana and Rui -- the location and neighborhood are great! Lots of helpful advice about places to check out and destinations worth visiting. Our stay in Porto was incredibly enjoyable and the apartment was fantastic!!

Vielen Dank für diese tollen vier Tage und die super  Gastfreundlichkeit. Die Unterkunft entsprach genau den abgebildeten fotos und unseren Vorstellungen. Das Haus ist super ausgestattet und alles sehr sauber und ordentlich. Zudem war die lage perfekt, um Porto von dort aus zu erkunden. Man ist schnell sowohl in der Innenstadt als auch am Wasser und hat eine Menge toller Restaurants, Cafés und Bars in der Umgebung. 
Wir haben vor Ort noch einige  Tipps von Joana und Rui persönlich erhalten und wurden sogar vom Bahnhof mit dem Auto abgeholt.
Also nochmal vielen herzlichen Dank für alles!!! :-)

The Back-to-Back House ll is a very nice accommodation.  In the center from the old city..but totaly quit. I' havent sleept that good in the hole 2 weeks holiday :-) good beds also and a very clean place.
Rui and Joana welcomed us very nice. We god a lot of tipps from them and Rui signed everything in a map.

I always would visit this accommodation again.Thanks to Joana and Rui

Thank you for this Time in your House! We had a great Time there. Near from everything! Bars, Clubs, Restaurants, all near! 
The House is very nice, clean and very calm! It is in a Backyard! :) 
Very fast wifi and even a Smart TV! Full equiped Kitchen and a nice Balcony to enjoy some Super Bocks! 
Thank you for the Tips and the nice care! 
I come back! :)

Abraco André

L'accoglienza e' stata eccezionale. Ci ha descritto gli itinerari e le cose più belle da vedere a Porto. Grande disponibilità. L'appartamento e' molto grazioso , con tutti i comfort. Posizione centrale nei quartieri più caratteristici della città e facilmente raggiungibile. Consiglio questo appartamento per un soggiorno a Porto.

La casa estuvo genial. Todo perfecto. Muy bien situada y Joana no hizo la estancia mejor explicandonos todos los sitios que visitar y donde comer. En general, un 10. Sin duda es un sitio donde repetir si algun día volvemos a Oporto. Gracias por todo.

We had a nice welcome to Porto from Joana. The house was clean and exactly as on the pictures. It is a small house but very well designed and carefully decorated. You have everything you need and more to have a nice stay at their place. The location of the house is at a walking distance from the city centre and is very quiet for a good night sleep.
I would definitely recommend it.

Joana and Rui were very nice and helpful hosts. On our arrival they gave us great tips such as breakfast at galeria de paris :-)
The apartment's location was very good as well, everything in walking distance.

Un excellent séjour à Porto chez Joana et Rui ou le soleil et leur gentillesse ont été un pur bonheur. Joana est très attentionnée et cherche vraiment à rendre le séjour à tout point parfait. L appartement très bien décoré et équipé est idéalement situé. Je recommande chaleureusement.

Joana's place is really nice. It is a whole house and it seems to be recently renovated, because everything is new. It is in the bar-center of Porto and you have may cafes, bar, pubs and clubs just around the corner. Nevertheless at night you can't hear anything and it is really quiet for a good nights sleep. From the house you can easily explore the city by foot. Nothing is far away. The house has a great kitchen and a really nice bathroom. We haven't used the living room and the TV, but I'd you need it, it is there.
Joana is very friendly and she gave us may tips and recommendations. She grew up in Porto and knows all the cool places.
Thanks for everything Joana.

Super accueil de Joana, avec pleins de petits conseil sur les restaurants et les différents quartiers a visiter.
de plus Joana nous a gentiment prêtée un poussette pour notre fille de 5 ans, cela nous a grandement facilité la visite de cette belle ville toute en monté.
l appartement est vraiment sympas et très bien décoré avec une bonne literie. il est situé dans un quartier animé .

Appartement très bien situé et très propre. Joana et Rui Maia nous ont très bien accueilli et même à 22h, ils ont pris le temps de nous expliquer les bons restaurants et visites sympa à faire. Merci encore.
Joana merci très beau appartement !! Calme idéal pour visiter Porto !!! Je recommande !!
Appartement très agréable, spacieux et décoré avec gout. La situation est très centrique et permet de visiter Porto a pieds. Très bon rapport qualité/prix. Hôte disponible et sympathique.

The place is absolutely great! It is located downtown, not far from all the nice bars and not too far from the public transportation. Although there is a nightlife right outside the door, the apartment is very quiet. It is also gorgeous inside. We enjoyed it being quite spacey for the two of us and very clean. Also, all the necessary kitchen equipment and cute home accessories made us feel at home. We have met Rui, who has provided us with interesting "insider" tips on where to go  for dinner and recreation. He has also helped us with questions that arised during our stay. Overall, great place, great hosts. We would definitely stay here when we come back to Porto next time. =)

Everything was perfect! 
Great house, close to the center, clean & calm! Joana and Rui were very friendly and helpful hosts! Really recommend this place to discover Porto!

nos hôtes nous ont très gentiment accueillis avec une bonne bouteille de vin portugais et ont pris le temps de nous conseiller.
La maison est à l'image des photos : Coquette, très très bien rénovée et équipée.
Le quartier est super sympa et idéal pour tous les bars et resto qu'il offre.

Our stay at Joana & Rui's appartment was really nice! We were welcomed by Rui, who gave us lots of useful recommendations on what to see, where to eat etc. Also, there was a bottle of wine and two 'pastels de nata' waiting for us. Both Rui and Joana were very helpful before and during our stay. 
The apartment is beautiful and really clean. Everything you need is there. The only thing we missed was a little heater in the living room (or perhaps we just didn't find it) since it was starting to get cold (beginning of December). Other than that it was great! We would definitely come back here.

Fuimos un grupo de 4 personas para visitar la ciudad.
La casa es tal y como sale en las fotos. Muy ordenada y limpia. La ubicación realmente buena, céntrica.
Los anfitriones te hacen sentir como en casa. Nos tenían preparado un detalle de bienvenida ;) Al llegar nos explicó toda la ciudad con un mapa que ellos mismos nos facilitaron. Durante nuestra estancia cualquier duda o problema era solucionado de inmediato. Sin duda los anfitriones se merecen un 10! 
Recomiendo este apartamento.

Great location, so close to the bars and the historical center of Porto, the house is really nice, just as the pics show, as well as our host Joana, which made us a nice welcome with a bottle of Porto and has explained us everything we should see in Porto, where to eat ect., was available for any type of help we needed.
Would definitely recommend it to everyone!

Joana and Rui´s apartment is exactly as in the pictures. Everything is very clean and tidy.
We really enjoy our stay because the location is perfect. 
It is in the very center and we could walk everywhere.
Joana was very helpful, although we didn´t met her because she was working, there was someone waiting for us to deliver the keys. Just very easy.
In any case Joana contacted me a few times to ask us how we were doing and if we had any questions.
For those ones that go to Porto by car I highly recommend to rent her parking space because it is very convenient since Porto's streets can be very busy.
It was a great weekend and Porto is a wonderful city!
Thanks Joana!

Great location, great cozy place! 
Definitely made the difference on our stay, and will definitely recommend.

we arrived to the apartment around 20:00. joana was waiting for us with a smile.
she show us the place, allow us to use everything, and even gave us a map and some recomendation for good restaurants and attractions in porto.
the apartment was beautiful, quiet, warm and we were very happy to stay there.
thank you joana!
Perfectly clean in a perfect location !

We had a lovely time in Porto and were happy to have chosen to stay at Joana's house. Spacious and well-decorated, we certainly felt at home. We were particularly pleased with the area - central without being in too touristy. In fact, the area around her house has many fantastic restaurants and bars. Joana was also very flexible with the check-in and check-out hours which was very much appreciated. The price/quality ratio can't be beat.

It is really a nice experience to live in the apartment. The environment is good, the location is also nice since to all shoping location or even the bridge is within walking distance. It is only ten minutes to the metro station to go to the airport

hôte très sympa. accueil excellent avec une bouteille de vin et des Nata (dessert local).
petit appartement mais bien équipé pour des petits enfants (lit, chaise haute,poussette)
quartier bien situé tout le centre peut être fait a pieds.
un meilleur chauffage sera le bienvenu (il y a un radiateur qu'il faut mettre a fond pour qu'il chauffe les 2 étages) ainsi qu'une bonne aération car ça sent un peu l'humidité.
les back to back houses tiennent vraiment leur noms car ils sont collés l'un a l'autre donc on entend les voisins quand ils parlent ou quand ils passent. 
les hôtes étaient très gentils et très réactifs.
c’était un agréable séjour
Joli appartement très bien situé dans Porto

Great place! Lovely accomodation, clean and very well located (10min away by foot away from metro station Trindade), concentration of bars, shop and restaurants in the neighboorhood.
Very good communication with Joana which had nice attentions for us. Thank you!
thank you for the Portwine and the nice time in Porto! Nice house, top location. Perfect homebase for a trip in Porto.

Très bon accueil de Luis et Joana a été très rapide à nous répondre par mail avant notre séjour!
La petite maison est très bien située, en plein centre, on peut vraiment faire tout à pied sans aucun problème!  
Petit bémol sur l'unique petit chauffage, au mois de mars il ne fait pas très chaud et une odeur d'humidité pas très agréable quand on arrive...
Mais sinon, la maison est très mignonne, très bien décorée et super calme!

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour à Porto! Le logement correspond parfaitement aux photos et la décoration est réalisé avec beaucoup de goût! Il est situé dans une rue calme et le centre historique est accessible à pied en seulement 10 à 15 minutes.
Rien à dire au niveau de l'équipement, on y trouve tout le nécessaire pour un court séjour.

Joana und Rui haben uns sehr herzlich empfangen, sogar eine Flasche Portwein stand bereit. Die beiden haben sich für uns viel Zeit genommen, alles gezeigt und uns viele nützliche Tipps gegeben. Außerdem waren sie die ganze Zeit über ansprechbar und behilflich. Das Häuschen ist geschmackvoll renoviert. Es ist Bestandteil einer kleinen Hinterhaussiedlung und ist dadurch ganz ruhig, obwohl es in einem wunderbar belebten Stadtviertel liegt. Man hat gleich alles vor der Tür: Die nette Bäckerei/Cafeteria Europa, wo man gut frühstücken kann; das Restaurant "A'Taska" (liebenswert von einem Ehepaar und einer Oma geführt), weiterhin gemütliche Kneipen, Trödlerläden usw. Auch als Ausgangspunkt für alle Stadttouren ist die Lage ideal. Alles in allem waren wir dort genau richtig am Platz, haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt und würden die Unterkunft jederzeit gerne wieder mieten.

The apartment is really nice, well located, well furnished. Simply awesome! Joana received us gently and gave really nice tips on how to get around. Communication was also smooth and clear. Totally recommended!!!

Joana was a great host. She answered all our questions quickly and in full. The apartment was clean and well decorated. It had everything that was necessary.  Joana had a bottle of port for us as a welcome gift, a nice touch. However, the apartment is significantly smaller than it appears in the pictures. There was also a moldy smell downstairs. The location is good.

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour à Porto. Le logement correspondait aux photos, linge de lit et de toilette très propres.
Concernant l'accueil, il a été très chaleureux : Joana nous a attendus malgré un retard d'1 heure dû à l'avion, et nous a présentés la maison de A à Z. Une bouteille de Porto nous attendait... Quoi demander de mieux?

Séjour très agréable dans la Back-to-Back House II.
Belle rénovation, maison calme tout équipée et emplacement idéal pour découvrir Porto à pied (20 minutes du Douro, 10 minutes de l'hyper centre).
Joana et Rui sont très sympathiques, disponibles et nous ont indiqué les meilleures "spots" de Porto. 
Si nous revenons à Porto, nous reviendrons à la Back-to-Back House II

Apartment is in a good central location, in a cluster of attached apartments inside a gate. Joana met us and explained everything and gave us a nice bottle of Port. 
Bedrooms are up a narrow staircase so not ideal for those with mobility issues or large luggage. Bed was very comfortable - very cute place.

Quel accueil ! Nous sommes arrivés le jour de la fin de l'année universitaire. La circulation à Porto était saturée et nous étions totalement perdus, Joana et Rui sont venus à notre rencontre à pied pour nous guider dans la ville après être monté avec nous en voiture. Rui nous a ensuite indiqué les lieux importants de Porto à ne pas manquer (en les signalant sur le plan de la ville). Une bouteille de vin de Porto nous attendait à la location. Cette location est très agréable, au calme et à 2 pas du centre historique. La visite de la ville peut sans problème se faire à pied. Nous avons eu l'occasion de croiser Rui durant notre séjour et là encore, nous avons passé un excellent moment. Nous recommandons cette location, idéale pour 4 personnes. Propreté irréprochable, décoration de bon goût. Si nous devons retourner à Porto, ce sera sans hésitation chez ces hôtes d'une gentillesse exceptionnelle. Un grand merci à Rui et Joana, les quelques instants passés avec eux ont largement contribué à la réussite de notre séjour.
Perfect situation next to city center. Nice welcome explaining the best place to visit. Nice little house And very clean. Thanks for the stay ! Charlotte

Logement tout à fait conforme aux photos et descriptions. Récemment rénové et très propre, le logement est spacieux et bien entretenu. 
Il est en plus dans une cours très calme et bien situé. Tout le centre est accessible à pied. 

L'accueil a été sympathique (effectué par la sœur de Joana) avec différents conseils de choses à faire. 

A recommander !

Zum zweiten Mal in der Wohnung unseren Urlaub verbracht und zum zweiten Mal genial. Danke für alles.

Been there the Second time and again it was a pleasure to stay there. Highly recomended.

The house is exactly how it looks on the photo's; really tidy and modern. Joana welcomed us with a bottle of port wine and an extensive explanation about all the highlights on the map. We used it all week!

The location of the house is perfect. On top of the hill, so the only way to go is down. At the end of the day we often took a taxi uphill, wich took us only around € 5,-. Porto is lovely and so is Joana and the house. Highly recommended!

Lovely apartment, very clean and convenient for exploring Porto.
Joana was very helpful in providing us information about the city.
Joana foi muito simpática! Mostrou a casa inteira, nos deu mapas e ainda dicas do que conhecer na cidade! Adoramos! O apartamento em do estava muitoo limpo e organizado! Excelente! :)

Joana was a really nice host, always available! The flat is super cute, clean  and really well located, just 5min walking from the main metro station Trindade, and equipped with all amenities including Wi-Fi. 
I highly raccomend this place!!

SUPER ! Merci à Joana pour ces précieux conseils sur le quartier (restaurants et supermarché) ça a vraiment contribué à faire de notre séjour un super moment.
La maison est très bien située dans Porto (prés du métro direct de l'aéroport), nous avons tout fait à pied. 
La maison est très calme et super bien équipée, c'est parfait avec un enfant. 
Nous conseillons vraiment la maison et le quartier.

Great house, clean, fully equiped and rather well decorated. The balcony on the second floor is very nice for a morning coffee.

The neighbourhood is great, closer to the city center than I anticipated (10 / 15 minutes walk) and with lots of nice bars and restaurants around.

The hosts were very welcoming and stayed in touch during the whole stay.

We had a great stay in Joana's house. She met us at check in and took the time to show us on a map the main places to see, including the closest supermarkets. The house was as described and very comfortable. A lot of care has been taken with the decorating. The location is perfect to get around and close to the main attractions but still quiet and peaceful. Joana messaged me part way through our stay to check if everything was ok, and made herself readily available.  Would definitely stay again and recommend to others.
Malgré notre heure d'arrivée tardive, Joana a fait preuve d'une grande générosité à notre endroit ! Appartement complet, propre et douillet et très très bien situé !

The house is well located at centre of city with 5 minutes walking distance to Lello bookstore and Clerigos tower. There are many good restaurants and convenient stores nearby. You can easily catch Metro and bus just out of the house. The house is clean and well operated with everything you may need. Joana and her friend Paula are very nice and helpful. They responded to all my requests very quickly. If I got chance to travel in Porto again, definitely I will choose to live in the same house.

Gracias por estar tan atenta de nosotros, poco tiempo tuvimos para contestarte a tiempo, pero si, encontramos todo perfecto para nuestra estancia.
Gracias.
Cute tiny place. It is much smaller than it looks in the photos. Staircase is very very narrow. Had to leave our bags downstairs. Liked the decor - location was interesting.

Modern and well designed/decorated apartment in a great location close to some great (and cheap) bars and restaurants, but away from the tourist areas so you had a more local feel to the neighbourhood.  The apartment was also off the street in a cute laneway.

Joana made check in/out easy and provided some useful tips on where to go and what to do.  The apartment was really clean and had all the amenities you could need for a short or long stay.  The city is walkable but it is a long walk uphill from the river.

Rui greeted me at the door and made me feel right at home. He provided helpful suggestions for restaurants and activities throughout the city. The house is on a charming little side street, and is set up with everything you could want for a comfortable stay. It was great!

Pequeno, mas conveniente.

A casa é em um terreno com várias casinhas, algumas reformadas, outras bem velhas.

Parece que Rui e Joana têm mais de uma casinha nesse espaço. A que fiquei (casa 3) era toda reformada, bem limpinha.

É pequena (menor do que aparenta nas fotos), mas adequada a quem vai passear em Porto (afinal, ninguém viaja para ficar dentro da casa/hotel).

Como avisado no anúncio, realmente a casa não é adequada a quem tem mobilidade reduzida porque a escada para os quartos é muito estreita (mais estreita do que a foto deixa transparecer) e, também, dificulta levar malas maiores para os quartos.

Os quartos são pequenos (não há como deixar malas nos quartos), bem como o banheiro.

O banheiro é sem banheira (ainda bem: sem riscos de escorregar durante a ducha). O banheiro de baixo é um lavabo (sanitário e pia – esta muito estreita) sem ducha (não há espaço para tomar banho).

A cozinha tem os equipamentos necessários, a TV é boa e o Wi-Fi funciona muito bem.

A comunicação com os proprietários foi sempre rápida e eficiente, recebendo orientações precisas de como chegar de carro (o GPS não localizou a rua).

O check-in foi feito pela Paula, com eficiência e presteza, dando as informações necessárias sobre a casa.
This place is really charming and could not be better located in the historical center of Porto. Plus, the guest was really arranging for the arrival time.

nous avons passe un tres bon sejour chez Joana et Rui, appartement conforme a l annonce comme sur les photos, rien ne manque. 
Il est tres bien situé nous avons visité Porto a pied.
Nous reviendrons volontiers chez Joana et Rui.Encore unn grand merci!!!

A very comfortable and well designed appartment, ideally located to visit Porto. Paula who welcomed us was very reactive and kind.
A great place to stay 2-3 days!

Le logement est très bien situé et nous l'avons trouvé facilement à la sortie du métro. 
Le quartier est très sympathique, vivant, sûr et central. 
L'accueil s'est bien passé et l'appartement était impeccable et de bon goût.
Todo tal y como se describe en el anuncio, un espacio muy agradable y tranquilo, con una localización inmejorable.

The welcome from Joana was great, she was helpful and understanding even though we arrived later than planned because the flight was delayed. The house is lovely, perfect for 2 or for a small family of 4. I would definitely recommend it, it really is at the center of Porto. Overall great house, great host, great stay!

Une belle petite maison, dommage que son voisin avait eu l'idée de faire les travaux durant notre séjour, pour les siestes du petit, ce n'était pas facile. Sinon la localisation est parfaite, l'hôte est sympathique et de bons conseils, merci à elle.

Ce logement est idealement bien situe : proche de tous les momuments, de restaurants .... et cache dans une ruelle : au calme aussi ! Conforme aux photos publiees, rien ne manque, c est vraiment tres bien !!! joli, sympa et moderne. Nous avons ete accueillis par une amie de Joana et Rui car ils travaillaient. Elle nous a tout montre correctement malgre notre heure tardive d arrivee . Merci
Propre, confortable, dans une rue clame et bien situé, notre séjour fut tout simplement parfait !

Logement correspondant bien au descriptif. Bonne situation géographique dans Porto : proche métro, commerces et visites de sites. 
Joana nous a fourni un plan avec les indications sur la ville de Porto.

Wir wurden sehr freundlich von einer Freundin von Joana und Rui empfangen und in das Haus eingewiesen. Das keine Back-to-Back Haus entsprach der Beschreibung und den Fotos. Alles war sehr nett und sauber eingerichtet. Die Lage des Hauses ist zentral in einem Hinterhof. Der angebotene Parkplatz für unseren Mietwagen wurde auch durch die beiden organisiert und lag in circa 5 Min. Entfernung vom Haus. Es ist wirklich unbedingt erforderlich einen Parkplatz zu mieten, falls man mit dem Auto in Porto unterwegs ist.

Porto fut une magnifique découverte, le logement de Joana & Rui est idéalement placé, à quelques minutes à pied de la station de métro Trindade (pratique lorsqu'on arrive de l'aéroport) en plein cœur du centre historique et de ses lieux touristiques, nous avons pu explorer la ville à pied de long en large. 
C'est une mignonne petite maison parfaite pour un couple et 2 amis qui correspond tout à fait aux photos. Le plus est qu'elle est située dans un passage privé au calme, à deux pas des bons petits restaurants et de la pâtisserie du quartier. :)
Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Paula qui nous a indiqué les emplacements de l'épicerie et des différents lieux à voir dans le quartier.
Joana quant à elle s'est toujours montrée très réactive et fut vraiment adorable.
Je recommande vivement de séjourner chez Joana et Rui lors de votre séjour à Porto.
Moi j'y retournerai sans hésiter!!! 
Muito obrigado pour cet excellent séjour.

Merci Joana ans Luis, cette petite maison était parfaite, très bien décorée et bien située. Merci à Paula également.
Many thanks Joana and Luis, this house is perfect, with a beautiful decoration, and his located is nice in Porto. Thanks to Paula too.
Marina

easy to communicate with hosts via phone & email. Arrangements made to store luggage until apartment ready. Location is great, close to good food, laundromat, supermarkets & metro as well as the main city sights of Porto.

Accueil correct . Le logement proposé est très agréable, très accueillant, propre ,bien équipé.Il est très bien situé dans la ville , à proximité des services, du métro et l'accès au bas de la ville, à pied, est facile,pas trop long.

The appartment was really perfect and felt like home. 
Joana very lovely and helping. 
Bad experience with a noisy neighbour, but I hope and think it was exceptionnal.

The communication was very smooth and quick. A friend and I have spent 3 nights in the apartment, and it was nice for the 2 of us. I recommend not having more than 4 persons in the apartment to keep some level of (personal) space. Also, there are only 4 chairs at the dining table. Paula waited for us to hand over the keys, and despite our late arrival because of a delayed flight, she took the time to kindly explain where we could things like a supermarket, local restaurants and the highlights of (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommenddation is to share the cell phone number from Paula, as we couldn't let her know that our flight was delayed. I really felt bad for her and her son, who were waiting very late in the evening.

The neighbourhood is fantastic, very upcoming and close to the city center. 
I'd highly recommend this apartment!

Appartement très coquet dans lequel on se sent tout de suite chez soi; Très bien situé par rapport aux différents sites incontournables de Porto; Pratique par rapport au métro qui nous ramène à l'aéroport et des petits restos et cafés sur toutes les places environnantes voire à proximité immédiate!!!Pas de commentaires sur nos hôtes puisque nous ne les avons pas rencontré; en revanche, une dame était là pour nous accueillir malgré le retard de l'avion .
