We had a great stay at Back-to-Back house II. Not so far from city center and Douro river. New, clean and stylish. Could be a problems with car parking near appartments. Highly recommended.

Hemos pasado unos días estupendos en la casa de Joana. Muy atenta con cualquier cosa que le pedíamos. La casa está muy bien ubicada para moverse andando por el centro de la ciudad. Muy limpia y cuidada. Todo perfecto. Gracias Joana
Una casita con mucho encanto, perfectamente decorada. Nos encantó. Se encuentra en una pequeña calle interior, muy tranquila.Muy recomendable.
La casa es hermosa. Las fotos son reales y aunque el barrio en la noche es un poco ruidoso está muy bien ubicado.

Appartement très bien placé, propre et bien équipé. 
L'appartement est vraiment conforme au photo.

The apartment is absolutely lovely and so are the owners! They gave us lots of really great tips on how to make the most of our short stay in Porto. The location of the apartment is perfect - you can walk to most places very comfortably. Can't wait to stay there again!
Lugar muy bien situado en Oporto. Nosotros fuimos con coche e incluso pueden gestionar un aparcamiento bastante económico. Todo impecable.
We had an amazing couple of days in Porto. Great location and very convenient!
Nous avons été bien accueillies par Joana qui a pris le temps de nous expliquer ce qu'il y avait à voir et à faire à Porto. L'appartement est bien situé, très joliment décoré et agréable.

Great location in Porto. 5 minute walk to the metro, Clérigos Tower and lots of restaurants and bars. Maybe a 15 minute walk to the river. House is a good size for 4 adults. Balcony was a relaxing place to enjoy some port. Joana and Paula are very welcoming and informative about the area. Would definitely stay here again.
Très agréable petite maison dans le centre. Très propre , accueillant, confortable.

Le logement est joliment décoré, bien situé, avec tout ce qu'il faut dedans, dans un quartier sympathique mais: il est très exigu (attention si vous êtes grand et bien bâti), l'appartement sent l'humidité, il n'y avait assez de serviettes de toilettes, pas de schampoing (comme indiqué dans l'annonce ) , le wifi ne fonctionnait pas, et surtout beaucoup de bruit aux alentours la nuit.

Hola! Hemos estado el pasado fin de semana en la casa de Joana & Rui. Ha sido todo perfecto. 
La casa tal cual como muestran las fotografías. Una decoración bonita y con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días como en casa. La zona muy tranquila y cercana al centro.
Los anfitriones muy atentos con nosotros.

Très joli appartement idéalement situé au coeur de Porto.
La décoration est très agréable, la literie très confortable et les hôtes bienveillants.
Je recommande vivement et y retournerai sans hésitation lors de mes prochains voyages à Porto.
Joana and Rui waren sehr freundlich und gaben uns hilfreiche Informationen zu Porto und der direkten Nachbarschaft. Die Unterkunft ist schön eingerichtet und entspricht den Bildern. Danke :)

The house was definitely smaller than it looked in the pictures, but still so nice and clean! I believe there is a bar close by, because we could hear people yelling through the hours of the night.

Overall, a great experience! I would definitely choose to stay here again, and Joana was extremely helpful and accommodating.

The apartment is lovely, new , cozy and well decorated.
The location is perfect , Rui the host was very helpful and gave me loads of tips in Porto.

We had a issue during my stay , Rui took action  and we were able to find a solution immediately.
Very nice house. Perfect to stay with 2 or 3 people. Fantastic location. Clean. Thank you very much!

My stay at Joana and Rui`s home was wonderful.  As hosts, they went out of their way to help me and make sure my stay was enjoyable.

The house is cute, perfectly sized, and perfectly located for Porto`s retaurants, bars and tourists attractions.

I have only great things to say about this stay, and was one of my best Airbnb experiences.

Highly recommended.
Very neat little house. Perhaps too small for six adults. Very well equipped and very nicely decorated.  Excellent location. We enjoyed our stay very much!

Fantastic! What a beautiful place to stay in Porto! It is absolutely gorgeous and the hosts are incredibly nice. I would totally use this place again! Thanks for a fantastic stay! It is super clean and super tidy and in the best location ever! I would recommend for anyone considering going to Porto.
The flat was perfectly described and well equipped!
Sim.. foi atenciosa... correspondendo  ao anúncio... bairro  bom

Fantastic apartment, well located and clean. The apartment is in a safe compound surrounded by other apartments and quite close to some prettychilled out bars. Joanna herself is very quick to respond to requests and queries and was the perfect host. Apartment is also well equipped if you feel the need to cook and beds are comfy. Only thing is it gets cold upstairs so you would need to bring the portable heater upstairs. Also, Car parking is located in a secure space 5 min walk from the apartment. Would stay here again.
Great house, excellent location, all amenities...!
Una casa ideal en una Illa típico de Porto, muy confortable, bien decorada y ubicada.
Like the pictures very clean and well equiped easy acess to all porto attraction i recommand this location

Beautifully appointed apartment. Photos are very accurate. Great location with a fantastic cafe right down the street. The bed in the master bedroom was superb!!! Plenty of pillows as well, something we found as a rarity in many homes we've stayed in. Easily walk to downtown Porto and even Gaia. Communication was very quick. Our check-in was very late due to delays at the airport, but Joana friend was helpful getting us settled. We booked a parking spot with Joana as well and it was very close to the apartment. Visitors may wish to use Best Western Inca Hotel as the GPS waypoint, as our GPS and phone did not pull up the listed address.  Already looking forward to a trip back!

The communication with joana was fantastic. She was really responsive and helpful is setting taxi rides for us. Location is good, very near livraria lello. The place is well decorated. We had a great stay. Thanks!

Very flexible, gave us lots of info and did everything to make our stay a great one and even let us have a late check out as they had no-one coming in that day.  Would stay here again and recommend to our friends

We met at the apartment and everything was explained and some helpful hints given regarding were to pick up groceries and a few suggestions for meals. It was exactly as portrayed on AirBnB. Beautifully decorated and has everything we needed.
We loved the area, lots of second hand/antique stores nd old book stores.
Lovely and comfortable place. The apartament is excellent, cozy and really well decorated. It is also convenient with good places to eat nearby. I would definetely reccomend the place.

Tout s'est passé comme prévu. L'accueil a été excellent, efficace (visite de la maison, essai des clés, quelques instructions, des recommandations de restaurants, de sites à visiter). La maison est, en tous points, conforme à sa description. Elle est très calme, vu qu'elle ne donne pas sur la rue mais sur une petite impasse à l'intérieur d'un pâté de maison. Le quartier est aussi intéressant, en cours de mutation .

The place was quaint, clean, and lovely. The host met us at the place and provided us with everything we needed. It is in great location to all the sites. The communication was good before arrival, but petered out.
Awesome place in an amazing location!

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour à Porto , la maison correspond à la description. Joanna est une bote charmante et la maison est située idéalement dans le centre de la ville. Si nous retournons à Porto, nous réserverons à nouveau cet endroit .
Fabienne

The flat was perfect a good location, everything really cosy and really nice decoration. Everything worked well with the owners, they even organized a park for us! We would come back anytime, thank you very much

Hemos pasado unos dias geniales en Porto y en casa de Joana y Rui. La casa genial y muy original. Super tranquila en una calle muy auténtica. Cerca del centro y bien comunicada. Si volvemos a Porto, volveremos a alojarnos allí.

La petite maisonnette ainsi que le quartier sont vraiment top. Décorée avec goût, très propre et moderne, elle présente un emplacement idéal pour visiter Porto. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour en ce lieu. Toutefois, la capacité d'accueil n'est pas de 6 personnes. Il y a effectivement deux chambres, l'une avec un lit de grande taille et dans l'autre deux petits lits dont un accessible par une échelle. De plus il n'y a pas deux salles de bains, la description est fausse.  Il y a une salle de bains à l'étage et au rez de chaussée, il y a un WC ainsi qu'un tout petit lavabo dans un réduit de moins d'1 m2. (Les photos sont trompeuses) Cette maisonnette est idéale pour un couple avec 1 enfant ou 2 maxi.

Nous n'avons pas vu Joana et Rui, une amie a eux nous a accueillie.
Le logement était dans l'ensemble correct. Il ne peut cependant pas accueillir 6 voyageurs dans la mesure où la 2ème chambre est équipée de 2 lits d'une personne. Nous avons subi une disjonction d'électricité (partie éclairage du living, cuisine et 1 wc) pendant 2 jours dues à des pluies importantes et certainement des infiltrations dans le faux plafond, non résolue à notre départ. le logement est bien situé dans une impasse calme

We had a lovely stay in the house. The house looks like on the photos. It is in a small alley hidden behind a gate from the main street. The place was clean and cosy, if a little humid downstairs. It has been decorated with love and has some quirky and tight corners and a narrow staircase that might be a challenge for some people. The second bedroom is a bit small but perfect for children. Once the ladder is set up it is however a bit difficult to open the door.
The main bedroom leads to a lovely terrace on which you can have a drink after a day of walking around in downtown Porto.
The recommended restaurant A Tasca three doors down is a typical Portuguese place where we had a lovely and cheap dinner. A supermarket is only a block away.
The communication and key handover worked as agreed.
Maison très bien équipée et bien placée pour visiter Porto. Nous ne sommes restés que 2 nuits mais nous avons beaucoup apprécié ce séjour chez Joana et Rui.

We loved our stay at back to back house II. What was especially nice was the area...there are a whole lots of lovely bars near the apartment full of locals. there are a lot of great eating options near by too. The apartment is also conveniently located to walk to all sites. I highly recommend this apartment
L'accueil de Paula était très sympa. Très à l'écoute.

The house is beautiful and so well located for the best parts of Porto - we loved it. Breakfast on the roof terrace in the sunshine is the best way to start the day - and it's a short walk to the river and port tours. The bars nearby are excellent and the locals are really friendly. Great place to stay!
Agréable maison,  située dans un quartier typique très proche du centre de Porto. Très bien aménagée, avec une petite terrasse..
Très bon accueil malgré notre arrivée tardive, superbe appartement au calme et très bien placé dans Porto. Livraison express du lit bébé. Parfait! Merci beaucoup.
Logement propre, moderne et calme. Tres bien placé, notamment près d'un tres bon resto «elebe» situé dans la rue perpendiculaire dans l'angle. Je recommande ce logement !

We verbleven er met ons gezin van 4 personen. Het huisje voldoet aan alle gemaken, het ligt in een klein straatje en is gezellig ingericht.
De ligging is ideaal om Porto te verkennen en te leren kennen, alle bezienswaardigheden liggen op wandelafstand. Er zijn leuke restaurantjes en sfeervolle cafeetjes in de buurt.

Nous avons été trés bien reçu par Paola.
Joana et Rui n'étaient pas là. Mais tout c'est trés bien passé. Le logement etait le reflet des photos qui sont sur le site. Il est trés bien situé et trés calme.
Joana a été trés réactive lorsque que nous avions besoin de quelque chose.
Juste une petite chose, je pense qu'il aurait été plus judicieux de mettre un lave linge à la place d'un lave vaisselle. Nous sommes restés 2 semaines et ce n'est pas évident pour laver le linge car pas de PRESSING.

Et pas assez de vaisselle pour faire tourner un lave vaisselle. 

De plus au PORTUGAL on mange au restaurant, c'est tellement bon !!!! et il y a tellement de chose à découvrir.

Autrement Il n'y a rien à dire, nous avons passé un agréable séjour (2 semaines) nous y retournerons et le recommandons sans aucun probléme.

Tout était très bien : le logement est beau, propre, conforme aux photos, bien situé dans Porto et contient tout le nécessaire auquel on peut s'attendre. 
À notre arrivée nous avons été très bien accueillie. Après un petit tour de l'appartement avec notre hôte (Paula) cette dernière nous a présenté un plan de la ville avec les principaux lieux à visiter. Elle s'est également chargé de nous réserver un taxi pour notre départ. C'était parfait !
Our stay was very nice! You have everything you need in this apartment! Great are the two toilets and it's very close to the best bars of the city!

The apartment is lovely. When we first arrived, we thought we might be in the wrong place but once we got into the unit, it was just like the pictures. Joana was great to communicate with. The place was well-stocked and in a great place for walking around. Just a few doors down is a wonderful, authentic restaurant. Only small issue was a boisterous neighbour that chatted loudly into the night but all in all, we loved the experience.

Não conheci Joana e Rui pessoalmente, mas a amiga deles foi super solícita e nos explicou tudo. Os dois entraram em contato comigo por telefone e mensagem. Consegui deixar meu carro no estacionamento providenciado por eles até tarde, após o checkout. Foi tudo ótimo! 

A casa fica numa vilinha bem localizada. Nem precisei pegar metrô em Porto. Fiz tudo a pé. A casa estava limpa e bem equipada. Se voltar a porto, pretendo ficar lá novamente.

Our visit to Porto was amazing - the city, the culture, the people. Joana and Rui's place for us was in an ideal location, a lively quarter of Porto surrounded by lots of great bars and restaurants. We were a mixed group 2 sisters in our late 30's/early 40's and our Dad who is 70.

Once we had navigated the city on our first day we realised that everywhere was so accessible. The map Rui sent to me prior to us arriving was great we easily found our way from the Trinidade Metro station to the Back to Back House. 

Our welcome was great too - the house was spotlessly clean, comfortable with everything on hand you could ask for.

All in all we had a very special trip to Porto to celebrate or Dad's 70th birthday.

We would all consider visiting Porto again in the future and possibly staying at the Back-to-Back House II

We only stayed for one night but it was great. Location was central and the apartment was perfect. We arrived late but Joana made it possible for us to meet with Paula who showed us around and provided parking for a minimal fee. Wish we could have stayed longer.

L'appartement sur deux niveaux est très bien décoré. 
Il se trouve dans une impasse dans un quartier sympathique ( restaurants / boutiques / visite de monuments)
Â notre arrivée une personne était là pour nous donner les clefs. Nous avons eu un bon accueil.
Experiencia perfecta. Ubicación ideal, se puede recorrer todo porto andando. Muy cómodo el apartamento y bien equipado. joana Nos contrató el taxi que nos busco en el aeropuerto. Lo recomiendo 100%

Joana and Rui's place was a Portuguese dream! Everything was very clean and modern, yet the house is located along an alley that really makes you feel like a local. There are several bars in the area and the Rio Douro is about a 15 minute walk from the house. If you have a chance, go to O Maria at the corner of the block to pick up some delicious bifanas!

Joana and Rui's place was an excellent launching point for exploring downtown Porto. Within walking distance of all major attractions, it provided a good home base for storing bags during the day and sleeping when back at night. While the tiny apartment is off the main street, and only minimal late night noise filtered through from people leaving the bars, there was a very loud neighbor throughout one of the mid-week nights that made it somewhat difficult to sleep.
Appartement conforme à l'annonce , propre et fonctionnel , idéal pour les courts séjours

El apartamento de Joana & Rui es perfecto: recién remodelado, muy bien decorado, y perfecto para cuatro personas.  Está muy bien ubicado, a 5 min. aproximadamente de la Torre de los Clérigos y de la librería Lello.  No conocimos personalmente ni a Joana ni a Rui, pero estuvimos constantemente en contacto con ellos vía (Hidden by Airbnb) , siempre muy atentos y pendientes de nosotros.  Recomiendo 100% este apartamento.
Great little place in a nook very close to the heart of Porto.

Our experience in this apartment of Porto was very good. 

The place is great and Joana organized well the check-in in order to help us when arriving from the airport. 

I recommend !
everything was prefect! i recommend
Perfect location, kind host, Nice decoration but some humidity problems in the appartment (bathroom and living room). Otherwise i definitely recommend!

The flat is just as you can imagine with the pics. Tiny but lovely and well located to discover Porto. Paula welcomed us greatly despite our late arrival, close to midnight. We hard a great week end in Porto in this appartement

Nous avons été accueilli par Paula, la voisine à notre arrivée. Elle nous a montré tout ce qu'il y avait à savoir dans l'appartement et nous a conseillé quelques visites. L'appartement est confortable, dans une impasse en retrait de la rue. Le quartier est calme, un excellent restaurant , le "museu d'avo" est à deux pas. L'emplacement est idéal, près de la station de métro Trinidade. La découverte de la ville à pied se fait idéalement à partir du logement.
La douche fuit un peu, et l'espace paraît plus exigü que sur les photos mais sinon, il n'y a rien à redire;
nous conseillons cet endroit pour passer un séjour agréable.
Barbara et Valérie
El apartamento nos ha gustado mucho. Esta muy bien situado y tiene todas las comodidades para pasar unos días en Porto.

La descrizione fornita dall'host corrisponde appieno all'appartamento. Ci sono due stanze confortevoli e due bagni, una cucina soggiorno molto spaziosa dotata di ogni necessario, il tutto era luminoso e pulito. L'appartamento si trova vicino  alla metro trinidade e Aliados e a 10 minuti di cammino dal centro storico , ha nelle vicinanze due supermarket (pingo doce e mini markt) , farmacie , panetterie , e ristoranti economici. L'host è stata molto gentile e disponibile  a fornire tutte le informazioni su osa vedere e dove mangiare .
Tres bon contact avec Joanna. Petite maison charmante très bien située
Great place to stay with a small family, nice and well furnutured house in a fine and lively neighbourhood. Joana and Rui are good hosts and its definitely a house to return to!
Wonderful! Thank you so much!

El apartamento es como aparece en las fotos. Es pequeño pero muy bien ubicado. La llegada y salida fueron muy bien. Lo único malo es que sólo había un calefactor y hacia frío en todo el apartamento, sobre todo arriba en las habitaciones. Nos dijeron que podíamos subirlo pero las escaleras eran bastante estrechas y además siendo sólo uno y dos habitaciones tampoco era una solución.
The location is perfect. The host is very friendly. Only be aware that the stairs are not safe for little kids.

Bon séjour chez Rui qui est très accueillant et nous a donné les visites et bonnes adresses à faire sur Porto. Seul petit bémol, il faisait un peu froid mais cela n'enlevait rien au charme de ce bel appartement refait à neuf récemment je pense. Sinon l'appartement est tes bien situé dans une rue calme et proche de tout.

We loved this place! It is very well located (walking distance to everywhere) and it is very well arranged inside! The flat looks the same as in the pictures! It was very clean and the hosts were very cooperative. We highly recommend this place to stay!

Du bon et du moins bon: 
Bon:  l'emplacement vraiment très bien 
Pas bon: l'odeur de tabac dans le logement, les lits et sur les draps de bain! Une fuite sur la cabine de douche

Joana et Rui sont très sympathiques, prennent contact avant l'arrivée, vous donnent un itinéraire précis, et de précieux conseils à l'arrivée.
L'appartement est très sympa et bien situé, je recommande chaudement !
中等吧
Casa linda e confortável, a distancia a pé dos principais pontos! Excelente escolha!!

We had a very Nice stay. The house is located in a very quiet area of porto, which is very good! It's very close to everything. The house number is 31 you have to walk throug a steal gate to enter the little street. The only problem we had was the cold water in the shower After 5 minutes, so the next person Which wants to take a shower had cold water.
After a warm welcome with great tips and explanations we had a superstay in your apartment thanks!

El apartamento es como se ve en las fotos, es pequeño pero está al lado del centro. El inconveniente fue al abrir el sofá cama, pues no estaba limpio; las sabanas estaban limpias pero no las colchas ya que había bastantes pelos que no eran nuestros y eso deberían comprobarlo antes. Otro de los inconvenientes fue el baño de arriba, se salía el agua por abajo y algún enchufe que no funcionaba.
La cocina está completamente equipada. 
No nos recibió Joana pero fue muy amable con nosotras y nos explicó las cosas más importantes de Porto.

Logement bien conçu et décoré avec goût dans une ruelle typique cachée. Petite odeur d'humidité / renfermé. Excellent accueil de Paula qui nous a réservé un taxi pour 5h du matin le jour de notre départ.
Rustige buurt, klein maar volledig huis
Bon emplacement dans la ville mais inadapté au delà de 4 voyageurs. Décoration sympa  mais logement humide.
Excelente localização!

appartement très bien situé proche des sites de visite et de  la vie nocturne. A préciser avant départ:
 les couchages 1 seul lit 2 places + un canapé convertible et 2 lits 1 personne.
1 salle de bain et 1 pièce d'eau
un peu juste pour 6 adultes mais ok pour une famille

Nous avons passé 4 jours à Porto dans cette maison-appartement qui très bien situé pour avoir tout à quelques pas: restaurants, épiceries, souvenirs et les sites touristiques essentiels. C'est assez petit mais bien conçu, mais faut pas être obèse pour passer dans l'escalier. 
De nature très positive, je ne suis pas très exigeante surtout en vacances. J'aurais préféré faire part de remarques à nos hôtes, mais personne n'est venu donc voici les points qui m'ont bcp dérangé :
L'accès au lit enfant en hauteur est  vraiment dangereux (échelle mobile non  fixée) il manque 1 voire 2 vis aux chaises qui sont branlantes, avec mes 80 kg je n'ai pas oser m'asseoir dessus !  Plusieurs prises électriques sont cassées, ou arrachées du mur laissant apparaître les fils. Et pour couronner tout ça, une odeur d'egout très présente et persistante.
La literie est vraiment très très ferme, en fait trop, y compris le canapé ou mon fils avec ses 40 kg tout mouillé avait très mal au dos. 
Dernier reproche, quand on loue pour 4-6 personnes on laisse plus de 2 verres et 2/3 tasses dans la cuisine.
Malgré de nombreux points forts (prix et emplacement), je ne retournerai pas dans ce logement avec les enfants et je ne le recommande pas non plus pour plus de 4 personnes.
O espaço é como nas fotos, mas recomendo para no máximo 3 pessoas. Bairro central vibrante e perto de tudo.
Boa localização.
Casa acogedora, parece mas grande en fotos. El trato con Joana super bien, nos recomendó sitios donde ir y donde cenar.
This place was really well situated and nice for 4 people. Thanks Paula for the warm welcome & the very detailed explanation on the better spots to be seen in the city.

Appartement très propre et bien équipé. Bien accueillis à notre arrivée par Paula qui nous a donné des informations pratiques. Le logement est bien placé par rapport à sa proximité du centre ville et de lieux de restauration de très bons rapports qualité-prix.
La plus petite chambre donne sur une cour qui peut être bruyante le soir en raison d'une auberge de jeunesse proche. La fenêtre fermée isole heureusement bien du bruit.
La petite terrasse n'est pas idéalement placée et peu pratique en raison de sa taille et du vis à vis.
Dès notre arrivée il manquait des vis aux chaises de la salle. Il faudrait absolument les réparer.

This is the perfect home base for a Porto trip. The apartment is cute and well equipped. Our host was super helpful and she offered a great parking space to us for 7 euros per day. Highly recommended!!

중심가에서는 많이 떨어져 있어요.
거리 자체가 먼 건 아닌데 워낙 포르투가 언덕이 많고 날씨가 더울 때면 다니시기 힘듭니다ㅠㅠ
아! 집에 개미가 너~~~~~무 많아요ㅠㅠ

그래도 집 자체는 깨끗하고 마음에 들었어요.

The apartment is cozy, but very friendly. It's located in a hip area and a short walk to the waterfront. The living room was large and inviting and the master was comfortable. The smaller room with the bunk beds was not enough room for two people and had ants, and the room was very warm (warmer than the outside temperature,  particularly on the top bunk). If you opened the window, it helped a little but you then heard all of the loud bar noise. In the morning, we faced loud construction noise. 

If you are traveling with 2-3 people, the space works well but I would not recommend any higher numbers. Also, bring a fan with you.

Een vriendin en ik verbleven 3 nachten in dit appartement.  Vooral de gunstige ligging was voor ons een groot voordeel. Alles te voet kunnen doen en liggend in een fijne wijk met leuke eettentjes en barretjes. Het appartement zelf is klein (smalle trap en gangetjes) maar heeft wel alles wat je nodig hebt. Met 2-4 personen prima te doen, 6 zou wel erg vol worden met twee mensen op een slaapbank. De wifi deed het goed en keuken en bedden waren schoon.
Consigliatissima!

El departamento es muy bonito. Cuenta con una cocina súper equipada y dos baños (uno en cada planta). La zona es muy linda y la ubicación es excelente! Cerca de la parada de metro y de fácil acceso a los principales puntos turísticos a solo unos minutos caminando. Paula nos recibió antes del horario usual del check in y nos permitió dejar las valijas para ir a recorrer la ciudad. Siempre estuvo atenta y procuro que nuestra estadía sea perfecta. Lo recomiendo al 100 %!

Logement tres agréable.
Un peu petit pour 5 personnes
Le lit superposé est dangereux dû à l'échelle

A perfect place to call home in Porto. The unit was quiet can cozy, close to many shops, restaurants and cafes. Host was very helpful and provided easy directions to find this little gem. Would happily stay here again

Logement très propre, calme car bien situé par rapport au centre ville
Très bien pour 3 personnes

Très chouette appartement, propre, très bien équipé et très bien placé. Un peu de bruit le soir avec l'auberge de jeunesse et le voisin qui pète les plombs a deux heure du mat...    nous y reviendrons sans souci.
Très bon accueil a notre arrivée. Maison très propre et très bien pour 4 personnes. Beaucoup de charme et très bien situé, nous avons fait toutes nos visites a pied.

Een leuk huisje met alles erop en eraan. Daar is echt niets aan te merken. Paola heeft ons heel vriendelijk ontvangen en alles uitgelegd wat we moesten weten. Een nacht hadden we last van de lawaaierige buurman maar de tweede nacht hebben we prima geslapen. Het huis is een aanrader.

Bonjour!
Cet appartement est bien situé,
Près des restaurants, près des magasins, près des bars, près de la gare! Nous avons trouvé que l'appartement était très petit et que plus de 4 adultes nous sommes coincés. Derrière l'appartement il y a une terrasse, ce qui occasionne du bruit le soir très tard!
C'est très joli et propre.
( il y avait quelques odeurs désagréables )!
Merci à notre hôtes !

The most amazing thing about this apartment is it's location - close to everything you could want, including bars, restaurants and main attractions. A lot of thought had gone into the interior decoration which made it feel very homely. Would definitely recommend!

Een hele leuk appartement. Prachtig ingericht en mooi afgewerkt.
Alles was aanwezig om het verblijf aangenaam te maken.
De buurt is super. Binnen loopafstand ben je zo op de leuke plekken in de stad.

Joana and Rui are very nice and patient :)
The house is charming close to the historical center and all the facilities. 
The small restaurant just beside the house is very good and cheap :)
I really enjoy my stay :)
Comfortable house, great location in a beautiful city

We were met by Paula who showed us the apartment & car parking. The apartment was clean & everything was as described. Great location, walked to restaurants & the old town & port. Supermarket also within walking distance. The small bedroom is suitable for children but cramped for 2 adults. The pull out couch in the lounge was a comfortable alternative for sleeping. We enjoyed our time in Porto very much.

Appartement très bien situé au sein du centre ville.Les points d'intérêt touristiques sont tous accessibles à pieds. 
Logement propre, fonctionnel et adapté pour un voyage avec enfants.
Chouette petit appartement bien situé et agréable. Accueil super.
Gut gelegene, gemütliche Wohnung.

Logement charmant propre très bien placé.
Petits points noirs : Bruits du voisinage et accès dangereux du lit d'enfant en hauteur.

We had a great stay at Joana & Rui's place. The apartment is exactly as described, accommodating well our group of 4 adults. Check in/out were easy and the communication with the hosts was great. Would definitely come back!

Wir wurden bei der Schlüsselübergabe sehr freundlich empfangen -  obwohl wir uns verspätet hatten! Die Unterkunft lag sehr zentral und es waren div. Restaurants in der Umgebung. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in Porto "bei Joana & Rui" welches eine Reise wert ist.

Um bom apartamento com fácil acesso aos principais pontos da cidade.
Ao chegamos no local, ficamos com um pouco de receio da vizinhança
We found the flat a good size for 3 people, and in very easy walking distance of everything we wanted to see
Perfect location, great atmosphere, well equipped.

A casa é super confortável, muito limpa e bem equipada. Sentimos falta de um local para lavar roupas apenas, já que estávamos há vários dias viajando. A localização é ótima, muito perto do metro e se pode fazer praticamente todos os passeios a pé (basta um pouco de disposição). Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Paula (amiga dos donos da casa) que nos deu um mapa e dicas sobre os principais pontos turísticos e a vida noturna. Apesar de ser bem central a casa é muito silenciosa. Excelente.
Situation idéale cependant il faut absolument réparer la fuite dans la douche ça rend le lieu humide et insalubre

Joanna and Rui's place is immaculately furnished/styled, they are great with local tips, and you can't beat the location, a minutes walk away from the nightlife scene and restaurants. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

We stayed three days in Porto in the flat of Joana and Rui. Joana gave us a warm welcome and some advice for sight seeing :) we had everything in the flat what we needed and sleep very well! We highly recommend this place. Best wishes from Germany - Josy

Joana and Rui’s house was perfect for our visit to Porto. Close to the metro line from the airport and easy to walk anywhere from it was a great location. The house was extremely clean and very pretty. Rui met us personally even though our flight was late and then spent half an hour advising us where to visit. A perfect host. Thank you and we hope to return.

We didn't met Joana and Rui, but a friend was there to give us the keys and show everything in the house and it was no issue that we arrived before 15h. The house is nice and cosy and is well equiped. The area is central, but quite silent. 
The tight stairway to the upper floor where the bedrooms are might be an issue for very big or handicapped people. We enjoyed the little balcony very much.
It was a perfect location and very clean! Would love to visit again.

Joana & Rui’s place is fantastic - very centrally located, yet off the main street, so quiet. It is clean and nicely finished. Joana & Rui were extremely helpful, greeting us late at night after our flight, and quickly responding to our messages. Thank you both!

It was a pleasure to stay at Joana & Rui's place. There was excellent communication from the get go and they were also very flexible in regards to our check in and check out times.

We were greeted by a friend of Joana and Rui's who showed us around the property, gave instructions and tips as to where to visit in Porto, which was invaluable. 

The location is amazing!

Thanks so much for making our trip so special.
Great stay! Within walking distance to everything.

Ein wunderschönes Häuschen und sehr nette Gastgeber.
Werde sicher wieder kommen.
The apartment was wonderful! It's very beautiful and cozy and its position is perfect, near to restaurants, bars and metro station!
Thank you so much Joana & Rui for the lovely stay. Great location and amazing duplex, will return for sure!

Excelente comunicação, tudo se torna fácil quando as pessoas são acessíveis.

Não conheci o Rui nem a Joana pessoalmente mas também não foi necessário, correu tudo 5 estrelas.

Obrigado
Great place- cosy and quaint. It was close to the places we wanted to visit and the host was responsive to everything we needed!

Die Unterkunft entspricht genau der Beschreibung, ist super zentral gelegen, absolut sauber und toll ausgestattet.

Joanna und Rui sind fantastische Gastgeber und haben sich viel Zeit für uns genommen und uns viele hilfreiche Tipps gegeben.

Wir kommen gerne wieder!
Gostamos muito da casa, limpeza e localização, mas um vizinho nos incomodou a noite inteira, gritando, estava visivelmente alterado, uma pena

O apartamento de Joana e Rui é perfeito como nas fotos, fica em uma zona muito boa, próximo à restaurantes e cafés. Logo acima tem um parque de estacionamento, mas o Rui da um auxílio quanto a isso, caso seja necessário.  A sala é ampla boa pra conversas, e o contato com os anfitriões sempre 5 estrelas. Eu tive uma ótima estadia, e recomendo o apartamento para todos.

This place was amazing, host communication was great. It was very clean, comfortable and quiet but within walking distance to everything ! Stylish, cool place would recommend this place to anyone who goes to porto !

Excelente localização e apartamento muito bem equipado. Está localizado numa vila de casas, por isso pode causar estranhamento aos brasileiros na chegada. Mas não se preocupem, pois o lugar é muito tranquilo, seguro e silencioso. O unico problema é o acesso aos quartos e banheiros que se dá por uma escada estreita, mas se você não tem nenhum problema de locomoção, vá em frente, pois recomendo fortemente o apartamento.

Igual às imagens, super limpo e cheiroso! Além disso é num local super sossegado apesar de estar mesmo junto à movida do Porto. Aliás, a localização é melhor do que esperava, desloquei-me sempre a pé na cidade. De aproveitar!
Wonderful place within walking distance of everything we needed in Porto, great base for our trip. Thanks very much
El apartamento es cómodo para un par de días, y está muy céntrico.

The apartment was very cute and in a great location! Joana got back to us very quickly every time I contacted her. Checking in and checking out were super easy and the place looks exactly as pictured!

Great place, very friendly host. If staying in winter I would recommend taking something warm to wear at night as does get a little chilly. There is a heater downstairs but in Feb it was quite cold. Really good location.
the apartmentwas exactly aspictured and described. Thehost has been really helpful and cheerful. Indeed a little small for 6 peoplebut really perfect for four or less. Suggested

Excellent location, very neat and tidy, excellent communication with the hosts.
We will be back again when we are back in Lisbon.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in dem Häuschen - die Lage ist super, ruhig gelegen in einer Art Hinterhof, aber trotzdem ist man innerhalb weniger Gehminuten in vielen schönen Ecken Portos. Und es gibt einen süßen schwarzen Kater in der Nachbarschaft, der ab und zu mal vorbeischaut :-) Die Zimmer sind alle zwar eher klein, aber clever & hübsch eingerichtet und man hat alles da was man braucht und es gibt sogar diverse Extras wie einen Balkon, eine Spülmaschine etc. Der Kontakt war immer superschnell und zuverlässig, wir hatten immer das Gefühl uns jederzeit an Joana & Rui wenden zu können. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen :-)
Emplacement bien situé . Maison un peu Humide quand il pleut . Calme. Literie bonne

This apartment is just like the pictures. Not one surprise there. The kitchen is fully equipped, I do not know why you’d want to cook with so many excellent restaurants around but you could. Beds are good. I would not recommend the house for 6 people though, that would be too crammed. The location is great, in an off street alley with small local houses. We felt very safe there at night. Bars, restaurants, sights are in walking distance. Joanna and Rui are kind and stayed in touch during our stay. If you want a real local experience, stay here!

Van donderdag tot zondag in het appartement geweest. Het appartement ligt een beetje in een achteraf straatje, maar is daardoor heel rustig en je hebt geen last van geluidsoverlast. Prima locatie midden in het centrum (op 5 min. loopafstand van de populaire bibliotheek), goede bedden, schoon en sterke Wi-fi. Met z'n tweeën was het goed te doen, maar met meer personen wordt het wel erg krap..  Enige minpuntje was de douche: de boiler raakt na 3 minuten al leeg en dan sta je onder een koude douche. 
Maar de prijs-kwaliteitsverhouding is zeer goed! Ik zou het zeker aanbevelen!

Gran ubicación, se puede recorrer todo Oporto caminando desde el apartamento, muy cerca a la estación de metro que conecta con el aeropuerto.
La casa es tal cual aparece en las fotos (diria que hasta mejor), buena comunicación con los propietarios. Definitivamente lo recomendaría.
Little beautiful, clean and calm appartement in walking distance to everything you want to discover in Porto. The hosts are very friendly and the check-in very easy. Highly recommended!
It was a perfect stay at Rui‘s House!

De locatie is zeer goed; veel bezienswaardigheden zijn dichtbij en ook de metro is dichtbij. Het huisje is heel knus met alle benodigde faciliteiten. Ook in rustige omgeving dus geen overlast. En Joana & Rui zijn heel behulpzaam. Zou echt deze plek aanbevelen!!!
Great central location in Porto, we were in walking distance of so many sights, shops and great restaurants.

Excellent position to visit the city center with a lot of restaurants and bars nearby. The kitchen and the toilets are fully refurbished and the house is nice. We do not see the host but the check in was easy and we received simple instruction to get to the house. We had a problem with the hot water, please verify in advance the functioning. We suggest to contact the host by phone because he is not always available by message.
A Joana e o Rui foram excelentes anfitriões, não tivémos qualquer problema com a comunicação. O apartamento fica numa zona central, é perfeito para viagens com amigos ou pequenas famílias. Recomendo!
Buena ubicacion, apartamento lindo y limpio

This place was great! We loved the location the most. We were close to some great brunch places, dinner spots and coffee highlights and we were only a short walk away from the city centre. The house is clean and cosy. The only thing was the bottom bunk bed, which didn't have a super comfy mattress. The other beds were great. Thanks for a wonderful stay in Porto!

Parfait pour 4 mais pas plus ;)
Communication ideale, emplacement genial

Logement très bien situé dans le centre. Il est également très propre et très bien équipé. 
La décoration est jolie et les lits sont confortables. Je recommande fortement ce logement.
The apartment was adorable! I loved the decor and the location was fabulous. It was walking distance from food, sites, etc. The hosts were also responsive. Absolutely recommend!
Lovely appartement close to nice and hipster neighbourhood.

L'endroit est super mignon, fidèle aux photos. L'escalier vers l’étage est étroit mais une fois la valise montée c'est parfait.  L'appartement est situé sur une petite ruelle cachée et tout prés d'un métro, aller vers les attraits et le Douro se fait très bien a pied aussi . Durant notre séjour il y a eu un voisin saoul bruyant mais il parait que c’était exceptionnel, l'endroit est réputé calme sinon.

Joana & Rui’s place is a beautiful home in a very convenient location. It’s within walking distance from tons of Porto attractions, as well as from a central train station, yet it’s pleasantly quiet at night. For a small family or group of friends, it’s the perfect Porto Airbnb!
The apartment was really nice, modern and comfortable. The contact was really friendly and easy. The apartment is very well based near the center and the heart of a nice and fancy district.

It was a nice stay for us both. With the check-in it was very helpful giving us a lot of tipps for the beginnning at the same evening and the start next day (i.e. supermarket). The location is perfect for a few days stay strolling arround in the city of Porto every day.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement, bien placé. Joana&Rui sont très réactifs.
Alloggio molto grazioso ed accessoriato, comodo per raggiungere la città anche a piedi. Disponibilità del padrone di casa per consigli ed informazioni.

I'm so glad I found this place! Easy access, no stairs, front row drop off for my Uber driver. They are wonderful and the place was clean, great decorations and everything I needed. I will stay here again!!
Great location in a quiet ‘island’ street nearby nice squares with plenty of options to eat and drink. Thanks to Rui for being very easy in communicating and making our stay without worries.

Great location, helpful and responsive hosts, decent amenities and equipment in the apartment - definitely recommended!!

Thanks for your hospitality!
The apartment is good located and you can easily get downtown. It's well equipped, but the dishes are not very clean. Porto is a wonderful town.

Super schönes Apartment im besten Viertel Portos: viele Cafés, Bars und schöne Geschäfte vor der Haustür. Trotz der trubeligen Lage, war es in der Unterkunft angenehm ruhig, da sie in einer Art Hinterhof liegt. Sehr empfehlenswert!
Lovely flat.
The apartment was very nice, clean in the city centre with a parking area very closed! I raccomend  this location to everyone who want to feel the porto’s atmosphere ! I
Nice apartment.  Easy walking distance to transit, restaurants and cafe's..
Good location, lovely little house.
The apartement is great. The location is perfect. There are a lot of bars and restaurants nearby. We had an amazing time in Porto!

This apartment is in a great location within walking distance local points of interest. The apartment itself was very clean and plenty of space for our party of 2. Communication was very effective and efficient. We were welcomed by Paula who gave us some good tips on things to do and see in the area. I would definitely recommend this place to others!
My family and I had a nice stay.  It was walking distance to everywhere we wanted to go to.  Very good communication with hosts.
Top nous reviendrons dans ce lieu avec un grand plaisir.

Great location in walking distance to many attractions. Host was very responsive. Affordable parking close by as well as bars and restaurants. Stayed only one night and everything was clean and functional.
Great location, clean and very quick responses from Rui . The house was a perfect space for 3 guests, I would definitely recommend staying here.
This home is in a lovely location, with amazing restaurants on the doorstep.  Parking is easy close by, and the home has been done up really beautifully.  lots of nice touches.

The Apartment was prepared nicely for our stay, especially the babybed for our 7-Month-old son was decorated lovely! The Location is Perfect, Bars all around, shops and bakeries and a few very nice Parks! 
The Apartment is located in a backyard, which is very quiet. But there are also some other air bnb Apartments - in our case it was very lively around there. Also we were a bit unlucky that we had extremly hot days and the Temperature was very high in the bedroom at Night (but there are two fans which made it a Bit more comfortable).
The Communication with Rui and Joana was very friendly and quick and everytime we had a question they answered immediatly! 
All in all we enjoyed our stay a lot! :)

A very nice two bed place kept very clean and well equipped. Two toilets, even! Excellent location near Metro (5 minutes) and eateries. Great value for a city break. 
Very good response from owners when contacted.
Porto was a beautiful city and so was this place! We really enjoyed our stay. The home was spacious, comfortable, and very close walking distance to many sites. Highly recommend!!
Great location! Parking is relatively easy to find. And the place is spacious

Die Wohnung von Rui & Joana hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Sie war sehr zentral mit Restaurants, Bars und einem Bäcker gleich um die Ecke gelegen. Die Wohnung war sauber und schön eingerichtet. Die Kommunikation war sehr gut und freundlich. Wir kommen gern wieder :-)

A nossa estadia foi ótima! Fiquei por cinco dias na casa com minha filha e meu marido e nos sentimos muito bem no local. O Rui é um host muito atencioso e quando chegamos ele nos deu boas dicas sobre Porto. A localização também foi muito conveniente para realizarmos nossos passeios! Eu só colocaria dois pontos de atenção: a casa fica bastante quente no verão; e na época da nossa estadia a casa passava por pinturas, então a casa tinha um pouco de pó de reforma (mas imagino que isso tem a sido ocasional por causa das pinturas). Mas no geral, saímos de lá com uma ótima impressão da casa e do host e memórias maravilhosas da Cidade!

Cutely designed apartment in a great, hip location of restaurants & shops. We are a family with an infant - the space is a bit smaller than we expected for our family (small rooms & bathrooms). Bed was comfortable. Rui was very helpful & responsive in giving local recommendations. Provided a baby bed & linens. Everything we needed for a weekend stay.

Things to keep in mind: 
- Loud neighbors (we heard neighbors partying and drunk people) and thin walls, so if you're sensitive to noise, you might want to consider this.
- Staircase has small, steep steps so you have to be careful and bringing heavy suitcases up/downstairs
- 2nd bedroom has a bunkbed (better suited for younger kids rather than an infant)
- 2nd bedroom can get quite warm. Open windows & fan but mosquitos.

Overall, a pretty decent stay for a weekend.
Nice little house in a backyard street, calm but near bakery, café, bars, restaurants and perfect to explore Porto by foot!!!!
Great location, and hosts were flexible with times.
Very obliging hosts and good communication but we found the house unsuitable for 5 of us. It was very noisy at night from the hostel close by and a neighbour drunk and singing loudly until 2 and 3am.
Es una muy buena anfitriona preocupada por que la estancia de los huéspedes sea muy cálida, la casa es muy agradable y el vecindario es precioso

Great house with a very good location. It is in a nice area with lots of restaurants and shops. You should definitely eat around here because if you go downtown its get more expensive and the quality doesn't get better. The house is great with two bedrooms and a cosy living room. Everything what we needed was there. Communication with Rui went very smooth and checking in was no problem. I would recommend staying here and would like to come again when back in Porto!

This is a cute quiet little courtyard with native Porto families as your neighbours. The area is very boho and cool. Porto University is nearby so a lot of great bars and restaurants without a lot of tourists. In fact we saw very few till we walked the 10 minutes it takes to get to the centre. Great dinner in Mundo and lunch at Brick. Reservations should really be made if you're travelling at the weekend. The house is perfect for three, four at a push. Clean, comfortable and well kitted out. We didn't meet our hosts but they stayed in contact to make sure we had all that we needed. Excellent value too.
Excelente!! Recomendo localização e estadia!!

La estancia en casa de Joana y Rui fué estupenda, la casa está impecable y es muy confortable. La localización es idonea, ya que tienes los sitios principales de visita a Porto a menos de 10 minutos caminando, 15 como mucho a la zona del Douro. Totalmente recomendable!
Lugar magníficamente ubicado, casa bonita y acogedora.

Very nice place in the city center :) Close from many area of interest! I recommand it. 
If you want to party it’s really close from the street with everybar  Top top

Fantastic location and beautiful home. Very comfortable bed and very clean.  Everything you need for a city break. My husband and I went to Porto to celebrate my 50th birthday.  We explored the city and went on a wine tour and boat trip down the Douro River.  The accommodation is in a great location, near to some great restaurants.  Highly recommended.
Very stylish and cozy house. Its location was amazing with nice bars, restaurants and must-go places in walking distance.

Rui is an excellent host. 
The apartment is great, clean & comfortable. Located in the heart of Porto. 
All sights are in walking distance and good restaurants & bars right around the corner.
We would definitely stay there again!

Thank you Rui !
Nice host, nice house in a perfect location.
This cute apartment is well located to access the city of Porto. Cozy and comfortable with good price. Strongly recommend.
Great place to stay. We were close to the town centre and the sights of the city. Great place to stay.
Great place in a central location. Would recommend!
The flat is very nice and directly in the City Center, there are a lot of nice bars, Restaurants and bakeries around. We spent 3 great days here and Joana&Rui were nice and helpful!

Apartamento muy centrico e ideal para 4 personas, entrada independiente facil y Rui una persona de 10, nos facilitó dejar las maletas el dia que nos ibamos y muy atento a todas nuestras preguntas, muy recomendable.

Hospedagem funcional e muito aconchegante. O espaço é muito bem
Planejado e decorado, próximo a tudo e com bom aquecimento no inverno. Ficamos muito bem hospeda dos. Rui é extremamente atencioso e gentil.

I spend two days in Joana and Rui's place to discover Porto. It was perfect. Rui is a very reactive host. Location is perfect in the center. House is very clean. Was a pleasant stay and for sure i'll contact Rui if i made an other trip un Porto.

Ótimo lugar 
Voltaria com certeza

name: Apartamento T3 duplex de luxo à beira mar
summary: Apartamento Duplex de luxo para 6 pessoas, situado na primeira linha do mar, frente à praia de Salgueiros, de áreas generosas, decorado com uma fusão entre o moderno e o clássico. Lugar ideal para férias ou estadia de curta duração e também um excelente lugar para viver.
space: Apartamento duplex situado à beira mar, num belo edifício, virado para o Oceano Atlântico, em Vila Nova de Gaia - Porto, no norte de Portugal. Situado na primeira linha do mar, frente à praia de Salgueiros, é o lugar ideal para férias ou estadia de curta duração e também um belo lugar para viver. Excelente vista do mar de ambos os salões. Duas espaçosas varandas sobre a praia, uma mais exposta e outra mais recatada com magnífica exposição solar, onde pode bronzear-se e contemplar o magnífico pôr do sol todos os dias. Este apartamento de 3 quartos acomoda 6 pessoas e situa-se num moderno edifício à beira mar. Tem dois amplos salões e uma espaçosa cozinha. Os salões, com uma vista e uma luz excepcional, estão equipados com cómodos e modernos sofás, tem uma TV LCD de 50 polegadas, TV por cabo com 150 canais e acesso gratuito de Internet wireless de 100 Mb/s. A espaçosa cozinha está equipada com todos os equipamentos e utensílios de cozinha necessários. Dos 3 quartos, um é uma suite, está
description: Apartamento duplex situado à beira mar, num belo edifício, virado para o Oceano Atlântico, em Vila Nova de Gaia - Porto, no norte de Portugal. Situado na primeira linha do mar, frente à praia de Salgueiros, é o lugar ideal para férias ou estadia de curta duração e também um belo lugar para viver. Excelente vista do mar de ambos os salões. Duas espaçosas varandas sobre a praia, uma mais exposta e outra mais recatada com magnífica exposição solar, onde pode bronzear-se e contemplar o magnífico pôr do sol todos os dias. Este apartamento de 3 quartos acomoda 6 pessoas e situa-se num moderno edifício à beira mar. Tem dois amplos salões e uma espaçosa cozinha. Os salões, com uma vista e uma luz excepcional, estão equipados com cómodos e modernos sofás, tem uma TV LCD de 50 polegadas, TV por cabo com 150 canais e acesso gratuito de Internet wireless de 100 Mb/s. A espaçosa cozinha está equipada com todos os equipamentos e utensílios de cozinha necessários. Dos 3 quartos, um é uma suite, está
neighborhood_overview: Praias de areia branca na frente do apartamento. Uma extensão de 15 km de praias de areia branca, pistas de ciclismo e 'jogging' ao longo da praia que podem levá-lo até às caves do mundialmente famoso 'Vinho do Porto', apenas a 6 km do apartamento. Fornecemos 2 bicicletas em alumínio com suspensão integral para uso gratuito dos hóspedes. Um parque infantil fica situado próximo do edifício, junto ao mar.  O apartamento situa-se a 20 metros de restaurantes locais à beira-mar, bares e cafés, padaria com pão fresco e bolos durante todo o dia; situa-se a 800 metros da Foz do Rio Douro, onde ele se encontra com o Oceano Atlântico, local que também é um habitat de muitas espécies de pássaros na área; situa-se a 5 km de centros comerciais, 8 km de campos de golfe, 6 km da zona histórica do Porto e da vida noturna, com bares e música ao vivo. A cidade foi recentemente premiada mais uma vez com a distinção de melhor destino na Europa, por revistas de turismo internacional. Uma vista à 'noite do
house_rules: From 29th of June until 27th of September we only rent the apartment per week or weeks. Checkin and checkout are mandatory on Saturdays. From 21st of December until 3th of January we only rent the apartment per week or weeks. Checkin and checkout are mandatory on Saturdays. Silence after 23:00 hours, urban behaviour as well as respect for the neighbours are mandatory. Failure to comply with the house rules will become a valid ground for immediate termination of contract with total loss of the amount paid.

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.comments:
The apartment is spectacular and even better than the photos I feel! We had a great time here. It is just across the beach, with many restaurants and pubs around. It was a much better place to be staying in rather than porto city, which is very crowded and packed! Perfect place to relax and unwind, and just a 15 minute drive to the porto city if you should wish to do that.
We had a great time, and Marcos was very helpful and informative. Would definitely recommend this place!

Loved it, loved it. The apartment was, overall amazing. Underground parking was very safe.The elevator right beside the unit made it easy to offload and load up our van with all our luggage. 6 people had a lot of luggage. An extra set of keys would have been really nice. The WIFI really only worked on the main level. It barely worked if at all, upstairs. Perhaps the modem should be relocated. Also, it was hard to sleep at night because of the neighbour's dogs on the property east of us barking pretty much all night. Perhaps not much can be done about that but, I have to mention it as it was very intrusive. 
The apartment itself is beautiful and as promised. The views of the ocean from the balconies are amazing. There are several restaurants, bars and grocery shopping close by. 
One thing is for sure, even with the dog issue we would have loved to have stayed longer at this apartment. By the way, use WAZE to find it. (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps takes you to some pretty rough and tight roads.

Location exceptionnelle !! Toute équipée, une vue panoramique et unique sur l’océan, une localisation idéale pour visiter le centre de Porto (8 km) ou les superbes caves de Vila Nova de Gaia (5 km), tout en profitant des plages qui nous font face. Une douceur chaleureuse se dégage de ce duplex fait de parquet, de marbre, et de bois. Nous recommanderons sans aucune hésitation ce superbe appartement. Une mention spéciale pour Marcos, son accueil et sa disponibilité... Merci Marcos !
Très bel appartement avec une superbe vue

El apartamento está muy bueno..... si vas en carro queda muy cerca del centro de Oporto.
Es un sitio muy tranquilo, frente a la playa.... cerca hay buenos restaurantes y supermercado.
El apartamento es muy cómodo y bien decorado.
Impecable y muy bien dotado.

Marcos est un hôte très accueillant, de confiance. Une vue exceptionnelle relaxante à souhait ! Deux espaces salons très confortables. Magnifique plages, restaurants et terrasses tout le long. Aire de jeu et supermarché accessible à pieds. Pour le reste deux bus en bas de l'immeuble ou déplacements uber sans difficulté. Un très beau séjour à Villa Nova Gaia.
Vale o pena

name: "PalaisDesCongres Condo"OLDMtl/Dt Free Parking
summary: Vivez votre expérience montréalaise en toute élégance dans cet appartement moderne et tout équipé situé aux portes du Vieux-Port de Montréal. Situer à quelque pas du métro Place d'armes et de Chinatown. Dispose d'une cuisine d'inspiration designer avec trois nouveaux appareils électroménagers en acier (Website hidden by Airbnb) vous n’avez pas forcément envie de sortir,  une grande salle commune sont à votre disposition. Il y a aussi un bar et une terrasse au niveau lobby.
