reviews.comments: The location is quite central. It is very accessible to public transit and right next to Chinatown.

Julia Et Philly’s place was amazing. We were so grateful that they let us check in with one hours notice as our other Airbnb was such a mess, they were lovely and helped us so much. We are so grateful they really saved our trip. Would book this place over and over again!
Great apartment, clean and well furnished with everything you need. Great location too!
Great location. Close to Old Montreal, Chinatown, and Metro. The condo was clean, spacious and has all the amenities you’ll need. Julia & Philly were wonderful hosts.
A beautifully decorated space that is perfect for a nice getaway from the stress of our New York lives. I highly recommend this location to all who visit the wonderfully friendly Montreal!

It was our first time visiting Montreal & are so glad we stayed in this place! Very close to the old town, metro, gorcery store & restaurants, it's also right next to chinatown. The place itself was spacious, clean & had everything we needed! it had a gym too!  thank you so much for hosting us!

Very accommodating! The origins parking spot is too short for my minivan and they assign me immediately to another larger parking spot! I need second sets of key for convenience and they provide me as well and waive the deposit charge! I will come back again for sure!!!
Clean apartment with nice features! Also very convenient location right near Chinatown and the convention center downtown.

Fantastic hospitality and great communication! This was our first time booking an airbnb, so I did have several questions and Julia was very quick to respond and put our minds at ease. The location was fantastic as we had friends staying at a near by hotel (except they paid triple for their stay). Julia Et Philly's place was clean and spacious (comfortably slept 4 adults). Would recommend this place for anyone looking to stay in downtown Montreal. Thank you Julia et Philly!

We had a great time! The apartment was beautiful and super clean, but most importantly had a fantastic location!! Julie was super helpful and made the check in and check out process very simple! Would definitely recommend this place! :)

The location is great.  The apartment is clean and the layout is good.  However there is pumping issue in the kitchen sink.  The dirty water stuck in the sink and caused the whole apartment stinks.  The offensive lingering odour made us felt uncomfortable for the whole night.  If this issue is fixed, then it is a good place to stay.

Was in Montreal for trade show, location could not have been more convenient (across from Palais de Congress), check was a breeze, even though our flight was delay 3 hrs and arrived late, the line of communication were kept open.
Great restaurants with walking location, centrally located for wither drive or walk.  Secure and clean surroundings.
Hosts were responsive and accommodating
Thanks Julia for being a great host.  Perfect condo in a perfect spot!  Everything is just in walkable distance.
A very nice place to stay! Location was perfect!
Great Apartment, walking distance from Old Town Montreal and right by the train station! Great communication!
Les hôtes ont été très acceuillant, endroit très propre et calme. Rien de négatif à dire.

Overall this place was great, and the hosts were quick to respond to all the requests. The location was excellent,  we were about a 5 minute walk to the Notre Dame Basilica. The building is clean, and quiet. We had access to the gym which we used. The parking space was a bit small, and uncomfortable, but we were glad to have it. The only almost catastrophic thing that happened was that when we got there 2 beds were missing which were advertised in the  original post. We contacted Julia and Philly right away, and they said that they could drop one off the following day and that the 2 sofa beds could fit 2 people each, so we should have enough room. That would have been horrible and uncomfortable for all of us considering we had a 6+ feet tall guy who barely fit by himself on the sofa bed, and couldn’t share the  queen size bed in the bedroom. In the end it all worked out because one of our coworkers did not come.
Great place to be if you want to stay downtown. The bedroom is bigger than it looks in the pics.
Super emplacement beau complexe avec piscine sur le toit chauffée, Julia vraiment gentille et prête à vous accommoder merci beaucoup
Loved this place!  Great location, very clean (bedding smelled amazing) and stylish space.  It had everything and more than needed for a one night stay.  Check in was a breeze!

Three of us were here for the F1 weekend. Condo is in a great location for old town, St Laurent, Crescent St and lots more. Pool and steam room are a nice addition to help dust off the morning cobwebs. Good communication and no hassles!

Unfortunately Airbnb gave us the incorrect address.  Also we specifically picked this Airbnb for the parking, but the listing didn't mention the low ceiling and that large SUV-sized vehicles would not fit.  We had to pay to park elsewhere, and when we tried to find the address, we waited about 40 min before resolving the actual address with Julia.  Julia was extremely attentive to our needs and came as soon as she could to guide us to the actual address that matched the photo listing.  Also, this property was in an ideal location to explore Old Montreal.
Great place great value!!
Don't stay here, unsafe, unclean and classic bait and switch. They'll offer you a larger unit, for a price.
Bel emplacement propreté impeccable

The hosts were accomodating, which was much appreciated. The location was excellent, very close to the old port. I had booked it for my parents (seniors) and the location was perfect for them to get to everywhere they needed to go.

This was only our 2nd Air BnB experience and we loved the location for our family of 4 to tour both Old Montreal and downtown by foot or transit.

The condo was clean, had available parking, adequate space for a family of 4, a nice view, was walking distance to a grocery store, and we felt totally safe walking in this area at all times of the day as well. 

If we ever came back to Montreal we would look to stay here again.

The location of the condo was perfect!! As for finding the condo was difficult, especially the parking. Thankfully Julia was quick to respond and gave us further directions. The space itself appeared to be quite different to the pictures, although was still nice. The space was unclean in the bathroom (toilet and sink) and kitchen (lipstick found on glasses). As for the sleeping arrangements the space comfortably would fit 4 adults. The beds however were terribly uncomfortable.

The space is awesome for a 1 bedroom, but cannot comfortably fit 6 adults. It was a good experience for the short stay we had since we didn't spend a lot of time inside the apartment. The location is awesome, right in the heart of Old Port and close to the metro. The location was a bit confusing at first because the listing said one place but our final confirmation listed another. 

For the 888 Rue Saint-François-Xavier, there is no access code to the building, it is free to enter, any floor. 

There are 3 levels of parking which is good and an adequate gym. 

Julia was great with communication, she also brought us more pillows and towels when requested.

Perfect location! Right in Old Montreal just steps away from great restaurants and attractions.  The accommodations were very nice and even included a washer/dryer.  Parking was included which was important for us.  Would not hesitate to stay here again.

Stylish place right in Old Montreal! It's listed as sleeping six people, but the two fold-out couches we're only the size of a twin bed. It might be a but if a tight fit to actually sleep two people on each couch. Other than that, great place!

Location was amazing. Parking process a little cumbersome and stressful (we had to go upstairs to get the parking pass before parking and same process to leave and fitting our large car very stressful!) The host did not respond to any of my messages during the stay. Beds super hard and unconfortable. The location was perfect for exploring.

Great place. Cannot beat the area . Julia et Philly offered quick communication, easy accessibility and answered all my questions. We had everything provided . Place seems a little smaller then the photos showed but still was more than comfortable and roomy. And the location- amazing!!!!
Excellent host, great position, amazing house

L’appartement que nous avons eu n’est pas celui que nous avons réservé. Sur le site à la réservation c’est un autre appartement qui doit être dans le même immeuble.
Celui que nous avons eu et très décevant et en plus nous avons eu le sentiment de nous être fait arnaquer.

The location of Julia’s apartment was fantastic for exploring Montréal. It was a bit tricky leaving the car to go up to the apartment on the 19th floor to get the parking pass before parking. Also having to do the same in reverse once leaving the underground parking. We were a group of 4. The main bedroom was comfortable but the 2 sofa beds in the lounge were only just adequate for 2 adults. If we were a group of 6 the sleeping arrangements wouldn’t have worked.
Bien pour un couple seul...

Great location! Middle of old Montreal near all the major hotels are.  Minutes away from Saint Catherine Street, Chinatown, CoucheTard, and the Place D'Arms metro station.  Great garage parking facility, tight turns for big cars/suv's but all navigable.  As with most of Montreal, alot of one way streets and the busy street can make your drive there a bit more fun (timely).  

The photos shown in the listing are NOT the same unit.  The furniture, finishes, and decorations are similar, but the physical room is not the one as shown.  Not a huge issue as the actual unit was quite sizeable and the layout didn't impose.  Just to note, the listing indicates for 6 guests.  At most it could comfortably sleep 4 adults.  Two in the queen bed and 1 in each of the two sofa beds.  So just beware of that if you have a larger group.  Also the sofa beds were quite firm/hard, like sleeping on a camping foam matress.
The worst communication with owner of the apartment. Apartment doesn’t corespondent with the pictures at all.

Very nice apartment in busy china town. Host was very prompt with responses. My one issue was that I believe photos are of multiple apartments & are misleading. It is way too small for six people as advertised & realistically would be awkward for more than one couple. Would be a great place for a couple perhaps with children.
Logement très bien situé dans une résidence hôtelière. Pas de contact avec les gérants. Tout se fait par (Website hidden by Airbnb) et efficace, mais un peu froid au final.

This studio apartment is well furnished with plenty of natural light. The space is generous with a small lounge room for relaxing. The location is excellent for walking everywhere and we really benefited from the free parking in the building.
I reported the window issue on October 26th, so make sure that it's fixed the next time someone books the unit.
There was an issue with this condo but Julia upgraded us to another unit nearby before check in. That unit was spotless and as described. Seamless check in and check out.
Excellent location and clean place. Free parking is a huge plus. Bed situation was slightly different than I expected (2 beds and 2 sofa beds) but it worked out fine. Would stay here again.
Great Place, Easy Check In, Great Location, Confirm that parking is available before arriving

Idéalement situé ! 
Magasin IGA à 3 min à pieds, métro,
etc... Nous n’avons pas utilisés la voiture du séjour !
Le parking est vraiment appréciable, surtout à Montréal.
Endroit très correct et très bien situé. L'endroit est par contre très petit.
Tres près du palais des congrès super beau week-end.
Great hosts with fast response through texts and calls.  The room is in a perfect location with an outstanding view.

name: A cozy room in BJK
summary: feel comfort
description: feel comfort

reviews.comments: Mukemmel

name: Batllo Apartment Barcelona
summary: CITY CENTER Cozy Luxury Apartment, near Passeig de Gracia; 300Mb free Wi-Fi  High quality king size bed, 55" Smart TV, second 30"TV, fully equipped kitchen, inner city center with many restaurants, cafés, bars and shops in the surrounding area. Two metro stops close by. Next supermarket at 20 meters from the apartment. Located on the corner with Rambla de Catalunya in the most beautiful part of the Eixample, close enough to Plaza Cataluña, Las Ramblas, La Boqueria, El Born or the Gothic Quarter
space: high end rental unit in exclusive and historic building with doorman
description: CITY CENTER Cozy Luxury Apartment, near Passeig de Gracia; 300Mb free Wi-Fi  High quality king size bed, 55" Smart TV, second 30"TV, fully equipped kitchen, inner city center with many restaurants, cafés, bars and shops in the surrounding area. Two metro stops close by. Next supermarket at 20 meters from the apartment. Located on the corner with Rambla de Catalunya in the most beautiful part of the Eixample, close enough to Plaza Cataluña, Las Ramblas, La Boqueria, El Born or the Gothic Quarter high end rental unit in exclusive and historic building with doorman The apartment is situated in a residential building of modernist style built around 1904 by the architect Maurici Augé Robert who was also author to other elegant buildings and houses of similar style built in the Eixample district of Barcelona and one of the candidates for the construction of the Columbus monument for the preparation of the Expo 1888. The building is characterized by a rich stone ornamentation such as the Salo
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in a residential building of modernist style built around 1904 by the architect Maurici Augé Robert who was also author to other elegant buildings and houses of similar style built in the Eixample district of Barcelona and one of the candidates for the construction of the Columbus monument for the preparation of the Expo 1888. The building is characterized by a rich stone ornamentation such as the Salomonic columns and the busts carved into the lintels, specially the one dominating the front door.
notes: The apartment is situated in a residential building of modernist style built around 1904 by the architect Maurici Augé Robert who was also author to other elegant buildings and houses of similar style built in the Eixample district of Barcelona and one of the candidates for the construction of the Columbus monument for the preparation of the Expo 1888. The building is characterized by a rich stone ornamentation such as the Salomonic columns and the busts carved into the lintels, specially the one dominating the front door. The apartment itself is as unique as the building. The owner of the apartment has taken care of the decoration himself, as owner of a high end furniture and decoration business that also through the close relationship between his family and Salvador Dalí, has collaborated in the furnishing of well known buildings such as the Teatre-Museu Dalí in Figueres, the Casa-Museu Salvador Dalí in Portlligat and the Casa-Museu Castell Gala Dalí in Púbol. Our guests in this apar
transit: No car needed. The location is the inner city center. Short walking distance to most main sights. 2 subway stations close by.
house_rules: - Please be aware that our apartments are suited for families, business travelers and groups of friends over 25 years old.   As a general rule the standard check-out is by 11:00am. We then have the apartment thoroughly cleaned and try to have it ready for arrivals from 15:00 onwards. Although those are standard guidelines we will always try to do your check-in by the time our guests arrive if the situation in regards of the previous reservations allows it. A late check-out is also possible as long as it does not conflict with the arrival time of the following guests. For early check-ins or late check-outs please contact us. Number of guests: All reservations are made for a specific number of guests over two years old. This number must be specified and confirmed by the client within the booking process, and cannot exceed the maximum capacity of the apartment. For no reason, upon arrival or afterwards, the number of guests shall be more than authorised in the confirmed reservation. Any i

name: Private Room's "Gaya" (Nº2) Low-Cost
summary: Maison avec 3 chambres à V.N.Gaia, quartier calme, à proximité des transports (bus\train), à 15 minutes du quartier historique de Porto et à 3 km de la plage. Chambres confortables, idéales pour les gens propres, polis et respectueux. Les clients ont accès à la plupart de la maison. La cuisine est exclusive aux invités, partagée seulement s'il y a d'autres invités dans la même période. TAXE TOURISTIQUE: Été: 2€ / personne / nuit (avril-septembre) Hiver: 1€ / personne / nuit (octobre-mars)
space: Agréable. La maison est assez grande pour offrir une bonne privacité.
description: Maison avec 3 chambres à V.N.Gaia, quartier calme, à proximité des transports (bus\train), à 15 minutes du quartier historique de Porto et à 3 km de la plage. Chambres confortables, idéales pour les gens propres, polis et respectueux. Les clients ont accès à la plupart de la maison. La cuisine est exclusive aux invités, partagée seulement s'il y a d'autres invités dans la même période. TAXE TOURISTIQUE: Été: 2€ / personne / nuit (avril-septembre) Hiver: 1€ / personne / nuit (octobre-mars) Agréable. La maison est assez grande pour offrir une bonne privacité. Les clients ont accès à la plupart de la maison. La cuisine est exclusive, seulement partagée s'il y a d'autres invités dans la même période. Je vis ici avec mes parents et nous sommes toujours disponibles pour aider. Je suis également accessible par téléphone portable. Lieu qui était le point de passage d'une route secondaire romaine. De nos jours, il appartient à l'une des paroisses les plus appréciées en raison de sa proximité av
neighborhood_overview: Lieu qui était le point de passage d'une route secondaire romaine. De nos jours, il appartient à l'une des paroisses les plus appréciées en raison de sa proximité avec la ville de Porto. Paroisse de Santa Marinha et S.Pedro de Afurada où se trouvent les célèbres caves à vin de Porto.
notes: Nous avons un chien nommé "Kiko". Calme! Notre ami à quatre pattes n'entre pas dans la maison ;-) Dépôt de garantie - en cas de dommage, jusqu'à 100€
transit: Transports publics - 1min de l'arrêt de bus - 5min du train En voiture: - Avec des endroits faciles à se garer à proximité (gratuit)
access: Les clients ont accès à la plupart de la maison. La cuisine est exclusive, seulement partagée s'il y a d'autres invités dans la même période.
interaction: Je vis ici avec mes parents et nous sommes toujours disponibles pour aider. Je suis également accessible par téléphone portable.
house_rules: - Somente permitido fumar na varanda e espaço ar livre. - Por favor reduza os ruídos ao máximo entre as 22.00h e as 8.00h. - Não é permitido comer nos quartos. - Não deixe as luzes acesas, aquecedor ligado enquanto não estiver no quarto ou quando não for necessário. - Respeitar a hora combinada do "check-in" e do "check-out". Se necessitar de chegar mais cedo ou sair mais tarde, por favor informe com o máximo de antecedência. - Não é permitida a permanência de pessoas convidadas que não fazem parte da reserva do alojamento. - Retornar a chave em mãos no "check-out". - "Check-out" é até as 12h. - Aproveite e tenha uma ótima estadia. Se precisar de alguma informação turística ou conselho, com prazer.

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host.host_about: Adoro conhecer pessoas de várias culturas,sou muito flexível,responsável e como anfitrião dou o meu melhor para tornar a sua estadia bastante agradavel

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments:
It was fine, even though filipe almost doesnt speak english and its a bit hard to communicate verbal, but if you write it it is fine.  Filipe also drove us arround and tried to be a good host. And he brought us coffee every morning. To the center its not far and easy to go with the bus. 
His parents are very welcoming and kind. If you are ok with a very quite neighborhood you will enjoy!

Very good communication with the host. He was very accommodating to my change of travel plans. Once I arrived he explained everything and showed me the local area. Had dinner with him and another guest there, and went to some local bars. Filipe is a very friendly and helpful guy

I have a good trip here! The host is very friendly,he gave us a lot of informations for our trip. The location also is good,there is a train station and you can go to the center of city,it’s very convenient. It’s a good choice to choose Filipe’s apartment!

Philippe is a very nice and helpful preson (his mother also). Photos of home don't show how preety is in real. Home is very good comunicated. There is 1 minute to bus stop and 5 minutes to train station. To beautiful (and not crowded) Gaia beach and boulevard at Douro river is 35 minutes of walk. Philipe give us a lot of helpful information about public transport system, places to visit in Porto and also print us flight chech-in cards. His mother make a delicious cake at sunday. Visitors can go out and come back at every hour without any problem. We enjoy very much visit.
Super aconchegante, proximo das paragens, proximo da cidade e com um amfitriao que super me ajudou com tudo que precisava! Otimo canto!

Filipe y su familia son mis amigos simpaticos, comunicativos, se comportan con mucha ayuda, buena comunicacion y en su casa se siente como su familia, ayuda conntodo lo que esta es una camara solar muy confortable y recomendable en todo sentido y parabito la gente que desea pasar unos dias increibles, muchas gracias a Filipe y familia son los mejores !!!!!!!

Filipe and his family are very friendly, talkative, they behave with a lot of help, good communication and at home they feel like their family, they help with whatever they are at sunalcance very comfortable and recommendable in every way and parabtoda people who want to spend some incredible days, many thanks to Filipe and family are the best !!!!!!!

I recommend the house for the localisation, 3 km from the beach and from the city, for the forniture, everything clean and tide, and for the host Felipe and his family. He have done an amazing job as a host, helping with everything, like and truly tourist guide.
I had a really nice time with his family also, an very unique experience with an airbnb.
Filipe sa mamam et son papa Antonio sont des hôtes extraordinaires je les recommande vivement

In der Unterkunft bei Filipe  erwarten Hilfsbereitschaft und Familie Atmosphäre.
Prima!!!

Une très belle surprise ?!
Accueil superbe de Filipe et ses parents je recommande vivement cette adresse il faut juste prendre le bus ou le train très facilement 
La maison est propre je recommande cet endroit où on se sent comme chez soi

Felipe's house is a traditional house, rich in details and beautiful. Everything was perfect during our stay but in particular Felipe and his family are great hosts, very nice people that we hope to see again one day.  Even if the house is not in the centre of Porto it is very close and we recommend that you stay there for the quality that they will offer you.
Filipe est un hôte extraordinaire, je recommande à tous de séjourner chez lui. L’endroit est merveilleux, calme, tout en étant facile d’accès pour aller à Porto.

Filipe a été LA belle surprise de notre 2ème passage à Porto 
Un homme charmant, plein d énergie, enthousiasme et disponible à tout moment.
Nous nous sommes senti comme à la maison!! 
Encore merci pour ta générosité Filipe, nous te souhaitons plein de succès !

Une bonne surprise : accueil chaleureux, maison très agréable et idéalement placée  entre la ville de Porto et le charme des alentours. Arrêt de bus direct pour Porto à 1mn à pieds !
Nous conseillons les yeux fermés.

Do you want to visit a fantastic place in Portugal with the super host and his family?  Go to Porto and find Filipe. He helps you and shows real Portugal. Then you will feel like a Portugese. :-) Thank you fór the nice stay.

Filipe mérite bien son titre d'hôte exceptionnel. Sa maison est confortable et propre, on trouve tout ce qu'il faut dans la cuisine et dans la salle de bain. C'est vraiment bien desservi par un bus à 3 mn à pied de la maison pour se rendre à Porto ou un peu plus loin la ligne de train pour visiter les environs. Lui et ses parents sont très gentils, et il saura répondre à vos questions pour les transports et les visites. J'ai adoré mon séjour, j'ai aimé visiter la ville de Porto et ses environs, et l'accueil de Filipe a aussi enchanté mon voyage. Il vous surprendra par son amabilité et sa disponibilité. Je reviendrai, et je le recommande. Filipe, c'est un nouvel art de recevoir les voyageurs dans le concept Airbnb.

Everthing is good for low price bed, cleaning, freedom entrance & exit, free wine and kitchen eqipment. Everybody has to use Filipe house if you save housing cost. Host & his family is smile mind for guest. No need that every guest stay in other high price hotels on center of Porto city. I really recommend Mr.Filipe house. Mr.Filipe! Thank you for your house and care. I miss your soft dog 'Kiko'.

Gente se precisar de hospedarem vai a casa de Filipe. Amigável atencioso. Os pais deles são  muito amáveis  e carinhosos.  Não  falta nada na casa. Tudo muito limpo e cheiroso. Filipe me orientou como chegar e como ir para Espanha. Me deu toda atenção e me ajudou a resolver tudo que precisei. Parabéns (Website hidden by Airbnb) é  muito gente boa. Quando voltar vou ficar aí de novo. Vale a pena hospedar na casa dele

Super hote,hyper accueillant et gentil et disponible. Il m'a énormément aidé à m'installer à Porto et à veuillé à mon intégration à Porto.
Je le recommande sans hésité , c'est le meilleur !

Filipe, est unique il a choisi ce qu'il fait pour le faire du mieux possible, il est à votre écoute dès votre arrivée et même avant, pour vous accueillir et vous accompagner durant votre séjour.
Le logement est parfait pour une personne ou un couple, l'accueil est familiale mais la maison est totalement indépendante tout l'équipement est prévu (jusqu'à une petite pièce de gym d'entretien).
Merci pour tout Filipe et à bientôt à nouveau.
Pierre-Yves
Filipe é um anfitrião excelente, tem muita atenção por seus hóspedes, me senti em casa.
Ça a été un plaisir de rencontrer Filipe et sa Maman! Il est aux petits soins avec ses résidents. Recommande fortement!

Quartos excelentes com bastante luminosidade e aconchegantes. O Filipe e a família são pessoas maravilhosas. Se você vier a Gaia e quiser dicas de comidas e locais para visitar, se hospede com o Filipe. Você vai voltar com mais um amigo na bagagem. Obrigada Filipe!

Hospedagem simples e boa
Fuu bem atendido e tirei todas duvidas q tinha sobre o local
Alem de recomendar pretendo voltar
Great place and amazing People

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host.host_about: Adoro conhecer pessoas de várias culturas,sou muito flexível,responsável e como anfitrião dou o meu melhor para tornar a sua estadia bastante agradavel

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments: Pro všechny, co hledají klidné a autentické bydlení. Doporučuji!

Well.. I'm honest to say that Filipe was the best host that I ever met! He takes it as a really serious business and makes everything to offer the  best service as possible, plus a touch of home sweet home. Filipe and family are agradable, friendly and happy when see we are happy. Everything is quite organized and clean, comfortable, far from metro but with options of buses even during the whole night, 20 minutes to the Porto Center. 15 minutes to the beautiful port of Porto and Gaia. I got a lot of experiences with Airbnb, and I never even wrote a review, but I couldn't to write about Filipe. I recommend it! And if you are nice too, there's great chances to get a good friend as well not only a good host. Speaks French and Portuguese, a bit of English and Spanish.  Filipe, I'm going to see you soon, for sure!!

It was really my best Airbnb experience. 

The room was very clean with even more towels than I even need. 

Kitchen is only dedicated to the guests so you can cook at any time and you will have enough space in fridge. Filipe's mother prepares a delicious cake for guests.

The location of the apartment is perfect, on one hand, it is in a non-touristic area which means you will have a local experience; you can have a nice meal in a local restaurant or buy good fruits from a local shop. On the other hand, you're not far from the center of Porto. There are 6 bus lines go to Porto through different bridges at 2 to 3 mins walking distance, a train station is also very close.

Finally, you will be hosted by a very friendly family and Filipe is really extraordinarily  helpful!!!!!

I strongly recommend!!

Filipe was a delightful host. He welcomed me with a complimentary shot of Port wine and chocolate on my first day, and offered to drive me to various locations around Gaia District. He's very informative about his culture and things to do and eat around Gaia and Porto. Try the local 'Francesihna' sandwich with Filipe; he knows the best places to eat it! The dogs were occasionally loud but are calm & very people friendly. Filipe's parents were happy and approachable. The communal balcony offers a lovely view of the rooftops of Gaia District. Filipe's home is very close to several bus stations heading towards the beach and Porto. Had a great stay - lovely bright room with a comfortable double bed & clean bathroom & shower. Would stay again!

Mi mejor experiencia en Airbnb. Filipe es extraordinario. Es un nuevo concepto de atención. Inmejorable. Sus padres muy atentos, familia muy agradable y simpática. En todo momento brindan apoyo para todo, y brindan todo tipo de información. Atención personalizada. Puedes contar con Filipe incluso para desplazamientos. La casa muy acojedora, muy limpia, todo muy cuidado. Barrio tranquilo, absolutamente muy bien comunicado. Recomiendo absolutamente este alojamiento. Muy contenta.
Agradável, seguro, familiar, com um bom anfitrião.
Amazing, loved it . Such warm people, can’t wait to come back
Pas de mensonge entre les photos et la réalité. Tout était très bien. Philipe est très accueillant et disponible! Mon voyage ne fut que meilleur

house_rules: IMPORTANT : check in is between 3pm and 9pm, check out is at last at 11am. You will be asked to provide an official ID upon arrival, in the name of the person who did the reservation. If you have booked in the name of a friend or family member, please tell me the soonest possible and inform the person that an official ID will be asked on arrival. I count on you and your friend/family to take care of my apartment as you would do for yours! The cleaning is included but I kindly ask you to take out the trash and wash your dishes. Thank you for your understanding :slightly_smiling_face: I look forward to welcoming you!

host.host_about:
Chers futurs guests, 
Ce serait un plaisir d'accueillir les voyageurs du monde entier et de partager une expérience Airbnb avec vous !
A très vite, 

Dear Future Guests,
It would be a pleasure to welcome travelers from around the world and share an Airbnb experience with you!
See you soon,

Christopher

reviews.comments: Logement impeccable et très bien situé. Bel accueil.

Christopher's place is beautiful, very bright with lots of natural light, seemed recently renovated with some retro touches. The location is perfect, such a great neighbourhood with lots of cafés, restaurants and shops within walking distance. The market is wonderful, too, and so close! Patio is epic, but you do need to go up a fire escape to get to it, so if heights aren't your favourite, that's a little intense. WiFi signal's not very strong on the ground floor, we couldn't get Netflix to work. And it was my first time interacting with a third-party for check-in and questions: check-in and -out were seamless, but a homeowner's familiarity with the neighbourhood and house were missing. Still, it's a great place for a really reasonable price, I'd absolutely recommend.
Perfect place in a great neighborhood. Clean, cute, narrow two-story building. I loved it.

L'endroit est super... Ce sera mon 1er choix lorsque retournerai à Montréal. J'ai adoré le quartier et les cafés, dépanneur, boulangerie ainsi que Marché Jean-Talon, le prix est parfait pas trop élevé et pas trop bas... C'est un "keeper"... Christopher est très réactif et coopératif, wow merci ! Belle terrasse aussi. Métro 5-7 min à  pied et stionnements très accessibles ds les rues avoisinantes l'unité.
Parfait location pour cette jolie maison la terrasse est parfaite !
Great location, close to Marche Jean Talon, parks, metro and restaurants. Great family friendly neighborhood. Clean, well laid out apartment with beautiful roof top deck.

Christopher's place is one of the best Airbnb's I've ever stayed in. It is spacious, well-lit, and amazingly clean. The location is perfect, only a few blocks from the subway to the downtown. We got the 3-day unlimited metro passes which work on the bus and subway, which worked out really well for us. The home is only a few blocks from the Jean Talon Farmer's Market, the largest farmer's market in North America. The kitchen in the home is full of everything you would need to cook for dinner. There is even a rooftop terrace for dining. So many great things. The one drawback is that the listing says there is air conditioning and it worked so poorly, I don't think you should count on that. It was very hot in Montreal the weekend we went and we just couldn't get the house cool with the air conditioner. Other than that, everything was great and I highly recommend this home!

L’appartement est très bien équipé et surtout la terrasse sur le toit est magnifique! Nous en avons beaucoup profité! Le marché Jean-Talon est à distance de marche, on en profite aussi, c’est super. La maison est sur un coin de rue alors ce peu être un peu bruyant la nuit, mais les fenêtres fermées, on n’entend rien, c’est bien isolé :)

Très bon accueil, très professionnel, par la personne de l'agence et le départ a été facilité.
La maison  convenait parfaitement à noter attente dans un quartier sympathique plein de commerces et de vie. (très Montréalais) Boulangerie très proche et supermarché ouvert jusqu'à 22H00 nous ont bien rendu service.

L'appartement est très fonctionnel, confortable, propre et agréable. Il est idéalement localisé (quartier agréable proche marché Jean Talon, metros ...). 
Seul leger bémol (et cela dépendra des points de vues), il s'agit d'un appartement a priori réservé à de la location donc un peu impersonnel (n'a pas le charme et le caractère vivant d'un appartement  habité).
Amazing location. Very clean place. The rooftop patio is awesome

Notre séjour s'est très bien passé dans cette maison très calme et très confortable avec tout le nécessaire, dans un quartier agréable. Autre point positif elle est très proche du marché Jean Talon, nous y sommes allés tous les jours , et du parc Jarry.

The place lived up to the descriptions provided, and my expectations. It was clean, well appointed, and had lots of room, spaces, closets, etc. to unpack and get comfortable. Great location near Jean Talon market, and the amenities, service, and key exchange went very smoothly.

Christopher's house was perfect : super clean, perfect location (we spent our days at Café Larue, Le Pain dans les Voiles, Marché Jean-Talon and at the Parc Jarry - all within 5 min. walk), communication was flawless and the rooftop terrace was a very nice plus. I would go back in a hearbeat. Highly recommended!

Christopher’s place was the best choice we could have made. The house was very cute,artistic, super clean and organised and had everything you might need.Christopher had thought of every detail for eg. extra pillows of different quality, and supplies for the house needs.  The house is in a very nice and safe neighborhood with a mini store accross the street and two metro stations in a walking distance. It is perfect especially for longer duration stays like ours. I would totally recommend it to everyone. It can really make you feel like a local in Montreal! Thank you Christopher for your hospitality!

This house in Villeray is as clean, spacious and charming as it looks! We stayed for seven weeks and fell in love with the space and the neighbourhood. Christopher is super prompt with responding to any questions and the check-in and check-outs were both smooth. The proximity to metro stations, Jean Talon Market, Little Italy and so many amazing cafes, coffee shops, bakeries and restaurants make Christopher's place an ideal base for your Montreal trip.

name: Oceanside Peace in Paradise - 3 bdrm, 2 bath
summary: Located on a quiet and private lane, steps away from the world-famous Kailua Beach. While staying in this amazing piece of paradise you will awaken to the sweet smell of the tropical flora and end your day watching the sun slip behind the Koolau mountains, while surrounded by lush professionally landscaped gardens.
space: The estate’s many amenities start with resort-style swimming pool with a cascading waterfall and a lava rock water-slide. The pool cabana has everything you need for outdoor dining and entertaining including a full-size BBQ, sink, food prep area and bar.  You will find a spacious, well-appointed home with the highest quality tropical hardwoods and imported stone throughout. Featuring indoor, outdoor living with a relaxed Hawaiian feel. A great house for entertaining, including a full gourmet kitchen, huge indoor/outdoor living space. Amenities include satellite TV, DVD player, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, ceiling fans and laundry facilities.

host.host_about:
Only 3% of Hosts have the privilege to earn the SUPERHOST Badge and I've been consistently a Superhost. I work hard and always go the extra miles for our GUESTS, with me you'll live Montreal LIKE A LOCAL as I'll be a pleasure to assist with anything and your experience will be unforgettable.
Seulement 3 % des hôtes sur Airbnb ont le privilège d'être sélectionné pour le statut SUPERHOTE qui est un gage de professionnalisme et de qualité, nous travaillons dur pour répondre aux besoins de tous nos voyageurs qui aspirent à découvrir une nouvelle ville et d'assister au mieux à toutes demandes. Votre séjour sera juste inoubliable !

reviews.comments: Great experience staying here! Amazing location

Stephan was a wonderful host, and very accommodating. We highly recommend this place. Stephan was prompt with communicating with us, and we had no issues during our stay. The condo was very clean and the location was great, and again very quick to respond to any of our inquires.  Thanks for making our Montreal stay so enjoyable. We look forward to returning.
Awesome location!!
Comfortable and clean.
Simple, clean and convenient.
Fantastic place. Great location
Great location, cute apartment
It's right next to the notre dame!

Spacious condo in a perfect location close to public transit, shops and restaurants. Blocks away from Notre Dame and other interesting places to visit. Will definitely be staying here next time I’m in town!
Great apartment in Old Montreal. Really enjoyed our stay here!
exactly as expected, the location is fantastic

The few pictures on the web page does not do the apartment justice. The place is a lot larger than I have expected from the pictures, like a big one bedroom apartment. The location is fantastic, there is a Bixi bikeshare right by the entrance, a metro station across the street, and old montreal within walking distance.
We had a great time and would stay again if back in Montreal. I would highly recommend this place.
Great host. Whatever you need Stephan will answer immediately to your needs. Great location. Close to the hub of downtown Montreal/old port
Wonderful place, very clean and  in a great location. Responds quickly to messages.
Book with Stephane!!! What an amazing apartment in an awesome spot. Check in was seamless. Will definitely be back
노트르담 성당 바로 뒤라 위치 좋았어요. 깔끔해요. 소통 원활하고 친절했습니다 :)
Perfect location, Room felt like a hotel room.
Clean, walkable, quiet, easy communication.
Great location!!!  Stephane was very helpful and the check in was a breeze.

Honestly this is a tough review to write. 
Pros: 
1) The location was 11/10. 
2) Host was pretty responsive in terms of speed. 
3) Checking in was easy enough. 
4) Bathroom was fine and the shower/ water pressure was great. 
5) Wi-fi was fast and reliable.

Cons:
1) Carpeted areas of the apartment were soaked due to a flood (host knew about this and didn't warn us during our pre-check in communications on the day of arrival), carpet was black and mouldy looking (and in some areas, he had covered it with another rug which also soaked through). 
2) Apartment smelled increasingly damp/ mouldy/ musty over the 2.5 days we were there. Caused my roommate to sneeze throughout the night.
3) Communications with the host regarding the flooding situation became oddly defensive. I ended up having to placate him as he got very angry when I told him that the situation did not meet our expectations for the stay and to please look into the matter immediately (day 2/3)
4) Building entrance doors weren't ever locked. Anyone could walk in off the street - not sure if that's the norm in Montreal for rental/ primarily AirBNB buildings but as two women staying by ourselves, it made us uncomfortable. Not really the hosts' fault of course, but we should have been informed.
5) When he let himself and/or the building maintenance crew into the apartment to investigate (while we were out for the day), we returned several hours later to find that they had left the apartment unlocked. All our stuff was in the apartment, including my roommate's passport, laptop, jewelry, etc. This combined with the fact that the building has zero security at the entrance made us very uncomfortable and we felt it was very inappropriate that the host did not ensure that he locked the apartment door upon his leaving. It was sheer luck that no one thought to try to walk in and help themselves to anything.
Stéphane was extremely responsive and communicative.
The host was great at communicating and really quick in his responses. The apartment is located in a prime location and very well kept. Would definitely use again.

I loved this location!  So close to everything, safe neighborhood, lots of dining options.  Very walkable areas.  The place was clean and convenient.  Stephane was very accommodating as we had an arrival after midnight.  I would stay here again if I return to this beautiful and vibrant city.

This was a perfect place and location for us for our few days in Montreal.  While there were only 2 of us, it would have been very suitable for a small family.   Location was perfect.  Not right in the center of old town  to be overwhelming but just a couple blocks away to be very convenient.  It’s right around the corner from Notre-Dame Basilica and about a block from the Metro.  We used all public transportation during our stay and it was very easy to earn the subway/bus lines.  The apt has everything you need for cooking, TV works fine with several cable channels and WiFi was good.  Our host was communicative and was accommodating with a request we made and we were thankful for that.  Highly recommend Tommy cafe up the street for coffee and breakfast.  They have a nice breakfast sandwich and avo toast with egg and really nicely made coffee!
Great location, perfect place for a Montreal getaway. Stéphane was very helpful.
Pretty Good!

What a spot!! After a simple miscommunication at check in my girlfriend and I were inside the best value Apartment space in Old Montreal! Everything was clean, assessable and secure inside the building. Parking was easy enough. And... you cannot beat the location. Walking distance to Old Montreal, the Old Port, St Catherine’s and Crescent St restaurants downtown! Highly recommend.
Great location!
Great location!
Great place and great location!
This condo is in a great location - close to the metro and all of Old Montreal! Very safe and secure location. Will return and would recommend to friends and family.
Great apartment.  Excellent location.

This location is the perfect center spot within a radius that is central to almost everything (even local transit). The apartment is well furnished and very private. 

The communication from the host was spectacular and questions where answered almost instantly. 

I would highly recommend.  This is now my preferred spot when booking a trip to Old Montreal. 

Also, the parking does cost extra. However the location gives you a peace of mind, since it is connected below the building and not remotely.

Great experience. The apartment is in an excellent location, close to downtown, St. Laurent, Chinatown, Old Port and very close to the metro so easy to get around the city. The apartment itself was very clean and accurately represented by the photos. Check in/out was easy and the place had everything we needed. We would definitely stay again.

Stephane’s place is in a great location. It is about a 5 min walk to the Basilica de Notre Dame and the metro is right across. The communication was great and Stephane replied right away to our queries. The place is perfect for a couple or maybe three people at the most. Thanks for hosting us Stephane.
Spacious apartment at an extremely convenient location.  It is within short walking distance to Notre Dame and many great restaurants in old Montreal.
Wonderful place to stay and great location. Stephanie was very helpful

Nice place, great location, very secure. TV volume is low so you can't hear it when the heat is on or the shower but everything else was good. 
Good for the price.
The apartment was comfortable and in a very central position which was very convenient for my short stay. I would recommend this place to anyone.

The apartment itself was comfortable and the heating worked well. There is a tiny television but you shouldn’t be watching TV anyway right? For those who are going to use the indoor parking, it would be wise to park at the end of the 15 min parking for the embassy suites because you will have to go up to the apt to get the parking pass and drive around one way streets to get to the parking garage. If you park at the 15 min zone, you can probably just back up 10 ft to get to the garage. There is an entrance to the indoor connected montreal across the street and you can walk all the way to the eaton centre in about 25 minutes or the place des artes in about 15 minutes. Just be sure to map it out beforehand.
Love the closet space
Great Service
I recommed this plance 100%.
Awesome place in front of Palais des Congrès. Very clean place.
Apartment was clean and in a great location. Old Montreal is a bit touristy, but it's also easy to get to other areas of Montreal from the place. Stephane was very responsive and helpful.
Great place and host!
La communication a toujours été tres facile. L'hote est toujours la pour repondre à nos questions. Le logement est très bien situé et insonorisé. Je le recommande.

The places has what you need for a short trip. It is near to the subway so It is well located. 
We really like it. A nice place.

Les sugiero tomar fotos de alojamiento entero antes de salir porque en mi caso el anfitrión me cobro una lámpara que yo nunca vi y que no aparece en el anuncio. Por favor, tengan cuidado para evitar malos entendidos que les generen repercusiones económicas.

Place is in the BEST location for old Montreal! Just steps away from so many great places. Also, the host is awesome, ensuring you have loads of information prior to your arrival! Super quick responses and great communication! I cannot wait to come back in the summer !!
Ce condo est parfaitement bien situé entre la vieille ville, le port et downtown. Très propre, facile d'accès. J'ai beaucoup aimé mon séjour à Montréal :)

Great location. Central to everything. Overall, the unit is clean and fairly spacious. The bed feels like its gotten a lot of use and is hard. The "second bed"/Fouton feels like its ready to break at any moment. I only sat on the second bed but overall, it was a great location and a decent unit. I'd def stay here again for a quick weekend trip.

name: Comfortable, cozy,  very nice location in moda cd
summary: Very good location. Clean, nice, comfortable, the flat is on the street but very quite at the same time.
space: Its very close to pubs, restaurants, shoping area, sea side etc.
description: Very good location. Clean, nice, comfortable, the flat is on the street but very quite at the same time. Its very close to pubs, restaurants, shoping area, sea side etc. I always welcome to my guests and give an information about the flat
access: I always welcome to my guests and give an information about the flat
house_rules: No shoes in the house please. You can smoke in the balcony. Balcony is very big and comfortable as in the picture

reviews.comments: Great place

Nalan is very flexible. Waited for us till late as we had to go to a concert. The apartment is clean. A bit of a smoking smell. Has a nice balcony. Little touches like phone chargers, toothpaste and brush... etc. place is cleeeean.
Nalan's place is a peaceful heaven at the heart of Moda. She has a gorgeous balcony. It was a very enjoyable stay.

Nalan's flat is quite big, well equipped and very well located in Moda. Nalan was easy to communicate with, friendly, precise and reliable. I very much enjoyed staying at her place (it's a real pleasure to get home after a busy day in Istanbul) and can only recommend her flat.

Moda caddesinin en merkezi yerinde, sahile ve tüm cafe ve restoranlara yürüme mesafesinde bulunan bu güzel apartmanda konaklamak gerçekten çok güzeldi. Nalan hanımın ev sahipliğinden ise aşırı memnun kaldık. Ev çok güzel dekore edilmiş şık ve komforluydu, banyo ve tuvalet çok temiz, balkon ise çok kullanışlı. Bukadar merkezi bir lokasyonda böyle bir konaklamayı açıkça beklemiyorduk.  Birdahaki gelişimde de mutlaka burada konaklayacağım.

The apartment is very comfortable and cozy, it has everything for a comfortable stay, for example dishes, towels, hair dryer, even drinking water. The apartment is located near the sea, also close to shops, restaurants, metro. The apartment is clean! Although the apartment was perfect, the owner of the apartment was interested in our comfort, she is very attentive and caring. If you appreciate comfort and convenience, this apartment will be the best option!
The location is super and the house is very clean. The communication was excellent.

The apartment was better than expected! It was stylishly furnished, tasteful and very clean.The balcony  large and comfortable, the kitchen well-equipped, All was spotlessly clean and the linens and towels generously supplied.
The host was so hospitable and thoughtful helped me whenever i contacted during my accomodation.
I highly recommend the apartment for those who want to stay in Moda-Kadıkoy !
Great location nice place

A very nice apartment in a great location at Moda - one of the best neighborhoods on the Asian side of Istanbul.   Within easy walking distance of everything Kadikoy has the offer in terms of dining, shopping, transportation to other parts of Istanbul, and of course the lively bar scene.  Apartment was as described, comfortable, sparkling clean, and well appointed.  Everything worked well and we had no problems.  Nalan is a great host, she is responsive and easy to communicate with.  Highly recommend Nalan's place.

Nalans place is lovely and stylish and at an excellent location. Everything you need is there. WiFi is working great. Nalan is very reachable and eager to help out if you have any questions. If there is one thing for improvement it’s the lighting situation, but every Turkish home I’ve stayed in has had the same: not many side lamps. I used the balcony a lot, it’s a nice place to feel you’re in the city. Next door is an excellent dürüm shop and all the treats of Kadiköy are within walking distance. In 10 minutes you walk to the Bosporus public transport to European side. Loved to stay here and hope to come back some time!
Great flat in a great location, own by a great owner!!

Great location. 
Plenty of bars, restaurants and coffee shops.
Durum Place next door
Nalan's place is what airbnb should be. She let me into her beautiful home with great amenities, perfect fast communication in a great location. Highly recommended.

Ben Londra/Ingiltere'de yasayan bir kisi olarak Turkiye'ye ziyaretlerimde rahat ve konforlu bir ortam bulmaya ozen gosteriyorum. Bunun icin de Nalan hanim'in evini herkese tavsiye ederim.  Nalan hanim kibar ve dusunceli bir kisi. Nalan hanim'in evi Moda'nin en guzel ve guvenli yerinde olup heryere ulasimi cok kolaydi. Ana caddede olmasina ragmen evin ici cok sessiz ve rahatti. Ozellikle de apartman ve apartmanin girisi cok guvenli olup istediginiz saatte gonul rahatligi ile eve gelmemi sagladi. Nalan hanim bana her turlu konforu sagladi. Ozellikle de Wi-fi mukemmel hizliydi.  Tabii ki Nalan hanimin mukemmel balkonu da evin en onemli ozelliklerinden biriydi. Nalan hanimin evini ve kendisinin gosterdigi misafirligi herkese gonulden tavsiye ederim. Kendi adima cok dogru bir tercih yaptigima inaniyor ve Turkiye'ye yapacagim ilerki ziyaretlerim de de Nalan hanimin evini tutmayi planliyorum. Tabii ki misafirligi icin de Nalan hanima cok teseekur ediyorum.
Nalan's place was perfect for our stay in Kadikoy. It was very clean and in a great location. We will definitely stay here again for future trips.
Nalan hanimin evi tamda söylediği gibi kadikoy modanin merkezinde,temiz ve rahat bir ev. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.
Great location! Nalan was very responsive.
Perfect in every way. A great apartment in a great area. I highly recommend Nalan’s place. It contains everything you need for a more than comfortable stay. She is also a first class host.

What is a typical Airbnb moment? Our stay at Nalan's apartment must be one of those special  moments. You arrive to a foreign land and city, where you never have been before. After an excruciating journey with an dishonest taxidriver from the wrong airport, you arrive at somebody else's home, and greeted with a warm welcome. After a short introduction where to sleep, and where to hang your your clothes, you are left alone in somebody else's nice and shiny clean apartment. Really a big wow type experience. And it is of course the very basic Airbnb, to tactfully and with great respect of other people's belongings stay in another person's apartment. What more is there to say? Of course the apartment was well cleaned, in very good condition, with all the necessary tings to cook, fry, iron, wash and so on.
We slept very well, and the whole area is full of shops, restaurants, bars and so on, all very closely together and in an small area easily reached by walking.
To visit Istanbul from Nalan's apartment is very simple,  you have the boats close by, going to most parts of the town. Going to Taksim square? Easy - take the boat to Kabatas, when there take the Metro one stop, and you are there. Grand Bazaar? Again easy, boat to Karaköy, cange to tram going over the bridge you just went under, get off at Beyazit stop. Get a Istanbul card, works at trams,  boats, metro and busses. Thank you Nalan for letting us use your apartment,  we had a wonderful stay, and we warmly recommend her apartment to anyone visiting Istanbul.

name: Tranquil Garden Getaway
summary: Need serenity and relaxation?  Eat breakfast on a beautiful hardwood deck surrounded by tropical gardens. In the evening relax in a hot tub gazing at the stars.  Located just 15 minutes south of Kona, this spacious 1 bedroom/1bath with separate living and dining area has all you need for your Island stay.  For daytime action, you are 15 minutes from world famous Kealakekua Bay where you can snorkel and swim with the dolphins. Kayaking to Captain Cook Monument is a once in a lifetime experience.
space: Most often our temperatures are 10 degrees cooler than Kona due to our elevation of 1300 ft.    Located on a cul-de-sac, in a quiet neighborhood, this apartment has it’s own private entrance.  Inside you’ll find a separate bedroom with king bed and private bath; full kitchenette with fridge, microwave, conduction cooktop, toaster and coffee maker; also desk with computer work space.  One queen size air mattress is available for an extra guest.  (Single bed can also be available at an additional charge.).   You’ll also have full use of the attached hardwood deck with table, umbrella and chairs; small bale house for meditation; outdoor grill; and hot tub.
description: Need serenity and relaxation?  Eat breakfast on a beautiful hardwood deck surrounded by tropical gardens. In the evening relax in a hot tub gazing at the stars.  Located just 15 minutes south of Kona, this spacious 1 bedroom/1bath with separate living and dining area has all you need for your Island stay.  For daytime action, you are 15 minutes from world famous Kealakekua Bay where you can snorkel and swim with the dolphins. Kayaking to Captain Cook Monument is a once in a lifetime experience. Most often our temperatures are 10 degrees cooler than Kona due to our elevation of 1300 ft.    Located on a cul-de-sac, in a quiet neighborhood, this apartment has it’s own private entrance.  Inside you’ll find a separate bedroom with king bed and private bath; full kitchenette with fridge, microwave, conduction cooktop, toaster and coffee maker; also desk with computer work space.  One queen size air mattress is available for an extra guest.  (Single bed can also be available at an additional
neighborhood_overview: Just a stone’s throw away, you’ll find THE KORNER POCKET restaurant/bar for food, drinks and pool;  SUN DRIED SPECIALTIES for fresh poke and daily fish offerings along with take-out;  CAFFE FLORIAN with great bakery specialties in the morning and sandwiches / salads throughout the day.   Then north toward Kainaliu (2 miles) you’ll find KE'EI CAFE for more upscale selections; ANNIE'S BURGERS for the best grass fed beef burgers around; TK NOODLE HOUSE;  GYPSEA GELATO their flagship establishment; ROCCO'S PIZZA and more.
transit: There is no timely/convenient public transportation available.  Therefore, a rental car is highly recommended.
access: Enjoy a 10% discount when you stay 7 nights. Daily rates can be as much as 50% lower than the larger resorts and many condos.  Private massage can be arranged on site.
interaction: We are pleased to share our knowledge of activities, restaurants, and other Big Island sights and experiences.
house_rules: - Please leave shoes outside. Quiet time 10:00 p.m. - 7:00 a.m.

host.host_about:
We both have lived many years on the East Coast in NJ.  We moved to the Big Island in 2006 after vacationing in Hawaii for more than 10 years.  John is a triathlete having done Half-Ironman and many other triathlons.   Chris enjoys meditation, yoga, nature and staying healthy. 

We have 2 children, one in Alaska and the other in NJ.  We have 5 grandchildren.  

We like to travel abroad.  We use AirB&B often.

reviews.comments:
My husband and I stayed at Chris and John's apartment under their house for a week. This is located in a quite neighborhood, butless than a five minute drive to a coffee shop and  a grocery store.
We were provided beach towels, beach chairs, sun screen, boogie boards and there was a hot tub for our use.
This place was very clean and Chis and John had lorts of suggestions on things to do and see.
I would not hesitate to stay here again. Great place great hosts.
Phyllis

Wow John and Chris outdid themselves with all the extras.  From a private beach tour, breakfast , fresh flowers  to great recommendations!!!! We loved the apartment and loved our new friends even more!!!  Fabulous space, gorgeous patio And all the amenities we ever needed

John and Chris’ place is clean, peaceful and quiet.  Close to many amenities, cute and local coffee shops and restaurants.  Their hospitality will be one to remember. They treated us like family!  Definitely recommend this place to stay for a great home away from home.

The Perfect Hawaiian Getaway! John and Chris are amazing hosts and the property was neat and clean, well-appointed and offered a beautiful tropical garden setting. It is located in a quiet cul-de-sac close to the beach, town, shops and restaurants. Truly an ideal location away from the touristy spots, offering a more authentic Hawaiian escape. A fresh fruit basket was provided as well as Kona coffee along with other condiments and basic staples. Fresh flowers from their garden filled the place with a fragrant tropical scent. If a relaxing and convenient place is what you are looking for then look no further than this property. You will not be disappointed.

John and Chris were extremely generous, thoughtful, communicative, helpful and pleasant to talk to. They gave us great tips about where to go and even took us to an awesome swimming hole. They provided a lot of things we wanted and would otherwise have had to rent or buy. The space of our home away from home was huge and lovely, and it even has an awesome hot tub for private use!!! I couldn't recommend this place more. :)

Amazing tropical retreat in a quite neighborhood. Splendid sea view. Very well equipped apartment, with everything you needed. Great host! Really enjoyed contacting John. Would definitely come back or recommand this gem!

John's apartment is in a quiet residential neighbourhood. The apartment was very well furnished and equiped, except for being a bit light on kitchen pots/pans and utensils - however as soon as we mentioned that, John arranged for them to be delivered to us VERY quickly!  The apartment is very high quality, immaculately clean and very comfortable. Of particular mention - the king-size bed was the most comfortable I have ever slept on! Although he was away from Hawaii at the time of our stay, John was readily available via Airbnb and had also arranged for a local contact who we met and was also very charming and helpful.
Location, Location and a hot tub!

This is a wonderful place to stay near to Kona. It is a lovely accommodation and we felt like home.
The hosts are very helpful and friendly. 
It was a great time for us! :)

Thumbs up for this place - one of the best Airbnbs I ever had. The flat was very clean, well equiped and with a nice garden to sit outside. The hosts have been super friendly and gave us a lot of toys for our little daughter.

The place is in a quiet neighbourhood. Supermarket and other stuff is around the corner but steep up. You have to drive to go there and to the shoreline.

We would highly recommend staying with John and Chris. The space they provide is private, clean, and loaded with high quality amenities. They were both super hospitable and gave us lots of good local tips. We will definitely stay here again, if given the chance!

John and Chris have the most beautiful place - one bedroom condo with everything you ever need in your tranquil stay at Big Island. Wake up and meditate in the garden or jump right into the private hot tub. They have tips and books about the best places, lots of beach equipment and some of the softest towels on Earth, probably. The kitchen is very well equipped and you even have your own barbecue. If you have the chance of meeting them yourself - you are in luck! John and Chris are the kindest and warmest hosts we have met. We ended up having many meaningful conversations and spent lovely time at the beach with lava tubes. Would go back there any time!

The apartment is very well equipped with all you need and has a lot of nice details. We appreciated the huge size of the bed that we never saw in other rental apartments. The place is surrounded by a beautiful garden with lots of places to sit and rest. Not to forget the hot tub, where you can chill out while admiring the sunset!
The location is very quiet, but at the same time close to lively Kailua-Kona and the beaches.
Chris and John are lovely hosts, with whom we had a lot of enriching discussions and exchanges. They also provided a lot of information for activities and visits on the West Coast of Big Island.
Thanks to both of you for the great hospitality and the delicious goodies!

Staying at Chris' and John's place was like staying with friends or family. Wish we could have stayed longer and hope to have the opportunity to return.
Hospitality at its best.

John and Chris are really nice people and provided great hospitality. If you are driving, their house is located in great neighbourhood and good access to coffee farms and famous touristic sites. 
Chris was very kind to provide local information and have been kind and helpful.
We enjoyed staying there and would like to go back. I hope everybody staying here will have great time like me.

Chris and John were fantastic hosts.  We loved their aptly named 'tranquil garden' with the peek-a-boo view of the ocean.  The space was well appointed with many thoughtful items available for our use such as beach chairs and beach towels.  Chris and John are knowledgeable about the island and were very helpful to our explorations with tips and suggestions.  We thoroughly enjoyed chatting with them.  Only wish we could have stayed longer!

John and Chris provide a 5 star experience in the fully equipped apartment with a lot of extras. They were very helpful with suggestions and interacted only as much as we desired. The garden apartment was extremely comfortable and fully equipped with top of the line linens and appliances. Fresh fruit and gardenias from the gardens were a treat.

The garden was a delightful place to sit in the morning listening to the birds and smelling the gardenias. Sitting in the hot tub viewing the spectacular Hawaiian stars was a real treat in the evenings. We could watch the sun set over the ocean from the property.

The listing is very accurate and we highly recommend this B&B to anyone wanting to stay in a area that cools nicely for sleeping and is out of the touristy hubbub. There are good restaurants nearby and it is easy to get to any other part of the island.

Great experience and value. John  and Chris  are gracious hosts and we enjoyed getting to know them. Their home is centrally located- 15 min to the heart of Kailua Kona, 10 min to Captain Cook in a cute neighborhood. Loved the garden and hot tub. We snorkeled, hiked, took a nighttime manta ray trip, visited a coffee plantation,  zip lined. and had authentic local food all within an easy drive from their spacious one bedroom apartment. If you want to truly experience the Big Island-you will not be disappointed.
It is a very nice place with a beautiful garden and thoroughly enjoyed relaxing in Hot Tub after busy day exploring!

name: Nice room, Lovely apartment next to the beach
summary: Espaciosa habitación doble a 10 minutos de la playa y junto a la estación del metro Poblenou. Es un Bonito y acogedor apartamento con un pequeño jardín ideal para tomarse un tè o porque no una copa de vino!
space: La habitación es amplia con cama doble , disponen de armarios, podrán usar la cocina con todas sus comodidades al igual que el pequeño jardín
description: Espaciosa habitación doble a 10 minutos de la playa y junto a la estación del metro Poblenou. Es un Bonito y acogedor apartamento con un pequeño jardín ideal para tomarse un tè o porque no una copa de vino! La habitación es amplia con cama doble , disponen de armarios, podrán usar la cocina con todas sus comodidades al igual que el pequeño jardín Podran contactarme en todo momento por cualquier duda o consulta. Yo tambien he sido un turista en barcelona y es encantadora intentare ayudarlos a que disfruten al maximo El barrio de poblenou es tranquilo pero lleno de vida podrás ir caminando a las mejores playa de la ciudad o al centro comercial. La Rambla esta repleta de bares y tiendas así que no se aburrirán   de seguro. Estarás a tan solo 4 paradas de metro de  los lugares mas importantes de la ciudad. Importante resaltar que hay un gato en la casa! ¨Bichu¨, es muy amistoso. También paso mucho tiempo fuera por trabajo, y hasta me marcho algunos fin de semanas, así que es casi como si e
neighborhood_overview: El barrio de poblenou es tranquilo pero lleno de vida podrás ir caminando a las mejores playa de la ciudad o al centro comercial. La Rambla esta repleta de bares y tiendas así que no se aburrirán   de seguro. Estarás a tan solo 4 paradas de metro de  los lugares mas importantes de la ciudad.
notes: Importante resaltar que hay un gato en la casa! ¨Bichu¨, es muy amistoso. También paso mucho tiempo fuera por trabajo, y hasta me marcho algunos fin de semanas, así que es casi como si estuvieran todo el piso!!
interaction: Podran contactarme en todo momento por cualquier duda o consulta. Yo tambien he sido un turista en barcelona y es encantadora intentare ayudarlos a que disfruten al maximo
house_rules: - SER respetuoso es lo principal - Se puede fumar en el Jardin

host.host_about:
Soy argentina aunque llevo en España alrededor de 10 años ya! he vivido siempre con Bichu que es mi gato y actualmente se acaba de agrandar la familia!! por lo que en casa encuentras a Edu mi pareja y  Sasha su perrita!  Soy muy aficionada a la actividad fisica, a la naturaleza, a pasar mi tiempo libre  probando deportes nuevos o con amigos tomando una cerveza. Puedo hablar muy bien el ingles, quizás un poco el italiano y el francés , así que si habláis estos idiomas genial  que ayudaran a mejorar el mio! Me encanta conocer gente nueva, también intento hacer escapadas para conocer sitios nuevos cuanto tengo tiempo. Poblenou es encantador al igual que Barcelona, intentaremos  ayudarlos a que disfruten al máximo la ciudad como lo  hacemos nosotros..
So... go ahead  Say yes to every adventure... 
¡Bienvendos a casa!

name: Habitación cerca a Sagrada Familia
summary: Cerca a Sagrada Familia (15 minutos. caminando), bus pasa por casa y metro esta a 3 calles. Habitación para 1 persona, ventana a patio interior, iluminada, con un colchón ortopédico, pequeño escritorio, armario, mesa.  Habitación recién pintada, limpia, aireada y decorada como las fotos. Es un piso tranquilo, ideal para descanso. Piso tranquilo no se permiten fiestas, es zona de descanso y relajarte.

name: Artsy and Comfy Bedroom, Living Room, Terrace
space: Large bedroom available, within a two bedroom apartment. Fully furnished with a queen size bed, blankets and such. I will be away for an art project, so many of my belongings and artworks will still be in the room/apartment. The apartment has a comfortable living room, furnished kitchen, and a private terrace. Wireless internet, and all utilities included.  The apartment is only five blocks from the A/C train, or a 10-15 minute walk to the 2,3,4, or 5 trains. There is a bus directly outside that goes to downtown Brooklyn and other trains.
description: Large bedroom available, within a two bedroom apartment. Fully furnished with a queen size bed, blankets and such. I will be away for an art project, so many of my belongings and artworks will still be in the room/apartment. The apartment has a comfortable living room, furnished kitchen, and a private terrace. Wireless internet, and all utilities included.  The apartment is only five blocks from the A/C train, or a 10-15 minute walk to the 2,3,4, or 5 trains. There is a bus directly outside that goes to downtown Brooklyn and other trains. The apartment is in an up and coming Brooklyn neighborhood. There is are multiple coffee shops and bars just steps from the front door, as well as several nearby grocery options, a laundromat, and a variety of restaurants. Franklin Avenue is a five minute walk, and is bustling with new restaurants, shops, bars, coffee shops. The other room is occupied by a permanent resident, a male in his 30's. He is a photographer and works from home often. He has a
notes: Two dogs live here!
transit: Street parking available. Closest subway is the A/C and is only 25 minutes to downtown NYC. Other nearby trains are a 15 minute walk, include the 2/3/4/5. Outside the front door is the B65 bus to downtown Brooklyn or Barclays Center.
access: The apartment is in an up and coming Brooklyn neighborhood. There is are multiple coffee shops and bars just steps from the front door, as well as several nearby grocery options, a laundromat, and a variety of restaurants. Franklin Avenue is a five minute walk, and is bustling with new restaurants, shops, bars, coffee shops.
interaction: The other room is occupied by a permanent resident, a male in his 30's. He is a photographer and works from home often. He has a dog (there are two in the apartment!).  I also own a spunky miniature Australian Shepherd, who will be staying at the apartment. I'd love to find a tenant who loves dogs! He is a lovable and outgoing little guy who loves attention, sheds a bunch, and is a great running partner.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hello! I'm a young artist who loves to paint, photograph, draw... you name it. I love to go jogging, be outdoors, and hang out with my dog. I'm pretty relaxed when I'm around the house, but tend to stay pretty busy between work and my art.

name: WONDERFUL APARTMENT NEAR PASEO DE GRACIA
summary: Beautiful, modern, elegant, bright and sunny floor of 100 meters located on the Gran Via, on the Eixemple of Barcelona. The apartment is located 10 minutes from Paseo de Gracia, Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Precioso, moderno, elegante, luminoso y soleado piso de 100 metros situado en la calle Gran Via, en el eixemple izquierdo de Barcelona. El piso se encuentra a 10 minutos de Paseo de Gracia,de Plaza Cataluña y Las Ramblas.
space: Beautiful, modern, elegant, bright and sunny floor of 100 meters located on the Gran Via, on the Eixemple of Barcelona. The apartment is located 10 minutes from Paseo de Gracia, Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas, and 5 minutes from Plaza Spain and Montjuic, and also very near of many other tourist attractions. The flat is  VERY WELL CONECTED with stops of subways and buses, the Sants station is 15 minutes, metro is just in corner ( Rocafort stop) and you have AEROBUS STOP (A1or A2) from the airport just in front of the flat (Gran Via- Urgell) ; so it is very confortable to come from the airport. The apartment is equipped with all the comforts of a normal, well maintained home. The flat was completely redone and turned into a modern flat equipped with everything you might need in order to have a pleasant stay. There is a huge living room, one bathroom, one toilet, one separate kitchen, a double bed room and a twin beds double room. There is also 2 extra sofa-bed in case you are 6 or 8 people
