access: Todo el piso es para los huespedes
house_rules: - NO PARTIES - NO PETS - NO NOISE AFTER 24

host.host_about:
Dear All

I am Maria, an active, travel-lover, sociable, friendly, gentle, open-minded and fun young woman originally from Valencia but who lives also some months in Barcelona. I love to travel and discover the rest of the planet… See other countries, find out about their culture and most of all their people.

 I am also a huge fan of photography, cinema, books, nature, decoration, Yoga, fitness, swimming and music.

I have a bachelor in law and currently have a managerial position in an important Spanish company related with turistic apartments.

I would like to rent out my flats and flats of other owners because I would like to think that people can visit Barcelona or Valencia and enjoy them through my apartments. As a fellow traveller I am proud to be part of this whole concept which provides and exciting alternative to standard mainstream travelling.
I would like to offer my flats preferably to families or couples wishing to know Barcelona or Valencia and its surroundings, its architecture, monuments, cuisine, their people and their habits. 
 
If you feel my places meets your requirements please do not hesitate to ask all the information you might need. Looking forward to hearing from you.





Hola a todos. 

Mi nombre es Maria, soy una persona activa, viajera, inquieta, sociable, amable, divertida y risueña. Me encanta conocer el mundo, otros países, su cultura, sus costumbres y sobretodo sus habitantes. 

Mis hobbies son, además de los viajes, la fotografía, el cine, la lectura, la naturaleza, la decoración, el yoga,  la natación, el fitness y la música.

Soy licenciada en derecho y me dedico a gestionar mis apartamentos turisticos asi como los de otros propietarios que necesitan mi ayuda.

Mis motivos para alquilar mis pisos son, aparte del económico, el poder compartirlos con otras personas para que ellas puedan disfrutarlos, el formar parte de una comunidad viajera que busca formas alternativas de viajar y poder conocer gente de otros países así como sus costumbres.
Preferiblemente deseo alojar a una familia o una pareja que deseen conocer  Barcelona o Valencia o sus alrededores, sus paisajes, sus monumentos, sus costumbres, su cocina, su gente etc..

Si necesitas saber algo más sobre mis apartamentos no dudes en ponerte en contacto conmigo y preguntarme.

name: Chambre lumineuse dans le Mile end!
summary: Appartement lumineux  et tranquille en plein coeur du Mile end, à Montréal! Quartier artistique qui bouge. Chambre idéale pour couple ou personne seule en vacances ou pour affaire! Je connais bien la ville et j'aime vous conseiller mes endroits préférés!
description: Appartement lumineux  et tranquille en plein coeur du Mile end, à Montréal! Quartier artistique qui bouge. Chambre idéale pour couple ou personne seule en vacances ou pour affaire! Je connais bien la ville et j'aime vous conseiller mes endroits préférés!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Humble LOFT - In the ❤ of OLD PORT / Old Montreal
summary: Walk score: 98 Bike score 100 Here's your chance to experience Montreal like a "local". European architecture, cobblestone streets, restaurants, art galleries... in the ❤ of the Old Port of Montreal! Ideally located, next to the St-Lawrence River, Palais des Congrès, downtown, metro station, etc. Let me know if you have any special requirements, room temperature, food allergies, scent (I use lavender and scented soaps, softener), arrival time, etc.
space: Enjoy Igloofest at its best, 5-minute walking distance!  You will be living in a historic building that used to be Hotel Rasco. Built in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , it welcomed Charles Dickens in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ! Location! Quiet loft in the heart of the Old Port of Montreal. Cobblestone streets only for pedestrians during summer, 5 minutes away from the Basilique Notre-Dame, only 2-3 subway stations away from Palais des Congrès (Convention Center), Parc Jean-Drapeau, the Casino de Montreal, Le Plateau, Mount-Royal, Montreal F1 Grand Prix, Osheaga.. Located on the 3th floor of the building, very quiet, with an elevator.  ** Note that although it can sleep up to 4 persons, the place is rather small, unless kids would be using the top bunk bed. Small dogs are allowed, but they count as extra persons.  If you're coming by car, secure indoor paid parking is available one block away (look for 330 Champ-de-Mars), about $20 per day. More paid parking is available nearby,
description: Walk score: 98 Bike score 100 Here's your chance to experience Montreal like a "local". European architecture, cobblestone streets, restaurants, art galleries... in the ❤ of the Old Port of Montreal! Ideally located, next to the St-Lawrence River, Palais des Congrès, downtown, metro station, etc. Let me know if you have any special requirements, room temperature, food allergies, scent (I use lavender and scented soaps, softener), arrival time, etc. Enjoy Igloofest at its best, 5-minute walking distance!  You will be living in a historic building that used to be Hotel Rasco. Built in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , it welcomed Charles Dickens in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ! Location! Quiet loft in the heart of the Old Port of Montreal. Cobblestone streets only for pedestrians during summer, 5 minutes away from the Basilique Notre-Dame, only 2-3 subway stations away from Palais des Congrès (Convention Center), Parc Jean-Drapeau, the Casino de Montreal, Le Plateau, Mount-Royal, Mon
neighborhood_overview: You will be living in the oldest part of the city! Cobblestone streets, art galleries and tons of restaurants and bars. Located near the St-Lawrence river.
notes: -- Please select the appropriate number of persons when making the reservation - -  ** The place can sleep 4, although you might find it a little small for 4 adults. Kids under 10 can sleep on the top bunk bed. Small dogs are allowed but they count as extra guests. If you're coming by car, please allocate some extra time for traffic and parking when you're leaving so you arrive on time :)  There is no keybox, I will meet with you in person when you arrive.  (if you are coming by plane, always assume it will be delayed). The apartment is located about 45 minutes away from the airport by taxi. Ask me for a Uber code for a free ride if you don't have an account yet.  There is secure indoor paid parking available nearby. Look on (Hidden by Airbnb) for the address 330 Champ-de-Mars street; cost is around $20 per day (24h).
transit: 10 minutes walking distance from metro Station Champ-de-Mars, Bixi bike rentals, Uber, Teo taxi.. 45 minutes from the airport ($40) Taking the subway is the best way to get around Montreal by far. Take the 3-day pass or more if you're staying for a longer period of time.
access: Private loft, TV (Roku with Netflix, Crackle, TubiTV... no cable TV), unlimited internet, kitchen, Nespresso coffee, bottled water, everything in the fridge is yours for breakfast, snacks; fully-equipped kitchen, cookware, etc. Feel like at home!
interaction: I'm always available by messaging through Airbnb if you have any question. I live downtown, I'm never too far away!
house_rules: - No smoking inside, no noise after 11PM, no unexpected "external guests", no parties.  Dogs are allowed but count as extra persons and cannot be left alone in the apartment. No barking tolerated by neighbors.  Please, do not lose the keys.  Breaking one of these rules will cost you an extra $150. Note that there will be a charge of $20 for each extra hour if you arrive later than 6pm

host.host_about: I enjoy meeting new people!  Whether traveling, staying at Hostels or via AirBNB,  I like learning different cultures and point of views, by visiting other countries or hosting in Montreal. My goal is to travel and run my business from anywhere in the world soon.

reviews.comments: Great location. Good value.

Yanick's place is perfect if you want to experience the heart of Old Montreal! The apartment is quiet and cozy, and the bed was super comfy. I appreciated the breakfast goodies, too! I've stayed at quite a few AirB&Bs in Montreal, and this is definitely one of my favourites, especially for the price.  I would love to stay here again.
Cozy and comfortable, right in the middle of Old Montreal. Very affordable for Montreal in the summer, and check-in and check-out were painless. Would stay again!

A charming, cozy, open space with a lot of character! It made our trip experience that much nicer. The beautiful original windows were so nice to sit and enjoy evening tea. 
Overall great location right by Old Port, easy communication to get keys and a msg when leaving. 

Thank you again, we hope to be back soon! Cheers Mél and Leah
Lovely apartment with a great breakfast and coffee!  The location can’t be beat! Would definitely recommend
Stocked fridge, perfect location in Old Montreal.

The humble loft is a comfortable and tidy space in a great location. Easy walking to all the activities on the water, restaurants, shopping, bus lines and metro stations. The neighborhood felt safe. Yanick is an excellent host. I would be very happy to stay here again the next time I visit Montreal.
This location is in the heart of history. A great value.
Really nice place to stay for a weekend with friends
Great location. Nice host. If you hate the perfume smell of fabric softener, don’t stay here unless the owner changes his laundry procedures. Good value.

This quiet, cozy apartment is in the very best location of Old Montreal. Walk to restaurants, entertainment, the Old Port and shopping. Very safe neighborhood, which was important since I travelled alone. The loft was well maintained and very clean. Nice shower with ample hot water, plenty of towels, air conditioned, comfy bed. I usually don't sleep well when traveling, but I had to problem here. Two sunny windows added to the charm. There is an elevator in the building so it was easy for me to get up and down with luggage. Check in and out was very easy and the building is secured at night. Yanick was a great host and made sure there was coffee, fresh fruit, plenty of bottled water and some nice breakfast items. I can't wait to come back to this charming loft!
A wonderful space truly in the heart of Old Port! Best location in Montreal!
Amazing location. We were travelling with a baby so we can truly attest to the ease of our stay. Surpassed all expectations.
We enjoyed our stay one of the reason was location. We loved the Old City and the place we stayed is in the heart of Old City. There can't be better location then this.

Amazing location to visit the Old Port. The place is located around lots of restaurants where you can go get food. 

It’s also located near to a metro station which makes it super easy to move all around the city. 

The whole place is nice and cozy.
Unbeatable location on bustling rue Saint-Paul. Breakfast food in the fridge was a very nice touch and it was an easy check-in/check-out process.

Any incredible location close to everything in Old Montreal. This was a comfortable, well stocked space to return to each day. There is strict timing around check in so ensure you create travel plans to accommodate. Yanick is approachable and attentive. This is a wonderful listing.
Unité parfaitement située dans le Vieux-Montréal,  je le recommande sans problème !

Great loft truly in the heart of old Montreal. Easy access to restaurants, bars, art galleries, souvenir shops, etc. Perfect location for tourists. The place was spotless and the owner is very accommodating. Really good value for the price.

What can I say... Location, location, location. In the middle of everything in Old Montréal. Convenient, quiet and cozy. Lots of great restaurants around. Communication with Yanick was super easy, same with key exchange. He even made sure there were things available for breakfast. That's a super host. I will not hesitate to reserve again.

Un emplacement idéal pour découvrir la meilleure partie de Montréal (le vieux Montréal). La rue dans laquelle se trouve le Airbnb est juste superbe. Yanick est un hôte très attentionné qui nous a laissé des rafraîchissements et tout ce qu'il faut pour se faire le petit déjeuner... Idem pour l'hygiène, nous avons trouvé du shampooing et gel douche bio à la lavande. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour.

You will not be disappointed! Perfect space and location! Loved that we could make lattes every morning thanks to Yanick having a frother and nespresso machine! Bunk  beds were comfortable, food in the fridge and cupboards are a nice touch. Was very clean and smelt wonderful!

Studio idéalement situé en plein dans la vieille ville. Idéale pour les visites à pied et à proximité des transports en commun. Appartement très bien équipé. Yannick est très réactif au téléphone et attentionné.
His place is sparkling clean with great location right in the heart of Old Montreal! I would definitely recommend his place if you are looking for a place to stay in Montreal!!!!

Yanick was great! Wonderful central location so much to see and walk to... close to so many restaurants. Locals were welcoming! Space was perfect for my needs, breakfast included helped so much on the first few days and space was very well done and well kept. Bunk beds were both comfortable.  Would definitely book the space for the future!
Yanick's loft was perfect for my short trip to Montreal. The space was comfortable and the location perfect for exploring the city. Highly recommend!

Located on the oldest street in the city of Montreal, in Old Montreal by the port, this cozy loft with double bunk beds is just steps away from restaurants and shops.  YanickProvided basic snacks and breakfast foods, and the loft was just perfect. It’s a fabulous place to stay! A 20 minute walk from downtown Montreal, and just a few minutes from the walk along the river. Great place.

The location is nice, inside the old Montreal. It's a 9-minute walk from the nearest subway station on a hill street, which isn't easy when you're with luggage, so I suggest using a taxi, uber or something on arrival and departure.

The place is really good, with some food in the fridge. 

We had a really great time in there and I do recommend it.

Amazing in every respect!  We will never forget our AMAZING experience staying in such a perfect location in a fabulous apartment where the host has thought of EVERYTHING++++
You miss out on this opportunity & it is truly your loss!

Location, Location, Location. 
Right on Old Montreal, it is an amazing location when visiting Montreal. 20 mins walk to St Catherines also. 
The flat itself is clean and cozy, but well equipped with a kitchen, TV, decent bathroom with a bathtub.
Great location and nice and cozy place. Loved it.
Cozy place in a great location in the old city. Breakfast options are great. Check-in and check-out were a breeze. Great value.
Yanick is very kind and helpful. The studio was cosy, very well located and very well equipped. I would definitely stay there again when I go back to Montreal! Thank you Yanick :)
A true gem. Yanick was very helpful and the place is filled with all the amenities you could possibly need. Very cozy!

Excellent little place in the PERFECT location in Montreal. Photos don’t do it justice! 

Highly recommend staying in this Air BnB
Great location and street with many restaurant bars.  Apartment very well equipped including laundry facilities separate to the space. Excellent breakfast food provided!
Perfectly located loft in Montreal.  Had everything we needed and was a great location for New Years Eve celebrations.  The host also gave us yogurt and other breakfast items which was super nice.
Amazing location and unit, and a fantastic location as well.
Logement de qualité, en accord avec les descriptions, accueil parfait et le logement est très bien placé
it is such a great location

Perfect location in the heart of old Montreal, easy check-in process and responsive host. Unfortunately the power and Wi-Fi were gone for the last few hours of my stay, possibly due to work that was being done on the street outside, but I know that would have been outside the host's control. Would definitely recommend this place though.

Yanick’s space is exactly as described. Few steps to the old port and amazing pubs / restaurants, and minutes away from the subway. Yanick made sure I had everything I needed; very responsive, and   kept on communicating with me even after my later check-in. Sparkling clean apartment.
Yannick's place was perfectly located in the heart of Montreal!

name: Hawaii Is Calling You!! Answer the Call!!
summary: This is our sanctuary, vacation home for the winter we would love to share with you. It is a clean, quiet, quaint condo just 50 yards from the Pacific Ocean here in Kailua-Kona on Hawaii Island.  It has all the amenities needed for a quiet restful stay and yet is just a few hundred feet away from restaurants and shops on the Ocean Front of Alii Drive. This is our first year listing our unit as rental with AirBNB so  come and stay and write reviews :) This year our price includes all taxes!
space: Perfect location for athletes in the Annual World Championship IRONMAN and all Holiday Parades!!  **We will be opening our Calendar in May 2019  for IRONMAN bookings.** **For IRONMAN 2019 there is a 10 day minimum stay @ $250/night.  Minus  discount because its more than a one week booking.  ** Other dates around your 10 day minimum booking will be adjusted to the $99/night price.** Our intimate, quaint studio is 420 sq ft of simple Hawaiian living.  It is a quiet corner ground floor unit so thank goodness no stairs to climb!! We have everything we need when we stay for the winter, including a small extra refrigerator in the living room which was my husband's idea, so he can watch all his football games and just reach out  and get a beer for himself and his friends without missing a play!! When I have my friends around we can keep our wine cool without having to walk back and forth to the kitchen:)  Our kitchenette has a family size refrigerator and freezer that is ample space for the
description: This is our sanctuary, vacation home for the winter we would love to share with you. It is a clean, quiet, quaint condo just 50 yards from the Pacific Ocean here in Kailua-Kona on Hawaii Island.  It has all the amenities needed for a quiet restful stay and yet is just a few hundred feet away from restaurants and shops on the Ocean Front of Alii Drive. This is our first year listing our unit as rental with AirBNB so  come and stay and write reviews :) This year our price includes all taxes! Perfect location for athletes in the Annual World Championship IRONMAN and all Holiday Parades!!  **We will be opening our Calendar in May 2019  for IRONMAN bookings.** **For IRONMAN 2019 there is a 10 day minimum stay @ $250/night.  Minus  discount because its more than a one week booking.  ** Other dates around your 10 day minimum booking will be adjusted to the $99/night price.** Our intimate, quaint studio is 420 sq ft of simple Hawaiian living.  It is a quiet corner ground floor unit so thank go
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is safe and still has the local 'Hawaiian Aloha' feeling of welcome. Most restaurants and shops close, or are winding down at 9pm - 9.30pm so an earlier dinner/shopping is recommended to avoid disappointment.
notes: This is our first year so until we get familiar with the working of the website our long time friend has agreed to take care of our bookings through the AirBNB website.  She also oversees our condo for us and will communicate with you  from your first request/Instabook  and will be available to communicate with you throughout your stay! She has full access to rates and policies with our permission and can contact us directly if necessary. She lives on Island and is more up to date with Island Happenings than we are in Iowa:) Some guests have asked about an additional 'resort fee'... There is not a resort fee on this entire property.  All registered guests in any of the condos on this property have FREE access to all amenities unless otherwise stated by individual owners. There are quiet hours throughout the complex from 10pm to 8am and we do ask that you respect those for everyone's pleasure.  There are also designated smoking areas towards the exit of the property for your convenience
transit: Transportation is VERY limited on the Island.  A rental car is recommended from the airport so you can drive back to the airport for your departure. Most of the major Car Rental Companies are at the airport with a shuttle service to the Car Rental from curb-side at the Airport. There is a local trolley service available and that schedule is available from the Main Lobby.
access: Our whole unit is at your private pleasure.  There is an entrance/exit front door through the banana grove and an entrance/exit lanai door to the lawn and relaxing cool pool which is just 20 feet away! You will be able to enjoy the whole condo without intrusion as there is no daily housekeeping on site, therefore we supply all our own personal towels and bedding for the duration of your stay! For hygiene reasons we do not supply beach toys, snorkels or fins.  We ask that you also please keep the screen doors closed at all times to prevent insects entering.   When cooking we would appreciate you opening the front and lanai doors but keeping screen doors closed.  This helps to keep the unit ventilated. At all other times please enjoy the A/C at no extra cost. Mahalo.
interaction: We live in Iowa for the Spring, Summer and Fall and return to our condo for the winter to get away from the snow:) We do have an on Island contact who will be available for emergency support and any questions you may have during your stay. Her telephone number and more details are available in the unit once you check in.
house_rules: - Quiet hours from 10pm to 8am all through the week.

host.host_about:
Aloha! 
We are Carl and Edna.  We have been coming to stay here at this property for almost 15 years, and then our adult children persuaded us to finally buy. We were very fortunate to find out that the unit we had been renting for many years came up for sale. So, of course  we bought and put our stamp on the unit that was already  filled with many happy Hawaiian memories for us both.

Carl and I come here from December through to end of March every year.  We meet the other winter-returning unit owners  (snowbirds) and thoroughly enjoy the winter Hawaiian Family that keeps us coming back year after year!

Returning to Hawaii is our focus dream every year. We want our kids to enjoy it as we enjoy it, and therefore you too.  Hawaii is calling - answer the call:)

Thank you for choosing our little piece of Paradise - we wish you as many happy Hawaiian Memories as we have created over the years!!

Mahalo and Aloha
Carl and Edna.

reviews.comments: My stay at Edna’s space was amazing! It’s the perfect place for 1 person or a couple. It was very nice and clean. You’re on the ground level, so getting your things in and out couldn’t be any easier. And the location was perfect. You can walk along the paths that are surrounded by beautiful flowers, and in less than a minute, you’re at Alii Drive and the ocean. You can go left or right from there, and either way will take you to wonderful restaurants, coffee shops, and places to get a drink.

We enjoyed our stay here. It was close to the beach, shopping, dining, etc. There is a full size fridge as well as a smaller fridge in the living area and had kitchen amenities that were not expected including foil and plastic wrap. It could have used a proper knife - I was  unable to find anything larger than a steak knife resulting in some difficulty cutting a melon and other latter items. Not critical but would be nice. Overall, it was a nice experience- close to everything without the traffic noice of Ali’i.

We stayed 3 nights and had a great time. The location is in the Kona central area, close to shops, restaurants, bars. Very convenient for us who is first time visiting the Big Island. Edna and her management team was very responsive and great help giving us flexible supports, early check in, late check out, additional coffee pot. Wished we could stay longer, will need to come back. Good place to stay, good value!

We loved our stay at Edna’s. It is in a very convenient location. The water is across the road at the back end of property there were so many places close by to eat and drink and the local trolley bus was right out the back. We don’t drive and Edna’s place was perfect as everything was nearby. The place is very cute and perfect for a getaway. Thank you again Edna for a wonderful stay.

I had a wonderful stay at Edna’s during my trip to Kona! This charming unit is very clean, cozy, comfortable, and short stroll to downtown beachfront. 
There’s a gate from the complex that leads directly to Ali’i Dr, where all the shops, cafes and restaurants are. I love how central the location is and within 5minutes I’m at the beach for a swim, or getting a massage right across the street (Theresa is amazing at Ka Lima Hana Kukui!)   The farmers market is also next door on Wed/Thurs, where you can buy fresh fruit and coffee to take back home! There is a coffee pot with filters so you can brew your very own Kona coffee to enjoy every morning! 

There’s also a patio outside with relaxing and quaint poolside/garden views. All the towels and linens very clean and fresh, the bed was plush, cozy and very comfortable- a real “home away from home.” There is a nice AC in the unit so you feel refreshed after the hot tropical weather! My friend came over to enjoy it as well, as where she was staying, her place did not have AC- it makes a big difference! 

The hot shower/water pressure is also great in the unit and replenished me after several days of scuba diving trips. I went with Jack’s Diving Locker in the complex next door (super convenient and their charter is one of the best on the island- check out their reviews on Yelp) The first evening we ate at Huggo’s just a short stroll by the waterfront. Delicious food, beautiful view and great service! 

I received a very warm, courteous and clear communication from Jeanette, with very easy check-in and out. I could not have asked for a better, more comfortable location to stay in Kona! I’ll definitely come back and stay again! Mahalo!
What a great place to base our big island adventure!  Close to everything in Kona yet able to have nice quiet poolside evenings.  Within walking distance of Kona night life and great restaurants!
Cute clean place in a very good location.  We used the BBQ several times for our dinners.  The kitchen and utensils allow us to cook simple meals for breakfast and dinner.  Would stay there again.

Edna's place is located in a very convenient area, very close to restaurants, convenience stores, and the beach. Her studio is very cozy and very clean. The kichenette area came in very handy. My husband and I really enjoyed the pool area. Jeanette was very helpful and responsive to my messages. I would definitely stay here again!

Be honest, before this trip I was debating with myself for a while if I should do luxury resort or adorable bnb, and I am glad I sticked with Edna’s studio!!

The photos in airbnb tell all stories and even better. The room is wide and comfortable, amenities are amazing: Swimming pool is small but enough to let me enjoy an afternoon, lots of Hawaiian style plants around..Needless to say how great the location is!! Restaurants and beach are walkable!! 

I had very great time for these 3 nights and can’t wait to come back again!!

I stayed here in June and it was great! Pictures and description are accurate. Check in very easy with the front desk. Staff I met were friendly. The complex is quiet and even being by (conveniently) by the pool there were no noise issues. Super convenient location for the beach, and car not necessary once you are there. Parking on site was never a problem either. I referred a minor maintenance issue to the manager and was responded to immediately which was excellent. The cooktop and blender were a bonus, it was lovely having a large fridge for all the beautiful fruit and veggies you can get next door at the farmers market. Thoroughly enjoyable stay thanks!

With this being our first time to the islands our nerves were s not high regarding the mainland news due to possible vog. As an asthmatic I was nervous. Jeanette (property manager) eased my mind with some government links that list air quality. Which was an easy comparison to Los Angeles at the time. My plan was to go forward with my vacation and bring my nebulizer. I’m happy to report that I never needed it! Even traveling the entire island, I was fine! 

Check in was easy! The front desk answered all my questions without problems. Along with how to get to the pool area and laundry room. Immediately we noticed that the grounds, landscaping were well kept and clean. We loved the sign for the feral-tame cats outside too. They were so friendly to see on my early morning runs. 

What was a surprise was how well stocked the condo was for our visit. From Saran Wrap, coffee filters, grocery bag in the closet, cooler for drinks, extra towels for the pool and the 3 pillows each were nice too! We were worried about the smaller bed as we’re used to a king size at home. The mattress pad and pillows were clean and comfortable! One day I wanted a nap to stretch out,  I used the rollaway bed in the couch. It was great! Everything was so clean! The added surprise snacks were a thoughtful touch and special treat too! It made us both smile! 

The central location to the touristy stuff was fun to see at night. I enjoyed the people watching and the close sea wall. Yet the drives we took to Hilo to see the waterfalls, along with seeing Mauna Kea-the surprising wild goats were awesome, driving across the lava land gave us awesome pictures to get to Kekaha state park, seeing the painted church, visiting black sand beach, and my favorite was swimming-snorkeling literally with the turtles. Which I did right down the street at the iron man swim spot at Kailua-Kona bay! Just walking right from Edna’s place! 

As an airline agent in the travel industry for almost 12 years, I always looked at Hawaii as being overrated. I was wrong. I get it and I will be back. The big Island is breathtakingly beautiful. This condo added to our view of this special place. We will be back and hopefully at our new home away from home at Edna’s. Mahalo!

Edna's place was exactly as described. It was a very easy check-in process and the front desk was very courteous and helpful. The place was very clean and comfortable. The location was terrific as we could walk to all the restaurants we wanted to visit in Kona and it was only a short drive to many of the excursions that we took. Furthermore, Jeanette was very helpful and responsive. We forgot some important items while checking out and she arranged for us to pick them up later at the front desk. Overall, we had a terrific time and very much enjoyed our stay at Edna's place!

We stayed for several days here. The location was great and you're just steps away from great food, a farmers market and a little beach, but once you step onto the property you don't even hear or see any of the tourist hustle. Check-in was simple, the pool was great and there's a few working cats on the property (and at least one was super friendly and loved attention), some geckos hanging out and the occasional mongoose. The unit was clean and tidy, the bed was very comfortable and we definitely enjoyed our stay.

Edna's place is all about location. It is right in the heart of Kona, easy walking to so much. There are many great restaurants and shops just minutes away. The unit is located in a nice location within the complex, looking out to the pool, yet it was very quiet. The unit is small, but it worked just fine for two of us. Jeanette was a great help in communicating directions, check-in, check-out, and local attractions! We would definitely return here again!
The pool and hot tub were wonderful after a long day. Beautiful home and best amenities.

Jeanette, who manages the place for Edna, is truly a rare host on airbnb--incredibly attentive, forthright, caring and sticks to her word. She was amazing, as was the place. Highly recommended, and we are incredibly honest when it comes to calling out problem hosts/places on airbnb. When you stay in Hawaii, it's difficult to find a "bug-free" home (as bug free as it can be in Hawaii), and this place was great. On top of that, Jeanette was always very helpful with tips/suggestions about the area, and sincerely cared about how our stay was. We would definitely stay here again. Great value!

What a little gem! A very well equipped studio (full frig, plus a beer one too!) that also had a very comfortable queen size bed. Located steps away from Kona's waterfront & the Farmer's Market. It's on the ground floor of the Kona Islander Inn - so no stairs - and we found it to be quite quiet. The lanai overlooks the well maintained pool, garden & barbecue areas - very nice for morning coffee. Would most definitely stay here again!

My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights in August to attend a family wedding.  The location is fantastic -- steps from the waterfront, close to shops and restaurants, and next door to the Farmer's Market, which had the most amazing selection of fresh tropical fruits  I'd ever seen.  I still dream about that fruit.

The place is perfect for a couple and has everything you need to be comfortable -- queen bed, sofa, lanai overlooking the pool, full-size fridge (and mini fridge next to the sofa), coffee pot, microwave, and a laundry room for the facility.  No stovetop or oven, but with all the restaurants nearby, it's an easy walk to great food (and easy storage for leftovers once you get home).  Beach chairs, beach towels, and a cooler is even provided should you want to spend time watching the waves!

Jeannette, who manages the place, is delightful, and really quick to respond when we had questions about laundry and other details.  The information she provided was excellent, and it was super easy to check in and make ourselves at home when we arrived.  We really enjoyed our stay, and would definitely book here again!

What a gem!  Perfect for a couple and right in the heart of Kona village. The surroundings are so lush and it’s peace and quiet as soon as you return. Perfect spot to explore Hawaii Island in each direction.  Plenty of bars and restaurants to choose from and you can walk everywhere. We hired a car and there was always an available parking space whenever we returned. We enjoyed sitting outside, overlooking the pool with a sundowner and a swim and spa at the end of a busy day exploring the Island. (Check out the Octopus farm, Kona coffee farm, kayaking to the James Cook memorial and swimming with spinner dolphins and Manta Rays with Wicked Wahine). We had a ball and will be back to explore the Volcano National Park which reopened the day we left.

name: Terrace Guesthouse FAMILY ROOM
summary: We are right in the center of the old town.Topkapi Palace,St. Sophia Museum,Blue Mosque,Archeological Museum,Islamic Art Museum,Grand Bazaar,Restaurants,Cafes,tram stop and boat stations are in walking distance.
description: We are right in the center of the old town.Topkapi Palace,St. Sophia Museum,Blue Mosque,Archeological Museum,Islamic Art Museum,Grand Bazaar,Restaurants,Cafes,tram stop and boat stations are in walking distance.

host.host_about: I love to meet with different people of the world.

name: Private room at Barra / Quarto privativo na Barra
summary: Private room located in Barra da Tijuca, only a block from the beach,  close to supermarkets, shopping centers, convention centers and the subway! Staying at my place you will have a clean and quiet space to relax, cable TV and high speed wireless internet. Quarto privativo na Barra, a apenas um quarteirão da praia, perto de supermercados, shoppings, centro de convenções e do metro! Se hospedando aqui você terá um espaço limpo e tranquilo para relaxar, TV a cabo e internet de alta velocidade.

Nearby you may rent a bike for a very low price or get to drugstores, restaurants and banks by walking. Aqui perto é possível alugar bicicleta por um baixo custo ou ir andando a farmácias, restaurantes e bancos.

notes: With an additional of $5 you may choose a bed and breakfast (Website hidden by Airbnb) um adicional de 20 reais você pode optar por uma permanência com café da manhã.
transit: You can come in or get out of Barra by car, bus, subway or even riding a bike! Only a few minutes from famous Ipanema and an hour from downtown. interaction: I’m a host that respects guests privacy and I’m always available to help. Sou uma anfitriã que respeita a privacidade do hóspede e também estou sempre disponível para ajudar.

reviews.comments: Foi uma excelente estadia! Voltarei mais vezes! Paula é um pessoa incrível, alto astral, super prestativa e acolhedora! Me senti em casa. O apartamento é lindo e muito limpo e organizado! Recomendo a estadia!

Paula e sua irmã foram prestativas pra me ajudar em tudo. Paula me mostrou as redondezas, restaurantes, mercado, salão (rssss) tudo em volta. Facilitou muito a minha vida!!! O quarto é muuuito limpinho e aconchegante, o chuveiro é uma delicia!

name: Kama'iki
summary: Welcome to Kama’iki. We would love to share our little home near the beach with you. Kama’iki means small child, and Kama’iki is our small child. He sits on the property with two other houses. Kama’iki is the middle house, he is between a house on the road and a house on the beach. He has a gazebo on his makai side (Oceanside), where you can feel and hear the tropical breezes, smell the ocean mists, and hear the crashing waves. Perfect for just a peaceful,  relaxing, quiet vacation.
description: Welcome to Kama’iki. We would love to share our little home near the beach with you. Kama’iki means small child, and Kama’iki is our small child. He sits on the property with two other houses. Kama’iki is the middle house, he is between a house on the road and a house on the beach. He has a gazebo on his makai side (Oceanside), where you can feel and hear the tropical breezes, smell the ocean mists, and hear the crashing waves. Perfect for just a peaceful,  relaxing, quiet vacation.
house_rules: - Quiet hours are before 7am and after 10pm - No pets - Entry gate needs to be closed at all times. - Hawaii style....Please leave your shoes at the door (or just inside the door). - After the beach....please leave the sand at the beach and rinse off at the outdoor shower (corner of green house) before entering into the house. - No smoking

host.host_about:
We (my family and myself) also live on this property, aka the ranch...its 27 acres. 
The two house are very far apart, the cottage is fenced in and has its own entrance.  On the ranch we have cows, bulls, calves, horses, goats, lots of peacocks, and three dogs. They are all fenced in and wont bother you....except the peacocks, they are shy, harmless, and beautiful, and they may come in your yard and scratch for food in the grass. 
We are so lucky to live here and we love it....and we love to share it.

reviews.comments: Marlene's place was just as described - cozy, clean, and relaxing with a well-equipped kitchen and a beautiful back yard area for BBQing and enjoying the ocean breeze. Friendly, helpful neighbors and great location as well with a path to the beach just one house away.
Laying in bed and listen to the ocean when you wake up is enjoyable!

An older home which was clear from the advertisement, but extremely noisy (along with the overall neighborhood).  Windy conditions were intolerable--nothing ever quietened in the house the first night.  Noisy AC units in the 2 bedrooms, so they could not be run at night to cool down the house temperature.  No AC in the main room or kitchen which resulted in 85+ deg F temps and uncomfortable stuffiness.
Lots of noise throughout the night and day from military activities--sounded like low-flying helicopters; also, could constantly hear neighbors--must have been very thin walls in all the closely spaced homes.
Lots of animal noises as well--could not figure out all the different noises, but sometimes we felt like we were on a farm.
Blinds were loosely woven reeds/thin bamboo and yielded zero privacy (they were effectively transparent)--neighbors could see clearly into every room in the home.  Also, the home was very bright inside starting at 5:00 AM, so trying to sleep in was impossible.
We walked on the beach, which was 50 - 75 yards or so from the home, but it was not a beach for lounging on a towel or chair--steep slope, rough sand conditions.  But very nice ocean waters and great scenery.
Lots of mold residue throughout bathroom; shower pan /floor tile stained black, brown, orange, rust, etc.--very difficult to tell if the shower had been cleaned.  My wife did not want to use the shower.
Lots of ants and other bugs (large roaches)  in the kitchen.  Again, made us question the overall cleanliness and pest control measures.
Floors appeared to have been vacuumed, but not cleaned.  Custom is to remove shoes (which we wholeheartedly agree with and observe in our own home), but after one night of walking around in my socks, the bottoms of my gray socks were chocolate brown.
We contacted AirBnB directly and tried to cancel our 8 night stay after 1 night.  Unfortunately, we were not able to find other accommodations and had to stay a 2nd night (which we managed to do), and then moved to a hotel in the near vicinity.
We paid for 3 nights in this home, which seemed reasonable given we were the ones who chose to cancel.
No comment
Our goal was to be able to view incoming ships for RIMPAC and this was a great location for that. House was comfy and a/c was cold - which was all we needed. Mahalo!

name: Sweet Home in Porto
summary: Espaço ideal para quem está visitando a Invicta! Facilidade de acesso a transporte público (metrô e ônibus), com a ótima proximidade também a supermercados, farmácias, banco, cafés e diversos serviços. O apartamento é cuidado com muito amor e carinho preparado para receber pessoas com alegria! ❤ obs: NÃO É NO CENTRO DA CIDADE, são 25 minutos a pé até à Baixa ;)
space: Amplo e arejado apartamento com dois quartos disponibilizados para Airbnb (ver Sweet Home in Porto Room 2). Os espaços compartilhados são cozinha, banheiro e sala.
description: Espaço ideal para quem está visitando a Invicta! Facilidade de acesso a transporte público (metrô e ônibus), com a ótima proximidade também a supermercados, farmácias, banco, cafés e diversos serviços. O apartamento é cuidado com muito amor e carinho preparado para receber pessoas com alegria! ❤ obs: NÃO É NO CENTRO DA CIDADE, são 25 minutos a pé até à Baixa ;) Amplo e arejado apartamento com dois quartos disponibilizados para Airbnb (ver Sweet Home in Porto Room 2). Os espaços compartilhados são cozinha, banheiro e sala. Cozinha, banheiro e sala. Podem me contactar através de mensagens SMS, chat do Airbnb ou (Hidden by Airbnb) .  Trabalho muitas horas por dia, portanto conto com meu co-anfitrião Fabinho que terá o mesmo cuidado e atenção ao receber os hóspedes! :) O endereço fica a 25 minutos a pé do Centro da cidade!  Aqui é Cedofeita, próximo ao Boa Vista e Lapa, locais bem estruturados e próximos à Baixa (centro). Contamos com três supermercados (Continente, Minipreço e Pingo Doce)
neighborhood_overview: O endereço fica a 25 minutos a pé do Centro da cidade!  Aqui é Cedofeita, próximo ao Boa Vista e Lapa, locais bem estruturados e próximos à Baixa (centro). Contamos com três supermercados (Continente, Minipreço e Pingo Doce) a cinco minutos.  Há paragem de autocarro na Rua da Constituição e na Rua Serpa Pinto, a cinco e dez minutos. Há estação de metro (Carolina Michaelis) a dez minutos.  Também têm inúmeros serviços de cafés, restaurantes, lavanderia na Rua da Constituição, ou seja, em dez minutos encontra-se tudo. Boa localização em uma rua tranquila e com fácil acesso a tudo o que se precisa! Ressalto: não é no centro. Mas é muito fácil e próximo.
notes: O horário de check-out é até às 12p.m. Ao deixar o quarto, pode deixar as chaves na porta e as toalhas usadas.
transit: Vindo do aeroporto é só pegar o metro e descer na estação Carolina Michaelis. Depois serão 10 minutos andando. ;) Até a Baixa do Porto é possível ir à pé  (25 minutos), de autocarro (2 minutos até a paragem e mais 7 minutos de viagem), de táxi ou Uber (são apenas 10 minutos) e de metro são 10 minutos até a paragem e em apenas duas paradas (2 minutos) já se chega à Estação Trindade.
access: Cozinha, banheiro e sala.
interaction: Podem me contactar através de mensagens SMS, chat do Airbnb ou (Hidden by Airbnb) .  Trabalho muitas horas por dia, portanto conto com meu co-anfitrião Fabinho que terá o mesmo cuidado e atenção ao receber os hóspedes! :)
house_rules: Você encontrará a casa sempre arrumada e limpa. Portanto, faça o possível para mantê-la assim! :)  - Sempre que usar a cozinha bem como seus utensílios, lave-os, seque-os e depois guarde no mesmo lugar onde estavam. - Você terá uma prateleira em um armário da cozinha para guardar seus alimentos. Os mantenha lá durante sua estadia. Também certifique-se que deixará limpo como encontrou. - Você também terá uma prateleira da geladeira. Faça o possível para manter seus alimentos somente neste espaço, pois lembre-se que você dividirá a casa com outras pessoas! ;) - Garantimos seu espaço limpo, então faça o possível para conservá-lo. Temos sacos de lixo, vassouras, panos de chão e produtos de limpeza à sua disposição. - As roupas de cama e toalhas são exclusivas para hóspedes. Também as mantenho limpas com muito cuidado. Cuide delas como se fossem suas. Não limpe sua maquiagem nelas para que os próximos hóspedes possam usá-las também! Vamos trabalhar juntos para que essa experiência seja fant

reviews.comments: El piso está bien, limpio y tiene lo necesario. Priscila y su compañero son muy hospitalarios, dispuestos a ayudar en lo que sea y dando privacidad a los huéspedes. La única pega es que está algo lejos del centro de la ciudad, a unos 20-25 minutos a pie, pero el camino no se hace duro.
Passamos um fim de semana nesta casa , a localização é  óptima se não se importarem de andar um pouco a pé. Anfitriã muito simpática e prestável. Bom preço- qualidade!

Für den Preis genau das was wir erwartet haben. Kein Schnick-Schnack aber sauber. Auch gut gelegen um schnell in die Innenstadt zu gelangen. Jedoch sehr hellhörig und es war sehr kalt in dem Zimmer. Trotzdem nette Gastgeber und zu empfehlen.

I spent only one night in Priscila house but it was very nice. I arrived at 9pm but it was absolutely no problem... she also sent me a picture showing me where to ring. The next day I left the room quite early so I haven't spent so much time there but it was enough to let me feel comfortable and at home. If I go again to Porto I will visit her again. L’appartement est calme et la chambre spacieuse. Priscila est très discrète. Environ 35 min de marche du centre, mais ligne de bus à côté de l’immeuble.

We could go to Priscilla's place immediately after our flight and were welcomed with open arms. Our room and the bathroom were spotless the kitchen is small but everything we needed was there.

Priscilla is so nice and she let us to check-in flexibly at noon. The place is super tidy and clean. The kitchen has all we need. You can walk around 10 minutes to the metro station. Recommend this place if you go to Porto.

Priscila - замечательная девушка, невероятно приятная и гостеприимная. Я очень благодарен ей за возможность остановиться в её апартаментах и всестороннюю поддержку. Квартира расположена неподалёку от станции метро Carolina Michaelis, до основных достопримечательностей города можно добраться пешком. В квартире очень чисто, уютно и царит позитивная атмосфера. 
Настоятельно рекомендую всем, кто планирует поездку в прекрасный город Порту!
Fairly close to city center about 15 minutes walk down the hill. Place was really clean and there was kitchen at our disposal. Priscila and Fabian were really friendly and helpful.
친절하고 좋았습니다!
Nice place to stay in Porto. Great value! :)
very nice!!!!

Nice and clean room. In walking distance of porto city center and close to a supermarket.

It was a great stay in Priscila's and Fabiahno's house. close to the center, very cozy and bright. highly recommended!
Polina and Sergii

Decent and clean private bedroom with a two person bed (which is quite squeeky while moving). The room is in an apartment shared with Priscila and her boyfriend, plus I believe one other room for other Airbnb guests. Priscila was welcoming and swift in communicating.

Perfect stay!  Good localization - easy to get to the airport and city centre. Very good contact with the owner and easy check-in. Nice and clean room :)

El alojamiento limpio con todos los servicios que podrás necesitar. Es un poco alejado de el centro de la ciudad pero esta muy bien conectado con el transporte público. Priscila fue muy buena anfitriona! Nos pareció maravilloso nuestra estadía!

Priscila’s place was very neat and in a convenient location. Beds were a bit uncomfortable in truth but no real complaints! Quick communication and a pleasant stay. Thank you!

Anyway, you get what you pay for.
Muy buena anfitriona, simpática y con el baño y cocina a nuestra disposición

name: Modern apartment Bondi Beach
summary: Newly renovated apartment only footsteps away from one of the world's most famous beaches --> Bondi Beach. This modern apartment is close to Bronte Beach, Tamarama, Coastal Walks, Centennial Park, Cafes, Shopping and public transport . You’ll love our place because of the location, the ambience, and the outdoor space. It is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
space: Our space has a fully equipped kitchen and a modern bathroom with separate toilet. Begin or end the day at our nice little balcony to sit back and relax. You will sleep in a comfortable Kingsize bed and can chill on our comfy couch while watching Netflix.

host.host_about:
Hi, 
I am enjoying life most while travelling and exploring new cultures, nature and food. I am living close to the beach in Sydney with my boyfriend and try to go kite surfing as much as possible. While travelling we spend most of our time outside and therefore our only demands for accomodation are a good bed to sleep in and that it is clean.

reviews.comments:
We had a great stay at Boudine’s place. The apartment was clean and tidy. Big plus was a very comfortable bed, good shower and fast wifi. Walking distance to Bondi Beach, shops and restaurant. 
I would absolutely recommend this place for anyone who likes to stay at Bondi but wants to be away from the busy streets.
Thanks for the great stay Boudine!
Boudine’s apartment is perfect for a Bondi visit- Only a short walk to the beach! Also really nice and modern and super clean!

name: Sea View Private Room with Bathroom-TF6
summary: Our hostel is located by the sea at Lantau Island -  Tong Fuk with a fantastic sea view. Guests can go to the beach on foot in 2 mins. The apartment has 8 private rooms in total. Guests can access to our shared kitchen, garden and BBQ area. Each private room has 1 double bed for guests to sleep and a private bathroom with shower. Each private room can accommodate 2 guests maximum. The whole place has air-conditioning available.

There is a private bathroom right inside the room with hot shower provided. Guests can enjoy a mountain view from the window of their room and can get to the beach on foot in 2 minutes.

This private room has a double bed which can accommodate 2 guests maximum. There is a private bathroom right inside the room with hot shower provided. Guests can enjoy a mountain view from the window of their room and can get to the beach on foot in 2 minutes. private room, private bathroom shared kitchen, garden and BBQ area You can contact us through phone or email or social media anytime and we will reply you within the next 24 hours. You can get there by a 20-minute bus ride from Tung Chung MTR station
notes: 1) Security Deposit for this apartment: $300HKD, cash only Guest is required to pay a Security Deposit to cover incidental charges to your room upon Check-In. The Deposit will be given back to guests upon check-out if the room is in good condition. 2) Rental fee of towels: $20HKD per towel
transit: You can get there by a 20-minute bus ride from Tung Chung MTR station. Or You can take ferry to Mui Wo form Central and then take a bus.
access: private room, private bathroom shared kitchen, garden and BBQ area
interaction: You can contact us through phone or email or social media anytime and we will reply you within the next 24 hours.
house_rules: - 11pm-7am Quiet Hours

host.host_about: The Cove Hostel

address.street: New Territories, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The place is basic  but very nice .room are clean and comfortable. nice view from rooms and rooftop. we used rooftop as common area. basic kitchen tools . for a relaxing weekend is really  a good place .

It’s beyond our expectations. Although we never had a chance to meet the management team, but everything arranged very well. 
The place also close to the bus stop and walking distance to beautiful beach.
But quite shock, the water heater in our room is only on in the morning and afternoon, so better to go wash ourselves ASAP :)
Also don’t forget to prepare your own food since it takes 30 min walks to our closest diner place.

name: Beach front condo - Prime location
summary: Available: Dec 2018 -30 day minimum, move in/out dates may be flexible. 4 miles to downtown Hilo. Beautiful, tropical beachfront paradise. Steps to  Richardson’s Ocean Beach Park;  fantastic ocean views. Remodeled 4th floor, private + breezes, fully furnished: linens, kitchen, Parking space,  pool + BBQ area. Steps to beach, snorkeling, swimming with the turtles, whale watching in season, historic fish ponds, etc. Convenient, comfortable, good light and breezes. 1/2 block to public transit.
description: Available: Dec 2018 -30 day minimum, move in/out dates may be flexible. 4 miles to downtown Hilo. Beautiful, tropical beachfront paradise. Steps to  Richardson’s Ocean Beach Park;  fantastic ocean views. Remodeled 4th floor, private + breezes, fully furnished: linens, kitchen, Parking space,  pool + BBQ area. Steps to beach, snorkeling, swimming with the turtles, whale watching in season, historic fish ponds, etc. Convenient, comfortable, good light and breezes. 1/2 block to public transit.
house_rules: - No partys or loud TV or loud music, etc. Hilo is somewhat remote. All efforts are made  to keep appliances and the elevator in good condition. However, if something does stop working, it may take weeks or months to get the parts and repair people to fix it. Also, it is reasonably quiet here but, there can also be some noise from occasional planes, etc.

host.host_about:
I enjoy the outdoors, travel, adventure, nature, meeting new people, meditation, zen and other studies, India, Myanmar, Hawaii, Europe and many other places. If I'm your guest I'm friendly and respectful of your lifestyle and privacy. If I'm your host I try to be the same and seek to provide any needed information and/or services/supplies for your comfort and enjoyment.
My style of traveling is to be low maintenance and just go for it solo or have a compatible travel buddy. Life moto? just try to be in the present and not to serious:)

name: ABSOLUTE SAGRADA FAMILIA 2
summary: Enjoy the best view of La Sagrada Familia in the whole city!.  2 bedrooms both with balconies and 20 m2 living room with 2 balconies more facing the cathedral's main facade. Lots of natural light in all roomes. Fully equipped kitchen, quality bedding, fresh towels. AA, Heating, Free WiFi. Reception desk for best guest assistance. Free acces to our roof top terrace (130 m2) with outside furniture. Best restaurants, food market, and excellent connections to all sites just 50 meters from the apt.

name: Bondi Beachside Bliss
summary: Light and spacious 2 bedroom apartment in North Bondi. Great for a couple or a family, it has everything you need for a home away from home.
space: The apartment has 2 bedrooms - 1 queen (smaller room) is set up as the adults room with a queen bed, lots of light and right next to the lounge and main area of the apartment. The the other (the main room) is set up as a kids retreat for my 3 yr old boy with a single bed + single trundle, giving a nice separation of adult and child when needed.  We have a modern kitchen with all the amenities (dishwasher, microwave, new fridge, gas cooker and oven, Nespresso coffee machine). Lovely comfy corner lounge (6 seater), with cable tv (full Foxtel package including movies, sport and kids package) and unlimited wifi. Lovely balcony to watch the sun go down over the park and get some fresh air.
description: Light and spacious 2 bedroom apartment in North Bondi. Great for a couple or a family, it has everything you need for a home away from home. The apartment has 2 bedrooms - 1 queen (smaller room) is set up as the adults room with a queen bed, lots of light and right next to the lounge and main area of the apartment. The the other (the main room) is set up as a kids retreat for my 3 yr old boy with a single bed + single trundle, giving a nice separation of adult and child when needed.  We have a modern kitchen with all the amenities (dishwasher, microwave, new fridge, gas cooker and oven, Nespresso coffee machine). Lovely comfy corner lounge (6 seater), with cable tv (full Foxtel package including movies, sport and kids package) and unlimited wifi. Lovely balcony to watch the sun go down over the park and get some fresh air. Shared backyard with trampoline and shared clothes line. I’m available for guests as needed. The apartment is ideally located -walking distance to the beach and slig
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is ideally located -walking distance to the beach and slightly longer to the harbour. Transport options abound, no need to drive.  Across the road from the apartment is a huge park, public tennis court and Bondi lawn bowling club (cheap drinks and pub lunches/dinners) and only a block from Seven Ways cafes, 2 blocks to Bondi Farmers Market on a Saturday and a 5 min walk to iconic Bondi beach.  There’s two options for buses within 1 min walk in either direction - to Bondi Junction (Westfield and the transport hub of train and bus stations), or to access the other beaches of Tamarama, Bronte and Coogee. 1km walk to Rose Bay ferry and all the magic of Sydney Harbour if you get bored of the beach! And a short 7 min drive to South Head / Watson’s Bay for a beautiful lunch on the water looking back over Sydney.
transit: There are bikes to hire, buses within 1 min that go everywhere and the ferry at Rose Bay. If you’re driving there is free street parking available.
access: Shared backyard with trampoline and shared clothes line.
interaction: I’m available for guests as needed.

host.host_about: I'm a fitness addict and PT, I work in media and I have a little blond blue-eyed son called Charlie. We live in the seaside suburb of Bronte in Sydney, Australia. I love to travel (although motherhood has curbed the overseas part for now!) and have been lucky enough to have travelled the world. I'm an avid reader, love animals and red wine as well as most styles of music.

name: COME INN 2인실B(1더블침대) 침사취이역B1에서 5분거리, 한국어 영어 중국어가능
summary: 룸에 창문이 있어괘적합니다. tv,무선인터넷  기본 필수품 준비되어 있습니다 숙소바로 뒷편에 구룡의 랑콰이펑이라고 하는 거리가 있어 하루 여행의 피로를 확 날려 버릴수 있습니다 There is a window in the room and it makes the room pleasant. TV, wireless internet and basic necessities are ready in the room. Right behind our accommodation, there is a street called Kowloon’s Lan Kwai Fong and you can relieve the fatigue of your day trip. 房间里有窗户,所以很舒适｡室内已准备好电视､无线网络以及基本必需品｡ 在宿舍后边有一条路叫做九龙的兰桂坊,您可以消除一天旅程的疲劳｡
space: 한국직원이 상주 하고 있어 연락하시면 언제나 친절히 안내 해 드립니다. 모든 룸에 창문이 있어 쾌적합니다. 차와 식수는 항상 준비되어 있어 언제든지 모님커피와 차를 드실수 있습니다. 구룡공원과,넛츠포드테라스가 숙소 바로 근처에 있어 아침 운동하기에 좋은 위치 입니다. Korean staffs are always in residence, so if you need any help, you will always be more than welcome to contact us. We will always happy to help you. All the rooms are pleasant with a window inside. Tea and water are always available, so you can have a morning coffee or tea anytime. There are Kowloon Park and Knutsford Terrace nearby the accommodation. It’s a good place to exercise in the morning. 我们有常住的韩国职员,所以您需要帮忙的话,我们会随时亲切地帮助｡每个房间都有窗户所以很舒适 茶和饮水总是准备好着,所以随您时可以饮用晨咖啡和茶｡九龙公园和诺士佛台位于宿舍附近,所以我们的宿舍在便于晨练的位置｡

neighborhood_overview: 저희 숙소는 침사취이 킴벌리로드에 위치 하고 있으면 주위에 유명한 네츠포스데라스가 있으면 구룡공원과 공원안 대형 수영장등을 이용하실수 있습니다 그리고 바로 숙소 앞에 sasa가 있어 쇼핑하기에도 좋은곳입니다 Our accommodation is located on Kimberley Road, Tsim Sha Tsui. Around the accommodation, there are the famous Knutsford Terrace and Kowloon Park and you can use the large swimming pool in the park. Also, there is SASA right in front of the accommodation, so it is a good place to go shopping. 我们宿舍位于尖沙咀金巴利道｡周边有著名的诺士佛台和九龙公园｡您可以使用 公园内的大型游泳池｡ 而且在宿舍前面有SASA,所以和购物也很方便｡
notes: 밤12시 이후는 다른 게스트들을 위해서 서로 배려하는 마음을 갖어 주시면 감사하겠습니다 We would appreciate it if you could be considerate of other guests after midnight. 如果您在晚上12点以后,为其他顾客相互照顾的话,我们会非常感谢的｡
transit: mar(지하철 침사취이역B1)까지 숙소에서 걸어서 5분 거리 입니다.   공항버스정류장은 숙소에서 3분거리입니다 숙소 바로 앞에 택시도 잡기가 편리합니다 It is a 5-minute walk from our accommodation to MTR (B1 Exit of Tsim Sha Tsui station) and it is a 3-minute walk to airport shuttle bus stop. It is also convenient to catch a taxi right in front of the accommodation. MTR(尖沙咀地铁站B1出口)距离宿舍有步行5分钟,然后机场公交车站距离宿舍只有步行3分钟｡而且在宿舍前面打出租车也很方便
access: 공용전자렌지와 냉장고, 정수기와 간단한 차가 준비되어 있으니 언제든지 편하게 모닝커피와 함께 하루를 시작하시면 됩니다 There are microwave, freezer and water purifier for common use and tea are available, so you can always feel free to start your day with a cup of morning coffee or tea. 我们有公用的微波炉､冰箱以及净水器｡而且茶准备好着,所以您随时可以轻松地与一杯咖啡或茶开始您的一天｡
interaction: (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 연락주시면 언제든지 친절히 답변드리겠습니다 If you contact us via (Hidden by Airbnb) Talk, (Hidden by Airbnb) ,we will always be happy to answer at any time. 如果用 (Hidden by Airbnb) Talk, (Hidden by Airbnb) ,联系我们的话,我们随时都会亲切地给予答复｡

just a few minutes walk from the metro station and the landlord was fairly hospitable and kind. except that it's a bit noisy after the night life begins, other   aspects are all good. i will choose to stay there if i visit HK next time.
很好,整洁干净｡位置有点难找不过瑕不掩瑜｡

bella是温柔又热情的房东阿姨,入住前会及时联络并且发来准确的导航,非常贴心｡房子位于尖沙咀的黄金地段,吃喝玩乐无论做什么都很方便｡因为是阿姨亲自打扫,房间更是干净整洁,睡起来非常舒服,总之在预算有限的情况下绝对是超值的选择,十分推荐!
Clean and comfortable room with perfect location and reasonable price. Bella is super kind and hospitable as well. Highly recommended!!!
Bella阿姨特别可爱 很喜欢~ 入住感觉很好 房间干净整洁 也很安全｡

nice

The room is a little bit tiny (every room in HK is small ),but we do have enough space.
Bella is super nice and very helpful,speaking Mandarin and English,also helps us to keep the suitcases after we check out.
Definitely stay in here next time we visit HK.

Nice location and clean and professional mini hotel like room.  Please note room is quite Hong Kong style small and narrow.  Including the toilet with showering.  A/C has some noise but not big.  I think it worth the price.

来说下问题,房间窗户跟前很大噪音轰轰响(可能是隔壁房间的空调机还是什么),因为第二天要考雅思加上我睡眠很浅所以真的很影响我第二天发挥...,那个噪音很影响我睡觉结果一直没睡着｡一直到三点多噪音才停下来,我才能睡着....
第二点,隔音差｡凌晨四点多好像是隔壁房间入住还是干嘛,走廊里一直各种声音导致我又被吵醒｡
结合上述两点｡房间其他都还可以,热水什么都有｡就是遇到了无法控制的噪音,希望房主可以改善下｡

The biggest problem is it would be really noisy at night  near the window.Ang this noise didn't stop until 3-4AM and it really effect the sleep quality.Just because I had a ielts the next day, it really influence me...

summary: This cozy apartment is located 50m away from the railway station of São Bento and other iconic monuments, in a recently renovated building in the heart of the city, an area classified by UNESCO as World Heritage.
space: During the renovation of the building, the original facades were preserved and the interior was fully renewed, using a modern design inspired by the surroundings. The interior of the apartment has a contemporary decoration.  It is very user-friendly: the furniture is easily adapted to the space, the kitchen is fully equipped - with all the equipments you need to prepare your meals -, and there is a complete and modern individual bathroom with a sophisticated and clean design.  We provide towels and sheets, cable television is available and, of course, the Wi-Fi is free!

neighborhood_overview: Oldcity Design Apartments is centrally located and within walking distance to several monuments, coffee shops, restaurants and a local market. It is located in the Sé neighborhood, one of the oldest, most typical and authentic areas of the city. Here, you can truly experience what it is like to live in the historic center of Oporto for a couple of days!
notes: We will meet you at Oldcity Design Apartments to welcome you give you access to the apartment. The check-in is done between 15h and 20h. We kindly ask you to inform us at what hour will you be arriving in order to have everything prepared for you. Stay with us and enjoy the unique design of our apartments, our sympathy, and the views of the cathedral and the old city right from your window!
transit: Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport in Porto is 10Km away from the city center. If you came by plane, you: 1) Can pick up a taxi, which is a little bit expensive, especially during nights and weekends, as they had a 20% extra tax. Inform the taxi driver to take you to Porto Cathedral.  2) Can book a transfer service. We actually can do it for you with an extra cost (30€ for 4 people; 40€ for 6 people; and 50€ for 8 people). In this case, we need your flight details: numer and time of arrival. 3) Can catch the Metro / subway. The directions are signed in the airport, you only need to follow the arrows and catch it to the “TRINDADE” station. Once you are there, you'll have change to the YELLOW line and exit in "S. BENTO" station. The subway departs every 20 minutes, and takes about one hour to get to your destination. You have to buy the Z4 ticket, that costs around 2€ / person. After you exit S. Bento station, you will see the Porto Cathedral and the Market of "São Sebastião". our building is

reviews.comments: Very Clean and new! The hosts were very nice. Good place to Relax and to see the vulkanos. Very recommendable! Enjoy!
This was a great place to stop after exploring Volcanoes National Park. The accommodations were new, clean, quiet and restful.

Space was super clean and very comfortable. Amazing amenities provided, I was very impressed. Host was very easy to get ahold of and responded quickly to the questions I had. Definitely would rebook once I make it this way again!

My friend and I really enjoyed our stay here, and we both agreed it was one of our favorite accommodations from our trip!  Mirna and Miguel were warm, welcoming, and extra thoughtful hosts.  The suite was immaculate, stylish and very comfortable.  The extra touches were much appreciated!
Good location for visiting the south.
Everything was fine. You will love this place.
Was in a nice area with plenty of things to see! Very friendly hosts and comfortable space.

Eine wunderschön eingerichtete Unterkunft, die extrem sauber ist. Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt, da es auch sehr ruhig war. Die Gastgeber haben wir nicht kennen gelernt, der Schwiegervater war aber vor Ort und sehr hilfsbereit. 
Die gesamte Gegend ist sehr ruhig. Der nächste Supermarkt ist ca. 15 min entfernt mit dem Auto, hier bekommt man die wichtigsten Dinge.
Condition just as you see in photos.  Open screen door and windows with overhead fan made it very comfortable for two or three max.  A good value!
Es ist eine sehr saubere Unterkunft und sehr gastfreundlich. Würde wieder kommen.

This is such a perfect rental. It has literally everything you need and is exceptionally clean. Comfy bed and linen. Beautiful yard and patio. Perfect layout. I honestly think it looks much better than the pictures. 

During our week on the island, we also stayed in Kona and Pahoa, but this place was my favorite!

Beautiful area. Close to South Point (definitely go!) and Punaluu Beach, which is great for families and snorkeling (saw 2 turtles).

Nice place with spacious accommodations and thoughtful appointments including a well-equipped kitchen and soft bathroom towels. The only thing I could see missing is better accessibility to the views of this beautiful part of Hawaii. i felt like I was missing something and it seemed a bit claustrophobic. The advertisement talks about access to the lanai at the main house but that was never offered to me personally and I didn’t want to intrude. Other Airbnb’s I’ve stayed at on the big Island have been much more welcoming to share the view. 

Thanks!
Jeff
This place was very clean and quiet. Everything was new and fresh. We were very comfortable here. It had everything we needed. Thanks, guys!
Wow! Place was like a resort! I was an AirBnb Superhost from the mainland but this place was like a 4 or 5 star resort! Everything was a cut above what you would expect.

Great communication, easy check in, very clean place. And the nicest thing was that the house owners gave us a tour of their house in the morning including a spectacular Terrasse view and fresh coffee :)
It is a quiet and peaceful place with such wonderful accommodations.  It is not far from South Point and just a very secluded beautiful place.

Great place with fantastic amenities. Seamless check-in process. Sparkling clean. Convenient location just a few miles off main highway connecting Kona and Hilo. We would definitely stay here again.
the studio is as described. the view is beautiful and the area is quiet and peaceful. we enjoyed 2 great nights of sleep

reviews.comments: I rented this place for my family who came from Russia for my cousin's wedding. We had 13 of us stay here and it was undeniably the best experience. I live in Montreal and have been to many places and this place by far was the most unbelievably gorgeous. So well designed. The location of the penthouse is steps away from everything in old port Montreal, from stores to restaurants, clubs and bars. We had an incredible water front view of the old port as well. If I could give this place a 10 star I would! Thank you from my family, my cousin and I!!!

Penthouse was great! Stayed over with a couple friends. Location was right on the pier Central to everything. The place is huge, well designed and stylish. The host even showed me around for a night! I would stay here again.

This place was beautiful, exquisite, and it's in a perfect location. I don't think I could have picked a better place to stay in during my time in Montreal. I stayed here for my brother's bachelor party and it exceeded all of my expectations with a group of 16. Our host was incredibly gracious and accommodating for all of our needs. He also was more than helpful to give recommendations and even accompanied us to get all the necessities we would need during our stay. He even came out with us our first night and made us feel right at home. This place and the host really made my brother's bachelor party an incredible one and I don't think I'll ever forget that.
The place is amazing and the service was great! Jonathan and Raj were very responsive and helped out with their local knowledge around the city as well!
Great place!
Beautiful place in the heart of the city
You CAN not go wrong with booking this place. Central to every hottest spots to be on Friday’s and Saturday nights. Service and response was fantastic !!!!

This place is awesome, I was in Montreal for a company Christmas party with my colleagues and we had this place. Amazing hospitality and the owner made sure we had fun and his recommendations for Montreal were perfect

Two separate units, plenty of space for 13 people to sleep in. Two really cool apartments with unique / interesting decor. Location is perfect for exploring Old Montreal and the hosts were helpful in suggesting places to go out to.
