name: Cacao-Ocean Room at Hamakua Chocolate Farm
summary: If you ever wanted to experience modern off-grid living on a working Chocolate Farm? – this is your chance!  100% of our farm’s electricity is supplied by the sun and our delicious water is drawn from our private deep well.  The Cacao-Ocean Room overlooks the Cacao orchard and Pacific Ocean, has a full ensuite bathroom, Tempurapedic queen sized  bed, and is the larger of the 2 rooms we rent.
space: It is all about indoor-outdoor living here in Hawaii.  Your large, elegant bedroom has great ventilation and plenty of windows, bringing the outside in.  But we also want you to enjoy our outdoor spaces as an extension of your room.  Our large covered lanai- just outside the bedroom acts as an additional living and dining room with a beautiful ocean view and gentle tropical breezes to lull you into relaxation. Our comfortable guest rooms are not equipped with TV (to help you unplug), however, you can connect to the complimentary WiFi network and enjoy whatever you want to watch or listen to on your own devices. There is also access to our adjacent chocolate demo kitchen w/ toaster, refrigerator/freezer, microwave, glassware/plates/utensils if you care to prepare your own self-catered breakfast.  We provide complimentary tea or coffee in the mornings.
description: If you ever wanted to experience modern off-grid living on a working Chocolate Farm? – this is your chance!  100% of our farm’s electricity is supplied by the sun and our delicious water is drawn from our private deep well.  The Cacao-Ocean Room overlooks the Cacao orchard and Pacific Ocean, has a full ensuite bathroom, Tempurapedic queen sized  bed, and is the larger of the 2 rooms we rent. It is all about indoor-outdoor living here in Hawaii.  Your large, elegant bedroom has great ventilation and plenty of windows, bringing the outside in.  But we also want you to enjoy our outdoor spaces as an extension of your room.  Our large covered lanai- just outside the bedroom acts as an additional living and dining room with a beautiful ocean view and gentle tropical breezes to lull you into relaxation. Our comfortable guest rooms are not equipped with TV (to help you unplug), however, you can connect to the complimentary WiFi network and enjoy whatever you want to watch or listen to on your
neighborhood_overview: Hamakua Chocolate Farm is located in Papaikou- a small village just 8 minutes north of Old Town Hilo- on the Big Island of Hawaii.  We are a great jumping off point to explore Hilo Town, the Hilo Farmers Market, numerous waterfalls, botanic gardens, tea farms/tastings, zip lines, local beaches, surf spots, quaint sugar plantation villages and the Volcano National Park and its lava spectacles all along the enchanting Hamakua Coastline.
notes: Due to this being a working chocolate farm with electric fences, suspension bridge, unfenced gulches and active farm equipment, we have a no-child under 16 policy.
transit: It is best to have a car to stay with us.  There is a public bus, but it does not service our private road.
access: We encourage you to explore and enjoy our cacao orchard, suspension bridge, treehouse, gardens, river and common spaces around the farm. Feel free to take our beach chairs down to the river for a picnic or get lost in a good book. There is a large covered lanai w/ lounges and dining table.  If you are interested in more cacao farm-related activities (like Farm Tours and Chocolate Tastings, or Cacao Harvest Events), reach out to us or check out- H (Website hidden by Airbnb)
interaction: We are often around working on the farm and are happy to provide local tips and advise- if you want that. We are also happy to allow you to have your own space if you prefer to have a intimate interaction-free experience. Both rooms have private keypad entries. If you are interested in more cacao farm-related activities, reach out to us or check out H (Website hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: - No shoes in the rooms.  - Outside quiet hours between 9p-7a - No kids under 16 policy due to electric fences, suspension bridge, swiftly flowing stream, active farm equipment and unfenced cliffs. HAWAII TAX INFORMATION: Our room prices are INCLUSIVE of 14.42% Hawaii Taxes, (which includes a TAT Transient Accommodation Tax of  10.25% and General Excise Tax GET  4.17%).

reviews.comments: Berndt and Dan were really fabulous hosts and even invited me to have dinner with them one evening. The mornings were really gorgeous from the sunrise coming up over the ocean at the foot of your bed. The room was immaculate and the bed was really comfortable. They both exceeded my expectations during my stay and I would definitely stay here again if I had the chance. The property has some really lovely architecture and Berndt and Dan are both really great people who are passionate about what they do and sharing their experiences with their guests. All-in-all I had a fantastic 4 day stay here for a work trip and was able to relax and unwind everyday.
Wonderful!!!so great beautiful place and wonderful host

This is not a typical place you imagine finding in Hawaii. The design is modern and somewhat minimalist but spectacular. The views of sunrise from the ocean room every morning were incredible with a view looking down the hill at the chocolate as the pods are ripening from green to cherry red on the branches. There is a pair of red headed Cardinals that seem to think it’s their home and have the outdoor run of the place and they love to say hello multiple times a day jumping around  your feet as you sit at the table outside as well as peeking into your window at times to say hello ....then there are the ubiquitous day geckos that are cuter than panda bears peeking out to say hello from corners of the building and on bushes by day and the other cute mourning geckos very loved by Hawaiians at night on the outside walls by the lights. If you’re interested in birds you can sit on the porch and watch many species come by including many native species.  it’s lots of fun to watch nature there

It was wonderfully quiet being a bit out of the city but a very short drive to Hilo which also was pleasant
Dan and Berndt  were excellent hosts at every corner for every whim have extremely an interesting backgrounds and are Master gardeners but I have experienced a lot in their lives worldwide.
They were also fantastic at giving recommendations for everything imaginable 

Immaculate premises Beautiful grounds and even better chocolate!

no comparison hands down five stars

Super gracious hosts and a wonderful stay on an amazing chocolate farm. This home is incredible, close to town, and a very comfortable room with stunning views of the farm and ocean. Thanks Dan for a tour of the farm, it was definitely the highlight of my trip! Mahalo.

Berndt and Dan are very nice people and responsive hosts. The property is beautiful and it’s really cool to walk through their cacao orchard, take a dip in the steam and check out the treehouse. The room you stay in is extremely stylish and very comfortable. The whole experience was special and we would definitely come back.

Great out of the city place to relax, enjoy great views and the soothing sounds of nature (both babbling brook and singing wildlife).  Easy access to Hilo.  Felt very welcome.  We could have stayed even longer and really chilled out with more chocolate!

Stay. In. This. Place.

I'm going to recommend this place to many many people, so book it up fast!

This was my favorite Airbnb stay in a while, and I've stayed in many many Airbnbs. Berndt and Dan were exceptional hosts and their home is one of the most beautiful on the Big Island, I'm sure of it. Do yourself a favor and ask them all about how they came to run a chocolate farm in Hawaii - their life stories are fascinating and I would quite happily have chatted their ear off for hours. Meeting them was an absolute joy.

The farm is lovely - with a stream, interesting fruits and spices, as well as the chocolate plants, and even a treehouse that they used to live in while they were designing and building the house. The chocolate farm is just getting up and running but we gratefully sampled chocolates left at the side of our bed and smell the beans roasting in their workroom

The sea view room has a huge window that you can leave open without blinds and watch the stars. It has a private entrance and private en-suite so it's definitely more of a guest suite than a private room. You also have access to a kitchen which they use for chocolate prep. Everything is very well designed and stylish, with high end features that shout to Dan's artistic profession.

They even left us fresh papaya and avocados just picked from the garden for breakfast - which were so huge we couldn't possibly eat all of. 

Hilo is much closer than we thought, as are waterfalls, hikes and snorkelling spots. Just ask Berndt or Dan for recommendations - they are big advocates for the responsible tourism and enjoyment of the local area. 

Mahalo for the stay!

I was not to visit the Big Island in the first place. The pictures of Berndt and Dan’s chocolate farm, the stunning ocean view, their lovely house in Klein blue and the nice taste interior design, however, made me make the best decision during my holidays in Hawaii this time.

Their wonderland is the place to be. Their advice and (the always timely) response lead you to the most beautiful experience here. 

I will surely be “back” here with my beloved family and friends.

I just can’t say enough.  Our stay at Hamakua was absolutely incredible.  
Dan and Bernt are wonderful hosts with a wealth of knowledge to share and an inspiring passion for their craft.  
The room was impeccably clean, the view was to die for, and the grounds were a lovely place to take in the majesty of the big island.  I wouldn’t stay anywhere else near Hilo.  Highly recommend.

A beautiful, modern, clean room in a cocoa farm with an ocean view. We can’t asking for more than that.
Dan is very generous host, take time to show us his chocolate farm and offered valuable tips for our Hilo stay.

My girlfriend and I had a great time staying 2 nights in the cacao room at the Hamakua chocolate farm. We love everything about the experience. Book the stay as soon as you can before this place gets too popular. Here is a quick summary of what we like about this place:  
1. super new&clean room with ocean-view: while we were looking for a place to stay that is close to Hilo, a lot of the hotels seen old and some Airbnbs look too remote (no bathroom attached). The cacao room really stood out as the room itself is excellent with oceanview. Already missed the feeling of waking up by the morning bird songs and enjoy the sunrise from the cacao room.

2. Modern design farmhouse: The building is a piece of art. It is so interesting to hear the story of constructing the building from Dan and saw the amazing blue lighting while driving back to the farm in the night. 

3. The host Dan is friendly and thoughtful: Dan welcomed us to his place with a small bite of chocolate (of course, we are staying on a chocolate farm).  We are amazed by all his small but thoughtful surprises: champaign in the fridge (we are celebrating 2 year anniversary), some fruit juice and experimental chocolate flavor popcorn. 
   
4. Chocolate farm tasting experience: we decided to go on his chocolate farm tasting tour. It was great to learn about how chocolate is made, walked around the property, and tasting some delicious chocolate. There are a cool tree house, a swinging bridge, and a river right on the property. Make sure you check that out.

We had a wonderful stay at Hamakua Chocolate Farm.  Dan and Berndt are super hosts!   The accommodations are well designed, clean,  and comfortable --  incredible attention to detail.    Very helpful tips on restaurants, activities.  
The setting is stunning:  a cacao farm on a rushing river.  Dramatic beauty is everywhere (including an 7 foot tall heliconia arrangement in our room cut fresh from the garden!).  At night, the tropical critters sing their songs, providing a sweet lullaby.   We look forward to returning someday.

name: Hong Kong University, MTR station 5 min walk away
summary: Located near the Hong Kong University Campus and situated nicely in the city with public transport available nearby apartment to get all over Hong Kong.  This 2 bedroom is the perfect place to stay to get some nice quiet time after a busy day in city
space: A great offer for this fabulous location near mid levels.  This 2 bedroom flat offers a large comfy double bed in each room, FREE Wifi, hair dryer, large LCD TV with entertainment DVD system.  The building has an elevator direct to the apartment with just a few steps to the lobby area. Located on High Street in a laid back area and has rapidly become a hip area hosting many of the city's most creative types, it takes 8 minutes/$5 USD cab ride or 15 minutes by foot to Central. There is a 7-11 convenience store just across the street.  The area is a melting pot of East meets West, with older chinese traditional buildings being surrounded by high end new luxurious developments with new restaurants, nice coffee shops, banking, shops popping up all the time. Transport is very easy through the nearby tram, buses and minibuses.  Of course, the taxis in Hong Kong are most convenient and very cheap compared to other big cities like New York and London.
description: Located near the Hong Kong University Campus and situated nicely in the city with public transport available nearby apartment to get all over Hong Kong.  This 2 bedroom is the perfect place to stay to get some nice quiet time after a busy day in city A great offer for this fabulous location near mid levels.  This 2 bedroom flat offers a large comfy double bed in each room, FREE Wifi, hair dryer, large LCD TV with entertainment DVD system.  The building has an elevator direct to the apartment with just a few steps to the lobby area. Located on High Street in a laid back area and has rapidly become a hip area hosting many of the city's most creative types, it takes 8 minutes/$5 USD cab ride or 15 minutes by foot to Central. There is a 7-11 convenience store just across the street.  The area is a melting pot of East meets West, with older chinese traditional buildings being surrounded by high end new luxurious developments with new restaurants, nice coffee shops, banking, shops popping up
notes: Once you arrive in Hong Kong, everything is quite simple and all starts with a call from the FREE phones at the airport located in the hall immediately after you pass through baggage customs.  There is also a Visitors Center there if you would like to pick up some maps, local travel guides, etc. to read on your way to the apartment.  If you need a local SIM card, there is a 7-11 in the middle section  of the main arrival hall where they see all types of SIM cards, I usually prefer the PCCW brand as it is the larges local operator.
transit: Getting around The apartment is very close to Hong Kong University HKU so the transport in and out of the area is super convenient, with the easiest being the many buses and mini buses that whisk students and residents around all parts of Hong Kong. There is also the brand new HKU MTR line extension station that just opened in January 2015, the station is within 5-8 minute walk from the apartment building.
access: Guests have access to: - FREE WiFi - Cable TV - Hair Dryer - Iron/Ironing Board - Microwave, Hot Water Boiler, Cooker - Towels, Sheets, Toilet Paper, Shampoo, Soap, etc.
interaction: As much as possible or invisible if you want. I will try to meet with arriving guests and show them the area.  Whenever guests need information or recommendations, I am always available via messaging or phone.
house_rules: This is a Strictly NON SMOKING Flat. UPON ARRIVAL AT PROPERTY, ALL GUESTS MUST WAIT FOR ME AT THE FRONT GATE OUTSIDE OF THE BUILDING.  BUILDING RESIDENTS WILL COMPLAIN TO PROPERTY MANAGEMENT IF THE LOBBY AREA INSIDE BUILDING IS BLOCKED.  THANKS FOR YOUR KIND UNDERSTANDING FOR AN ENJOYABLE STAY. Check in time is AFTER 12:30 pm.  Make sure to contact us by phone at least 30 minutes prior to arrival such that we can meet you at the flat to hand you the keys and acquaint you to the surroundings.  As this is a family business, please try your best to arrive at the apartment as early as possible. After 11:30pm as transport to the apartment is limited for us, we have to charge HKD150 to cover our taxi transport cost to and from the apartment. We are generally exhausted at the end of the day and we really would rather you arrive early and not have to charge this. Guests must wait for us OUTSIDE the building upon arrival and not enter the building without us as this causes unnecessary misunders

host.host_about: I was born in California and raised in Hong Kong. Went to college in the states and returned to Hong Kong a few years ago.  I absolutely love travelling around the region but Hong Kong has always welcomed me home and I look forward to showing off my home town and sharing all the little insights and local specialities with all my guests!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Brendan's space was really awesome! It was super accessible by a number of buses and minibuses which was a major plus getting all around HK island. In addition it was a very spacious area that was perfect for my two friends and I. The neighborhood had plenty of good dining options including a vegan/vegetarian spot that was a huge plus as one of the members of our party is vegan. If I go back to HK I would be sure to hit up one of Brendan's spaces!
I am happy to stay this appartment. Space is big and nice flat.
Awesome host! Very accommodating and honest. It was a pleasure booking your apartment. Thank you! :)

The place is great, spacious and equipped with everything one might need, and feels like home. We had no problem with hot water, the wifi internet was fast and AC's worked well. Also, the rooftop is a very nice place to have evening tea while doing laundry. Brendan is very nice, he met us and showed us the apartment. The only issue was that I couldn't find any knives at the apartment, but thanks to that I've bought myself a folding ceramic knife at Japan Home Center nearby.
Getting to Sheung Wan on foot takes time, but there are lots of buses. 
I would highly recommend Brendan's apartment.

On the whole, it was a pleasant stay. The location is near the university, about 10 minutes walk. The neighborhood has a good mix of both local and international food. It is accessible to central and causeway bay too. The host is very helpful and kind. I ordered a pair of yoga pants online and when i approached the host to receive the parcel on my behalf, they agreed readily :)
Nice apartment with rooms comfortable in size. Professional host.

We had a lovely stay, Brendan was very hospitable on our arrival. Everything was as described and the apartment was in a highly convenient location. All in all just great! I would definitely stay again and would recommend Brendan to others.

This is Caroline who stayed at the apartment for the period. On the whole this is a very nice set up, but the guy next door smoked so much that smell sipped in.  I would  recommend for any traveller to come to stay.

The apartment is, by Hong Kong standard (the standard being about the size of a shoe box), nice and spacious. It is conveniently located in one of the hottest area in Hong Kong, with the brand new MTR station 5 minutes away.

The rooftop terrace is very comfortable, though it could benefit from some renovation/improvement. The view is nice, typical Hong Kong, encased between high-rises.

The perfect location for our conference at Hong Kong University. Only hiccup was checking in - we waited out in the summer heat for about half an hour before being let in. Also the beds are a tad small for 2pax unless you are petite/very good friends

The place is small (though huge compared to a typical hotel room on the island) but quite comfortable and very near both HKU and many really nice pubs/cafes/restaurants on High Street and other nearby streets. Would love to stay here again when in the area. 

Brend was very cordial and responsive via email - very easy to work with.

We had a great stay at Brend's lovely flat. It was exactly as described, clean and actually more spacious than we were expecting! The roof terrace is great as well and fantastic for al fresco dining/evening drinks. The flat is in a really convenient location too, great base to explore the city as only a 5 min walk from Sai Ying Pun mtr station and also walking distance to the lovely shops/bars/restaurants in trendy Sheung Wan/Soho areas. The flat is also on a very quiet street and we were surprised at how quiet the flat itself was, the only noise disturbance we had was some building works going on in the flat next door which was unfortunately just bad timing! We had a fantastic stay and would definitely recommend this flat to others and hopefully will be back ourselves in the future! Thanks, Rosie, Simon, Joe and Lucy

Communication with Brend was very good. He provided us with a lot of information about the city and it was easy to access the apartment. He also gave us a international connector to be able to recharge our computers.
The apartment is conveniently located close to the Uni. It is in general nice although smaller and older than perceived via the pictures.

Brend heeft ons een goede routebeschrijving gegeven, zijn medewerkster was snel ter plekke om de deur te openen en alles uit te leggen. Het is wat basic allemaal als je een week blijft. Weinig servies en glazen, maar 2 handdoeken, de lampen doen het voor de helft niet er is weinig beddengoed. En er is geen verwarming, wij hebben het koud gehad. Verder wordt er overal om de flat heen gebouwd , de wijk is in opkomst en dat merk je. Wel een prima locatie, dicht bij centrum met leuke restaurantjes om d e hoek.

I recommend this place. It is clean, the location is great (I love this area) and it is very convenient. Close to nice bars and restaurants but quiet and 5 mins away from sai ying pun MTR station. The apartment  is quite small but you won't find big places in HK. It has a cool rooftop terrace. There is no washing machine but there is a laundry 5 mins away. When we first arrived to the apartment it was very cold but Brend's mom provided us additional blankets and a heater and it was perfect after that. The kitchen is very basic (hotplate, microwave, a small fridge and a kettle) but we were not cooking much anyway.
Brend was a great host. The place was clean and comfortable.

This apartment was perfect for our needs.  Brend was a good communicator, and was helpful to us with a few special needs.
The apartment was spotless, and everything was as described.
Location is great, away from noise, yet close to great shopping and the big food market.  I would stay again without a doubt.

For Hong Kong, this unit is a gem. two relatively spacious bedrooms with lovely firm double mattresses. A plethora of restaurants within one block. access to taxis easy. access to mini bus up on Bonham Road.  I spent the week with my 85 year old mum and it was great. Few steps to start but not huge and then an effective lift to the top floor. Air con was effective and 2 ceiling fans were lovely. Felt very secure, lovely concierge always with a happy greeting.  Sai Ying Pun is a vibrant but not pretentious community. one of those areas that are about to bust into the trend...
Lovely place in one of the best neighbourhood of HK.

Probably for HK this is a good deal, not too small and has everything you need. Close to MTR. But I didn't like the noise such as water pump/traffic/kindergarden downstairs. But most of HK is noisy so this is nothing special.
Clean, basic confort, quiet, well located with several coffee shops, restaurants, supermarket, MTR within 10mn...
Brend的房子采光不错,房间也很宽敞,厨具齐全,浴室水温恒定花洒流速很大洗澡感觉很赞｡跟房东沟通能及时回复!我入住期间把沙发和餐桌对调了位置,这样房子看起来方正一些,另外因为带着bb,这样放置bb活动范围会大些,楼顶可以晒衣服,这在香港是很难得的,非常喜欢!美中不足的是洗衣机放在楼顶,日晒雨淋后洗衣机内有青苔及一股霉味｡

We stayed here as a family of four (2 adults, 1 4 year old & 1 5 month old) and it was perfect for what we were looking for. All the amenities you need (lift, microwave, washing machine, TV & separate bedrooms!) and it was also close to the MTR and lots of restaurants/food stores.

As a family, I didn't really appreciate the fact that the high street is literally that - high up the hill. As a result it's not ideal for people with a pushchair but we worked around it, and I imagine many properties across this part of Hong Kong Island will be similar due to the geography, so it's more something to be aware of.

Communication with Brend was good and next time we're in HK, I'll be looking to book again.
Great apartment in solid location. Exactly what we were looking for.

Interesting location as the neighbourhood is undergoing some rapid gentrification. A little further down the same street there are many expat bars and restaurants. But just a few hundred metres away are local eateries and markets that keep the authentic Hong Kong hustle and bustle. 

Would recommend
Nice trip in HK. I recommend.

It's a nice trip.The apartment is closed to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) very convenient .Brend is friendly and helpful,if you have any question,he will help you to solve.Anyway,i think it's wonderful.

A friend and I rented Brend’s place for almost 5 months and it was an excellent place to live. The location was perfect as it is centrally located in a great part of town that is literally across the street from many restaurants of every cuisine, a convenience store, a supermarket, and more. There is an excellent rooftop right above the apartment. It also has a working elevator which is rare and is only 4 blocks away from the HK Island Subway MTR line (either HKU or Sai Ying Pun stops). The apartment itself is exactly as pictured.. 2 bedrooms, a western style bathroom with working bathtub, kitchen with working stove and microwave, and functional pullout couch which can easily sleep 1 or 2 more. Both aircon, space heater, and water heater work perfectly as well. There is also a “doorwoman” present at the building during business hours which is nice as well (although super unnecessary). Would definitely recommend and would stay again!

Brend could not have been more responsive and the place was great!  After he confirmed our booking he followed up with a bunch of restaurants and activities to try in Hong Kong.  It was a great trip and I'd recommend staying with him.
the hosting place is convenient to everywhere

Brend’s apartment was perfect! It’s just a few minutes walk from the MTR and very easy to get everywhere we wanted to go. There’s enough cafes, restaurants and supermarkets on your doorstep and central is walkable if you wanted to. The building felt very safe and secure with someone always in a security area on the ground floor. 

The apartment itself was exactly as advertised and was very spacious for Hong Kong. It was very clean, tidy and had the amenities we needed such as iron and ironing board. The WiFi was very good and the shower was also very good. The rooftop was a wonderful touch. Brend was very helpful from start to finish and was on hand with instant, helpful responses when we had a question (even over the festive period). Thank you Brend for a brilliant stay!
Convenient location. Area is nice with lots of trendy restaurants, but yet is tranquil enough to enable a relaxing stay.
首先房東Brend非常熱情,給了我們很多有用的指引｡公寓的位置也很好,離地鐵站和電車站都很近｡房間在香港來說很寬敞,而且設備齊全､乾淨衛生,下一次出行還會選擇!

Brend's apartment is clean, his responses to our inquiries were instant and helpful.  The location of the apartment is in a quiet residential area but within 5 minute walk, you are among restaurants, markets, and public transportation.  Great place to stay!

We moved here last minute and Brend was fantastic in responding.  The location is a short walk to the MTR along a street full of diverse restaurants ranging from a Hong Kong cafe to bars and a wet market.  

We were travelling with a 3 year old and another couple and the space was perfect.  The apartment is sparkling clean so it was nice to let our daughter wander around.  The beds are comfortable and the sheets feel clean.

A few downsides: There are quite a few stairs at the entrance so we didn't end up using our stroller (although, Hong Kong is not stroller friendly at all).  Second, there isn't much space to sit and eat so don't plan on cooking full meals.

We would definitely stay again for the convenient location and cleanliness of this space.

We have been to HK many times, but this was the first time we stayed as far west as the edge of Shueng wan and we were very pleasantly surprised. There were several great restaurants at our doorstep, it was quiet yet we were a short walk away form central. The apartment is clean and quiet, and Brend is a very attentive host. If you need a place to stay in HK this is much better than a hotel, especially if you're with a family.

Though the apparment is a bit older and used then on the picture, it is fully functionnal, clean and comfortable. It was a real pleasure to come back to the chilled and comfortable rooms (great AC), the western-stylish bathroom (bathtub and hot water all day long) and the well-equiped kitchen/appartment. Internet works great too. You also get a comfortable place on the rooftop to chill out after a long day. The buidling is a bit old (some facility noises) but the neighbours are mostly discrete and friendly. The neighbourhood is also great and more quiet then the famous parts. If you exit the MTR at exit A you'll find the more lively part of the neighbourhood. Brend was also answering within 15 minutes and very friendly. A great, comfortable and accessible place. Thanks again.
Great location! Cozy place! Clean! We were very comfortable!

Brend's apartment is right on high street which has a ton of restaurants and bars.  It's a great location if you want to be out of the hustle and bustle of central but still have many Chinese and western places to eat and drink!  The apartment was a fair price and the kitchen was well stocked.  The beds were comfortable and clean.  The bathroom needed a little updating but nothing that cant be fixed!

The communication with Brend was very quick, and check in and out very easy. Apartment was spacious by HK standards where spaces are small. Lots of hot water, air conditioning worked well. Very easy access to taxis which are plentiful and inexpensive. Building and street quiet, good black out shades for easy sleeping even with jet lag. We had a great stay, thank you Brend!

Wonderful location, helpful communicative host. Bedrooms good, air con as well. Living area a bit dated . People in building friendly. Not many plates etc, super cooktop and heaps of good eating places nearby, plus Bonham Rd, MTR and the wonderful Locofama. Would stay again
什么都好,就是旅行者入住自备拖鞋

Appartement convenable et propre mais les photos son inextactes. Quartier tres pentu mais calme et pres des restaurants bars et metro. Acces  par de nombreuses marches avant l ascenseur. Ne convient pas aux personnes ayant du mal a marcher et enfants avec poussette.
各方面都很好

Brend’s apartment was great! Communication before and during our stay was fantastic—Brend was very accommodating and extremely accessible for the duration of our stay. Our stay at the apartment was between arriving in Hong Kong and moving into my own apartment so we had ALOT of luggage—there is a set of stairs from the entrance of the building after the security gate to the elevator so just be prepared—if me (29), my mom (60), and aunt (65) can lug 9 checked bags and 3 carry ons up and down those stairs you’ll be fine—I wont say it was easy but its possible. Thanks Brend for everything!

We really enjoyed our time in Brend's flat.  It isn't the largest flat but 2 adults and 2 teenagers sharing beds were accommodated well and Hong Kong offers so much that we didn't spend too long in the flat. The location is great, near a MRT and all the amenities we needed and the communication and support from Brend was excellent. I would definitely recommend this flat.

Just what we expected. The apartment is bigger than the usual by HK standards. Wi-fi can be a little unstable at times in the day but decent at night! Brend was responsive even tho we didn't get to meet him in person. The stairs/slopes in the area can be a challenge and there's a little stairs walk up to the elevator in the building but shouldn't be much of an issue. Surrounded by great food nearby too!
Brend is one of best host ever I stayed in Airbnb. Full take care the tenant & suggestion for local area. By the way, this is my first comment / review after staying Airbnb.
房子很干净,很温馨,非常不错
The appartment was as expected and its location is great

Brend and his brother were great hosts. Brend’s apartment was very clean and provided all the facilities we needed. He also recommended very good restaurant choices for us to try and we loved it.  Communication was very quick as well. Great central location as well. Thanks for everything.

Small appartment regarding european standards but very confortable for HongKong. Check in and out very simple, very clean and good equiped. Air conditioning. Near the subway and a french backery. Nice and quite neighborhood. Very recommanded !

Great holiday stay! A stones throw to some great restaurants and the station was walking distance. The apartment was clean and the host was quick to respond with check in instructions. Thanks for a great stay!

Brend's place made a great base for  our week in Hong Kong. HK residential blocks aren't the most soundproof, so you might struggle in the mornings if you have jetlag, but SYP is an excellent location with lots of cool bars/restaurants nearby.
Very clean apartment in a great location with lots of restaurants and coffee shops nearby.
位置很好找,房间也挺好,就是房间有一股霉味
交通很方便,离市场,超市都很近,屋主很热情很有耐心,一直保持联系,房子很干净,就是每天要上坡比较辛苦,其他都很满意｡
very nice experience.

The Location of this place is great.
Brend is very speedy with communication and all of his tips and suggestions on transport from the airport and getting around the city was very helpful.
We enjoyed our stay.

Brend is a wonderful host! He was always very prompt with his replies to my questions, and he had a number of great suggestions of places to see, etc.  His flat is a terrific bargain for staying on Hong Kong Island, and I base this on the fact that I have been coming to Hong Kong at least twice a year over the last five years. The photos of the flat are reasonably accurate, and the flat was very clean and well equipped. There is more than enough kitchen stuff to make meals if you wish. A friend and I stayed with Brend because we were attending a marine biology conference at the University of Hong Kong, and the flat is SUPER convenient to the University of Hong Kong (very close to the university’s east gate).  It is also a short walk to the MTR island line, so it is easy to get anywhere. There are also lots of restaurants and markets and even a great bakery nearby.  I would certainly stay there again and Brend’s flat would be my first choice if anyone asked for a recommendation of where to stay while visiting Hong Kong.

Brend's place is terrific - sparkling clean and terrific location close to MTR, buses, lots of taxis, and a number of great little cafes and bistros just up the street. In addition, she is a great host - very responsive and helpful!  Highly recommend to anyone considering a Hong Kong stay!!
Very clean and seamless check-in. The location is great for exploring Hong Kong - Very central with great restaurants and bars within walking distance.

The apartment is wonderful. It is really nice, neat and super clean (pictures really reflect the true atmosphere of the place). It is also really well located,you can walk to the MTR in 5 minutes.And Brend is super communicative and helpful.If i come to HongKong again,i will still live here!

name: Superbe maison vintage au cœur du plateau
summary: Grande maison avec une terrasse immense à l’arriére, située au plateau. Le merveilleux parc messier à 3 minutes de marche, plusieurs bars et restaurants sur la rue mont royale qui est à 1 minute de marche de la maison. 2 bus qui passent devant la porte, l'un emmène à la station mont royale en 8 minutes et l'autre à la station Frontenac en 5 minutes. La terrasse va être prête pour les bbq cet été.

Le merveilleux parc messier à 3 minutes de marche, plusieurs bars et restaurants sur la rue mont royale qui est à 1 minute de marche de la maison. 2 bus qui passent devant la porte, l'un emmène à la station mont royale en 8 minutes et l'autre à la station Frontenac en 5 minutes. host.host_about:
Bonjour! 
 
My name is Kyle and I'm an entrepreneurship coach/ traveler who loves to meet people and travel the world. Over the last few years, my american journey as world traveler led me to become an Airbnb Host and I've recently hosted hundreds of travellers from all over the world in my places. Make sure to read the reviews of my previous Guests and feel free to contact me if you have any questions about my listings.
 
 Best,
 
 Kyle

name: Room A4
summary: Room in Appartment in the centre of the city of barcelona, few meters to all the stops, aerobus, metros, trains,etc. A direct connection with the airport and to a few seconds of famous Plaça Catalunya and the Rambla, the room is for who want to explore the city and spend agreeable days here. See you Soon. im sure you will like it.
description: Room in Appartment in the centre of the city of barcelona, few meters to all the stops, aerobus, metros, trains,etc. A direct connection with the airport and to a few seconds of famous Plaça Catalunya and the Rambla, the room is for who want to explore the city and spend agreeable days here. See you Soon. im sure you will like it. To get to the apartment from the airport, just take the blue bus that goes to Plaza Catalunya and from that station home is 3 minutes walking.
transit: To get to the apartment from the airport, just take the blue bus that goes to Plaza Catalunya and from that station home is 3 minutes walking.
house_rules: - - 1- Check in 14h - 2- Check out 11h - 3- We do not keep luggage before or after your arrival - 4- you have to pay a deposit of € 20 for each key delivered, it will be returned if you do not lose the keys

name: Leighton Apartment - Times #E (禮寓-時代館 #E)
summary: Newly renovated Inn,5min walk to Time Squares Causeway Bay, best location in town. Building has lift and security, we have Free WiFi, 24hrs check-in, use of refrigerator and Nessproso coffee machine in the common area.The room has private toilet with all free amenities like shampoo,bath gel, toothbrush, etc. A double bed (extra matress on request) with good quality sheet, feather blanket.全新豪華裝修,五分鐘步行到時代廣場,鬧市中安靜後花園豪宅區｡大樓有電梯保安,免費無綫網路,24小時入住,前枱共用免費冰箱咖啡機｡獨立衞浴,一張大床,可另加一張單人床墊,免費提供盥洗用品毛巾瓶裝水,優質床單羽絨被枕頭
space: This apartment has 7 rooms with a reception. 本公寓有7間套房

Building has lift and security, we have Free WiFi, 24hrs check-in, use of refrigerator and Nessproso coffee machine in the common area.The room has private toilet with all free amenities like shampoo,bath gel, toothbrush, etc. A double bed (extra matress on request) with good quality sheet, feather blanket.全新豪華裝修,五分鐘步行到時代廣場,鬧市中安靜後花園豪宅區｡大樓有電梯保安,免費無綫網路,24小時入住,前枱共用免費冰箱咖啡機｡獨立衞浴,一張大床,可另加一張單人床墊,免費提供盥洗用品毛巾瓶裝水,優質床單羽絨被枕頭 This apartment has 7 rooms with a reception. 本公寓有7間套房 The room that you have booked, common area for coffee and use of the fridge. 您所訂的房間, 共用區域的冰箱和咖啡機 We can provide late check-in, reception is opened from 9am to 9pm.  我們提供深夜入住, 前台時間一般為早上9點到晚上9點 5mins walk to the Times Square and the subway, one of the most popular area in Hong Kong 5分鐘到時代廣場和地鐵, 香港其中一個最受歡迎的地方 Take the Airport Bus A11 to Times Square Causeway Bay (stop no.13), 7mins walk to the apartment (follow the map in photo gallery) or take t
neighborhood_overview: 5mins walk to the Times Square and the subway, one of the most popular area in Hong Kong 5分鐘到時代廣場和地鐵, 香港其中一個最受歡迎的地方
notes: Surveillance camera in operation in the common area.   共用區域有攝影機 Please note that this is NOT A HOTEL, do not expected a 5stars hotel experience. We will try our best to give you a wonderful journey, however do not take it for granted. We do not really care about the rating you give us, if you do not like it, please do not come back and we hope not to see you again. 請記住這不是一家酒店,如果你要5星酒店要求麻煩滾走,我們會盡全力為你們服務給你們一個舒適愉快之旅,但不要覺得所有東西我們為你做的都是應該的. 我們根本不管你給幾顆星, 如果你不喜歡千萬不要訂房我求你. 我年薪過百根本不需要受你們的氣. 好, 最後希望你們會喜歡, 感謝!
transit: Take the Airport Bus A11 to Times Square Causeway Bay (stop no.13), 7mins walk to the apartment (follow the map in photo gallery) or take the Airport Express train to Central and transit to the Blue line and get off at Causeway Bay station Exit A (Times Square), and a 5mins walk to the apartment (follow the map). 從機場坐A11到銅鑼灣時代廣場 (第13站) 走大約7分鐘到達公寓(請看相簿內地圖) 或 從機場坐機場快線地鐵到中環後換藍色線到達銅鑼灣站A出口時代廣場 走大約5分鐘到達公寓(請看相簿內地圖)
