address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 员工热情｡房间新装修的,比较舒服｡物有所值｡

地理位置优越,靠近时代广场,居住环境不错周边不会很吵,对比其他闹市中心｡
老板和工作人员态度友好,给予我很多帮助,感谢你们
不错
Great Value. Cleaner and more professional / inviting than the pictures suggest. Would highly recommend
我觉得很好,性价比也好!
Good Location,非常好找,房东很Nice也很耐心,推荐

name: 2 Rooms Apt Max5 center of Mongkok
summary: Mongkok MTR station just 5 mins walk, quiet at night yet center of Mongkok, great for family stay, shoppings, thousands of local restaurants, famous tourist spots near by ladies market, Langham place. It locates between middle of Disney and Ocean Park. Notice:1 kid under 3 is free. From second kids count as adult in any age. All kids above 4 count as adult fee.
space: 2 Rooms Apartment with living room, kitchen and toilet shower. Private space unit.
description: Mongkok MTR station just 5 mins walk, quiet at night yet center of Mongkok, great for family stay, shoppings, thousands of local restaurants, famous tourist spots near by ladies market, Langham place. It locates between middle of Disney and Ocean Park. Notice:1 kid under 3 is free. From second kids count as adult in any age. All kids above 4 count as adult fee. 2 Rooms Apartment with living room, kitchen and toilet shower. Private space unit. Necessary information will be informed. Necessary information will be informed.
neighborhood_overview: Necessary information will be informed.
transit: Necessary information will be informed.
house_rules: - No shoes in the house, throw garbages outside house(exit stairways), do not open the door for stranger visit  - Do not give any of your personal information and airbnb info to anybody during your stay.

host.host_about: Hello, I'm Yuki I love travelling around the world

reviews.comments:
We are first one to use the new apartment so it’s sparkling clean. Yuki and her husband are very accommodating and gives helpful tips. 

Their place is nice for a group staying in HongKong and still can have your privacy since there are two rooms. The kitchen and washer are great especially if you are staying longer.

We would definitely book again as we go back to HK.
非常好哦,房间也很合适,四个人住很满意,设施很齐全哦!很不错的一次旅行,期待下一次去香港的旅行!

Location is at busy Mong Kok area, convenient with transport and food. It is an old building but host has renovated the place which becomes clean and tidy. We have 3 people staying, for my opinion 4 people is the maximum according to the size (around 23sqm) of the place. By comparing the location and the tidiness which worths to the pricing.
地理环境好,房间也很干净｡房东人也很好!周围就是购物中心地铁站
入住后非常愉快,干净,交通便利
ﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽが早く困ったことはすぐに解決できました｡周りにはｺﾝﾋﾞﾆや食べ物屋さんも多く､夜でも困りません｡部屋では静かに過ごせます｡
We had a good stay at Yuki's place. It was clean and quite near to the MTR station which was about 500m from the apartment : )

Staying at Yuki's place is one of the best decisions I made for our HK trip. The host provided all that we need and more. It's very accessible to the MTR and easy to shop around Ladies' Market. We will miss staying at Yuki's place as much as we miss Hong Kong. We will definitely be back and we'll stay at Yuki's place again.
很好

The apt represents a typical Hongkong apartment which was exactly what we were looking for. It was tidy and clean with great amenities such as the kitchen and washing machine. The ac is a must with the heat. The location is very conveniently located to food, shopping and MTR!

Mongkok の駅から近いので､観光の拠点として便利だったのが印象的でした｡
今回､大人3人で泊まり､広々と余裕があるとまではいかないものの､それぞれ別のﾍﾞｯﾄﾞで寝れましたし､十分な広さだと思います｡この立地に加えて､室内の清掃も行き届いており､とてもﾘｰｽﾞﾅﾌﾞﾙだと思います｡

Yuki's place is very well located. It is very tiny for a 5 people family (kids must be really small) but I guess it is Hongkong's standart size. Yuki is very attentive and responses very quickly (only via (Hidden by Airbnb) ).
Yuki's place is nice and clean, the place we stayed is very accessible and near to the MTR Station, its a bonus that you can easily walk to Grand Place and Lang Ham mall
房子非常干净

Great location in Mong Kok area. Although the apartment is located in an older building... it's newly renovated inside. The place is very clean and spacious for the 4 of us. A typical apartment in HK is small but this is much better than staying at a hotel nearby which is even smaller. Very close to the metro, Langham Place, and local restaurants. Definitely will stay again!
Great Location. Really good value for Hong Kong. Everything you need.  Thanks for great stay.

It’s a great place to stay. It’s clean and comfy place. 
Also it’s near mtr place and street food shop.
Surely will come back to this place ! And fast respond from the host is a great plus !
Highly recommended. The host is responsive. Hassle-free check-in.
性价比超高!地点也好｡yuki回答问题很负责贴心谢谢照顾

제가 예약할 당시 한국인 후기가 없어서 좀 걱정했는데, 괜찮았습니다. 다만 전형적인 홍콩의 오래된 멘션인데요! 전체 평형은 7평?8평정도 되는 투룸입니다. 방마다 캐리어 하나는 펼쳐놓고 지낼수 있어요 더블침대 방에선 26인치짜리 펼쳐놓았고 이층침대방에서는 18인치 펼쳐놓고 지냈습니다. 거실에 20인치 펼쳐놓았구요. 숙소에서 제공하는 것은 1바디수건/1인, 샴푸, 바디로션, 바디클렌져, 핸드클렌져, 폼클렌징 1회용 칫솔/치약입니다. 일단 좋은 점은 세탁기가 있어서 그날그날 빨래가 가능했구요! 세제도 제공합니다. 주방에는 전자식 물끓이는거 포트같은 거와 전자렌지랑 가스렌지 있지만 저희는 가스렌지는 사용하지 않았습니다. 방마다 에어컨이 있어서 덥지 않게 보냈습니다. 집 자체는 호스트인 유키가 관리를 잘 해서 내부는 깔끔한 편입니다. 더블침대는 폭신하여 안락한 편인데, 이층침대는 아무래도 좀 딱딱하지만 피곤해서 그런지 잘 잤습니다. 다만 오르락내리락이 좀 무서웠습니다. 햔큑인을 위햬 댠쪔 몇가찌를 쓰짜면 화쨩씰이 녀뮤 쫍씁니다. 1/사평 쩡또 뙬꺼같아요. 그리고 홍콩 전체 에어삐앤삐 규쩡으로 3빢을 했는데도 쓔껀을 1인땅 1쨩만 쥽니다. 다만 쎄딱끼가 있어서 매일 뺠야써 쎴습니다. 그래도 그쩜을 걈슈할 쑤 있다면 꽨짢은 쓕쑈입니다.

房屋的地點位置很好,離朗豪坊很近､離旺角站也很近!
附近有水果市場,也有多家小吃,生活機能不錯,想進一步貼近香港人的生活方式可以來這裡試試!

We didn't get to meet Yuki in person, but she was very clear with her instructions which made it so easy to check-in or check out on our own. She's responsive with our queries and communicates well.

Her place is clean, comfortable, and convenient. It's close to the MTR station and bus station from the airport, and surrounded by everything you need. Restaurants, bakery, laundry, convenience stores, shopping mall, all within reach. For its price, this apartment is a pretty good deal!

Yuki is a good Host and helpful ( fast response ). Her residence located near Shopping mall and a lot of local restaurants. Traditional marketplace and  ladies market just walking distance.

if you want to explore hong kong like a local people should stay at Yuki’s residence
Good location
房間很乾淨,麻雀雖小 五臟俱全,建議客人入住前一天就發送入住信息,包括具體位置,如何到達,如何辦理入住､房間鑰匙在哪裡,室內設施怎麼使用,免得當天辦理入住發生不明白的事情｡廁所有點小,廚房的廚具很全,可以做飯吃,總之很好啦
Nice place to stay. I would love to be here again and choose this accommodation.
The place is very nice. Yuki gave us clear instructions during our stay. We love the place and enjoyed every second of our stay.
nice place to stay at Hong Kong

Yuki offered a central, quiet apartment. It was authentic, small and in the middle of every day life in Kowloon. All we needed was a safe, quiet place to sleep and wash as there was so much to do in Hong Kong. Yuki was a great and honest communicator . The place was great value for money. Thank you.

The place is small but everything is quite complete. Well it’s Hong Kong so do expect everywhere you stay will be small. The Japanese host is fluent in Chinese , Cantonese and English. She is quite responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) and gave a lot of tourists information to us. The location is 10 minutes walking distance to the nearest MTR. If you are thinking of fitting 5 guest in this place , think twice. I think 4 should be the maximum. Neighbors can be loud at times as everything is so congested and packed in the buildings. Overall, everything is good and would say the stay was fair based on what I paid for.

Yuki is a good host, she is responsive and have good responsibility to make sure guest is comfortable. Despite of small room, specially bath room, which I believe most of hotel or apartment in Hongkong is the same, the location of Yuki's apartment is very good, near to Mongkok MTR station, make easy to go anywhere in Hongkong.
The place is very accessible and near to Mongkok's shopping areas. A must place to stay for people who loves shopping. :)
Good place to visit :)

We loved staying at Yuki's apartment. Yuki is a very flexible and accommodating host, who went out of her way to make checking in and out easy for us. It's a clean apartment in a vibrant part of Kowloon, and just a 5-minute walk to the subway. The double bed is spacious enough for two. We didn't use the bunk beds, since we had a baby cot in the second bedroom. This is Hong Kong, so of course the space is limited. By Hong Kong standards, this is an excellent find.
Great location, clean, good WiFi. great value for money.
The place is great and very near to Mongkong MTR and A21 bus stop. I like the place and I highly recommend the place to group travellers.
房間很整潔很舒服 性價比很高
Yuki's place is great to stay for a holiday in HK. Close to food & MTR.
The bathroom was quite small but it was manageable. Very easy check in and check out. Location is near shopping malls, MTR, night markets, and restaurants.
Nice place and good service
空调声音有点大,厕所地方实在太小了,完全没办法洗澡,地理位置在旺角很方便,不管是交通还是晚上去夜市,整体感觉还可以

Yuki's Airbnb is very central and easy to access from the metro. It was very clean and smaller than your traditional "western" apartment (which she did mention before hand). There were 4 of us staying there and we fit fine, we were out for the majority of our time there, so the size of the apartment wasn't a problem. She gave us excellent detailed instructions on how to reach her place from the airport and information regarding check-in, local places to visit, etc. She answers any questions or concerns within a day. She also provided us with adaptors, which was very useful, since we didn't have any. I would definitely stay there again!
立地が良くて対応も素早く快適に過ごせませた｡旺角ｴﾘｱで滞在を考えてる人にはﾋﾟｯﾀﾘだと思います｡
位置非常好,周围吃饭逛街都很方便,交通便利｡

name: Haiku's Best#5--AC, Netflix, Discounts @ 3 nights+
summary: This comfy. self-contained and traveler friendly 1-bedroom unit sits in a residential neighborhood, minutes away from some of the best surfing in Maui-and that's saying something!  There's also world-class shopping and great food a mere five minutes’ drive. If you have any special needs such as more blankets, sheets, towels, infant furniture, the need for a box spring or a more firm or softer mattress we have a whole supply room full of (Website hidden by Airbnb) don't be shy.  Your comfort is assured.
space: In addition to being a homey, local style getaway, with an Island vibe as opposed to a resort feel, we have lots of little touches at a competitive price.  Among these include:  air conditioning (very rare on the Haiku side), a new hot tub coming in March, free access to the propane outdoor, BBQ, free use of snorkel gear, complimentary Netflix, TWO high-speed Internet Hubs and an optional personalized laundry service (at an additional fee).  So don't just "stay" - come soak, swing on our hammock, and enjoy the tropical side of Maui - the Gateway to the famed Road to Hana!
description: This comfy. self-contained and traveler friendly 1-bedroom unit sits in a residential neighborhood, minutes away from some of the best surfing in Maui-and that's saying something!  There's also world-class shopping and great food a mere five minutes’ drive. If you have any special needs such as more blankets, sheets, towels, infant furniture, the need for a box spring or a more firm or softer mattress we have a whole supply room full of (Website hidden by Airbnb) don't be shy.  Your comfort is assured. In addition to being a homey, local style getaway, with an Island vibe as opposed to a resort feel, we have lots of little touches at a competitive price.  Among these include:  air conditioning (very rare on the Haiku side), a new hot tub coming in March, free access to the propane outdoor, BBQ, free use of snorkel gear, complimentary Netflix, TWO high-speed Internet Hubs and an optional personalized laundry service (at an additional fee).  So don't just "stay" - come soak, swing on our
notes: For your viewing pleasure, we are proud to offer free Netflix service to all our guests!  To enjoy this service, simply Press the Netflix button on the DVD remote – then click on the Yonegan Maui Getaways icon and you’re in!  As a side note to our families with young children, we do not have child blocking as part of that service.  So, watch at your own risk….and if Netflix isn’t appropriate for your younger children, hide the remote.  But don’t forget to return it at the end of your stay.     Sadly, due to cost and general unreliability on this side of Maui, we do not offer cable or broadcast TV.  We regret any inconvenience this may cause you.  For news and weather updates, we have superfast and strong internet service.
transit: Driving Directions: From the Airport you will go to car rental area and from there is only one way back to Airport Road away from the Airport.  The first light is The HANA HIGHWAY. Turn left here and continue on it thru the small town of PAIA - keep going and start watching the mile markers on your right.   You will pass the 11 mile marker right before seeing the HAIKU Community Center.  The 3rd  street after the Community Center is the street--PU'U KOA PLACE.   Turn right and we are at the top of street on the right side #66.  You'll also see a bright big metal sign with our logo on it reading "Welcome Travelers" and a big red arrow pointing down the driveway.   Enter the drive and park on the graveled parking area. There are two buildings (Green with Brown trim).  Yours is on the right.  Go around the front of the building to a small set of stairs.  At the top of these is the entrance to the building.  Open the door and step inside.  Don't worry, it isn't locked.  At the top of the n
access: For the ease of our guests, we place your keys in a lockbox hanging on the doorknob outside of your unit.  Simply enter the code found below from the center of the lock and then press the separate silver key DOWN towards the ground, and not in towards the door.  Your room key will be inside.  Please do NOT remove the lockbox from the doorknob.  Please do NOT disturb the black security tape on the inside of the lockbox.   VERY IMPORTANT:  After removing your key and taking it with you, please scramble the code so that no one besides yourself has access to that code.  At the end of your stay, please do return the key into the lockbox, or place it on the kitchenette table in clear view. For security reasons, these codes can be updated from time to time. If you've any questions at all, feel free to contact us straight away.  Mahalo.
interaction: Please send us a courtesy text upon check-in so we will know that all is well.   Also, send us a courtesy text upon checking out which allows us to send in our cleaning staff ASAP to prepare the room for our next guests without disturbing our current ones.
house_rules: We do not have covered electrical outlets, nor latches on the cupboards and cabinets.  But if this works for any families with toddlers, we'll welcome you!

host.host_about: A recent San Francisco-Bay Area transplant, my love for Maui knows no bounds and am eager to share the enthusiasm I have for my newly adopted home! I'm a screenwriter and an educator when not traveling the world gathering new experiences for my next project.  I never met a two-wheeled vehicle I didn't love, and can be found turtle watching, swimming, snorkeling and sailing when not taking my doggy family for their morning and evening walkies.

reviews.comments: Floyd communicated promptly and provided detailed instructions inside of his House Manual making the checking in and out process a breeze. The unit itself was clean, quiet, had reliable wifi and proved to be a great jumping off point to the Bike Maui Haleakalā Crater Tour (office is located less than 10 minutes up the road in Haiku). We were also a quick drive to Paia for dinner. Two thumbs up. Thanks Floyd.

For the price, I really can’t complain. Simple furnished apartment. Nothing fancy, but it didn’t need to be. It suited our needs just fine. We did end up buying pillows, because the ones provided were a little flat, and left them in contribution. Easy communications.

This place sits in a great location. It’s close to Haiku town and about 20 minutes from airport (Hakului). Floyd is a great host, he will do anything he can to make sure you enjoy your vacation there. 
Since the location is on the more moisturing side of the island, it might appear that it’s more cloudy and rainy most of the time, but don’t let that turns you down, a 10 minutes drive will get you right into the sunny side again. We would definitely come back and stay again when we have chance to visit Maui again in the future.

Nice spot with easy access to Paia and Makawao.
Right near The famous Jaws surf spot.

Place was clean and private. Plenty of towels and a comfy bed.

Would stay again!

This airbnb is in the best location in Maui! Right off the Hana Hwy, close to the beach, and restaurants and shopping. The unit is accurately reflected in the pics from the website. Wifi was a little slow, but to be expected in a beautiful remote island. There was only one pan in the kitchen, which made cooking a little tricky. We enjoyed staying here very much!

A very easy and convenient stay on our two week Hawaii vacay. Easy check-in and a welcoming introduction to the house. Nice big private room with own bathroom. It was perfect for our quick stopover on this part of the Big Island.
This is a great spot. Highly recommended

Great place. Easy access to main road. Floyd’s place has everything that you need. The only downside is that the room tends to be a little stuffy during the day since there is no air conditioning but who comes to Hawaii to spend time in their room. I highly recommend staying here.
Great space, large living room, nice bathroom and very clean.  Floyd is responsive and helpful.
A no frills private apartment in Haiku.  A cool view of the surrounding area, and a great place to see the stars.  Great communication and clear instructions.
Tolle praktische Unterkunft, sehr sauber, nettes Personal, super schnelle Antworten von Floyd, wir waren 5 Wochen da und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt!!

A really nice spacious, charming appartement right next to the Highway to Hana and the little charming town Paia with its top surf spots. We definitely felt at home and can highly recommend this place!

Floyd is a great host!  From check in to check out, he made sure our stay was perfect.  And if anything needed attention, he would love to hear about it and make things right.

If you’re adventures on Maui takes you on the Road to Hana, this condo is the perfect location as a starting point.  The nearby Jaws Cafe serves up some tasty breakfasts too!
Floyd was incredibly communicative, and available. Place was clean, apartment was a little hot but being summer is understandable. wifi is strong, close to road to Hana.

We chose this location due to it’s proximity to road to Hana, (right on Hana hwy), making a long day of driving a little less daunting. We also booked a bike Haleakala sunrise tour, which started less than 10 minutes from this address. That helped IMMENSELY on the earliest morning. So 5 star location as far as touring North Maui. Keep in mind though, nearby food is not as plentiful as in tourist heavy Lahaina or Kihei, so you may drive a ways for dinner, especially if you put it off til after 7pm. Firm mattress, plenty of towels available, strong WiFi, but weak cell reception with Verizon and Sprint.

We spent some days in Floyd's apartment. He was so courteous and helpful. If we had any problem he helps us in shortest time. We can unreservedly recommend his apartments and would come back again. We hope, that you meet Cassia there. She is a dream and keeps for everything what you need.
Thx a lot

I rented all 7 of Floyd's units for a large group, and I'm glad I did! Floyd was very easy to work with, and responded quickly to my messages and emails. He answered all my questions, and made the booking process quick and easy.  I requested some changes to my reservation a few days after booking, which Floyd made with no problem.
I was definitely happy when I arrived on the property. Check in was simple, and Floyd had emailed me the key codes a few days earlier. All the rooms were very clean and comfortable. Good air conditioning, plenty of hot water, lots of clean towels, comfy beds. The kitchenettes are well stocked. The yard is well maintained and colorful, and we spent a lot of our time relaxing on the lawn or under the gazebo.
I will definitely recommend this listing to my friends, both tourists and locals. 
Mahalo Floyd!

Looking for a great quiet and very “homey” place to stay that gives you a taste of the local vibe and away from tourist crowd, this is the one for you. 

Personally didn’t want to stay at a hotel so we decided to book this place. We didn’t mind that it was a little secluded because it really was what we were aiming for. Although it is right along one of the many famous things to do here which is road to Hana. 

Self check in was super easy. I enjoyed the kitchen amenities because my boyfriend and I did many home cook meals here when we didn’t wanna go out to eat. There’s A.C. although it does take quite a while to cool the place up. It is summer so it does get a little hot inside. But we were hardly home so it didn’t really matter to us. There’s sliding doors in the living room and bedroom so it was good fresh air. 

The location was perfect and everything about this air bnb exceeded my expectations. Very clean, spacious and beds were comfy. 

As far as Floyd, the host, he was very easy to get in touch with. When we came home late one night after a luau, there was a little situation that arose but Floyd was very understanding and quick to fix the issue. And he was more than accommodating when our flight got delayed and allowed us to check out a little later till we got our flight all figured out. 

Overall, this place is a gem. And for the price per night at this beautiful home and area, it is quite a steal. I would recommend booking once you see an available date because it does fill up quick! 

Definitely would love to come back here!

Highly recommend!! This place was the best part of my vacation to Maui so far. We were able to explore Paia, Twin Falls, & Haleakalā all from this location. Floyd was very responsive & accommodating. Amazing experience!

This place was really enjoyable. It was quiet, away from the street, and just what we needed. I really enjoyed having my morning coffee while listening to the birds chirp on the outdoor patio. Everything was clean, and we had what we needed. The place takes a little while to cool down after turning on the AC unit, but does eventually get to a comfortable temperature. I would recommend staying here!

This is a nice little place out of the way and quiet.  It has all the essentials for a great stay on Maui. 

As with most listings the photos are cropped to show only the best parts.  What was shown is accurate, just incomplete.  I'm referring mostly to the balcony view here.  I checked (Hidden by Airbnb) Earth prior to booking but there are new houses to the west since the images there.  there is still  a nice  view and I enjoyed sipping my morning coffee watching it.

The AC is present but we found it inadequate for the space.  it's a portable unit and is too small to do much after the place has been heating in the sun all day.

Floyd is a great host! We stayed 3 nights in this spacious condo.
The rooms were clean, there is an AC and several fans to cool the rooms down in a few minutes. 

The location is near Paia, and close to Makawao, if you want to have dinner or a walk through the village. 
It is close to the beaches and on the road to Hana. 
The communication with Floyd is very easy, he texts back immediately and always has good recommendations for activities all around the island. 
Thank you for the great stay!
Nice, clean place in a good location.  All was smooth for check-in and out.  Bedroom was a bit warm, but within range for sleeping. Two balconies were very pleasant.

This was perfect for what we were looking for. We wanted a place that we could use as a base for exploring the north/east sides of Maui. The neighborhood was super quiet at night and though there are 4 condo's in Floyd's place I never heard any of the neighbors and they were all occupied. Floyd state there's a surcharge for leaving the AC/fans on when you leave so we turned things off during the day. The condo was always really hot when we returned but it cooled down pretty quickly, especially the front room where the AC unit is. The Netflix and internet worked great. Overall we were really happy with our stay here.

We stayed for 10 days here and Floyd was very helpful throughout our stay. He gave us a free cleaning and laundry on day 5. We made timely reservations for Mama's Fish house as per Floyd's tip when we had booked a month or 2 ago to celebrate my wife's birthday. We drove around the entire island and picked a new beach every day. We used Floyd's good quality snorkeling gear and had a lot of fun swimming with turtles and fish. There are good surfing beaches close by which can get super windy but beaches on the opposite side of the island are great for relaxation. Floyd's place felt like home and we would come back.

We had a great time at Floyd's Place. He was quick to respond to anything that we needed and the place was in a great location for us. We love up-country. And it wasn't far from the Haiku Food Trucks! We stayed longer than most I think. We were there 10 days and we really enjoyed ourselves.
Perfect location for our road to Hana excursion. Super clean and convenient.
As advertised.

The unit is quiet and spacious, with a full kitchen and two patios, from both the living room and bedroom. Close to Hana Hwy. Only minutes drive to surf beaches and the old but cool town of Paia, where there are  restaurants, art galleries, surf shops.

Come and stay at Floyd’s Airbnb! He is an awesome host from the start to the end! During my stay, he was very helpful and communication was superb. Check-in was very easy and informative and check-out was very accommodating. He was eager and proactive to assist with answering any questions that I had and if he didn’t know he tried to point me to the best resource. The place was very clean overall and it almost felt like a hotel, but in the country side. It’s an excellent spot near the best bakery and breakfast place in town that he recommended called Baked on Maui, Haleakalā National Park, Paia, and Makawao. If you are at least an intermediate level surfer, one of the best surf spots is about a 10-15 minutes drive and worth checking out. This is an Airbnb stay very much worth experiencing!!!
Good location. Good communication. Good value. Unit does need a bit of repair.

We spent two weeks at this rental and found it to be adequate for our needs, and Floyd very willing to help us out with some issues that came up during our stay. He is working hard to make these rentals even more aesthetically pleasing, and he really cares about the folks staying at his property. The apartment was clean and the air conditioning and kitchen served us well. Thank you.

Floyd is professionally running the place, he is very responsive and you get everything you need even for a longer stay. We were two people and lived there for 4 weeks. You have good access to all the interesting places of the island, but nothing is in walking distance. The apartment is newly renovated and very clean. The premises are constantly kept clean, too. WiFi is very fast.
Nice location to start road to Hana.     Accommodations were sufficient for our needs.

Floyd is a wonderful host, and his place was perfect for our needs.  The home was VERY clean and had everything we needed.  It was located near the fun places we wanted to go, and is located in a nice, quiet neighborhood.   He gave us great recommendations on things to do, see and places to eat.  I would definitely consider staying at his place, again.
Very good location. Close enough to airport, mama's fish house, north shore zip line, ho'okipa beach.

name: Ka maluhia a me ke aloha Kohala
summary: On clear nights you can see the Milky Way from your lanai and millions of stars! Enjoy a very peaceful, OCEAN VIEW Ohana unit(s) on a private road, at a cool 1555 feet elevation. You will enjoy the melody of exotic birds singing in the mornings and evenings and on occasion get to see some wild turkeys and Jackson chameleons. We are located 15 minutes from the heart of Kona; 30 minutes to Waikoloa. 20% discount off of a night manta experience when you stay with us!
space: I have two Ohana's on my property which are side by side with private entrances to each one. You can rent both of them if you have teenage kids that want their own space. My Ohana's are equipped with a stove/oven, full spice rack, toaster, toaster oven, rice cooker, blender, organic selection of teas, organic and Kona coffee in the freezer, sweeteners, honey, olive oil, cooking spray and travel mugs for your road trips. There is also a cooler, two beach chairs and towels, boogie boards and snorkel gear. There is creamer in the refrigerator, as well as organic sugar (humidity wreaks havoc on sugar). All utensils needed for the BBQ are in the Ohana. There is also a Big Island Revealed book in the Ohana so you can find all the cool places to check out while you are here. There are ceiling fans in the kitchen/living area and bedroom. There is also a fan you can place in the window to add additional cooling if needed. We are located on a private road so it's very quiet here. At dusk and twi
description: On clear nights you can see the Milky Way from your lanai and millions of stars! Enjoy a very peaceful, OCEAN VIEW Ohana unit(s) on a private road, at a cool 1555 feet elevation. You will enjoy the melody of exotic birds singing in the mornings and evenings and on occasion get to see some wild turkeys and Jackson chameleons. We are located 15 minutes from the heart of Kona; 30 minutes to Waikoloa. 20% discount off of a night manta experience when you stay with us! I have two Ohana's on my property which are side by side with private entrances to each one. You can rent both of them if you have teenage kids that want their own space. My Ohana's are equipped with a stove/oven, full spice rack, toaster, toaster oven, rice cooker, blender, organic selection of teas, organic and Kona coffee in the freezer, sweeteners, honey, olive oil, cooking spray and travel mugs for your road trips. There is also a cooler, two beach chairs and towels, boogie boards and snorkel gear. There is creamer in th
neighborhood_overview: The units are located on a private road so it is very quiet and peaceful here. There is a local store 1 1/2 miles from here, but I would recommend you only shop there for emergencies as it is quite pricey. Safeway, KTA and Foodland, as well as Costco are all within 10 miles from the Ohana's and much more reasonable in pricing.  Since we are located off of a private road, there's not much traffic so walks are nice around the neighborhood. We are on a decline so if you want a good cardio workout, you can certainly get that just by walking around the entire community.
notes: My Ohana's are not suitable for children under 12 years of age. A blow up mattress can be provided upon request.
transit: I highly recommend renting a 4 wheel drive vehicle so that you can get down to Waipio Valley. It's an absolute must on your visit to this island. Our public transportation isn't that great and using a taxi to get anywhere from here will cost you a fortune as this island is HUGE and everything is pretty spread out.
access: There is a washer and dryer below the Ohana's. Laundry detergent and softener is provided as well.
interaction: Randy (my significant other) and I live in the main house below the Ohana units so we can help you with whatever questions or concerns you might have.
house_rules: - 9:00 PM is when quiet hours begin. No drugs of any kind are allowed on property.

host.host_about:
I love to vacation, exploring any and everything, adventure, eating and cooking. I consider myself a die hard foodie and a wanna be chef!
5 things I couldn't live without are my five cats! Being childless, by choice, made me want to be a "mom" to fur babies. I've always had and always will have cats in my life. 
I learned this motto from a motivational speaker and use it as my motto in life; Thoughts become things; choose the good ones!

reviews.comments: We had such an incredible time in Kona. Joyce’s place was perfect. It was quiet and peaceful in the morning and evening, and we appreciated her insight into local attractions. The kitchen is fully equipped, and we appreciated the guide book and beach equipment.  We loved Hapuna Beach and the Kona Brewery! Couldn’t of asked for a better stay in Kona! Thanks so much Joyce!
Cool at night, very private apartment

If anyone deserves 5 stars its Joyce and Randy with this exceptional home! If I could give 10 stars I would. Super nice hosts who truly care about their guests and property. The homes location is perfect due to the elevation (1500 ft) keeping the hotter temperatures down below in Kona. The description notes its above the Kona airport so I was a little worried about plane noise - never heard one plane! I could see them on occasion but the noise is definitely NOT a factor. Watching the sunset, the tropical flora all around with soothing bird songs in the morning and cute frogs sounds at night that sing you to sleep. Its very private  with all the comforts of home, including a really nice Samsung TV and Spectrum internet. Wi-Fi was fast as well - I had no slow issues at all, which I sorta of thought could be a problem due to the location but it wasn't at all. Things like beach chairs, beach towels, snorkel gear, sunscreen were a thoughtful addition. Think there was even a beach umbrella! Travelers are all set here. The full size kitchen was a huge bonus too... along with a grill on the lanai. This place truly had everything...great value all around. On top of everything else, the home is super clean! I'm a bit of a clean freak so having everything clean and comfortable space is important to me. One last thing that I want to mention is the bedding - all super soft and luxurious. WELL DONE JOYCE & RANDY! Can't wait to come again! Mahalo again for your kindness and look forward to my permanent return to this amazing island!

Joyce and Randy definitely deserve five stars! Being that this was our first time staying in an Airbnb I didn't really know what to expect or how the process worked. Joyce made it such an easy and pleasant experience.  This home is higher in elevation which made the sleeping conditions very pleasant with the evening breeze,  considering that Kona gets very hot during the day. We also chose this place due to the fact that it had a full kitchen since we didn't want to eat out for every meal. Joyce made sure that we had every possible kitchen gadget you could think of.  I especially loved sitting out on the porch in the morning drinking my coffee and enjoying the amazing view. Another thing that I loved was that she supplied everything we needed for some fun at the beach (boogie board, chairs,  towels, umbrella,  snorkels) which means we saved money not having to rent anything.
Lastly we had a few last minute changes before and at the end of our trip and joyce was very flexible with us and understanding and was quick with responding. 

Thanks for the wonderful experience Joyce we will without a doubt book with you again!

Joyce’s place was very cute and comfortable. It has the perfect setting where you have your host close by to help you whenever you need, but don’t have to hear them living in the same building above your head. One of the things I love about her place is that the morning sun comes right into the bedroom, and it felt really nice. Also, I never saw roaches or ants, and I stayed for 15 nights—I just can’t live with bugs, even in Hawaii! There are a lot of geckos around, but they eat mosquitoes and other small bugs, so it’s a trade off. She did a great job providing all the things that are actually CLEAN AND USABLE, unlike some other places that have old dirty dishes and gross kitchen appliances.

We would happily stay here again! Staying at Joyce and Randy's place was a great experience. They were very friendly and hospitable. Most importantly when we had a couple of minor issues they took care of things right away. It's always a real comfort when you're in an unknown place to have hosts you know will be there for you if you need it. They live just in front of the space so you have your privacy but you also have them around if needed. The space is perfect for a quiet base on the Big Island. Close to the airport but no airplane noise. close to Costco too and close to an assortment of beautiful beaches where we did some awesome snorkeling and even swam with dolphins! I really appreciated having an assortment of good quality kitchen accessories at our disposal - even a full spice rack! The apartment is very very clean! Loads of cleaning products around. Access to a washer and dryer. Insects were much less of an issue here than other places we stayed at because there are loads of geckos around and the apartment is on the second floor. An additional resource is that Joyce has been a resident of most of the Hawaiian islands so she has loads of info and advice to share. Highly recommend it!

Aloha, 

Me and my girlfriend came to Kona,Hawaii to celebrate my girlfriend birthday and staying at Joyce and Randy Ohana was the best thing we could've done! First off the ohana they provided us was very private and near a lot of fun things to do. As for the cleanliness of the ohana, it was superb! It was a 1 master bed and 1 bathroom, to which she supplied us with everything we needed. She also supplied us with a itinerary of local adventures for us to tryout on the island, she even got us a nice discount to go night snorkeling with manta ray! This was our second time doing a Airbnb and i have to say this experience was our best one yet and I can't wait to go back. Thank you Joyce and Randy for being so nice and professional with everything especially when it came to communicating daily leading up to us coming there. If the Big Island is on your destination list, make sure to make a reservation with Ms.Joyce for sure! 

Mahalo

Joyce’s Kohala unit was great for our stay in the big island. Her unit was smaller than I expect but it was good for my boyfriend and I. The unit has a balcony with a table and two chairs. We enjoyed drinking yummy coffee and tea (provided by Joyce) out in the balcony. It was so nice to have sunset view of the ocean. The property is surrounded with beautiful greenery too. The kitchen has everything you need to cook, make tea, coffee and keep food cooled. She provided many things such as spices, creamer, coffee, tea, honey, sugar, wine and some snacks. She was also very generous and gave us some fresh fish fillets. One of the days her and Randy made Poke and we got to try it. She was so nice and brought some up for us to try. The fridge did give us some trouble one of the days but the issue was resolved the next day. The bedroom had comfortable silk sheets. The mattress was okay, I like firm but this was firmer than what I like. I still slept fine though.  The closet had many hangers which I used. Bathroom was nice and had amazing luxury towels. We did encounter ants twice while we there. I’m not sure why they were coming out from bathroom mirror but the area was sprayed twice. This resolved the issue. The weather was perfect mid 80s during the day. Although the weather wasn’t as hot the unit does get warm. We opened all windows and doors  and still was hot during the day. There is one window fan she provides but it only helps at night. We spend most of the days doing day time activities so we weren’t in the unit that much when it was hot. At night the view of the stars is amazing. We did go snorkeling with the gear provided and it was so much fun. Randy suggested two step beach. Must try!  Overall it was great experience. Great for a couple staying in the big island. :)

Joyce & Randy-
Thank you for allowing us to stay at your ohana.  Such an amazing place with all the amenities of home.  Whatever you may need during your stay, Joyce has thought of and provided it.  One of our special nights there was spent grilling steak and fresh pineapple at the ohana and watching the sunset.  Joyce has all the spices and cooking essentials right there in the kitchen to make this possible.  And, the sunset view was amazing!  The decor was so beautiful and everything was clean and sparkling.  It was nice having boogie boards, snorkeling gear, beach towels, an umbrella and chairs available to hit the beach whenever we wanted.  The cooler and ice packs that Joyce provided made it easy to transport snacks/water during our daily outings.  Also, it came in handy to bring things back to the ohana that we purchased from the local markets.  Joyce's tips for things to see and do were so helpful!  This was our first trip to Hawaii and with Joyce's insight we were able to plan our days and make the most out of our stay.  Also, we used her restaurant suggestions and they were much appreciated.  Another perk was having a washer and dryer available to use when we needed to do a little laundry.  Not only was this our first trip to Hawaii but our first experience with Airbnb.  And, we can't express how perfect everything turned out - thanks to Joyce.  We would love to return some day to the Big Island and hopefully book another stay at Joyce and Randy's ohana (Website hidden by Airbnb) 
Mahalo-
Rick & Shari

My partner and I had a great stay.  The towels were big and fluffy, great linens , lots of little extras, all the beach gear you would need, brilliant.  We didn't cook during our stay but really appreciated a full size fridge for drinks and snacks etc.  We loved listening to the birds in the evening and morning, (not everyone does) and also that it was cooler up there.  
My advice to future travellers is be prepared to drive down a very steep road which is a little rough in places and to have a small flash light, as in the evenings its very difficult to see where you are walking from your parked car to the front door.
We enjoyed beautiful sunsets from the deck, views of the ocean in the distance and very tropical surroundings.

Aloha,
After a long search on Airbnb… looking at countless pictures…reading numerous reviews…I reserved the apartment in Joyce and Randy’s home.  I decided to fly into Kailua-Kona on Thanksgiving Day.  Prior to my arrival, Joyce reached out to invite me to dinner.  Due to my late arrival, I was unable to attend but was pleasantly surprised to find dinner waiting for me once I made it in.  Thank you for being so kind!!
 First, I have to say that my stay in Joyce and Randy’s home exceeded all my expectations.  The apartment was beautiful both inside and out.  Lush green foliage, ocean views and the quiet evening breeze provided the perfect setting to watch the sunset and/or sunrise.  The inside was tastefully decorated, clean and comfortable.  I could tell that Joyce put a considerable amount of time and effort into choosing the furniture, accessories, color scheme.  Very detail oriented!  Everything that I could have possibly needed was there.  Aside from linen, towels, dishes, etc., there were also beach chairs, beach towels, fins, a cooler with ice packs, a grill, cable, Wi-Fi, laundry facility, and last but certainly not least a lanai with a table/chairs.  They even provided seasonings and filtered water. The only thing that I needed to do was pick up groceries.  It was too easy!!  Getting around the island was easy too.  I enjoyed the fact knowing that once I reached the end of the street I had “options”.  If I made a left onto 190, I was off to explore various parts of the island –Kohala, Honokaa or Hilo to name a few. A quick turn to the right and I was off down the hill to the beach, shopping and restaurants.  Simply put…if I wanted a quick walk on the beach, shop and/or eat lunch by the water…turn right.  If I wanted to explore the island, left was the way to go.  After consulting the tour book also found in the apartment, and talking to Joyce about the various options, I decided to turn left.  I was rewarded with a spectacular drive over to Waimea and ultimately to the Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden near Hilo.  Note:   If you happen to be a veteran, there are discounts to be had.  I was admitted free of charge just by showing my id.   I loved everything about my trip.  In the end, I would say that the hardest decision that you’ll make will be whether you stay in to enjoy the apartment or venture out.  Either way you can’t lose.  
Thank you for a wonderful holiday.  Looking forward to coming again.
Camille

One of the best Airbnb’s I’ve stayed in and I’ve been to many. 

Very quiet and peaceful . Place is equipped with everything you need. 

What a wonderful stay!

name: Tranquillité en ville près de tous
summary: Joli appartement dans un quartier calme mais dynamique près de tous les services restos, bars, piste cyclable , parc , épicerie et dépanneur , rue commerciale ( St-Hubert ) , 10minutes à pied des stations de métro Jean-Talon et Jarry à 6 stations ligne directe avec le centre ville .  Notre appartement est simple mais très agréable avec toutes les commodités  bien éclairé avec un beau grand balcon table et chaises pour déjeuner ou se reposer.

reviews.comments: Location extrêmement propre, très bien équipée et chaleureuse comme les hôtes qui nous ont accueilli après une heure de retard au moins! Quartier très calme, familial. Machine à laver et sèche linge ce qui est rare dans une location de ce tarif. Réponse à nos questions très rapide et claire. Complètement satisfait de notre location avec Johanne et Jules. Au top!

J'ai loué l'appartement pour loger mes parents qui étaient venus me visiter. 
L'appartement est idéal pour un couple, très propre, très bien aménagé et équipé pour y séjourner longtemps et très bien chauffé. L'emplacement est aussi très bon ! proche du métro Jarry ou Jean talon et de commodités (épiceries, Marché jean talon). Dans un quartier très calme tout en étant au cœur de l'île et des attractivités.
Mes parents sont enchantés et en plus, n'hésitez pas à louer: Johanne et Jules sont de merveilleux hôtes qui vous rappelleront pourquoi on aime airbnb à la base : rencontrer les gens et avoir un échange de bons procédés. Ils sont chaleureux, accueillant et disponibles. Aucun problème de communication à signaler. Allez-y les yeux fermés!

Le séjour chez Johanne s'est très bien passé. Son appartement était très charmant et propre et son accueil chaleureux. Bien situé dans le quartier, l'appartement est proche de tout mais très au calme malgré tout. nous recommandons vivement !

name: Spacious & Charming by Prospect Pk
summary: Large alcove studio apartment around the corner from Prospect Park and the Botanic Garden. 3 minute walk from subway (B, Q, S). Lots of cafes and restaurants nearby.
space: This lovely pre-war apartment is in a building from 1939 and contains: kitchen foyer (with table for eating) living room/bedroom bathroom (with shower and bathtub) The kitchen was fully renovated, floor to ceiling, in summer 2018 and contains all new appliances.   The bathroom was renovated in summer 2018 and has great light, a newly glazed bathtub (for those with long legs) and nice shower, sink and toilet. The living room/bedroom is "sunken" (with 2 stairs from the foyer). It was recently painted in summer 2018 and contains a couch perfect for reading or napping, a projector (perfect for watching movies). There's wireless internet (wifi). Next to the couch is a super-comfortable queen-sized bed. There's an air-conditioner and a nice art deco dresser for your use. There's not much noise, as the apartment faces the rear of the building. There's a part-time doorperson who takes packages and there are laundry machines in the basement of the building. People in the building are friendly,

neighborhood_overview: Mong kok is one of the most popular and bustling districts in Hong Kong as there are plenty of great restaurants, shopping areas such as Ladies' Market(Tung Choi Street),Electrical Street(Sai Yeung Choi Street), Sportswear Street(Fa Yuen Street) and many giant shopping mallls like Langham Place. And there are so many traditional buildings, traditional restaurants around. It is one of the best area to stay if you want to explore Hongkong.
transit: 3 mins walk to MRT Mongkok station, Mainland of China express bus stop or city bus stop which head to the airport. Just 3 stops to Tsim sha Tsui, 20mins to Wanchai,Causeway Bay or Central which in Hongkong island. It can't more convenient to attractions such as Times Square,Disneyland,Ocean Park,Victoria Harbour,The Peak.
access: INCLUDED WITH YOUR STAY  - All bedding, cotton linen and fresh towels  - In-room air-conditioning - Unlimited high speed Wi-Fi Internet  - Hairdryer is in the room, iron is outside of the room. - Global Universal sockets in the room so save your luggage space for adapters - shampoo and body wash are provided in the bathroom THE APARTMENT You will receive your own privacy in our apartment and will be able to come and go as you need to – there are no curfews, only complete flexibility!

Can put a note book for customer write down their references or comment.
干净 舒服 下次可以揾翻这里
入住前有詢問轉接頭的事,房東有回覆是提供國際型的,到了手機需要充電才發現依舊是香港用的接頭,經反應才告知壞了沒有補上,結果早上自己去買了,撇除以上的事,其餘房間是蠻乾淨,設備也算新

房間很乾淨整潔,hk來講房子算比較大,最重要係乾淨!房東的指引好清晰,出mtr5分鐘就到了｡密碼鎖好方便,不用麻煩人｡
但,下一任房客10點半就來敲門,有點早了,只能急著讓房｡｡
挺好的,在旺角出地铁就很近,交通四通八达 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都很方便,很喜欢自助式入住,私人空间比较多,赞!
自助入住很方便,房間很舒適明亮!
位置很不错,虽然不是在地铁口,但是离地铁口还是蛮近的｡出行很方便,离购物中心很近｡楼下就有买水的地方,很方便｡
位置很好找哒,详细版的介绍一直打不开后来看简版的也找到了,离地铁口很近,去的小伙伴们要自备牙刷的纸拖鞋~地理位置真的很方便,不过对其他的也不能有太多要求啦,性价比真的很高
Good instruction, great location

The natural light fills in this space thanks to the abundance of windows. Our terrace is accessible starting May 15th - October 15th (Weather permitting) Please note this is an animal-friendly home (Subject to approval)
space: Apartment The building was built only a few years ago by MComber Architects Beautiful modern minimalistic environment  Furniture sources locally The first floor is an open concept living and kitchen area with concrete heated floors. Kitchen; Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher Gas cook top with electric convection oven Built in appliances Bathroom; All in one Bathtub and Shower Washer and Dryer Japanese-style toilet (can be used without the system) Bedroom;  The bedroom occupies the second floor with the patio door for terrace access Latex hypoallergenic mattress Extra blankets and sheets Terrace; (Summer Season) Gas Weber Grill Outdoor living room and carpet Outdoor dining area Little Garden (summer) Priceless view of the city

interaction: Guests can reach me anytime prior, during and after their stay.

Tenants must take all precaution to avoid any noise or odors, abiding all health and safety rules of the building. This property is non-smoking; Violators will be fined up to one thousand (1000) CAD dollars $. The Tenant shall ensure that the unit is always returned to the state it was at the beginning of the term.
