host.host_about: Attivista & Viaggiatore

reviews.comments:
Best. Airbnb stay. Ever.
Appart de folie, gavé de resto top à moins d'une minute (ça aide par grande neige), hôte adorable...on se croirait dans une pub pour Airbnb.
Et Jason, merci pour les bagels :)

Jason's condo was absolutely perfect. Prime location- super close to St-Laurent street in the Mile End, tastefully decorated, & with every amenity you could possible need. Jason himself was very thoughtful & hospitable, promptly providing info on the apartment and made sure we felt at home.  I would highly recommend staying here during your visit to Montreal!

Très belle expérience du début jusqu’à la fin. Echanges et communication faciles et rapides, check in et check out simples et souples, superbe appartement propre, ensoleillé et décoré avec goût, terrasse magnifique offrant une belle vue, suffisamment d’espace pour ranger ses propres affaires et se sentir « comme à la maison », équipement fonctionnel et complet (ou s’il manque quelque chose (comme un sèche cheveux dans notre cas), le très sympathique et attentionné Jason vous l’apportera dans les heures qui suivent), quartier très bien desservi par les transports en commun et animé (ce qui n’empêche pas de bénéficier d’un calme appréciable dans l’appartement), etc.

S’il fallait vraiment formuler une critique, peut-être pourrait-on suggérer l’installation d’enceintes pour écouter sa propre musique ? C’est vraiment tout…

En bref : à essayer de toute urgence, même si vous habitez Montréal et que vous avez envie de vous faire un weekend dans un lieu sympa ! Mon ami et moi reviendrons à Montréal et nous n’irons pas chercher ailleurs. Nous avons déjà recommandé l’endroit à quelques amis.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jason was very nice, easy to communicate with and responsive. His apartment is an amazing place to stay. Everything is new, modern & clean. The deck is absolutely stunning with a gorgeous view & a vegetable garden. We ate tomatoes from it! The kitchen is stocked with lots of things you'd need to cook. Although the place is conveniently-located just off St. Laurent, it's quiet. The bed is new & very comfortable & the shower is really nice. Just across the street is one of the best cafes in the city, Cafe Sardine, which at night turns into a restaurant (same chef as at Toronto's Guu). Walking distance to more great restaurants, grocery & organic food stores, a pharmacy & lots of shopping. If Jason's apartment is available to rent, it'd be a good idea to snap it up! There aren't many places like this to rent in Montreal & in the best neighbourhood.

This was a great apartment. Very comfortable and VERY clean. In walking distance to a lot of good restaurants and shops. There is a good coffee shop right across the street which always helps. Spoke with Jason for a little bit, he was a very nice guy/host!

A smooth and relaxing stay! I hope this apartment is available next time I'm in Montreal! The apartment was clean, bright and modern and the roof top terrace was a huge bonus.

The neighbourhood is my favouite in Montreal with many of the best new restaurants and brunch spots within a short walk. Lots of boutique shopping and close to a deppaneur and grocery store.

The company I work for had booked this AirBnB for me. I had never been to one before and I did not really know what to expect. I 
was happily surprised to find the standard of a good hotel, with shampoo, shower gel, body lotion and fresh towels readily available. 
The apartment looks modern, was very clean and is located near lots of restaurants and bars on St. Laurent. 
The roof top terrace is absolutely gorgeous with a view on Mont Royal. Key exchange was uncomplicated and Jason was very friendly
and patiently answered all of my questions.  I can totally recommend this AirBnB and look forward to staying there again - and now maybe also in other AirBnBs because of the 
positive experience.

We really loved our stay at the Fairmount flat. Walking distance to iconic food destinations like Fairmount bagel, Schwartz's Delicatessen, Wilensky and more, about a 5-7 min. walk to the metro. We visited during extremely hot weather so we were glad to have this place to come back to and relax during the day to recharge -- the AC helped a ton. The flat and kitchen is impeccably stocked with any tools and things you might need -- we chose to grill some of our meals with the awesome Weber grill on the roof deck.

I was also very impressed by the cleanliness and presentation of the flat overall. Thank you, Jason!

The listing was exactly as pictured (with the exception of the balcony, which is even better than pictured, with an amazing seating area!). 
My husband and I had a great stay in our favourite neighborhood in Montreal, full of interesting stores, cafes and restaurants. One of the best restaurants I've tried in Montreal, Hotel Herman, was just steps away. 
Jason was a great host and made the check-in and check-out process clear and easy. I'd highly recommend this apartment for a trip to Montreal and would try to book it again the next time in Montreal.

Amazing place to stay, great location. 
Heated tiles !!!!

We had a great stay at this property! It was clean and well maintained with lots of plants. Looks just like the pictures, but feels even cooler in person. The neighborhood is perfect if you like local clothing/design shops and great restaurants. Jason was communicative and checking in was very easy.

We enjoyed our stay at Jason's apartment during our visit to Montreal between Christmas and New Year. The apartment was exactly as described / as it looked in the photos, a really nice space with everything you would need for your stay. The apartment is in a great neighbourhood with lots on your doorstep without having to venture into the city centre everyday. Some great recommendations in the guidebook. Jason was easy to contact before and during our stay. Would definitely recommend!

Jason and Guillame were excellent hosts. If you are a foodie, this apartment is located in the midst of a zillion delicious restaurants. It is in the middle of shopping, coffee, food, and people. This is not the area of Montreal that is touristy - you'll feel like a local walking around in the Mile End/Mount Royal. Thanks for an excellent stay!

A very cool apartment in an amazing location! Jason is a great host and greeted me to check in, even though I arrived quite late.

For those who do not know the area; this is in the prime area of Mile End. Plenty of great shops, resto's, cafes and bars literally around the corner.

For all that, it is amazingly residential and quiet too. The roof terrace is one of the best I've seen and makes a wonderful location for your breakfast or dinner!

Thanks Jason.

This is a beautiful apartment in a fantastic neighborhood. Jason and Guillaume were very easy to communicate with, and they'd left us some good recommendations for things to do in the area. The apartment itself was so pretty and comfortable that we were tempted just to hang out there, even though the neighborhood has an abundance of great things: the best bagels and the best ice cream in Montreal, etc. Highly recommended!

Perfect location in the heart of the Mile End neighborhood. Walk to everything i.e., shops, restaurants, nightlife etc. but still located on a quite street. The home was clean and comfortable with a gorgeous rooftop.   Would definitely stay again.
Amazing place. Perfect

We loved the apartment. Couldn't ask for a better location. It's right next to restaurants and bar, as well as a close walk to the Metro. The place was quiet, well-maintained and as good (if not better) than it appears in the photos. I'd recommend this place to anyone looking for a private retreat in Montreal.

This place is better in real! Excellent location, very easy check -in, cozy and spotless clean apartment! Fabulous top floor terrace. Jason has been a very good host. Responsive and punctual. Thank you for the opportunity to enjoy this little paradise!

Guillaume’s home was absolutely perfect for our 10 day trip to Montreal. His home was super clean, modern and comfortable with huge windows and fantastic views. Located in the heart of the mile end, surrounded by restaurants, cafes and shops but tucked away enough to be quite at night. We would definitely stay there again, merci!
Appartement parfait en tous points.

The apartment was just as pictured, very clean and modern and the roof deck was lovely. The location was great with lots of wonderful restaurants and cafes just steps away. We especially enjoyed the Sparrow and Cafe Olimpico. Navigating street parking in Mile End is rather confusing, read the signs carefully!
Jason and Guillaume’s home is amazingly located and uber clean. Would happily return next time I visit Montreal.

Staying at Jason's place was like a trip back in time to the olden era if airbnb.  It was so nice to be in someone's actual home.  They are also excellent hosts.  The apartment is comfortable with a good kitchen and bed.   The location is excellent.  We were traveling with out cat who absolutely loved the stairs.

We had a wonderful stay at Jason's.  The apartment is beautiful and modern, very clean, airy, and in the best location, in the heart of Mile End.  The bed is really comfortable and it's lovely to have the roof deck.  Jason is easy to communicate with and gives great neighborhood recommendations.  This is our second time staying here and we hope to stay here again.

Jason’s place is more beautiful in person than seen in the photos on the listing. We absolutely loved this apartment, it was clean and saturated in natural light. The bed was comfortable, shower and soaker tub were great and I loved the plants through out the apartment. And of course, the rooftop terrace was an amazing addition to our trip. Jason was easy to communicate with before, during and after our trip. Thank you for your hospitality!
Great! do not hesitate to book it
Jason's place is the kind of airbnb you want to live in. It's beautiful. Smart finishes, great amenities. The area is perfect. You couldn't change a thing.

Best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at hands down and also the only Airbnb I’ve ever visited that I truly wished I lived there. The place is absolutely beautiful, the surrounding area has many amazing places to eat. If I’m ever in the area again, I’ll deff stay here and you should too. I already miss being there

name: Free Parking! North Star Flats@Ribeira & Cellars 5
summary: Apartamento duplex no coração das caves do Vinho do Porto, pertíssimo da Av. Diogo Leite, sendo esta o melhor local para fotografar e admirar a Ribeira do Porto – Património Mundial da UNESCO. Está apenas a pouco minutos a pé da famosíssima Ponte D. Luís I, do centro do Porto e dos principais monumentos de interesse. É um apartamento confortável com decoração moderna e vistas para a Ponte Dom Luís I. É o local perfeito para descansar após deambular pela cidade. Vai adorar hospedar-se aqui!
description: Apartamento duplex no coração das caves do Vinho do Porto, pertíssimo da Av. Diogo Leite, sendo esta o melhor local para fotografar e admirar a Ribeira do Porto – Património Mundial da UNESCO. Está apenas a pouco minutos a pé da famosíssima Ponte D. Luís I, do centro do Porto e dos principais monumentos de interesse. É um apartamento confortável com decoração moderna e vistas para a Ponte Dom Luís I. É o local perfeito para descansar após deambular pela cidade. Vai adorar hospedar-se aqui!

host.host_about: I have always worked on multicultural environments. At first, as representative in Europe of portuguese textile companies; then, as owner of a textile decoration company where I had the opportunity to meet pleople from every part of the globe, as Fabric Purchasing Manager of a US-based company, and presently as owner of a translation & webdesign company which clients are located worldwide. I love to meet culturally different people and learn a bit more about their countries and their travel experiences.

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments: Maria molto disponibile e cordiale. Una bellissima esperienza

Vous apprécierez la terrasse au-dessus des toits des caves de Porto, pour prendre son café au soleil le matin, au sortir du lit,  avec vue sur le fameux pont Luiz I -qui vous mènera en 1/4 d'heure à pied au cœur de la ville, avec panorama...! :)
C'est un type studio (tout ouvert) en duplex (étage salon cuisine, étage chambre-terrasse-salle de bain), bien équipé, au 4ème étage d'un immeuble entièrement rénové par les propriétaires pour la location. L'hôte nous a bien reçus et accompagnés au garage (manipulation particulière, car nécessite de prendre l'ascenseur avec la voiture pour se garer au 1er étage du parking du quartier, situé dans la même rue). Il est juste à côté des berges du Douro, en face de Porto, le quartier s'est beaucoup développé, vous y trouverez nombreux restaurants et les familles comme les touristes en promenade sur les berges. C'est vous l'aurez compris le fameux quartier des caves de Porto, que l'on peut y déguster, d'où son succès, mais aussi parce que c'est de ce côté là qu'on a les meilleures vues sur Porto (et qu'on se sent un peu plus éloignés de l'agitation de la ville). Bon séjour à Porto chez Maria.

We had a perfect stay at Maria´s place: Our flight arrived early and she made it possible to enter the apartment earlier than the description says. She provided us with recommendations for restaurants, bars and places to see and answered super quick whenever we texted her. We highly recommend this place!

Séjour parfait dans ce logement très bien situé.
Logement très propre et un accueil de qualité. Je recommande !
Très joli duplex à deux pas des berges de Gaia !

Maria and Paulo are very kind and extremely helpful and amazing hosts. 
The apartment is fantastic especially the terrace with a view to the entire city - it’s unique in Porto to have this kind of terrace. The area is great too, close to all the port wine cellars, which is really worth a visit. 
So if you are looking for the perfect apartment this has to be it. 
Rasmus and Carina.

Maria and her brother were fantastic hosts! On the first evening she came to meet us and make sure we were happy with everything, she was on hand during the whole stay and gave us recommendations on where to visit/eat.

The accommodation was excellent, very clean and modern with great facilities

The view from the balcony is amazing.

The location of the flat is perfectly central to really enjoy Porto

11/10!
Très bon emplacement au bord du Duro côté caves. Appatement très propre et refait à neuf. Merci pour les touches d'attention pour notre bébé.

The appartment is exacly like on the pictures. The view from the balcony is amazing and we really enjoyed our time in the appartment. The location is very close to everything and we actually liked it very much. The checkin was very welcoming and we got great tips where to go for food and for drinks. The only thing is, that the bathroom is not really made for tall people. My boyfrind is 193 cm and the bathroom ceiling was a bit to low for him.

Appartement idéalement situé en centre ville mais quand même au calme d'une petite ruelle. A l'intérieur : rien à redire ! Accueil chaleureux par les deux propriétaires. Liste d'adresses locales et plan de Porto à disposition. Je ne peux que recommander. Merci encore !

Die Kommunikation im Vorfeld wie auch während des Aufenthalts ist sehr vorbildlich. Der empfang ist sehr unkompliziert und herzlich. Das Appartement würden wir sofort wieder buchen. Ideal für zwei Personen und mit allem ausgestattet was man benötigt. Der Balkon ist Super und hat Morgensonne mit schöner Aussicht. Eine Möven-Familie hatte auf dem Nachbardach zwei Junge, was amüsant war zum beobachten. Einziger Nachteil ist, dass die Wohnung im 4en Stock ohne Lift ist. Für uns kein Problem, aber vielleicht für ältere oder schwächere. 
TOP-Appartement!!!

TIPP was nicht zur Wohnungsbeurteilung gehört: 
Die Portwein-Keller sind in unmittelbarer Umgebung, wobei wir Taylors für eine Besichtigung empfehlen. Da kann man selber eine Tour mit Audioerklärungen in jeder Sprache im eigenen Tempo begehen. Einkaufen in den Kellern, speziell bei Calem ist nicht zu empfehlen. Wegen vielen Touristen sind die Preise dort jeweils erhöht. Mussten wegen Unkenntnis, bei Calem für eine Vintage-Port, den ich zum ersten mal kosten wollte, 220% mehr bezahlen als auf seriösen Homepages nachgelesen. Zudem verkauften sie mir einen der schlechtesten Jahrgänge, obwohl ich mich extra, wegen Unwissenheit, beraten lies. Wurde gut ausgenutzt. Auch normale Portweine kosten ca. 10 bis 20% mehr als in den umliegenden Geschäften oder Online. Trotzdem eine tolle Erfahrung und ich hab was dazu gelernt :-)

Dear Maria and Paulo,  we really enjoyed our stay and the wonderful view over the river and bridge.  An amazing location and thank you for assisting with driving to your place.  The directions were very clear.  A very nice apartment.   Greetings Cecile and Peter

Logement de très bonne qualité, au calme, légèrement en retrait des quais et cependant idéalement situé à proximité du Douro, des caves, du ponte Luis , du quai de la Ribeira, du centre historique.....

Fantastic place right next to the river and easy to walk to all the sights and port tastings! Maria and Paulo were great hosts and came to meet us to make sure we found the place ok. The parking was a bonus. We loved our visit to Porto and hope to be back soon!

The view of the accommodation was fantastic. The owner of the accommodation, Maria, was also very kind and helped to provide detailed information such as a restaurant near the accommodation. Also, the inside of the hotel was clean and pleasant.
We had a wonderful stay. A beautiful apartment in a great location.

Maria and Paulo were excellent hosts. We arrived by car, so they met us at an easier-to-navigate-to spot and led us to the parking garage next to their apartment. The apartment itself has two floors and a balcony; it is very clean and comfortable and has plenty of room. It is also very well-located, just a short walk from many of the port houses and a ten-minute walk across the river from Porto. Would absolutely stay here again on a future trip!
포르투를 바라보는 가이아의 전경을 볼 수 있으며, 숙소의 인테리어도 뛰어남. 개인적으로는 한글로 쓰는게 도움될 것 같아서 한글로 남김!

Perfect location, less than 5 minutes to the river and port cellars. Maria replied quickly and gave us very good recommendations for places to eat and things to do. We would definitely recommend to a friend!
Great location, clean, hip and has an amazing balcony. Paulo the co-host was a pleasure aswell.

사진과 정말 똑같아요! 복층구조로 되어있고 너무 깨끗하고 테라스에서 동 루이스 다리가 보여요!!!! 물도 주고 커피머신이랑 티도 준비가 되어있고 컵 그릇 냄비와 소금 올리브오일 등 간단한 식재료가 준비되어있어요! 호스트가 매우 친절하고 음식점이나 와이너리, 구경할 것들을 추천해줍니다 단점은 5층이었는데 엘리베이터가 없었다는점과 에어컨이 없다는점? 7월초에 갔는데 아침저녁으로는 쌀쌀해서 에어컨이 필요가없긴했습니다 선풍기 엄청 강력한걸로 두개있어요 위치가 와이너리쪽에 위치하는데 동루이스 다리에서 그리 멀지 않아 걸어다닐만했습니다. 포르투크루즈 건물이있는 골목에 있어요 주변에 와인판매점도 많고 도우로 강가랑도 가까워요! 평지로 가는 법이있고 언덕에있는 계단으로 가는 방법이 있는데, 구글지도가 언덕으로 알려줘서 처음엔 언덕으로 갔었는데 나중에는 평지로 편하게 다녔습니다! 너무 좋은 숛소였습니다!!

Maria and Paolo are great hosts. Checkin process went easy, we were provided with a huge list of recommendations about the places to see, to eat etc.
The duplex is perfectly located (especially for people who adore porto wine). The area is beautiful, but not really touristic. 
The flat has everything you need for a comfortable stay. And a FANTASTIC terrace. Last 2 evenings we did not go to the restaurants but ate on the terrace - the view and the atmosphere there is much better :)
I would recommend this place to couples who want to spend a romantic time in Porto (or Vila Nova de Gaia :)).
But I would not recommend to bring huge suitcases - it's less than 1 km from the metro, but the road is not flat at all. And we did't manage to call the Uber there (had to use Teleférico to get up to the metro station with our luggage).
Mezonetový, moderně vybavený apartmán se skvělým výhledem z terasy. Možnost parkovat v parkovacím domě přes ulici. Řeka, most, historické centrum, vše je v docházkové vzdálenosti. Určitě doporučuji.
We had a great time in the cosy and well equipped apartment which is located very in the middle of everything. Highly recommend! Thanks a lot!

This place could not be in a better location for visitors wanting to explore the port wine caves of Vila Nova de Gaia. Beautiful view of the town and embankment from the window and the private balcony. Safe and very secure neighborhood and building. Clean space and amenities. Comfortable beds and, while there is no AC, there are fans and a nice breeze with open windows. A two minute walk to the main strip of Diogo Leite, next to the Sandeman property. Though close, not noisy and a good place to get rest after exploring. Easy walk over the bridge to Porto, but we liked Gaia better!
Great location and clean, nice apartment.  We enjoyed the area, too.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Porto et l'appartement de Maria y est pour beaucoup. Malgré notre arrivée matinale, Maria nous a très bien accueilli. L'appartement est conforme à la description avec un balcon très agréable. Super bien situé, nous n'avons utilisé aucun transport pour nous balader dans Porto. A recommander!

La localización en Vila Nova de Gaia es una excelente opción para visitar Porto. Estuvimos en agosto y la afluencia de turistas en Oporto era muy grande. Al estar al otro lado del Duero esta localización te permite estar al mismo tiempo cerca del centro y más tranquilo del ajetreo de turistas. Además tienes las bodegas con sus terrazas y restaurantes al lado. En nuestro caso pillamos una ola de calor que hizo subir las temperaturas muchos grados por encima de la media de un mes de agosto durante algunos días. En condiciones normales, que también tuvimos, las temperaturas son moderadas y muy agradables en verano en general  y también en el apartamento. Sin embargo, los días de la ola de calor echamos en falta el aire acondicionado, que,  por otro lado, ya sabíamos que el apartamento no tenía. Por lo demás, perfecto.

Asunto oli hyvin siisti ja sijainniltaan loistavalla paikalla. Lähiympäristössä oli kivoja, pieniä ravintoloita ja tietenkin upeat portviinikellarit. Söimme joka aamu aamiaisen omalla parvekkeella katsellen maisemaa Douro-joelle. Sisäänkirjautuminen sujui ongelmitta ja Marian kanssa kommunikointi oli vaivatonta. Iso suositus!

Great apartment right near the river and all of the port wineries. Really nice balcony to sit and have a cup of coffee on. Also very easy to get across the river and into the city center. Really great hosts who got us checked in and gave us great recommendations! Only thing is that it’s a bit hot in the summer since there is no air conditioning but they had fans set up for us.
Great location

Not only an amazing location, but the appartment was absolutely perfect inside for our couple day stay in Porto. We were a 2 minute walk from the main strip. 

Our host was nice enough to give us recommendations of restaurants and nightlife soon after we arrived (in which we accepted and tried) the bed was comfortable, kitchen was fully equipped and the balcony was perfect to enjoy a glass of wine, or breakfast with a beautiful view. 

I loved the place so much I wish I could have stayed even longer.  10/10 would definetly recommend. Would love to stay here again 

Very clean, modern, and enjoyable.  

Thank you

B

Conforme à la description et aux photos, voir même mieux. La vue sur le pont est juste superbe. L'appartement est hyper bien placé, très propre et Maria est très disponible. Elle indique la ligne de métro à prendre puis le plan pour arriver à l'appartement. Maria laisse également des recommandations pour des lieux à visiter ainsi que pour des restaurants.  Et, pour notre départ elle nous a commandé un taxi car nous partions assez tôt.
Nous retournerons avec plaisir chez Maria pour un prochain voyage à Porto.
top

Maria's place is very nice, clean and has almost palpable charm. Located on the "Port wine" side of Douro river it is not as busy as the tourist part of Porto and we loved it. 

Maria is an amazing host and very kind person. She gave us thorough information how to get to place and welcomed us on the spot. Also, she provided us with great tips where to eat and what to see.

If we will come back to Porto we will definitely go to Maria again.

Marias Apartment lässt tatsächlich keine Wünsche offen! Wie schon in den vorhergegangenen Bewertungen beschrieben, ist es für zwei Personen perfekt geeignet und liegt absolut perfekt, um zu Fuß Porto zu erkunden - wobei auch die direkte Umgebung von Vila Nova de Gaia viel zu bieten hat. Maria war unglaublich gastfreundlich, holte uns sogar aus der Nähe ab, weil wir den vereinbarten Treffpunkt nicht so recht fanden. Außerdem gab sie uns unzählige Tipps für Restaurants, Bars, Unternehmungen etc., und davon war jeder einzelne gold wert! Wir können Marias Apartment wirklich uneingeschränkt empfehlen!

Superb apartment, wonderful location and close to everything. The apartment is fully equiped, beautiful terrace with view of the bridge, super comfortable bed and more. Do not hesitate with this apartment, you will not be disappointed

Great communication before and at our arrival. Maria met us and guided us into the parking garage - a small car is a must! She then sent an email with lots of local info and places to visit - very useful. The apartment was spotless and well equiped, it's in a perfect location - a couple of minutes walk from the river, about 5 mins from the bridge and in the middle of all the Port houses. The balcony was a bonus for an evening drink and a morning coffee, looking out over the roof-tops and the bridge. The apartment is up 4 flights of stairs so not for those with walking difficulties but all of Porto is hilly - it makes for great views! Would definitely recommend.

L'appartement est très agréable,  spacieux et très propre. Le petit balcon donne sur le pont Dom Luis 1 et est une touche très sympathique.
L'appartement est super bien situé et si on pense à bien réserverune place de parking auprès de Paulo et Maria, il est très simple de voyager en voiture. 
Nous avons reçu un super accueil de la part de Paulo, qui nous a égalementfait plusieurs suggestions sur les choses à a voir, à faire, à manger, à boire, durant notre séjour à Porto.
Nous recommandons!!!

There is sooo clean and amenity is perfect.
View from  balcony is also perfect.
And host gave me awesome information.
I really enjoy my stay.
highly recommend.
thank you so much!!

Great view from the apartment, and from the Gaia Ribeira side onto the old city, lovely little coffee shops on the same street, great hostess with a lot of valuable tips. We stayed for 3 nights, we definitely recommend!

Maria was very warm and welcoming. She gave us great tips, places to eat, things to see, but even more important is the fact, that it was possible to call or text her if we needed help or advice with anything. It was good to know that when in a foreign city, you have someone you can turn to if needed.
The apartment is airy, with great light at all times of the day. The view from the balcony on the top floor is lovely, and was a great place to sit with a glass of wine at the end of the day,  just relax and enjoy the clean air and the picturesque view.
Maria and Paolo are wonderful hosts and it was a pleasure to stay in there. They made everything pleasant and easy... A wonderful stay in Porto... a beautiful city, and they made it amazing!
Thank you Maria and Paolo!!
Vielen Dank, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt

Maria is the perfect host with a great apartment located in the historic port house area of Vila Nova de Gaia (directly across the Douro river from the Ribeira precinct of Porto). There are several major port houses and restaurants a 2 minute walk away on the banks of the Douro with the Ribeira dining precinct only a 5 minute walk away via the picturesque Dom Luís I Bridge. The apartment is on the top floor of the building but the stairs are worth it for the view of the Douro and Dom Luís I Bridge. An amazing experience which we wished was longer. Thanks Maria.

A spacious and stylish apartment in the heart of Vila Nova de Gaia. We walked across the famous Dom Luís bridge every day and had no problem walking to almost all tourist sites! Coffee pods in the kitchen were amazing, no need to find a supermarket and try to figure out what pods would work (something not all AirBnb’s we stayed at had)! They gave us great suggestions for restaurants and loved the home cooked Portuguese food at Casa Dias, a few minute walk from the apartment. The terrace was lovely and a great place for morning coffee. The apartment was SO clean!! Thank you for providing a great place for our first stay in Portugal!

Super beau petit condo deux étages. Bien situé, ne donne pas sur la rue, donc tranquille. Idéalement situé pour visiter les cavistes, ou pour marcher jusqu'au centre touristique de Porto. Paulo est très accommodant, et sympathique. À recommander!

Paulo could not have been more helpful. He gave us fantastic recommendations and was incredibly attentive. The location was fantastic. Being able to walk across the Luis bridge everyday and get the beautiful view of Porto was amazing. The flat was lovely (perfect for two people). Would return again tomorrow!

très bien situé,à proximité du pont,tout se fait à pied. L'appartement est très propre et bien équipé. Une petite odeur d égout dans la salle de bain, désagréable mais largement supportable. Maria parle très bien français et est arrangeante.
Logement tout proche des quais de Gaia et bien situé pour la visite de porto. Calme, lumineux, propre et agréable. Bon accueil. Parking gratuit à 50mn. Je recommande sans hésiter.

The apartment has a stunning view to the bridge.
It is close to the city center, walking distance.
It is very clean, the host is responsive to the guest's needs.

Estuvimos en el apartamento de Maria y Paulo durante una semana, ya tenía claro que quería hospedarme en la zona de las bodegas,  un lugar muy tranquilo cuando cae la tarde noche. La casa es igual que en las fotos, la limpieza impecable, todo muy nuevo... y encima con vistas al puente D. Luis. Posiblemente leas que cualquier emplazamiento es centrico, aqui te queda la primera estación de metro a 10 minutos caminando y la estación de tren de Sao Bento a 20 minutos, puede parecer mucho, pero no lo es. Oporto es una ciudad tranquila pero con mucho movimiento de turístas, hospedarte más al centro supone mucho más ruido, y sobre todo, porque muchas de sus calles son con adoquines, por lo que se  puede percibir el ruido desde muy temprano, en la casa de Maria, lo único que te puede despertar es alguna gaviota que se acerque mucho a la terraza. 

Desde el primer día nos facilitaron información de diferentes lugares para visitar y comer, aunque nosotros ya conocíamos Oporto. Puedes contratar un transfer para que te lleve desde el aeropuerto por unos 15 euros para 2 personas.

Nos ha encantado Oporto y el resto de ciudades que visitamos, ya que practicamente todo los hicimos en tren que es muy barato. Sin duda recomiendo éste alojamiento a todas esas personas que como yo, les gusta la tranquilidad y huyen del ruido.

Muchas gracias a María y Paulo.
Desde Tenerife.

Logement juste parfait..Très agréable, propre, bien équipé, bien agencé avec superbe terrasse et vue. Emplacement dans un quartier très sympa, il faut juste traverser le Douro pour rejoindre le centre ville à pied, en télécabine, funiculaire ou métro! Trajet très agréable avec beau point de vue sur la ville.Merci à Maria pour son accueil

My boyfriend and I had a great stay in Paulo's appartment. It is extremely practical as it is less than a minute away from all the wine cellars and it is also very quiet. Paulo was extremely kind and was reactive to any questions. The only advice is to probably carry smal luggages as the appartment does not have a lift and it is on the topmost floor having a lot of steps ( even then paulo helped us so it was no problem). Also the road to the house is quite narrow (like all of portugal) so try a get a small car.

Paulo's responsiveness, the location, the cleanliness, the style, the general condition, the quality of linens, the parking, and the security were excellent. There are a few functional aspects that could use improvement, but overall this is a great place. A small grocery store and an excellent restaurant called Arcoiris are a few doors down, and the river front activities and view make this super place convenient.

위치는 강 건너편 빌라 노바 드 가이아라 시내 중심은 아니라서 짧게 여행하시면 힘들 수도 있어요. 와이너리 투어하기 좋습니다. 저는 5박6일 있었고 매우 깨끗하고 좋았습니다. 다리 뷰도 사진 그대로에요. 호스트도 친절하고 근데 5층인데 엘레베이터는 없어요. 올라다닐만은 합니다 :) 
It was an amazing flat. Exactly same with pictures. Hosts were very helpful and their recommendation was so good. Flat was very clean. I’ll stay this flat next time when I go to Porto again.

Nuestra estancia fue de 10 sobre 10. Tanto Paulo como María fueron muy atentos, nos ayudaron en todo lo posible. El apartamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. La zona es muy tránquila, el parking está a escasos metros del portal. Sin duda para repetir. Obrigado!!!

name: Kona Reef, F5 - Beautiful remodeled Condo stunning ocean/sunset views
summary: Welcome to paradise! Located on the first level of the complex, walk straight into a modern, luxurious, and fully appointed beach retreat. This beautiful unit has everything you may need while on your vacation in Hawaii. Newly remodeled with lovely beach decor, spacious, and with all the amenities. Perfectly located within walking distance to all of the best ocean-front restaurants and shops. Take a stroll down to Daylight Mind for some famous Kona coffee, and a fresh baked pastry.
space: This space is located on the ground floor, so don't worry about having to drag your luggage up a flight of stairs. Just walk right in! The space recently got a full remodel and contains all the amenities you may need during your stay. Get an amazing nights sleep in the king size bed. Fall asleep in the beautiful ocean air or use the A/C. Leave your quarters at home; there is a washer and dryer in unit for your use. Spacious living room with amazing ocean views, A/C, cable, TV, and Wi-fi. Brand new appliances, furniture, linens and more. Easy access from parking to bring your luggage in. The inviting pool is a short walk into the complex. Enjoy the hot tub; especially in the evenings! BBQ facilities are located next to the pool. The kitchen comes fully equipped with dishes, cooking equipment, microwave, dishwasher and more. We also have beach chairs, snorkel gear and a boogie board for your use. There is an underground parking garage that elevates the back end of the unit to provide the

Perfectly located within walking distance to all of the best ocean-front restaurants and shops. Take a stroll down to Daylight Mind for some famous Kona coffee, and a fresh baked pastry. Fall asleep in the beautiful ocean air or use the A/C. Leave your quarters at home; there is a washer and dryer in unit for your use. Spacious living room with amazing ocean views, A/C, cable, TV, and Wi-fi. Brand new appliances

host.host_about:
First Island Realty has been managing properties on the Big Island of Hawaii since 2005. We specialize in paradise and have a diverse portfolio ranging from multi-million dollar luxury homes,  estates, and vacation rentals to multi-family properties.

Mark Trahan, Property Manager

Originally from Lafayette, Louisiana, Mark received his Bachelors in Accounting from the University of Louisiana @ Lafayette in 2005 after serving 6 years in the U.S.Air Force. Having worked for Fortune 500 companies in New Orleans and Dallas, Mark brings a depth of accounting experience that will build trust and ensures smooth transactions. With his southern charm & hospitality, each guest can be assured that their needs will be served in a friendly manner – leaving one with a sense of Ohana and ALOHA! 

Lori McNeel, Concierge Services

A Texas native, Lori moved to the islands over 15 years ago first to Maui then the Big Island.  Lori comes to us with a wealth of experience in the hospitality industry.  Past experiences include VIP concierge for Starwood and the Hyatt regency.  Lori has an in-depth knowledge of the Big Island and will assist you in creating the vacation you have always dreamed of.  From wedding planning to personal concierge services such as activity planning, she is your girl!

Laure McElwee, Broker

As a long term resident and real estate broker in the state of Hawaii, Laure McElwee's focus has always been on providing the best service to buyers and sellers alike. Consistently a top producer both regionally and nationally for over 10 years, Laure loves the challenge of finding you the perfect property in paradise and assisting with the transition to the Big Island!  She is honest, dedicated, hard working, and many buyers and sellers have become her dear friends. She brings knowledge, experience, integrity, and a "can do" attitude to the table. Laure is a fun loving, high energy, and a driven realtor.  Currently on the West Hawaii association board of realtors grievance committee and a member of the Hawaii association of realtors. Laure is also a 100 tons boat captain, a dive instructor, and an avid paddler.

reviews.comments: First Island Realty was extremely responsive and helpful throughout the entire booking and staying at the location process. Every question we had was answered quickly and with a friendly Hawaiian welcome. The location is unbeatable, only a 5 minute walk from downtown Kona and the view of the pool and ocean was fantastic. Entirely updated kitchen made for great cooking enviornment. Would highly recommend!

First of all we are more than thankful for the last minute booking and the communication! Everything was beautiful the location is amazing! My wife and I are originally from the big island and I grew up surfing as a kid right outside the kona reef complex! It felt so good to get away from Honolulu and come back home to kona to relax! Everything was perfect! The ambiance the way the condo was decorated! Everything was A1 perfect! Definitely be staying here again soon!!!
Awesome location- very clean with everything you’ll need for your stay including snorkeling equipment! The view was simply amazing - we will definitely return!

F5 is a incredible unit!   The interior is just beautiful with everything you need and more!   And the Lani is HUGE with the most amazing view.  Location is perfect.  Walking distance to excellent dining and shopping but just barely away from the crazy!   We would definitely stay here again.
Had a great stay at the Kona Reef F5 unit. The unit had everything from washer dryer to snorkeling equipment. Would totally recommend this unit to anyone looking to stay in the area.

Place was great!  quiet location to Kailua, walking distance to bars and restaurants, with its own small beach area (if you understand that a beach is filled with rocks on the big Island!!).  Great sunset view.   Perfect for a couple.
Fine spot not too far drive from downtown Kona.
眺めも良く､立地も最高です!

Location of the condo was great.  You walk 5 minutes to city center but the condo itself is quiet enough.  Easy parking on the same level as the room.  You can truly enjoy both of them.
Support from the owner was very quick, which I appreciated very much.

The location was superb and within walking distance to downtown.  The view of the surf was great too.   The unit is mostly remodeled but glass sliding door was dated (frame is loose).  The unit is in main floor which helps with getting things to and from car but also means you get noise from parking lot and other guests walking around.  
The amenities were awesome and had everything we needed for our stay, even some gear to enjoy the beaches and water.

name: (inRAMBLAS) 1double room! Historic center
summary: Céntrica habitación  doble  privada con baño compartido en el centro de Barcelona Mira las fotos: Habitación tiene 2 entradas la puerta principal y la puerta  antigua con cristal( ver foto), que da a una terraza.   y el baño está al lado de la habitación. Vivirás la experiencia de como es una típica casa del cetro histórico de la ciudad ciudad bella.  Apartamento situado en plena en ramblas. BARRIO GÓTICO.  VERY IMPORTANT : we ONLY ACCEPT QUIET GUESTS . This is an easy going but a quiet house!  Please be aware we DON'T ACCEPT PARTIES , ALCOHOL BEHAVIOUR , or any kind of LOUD MUSIC , or noises that can disturb the peace in the apartment and the neighbourhood.
space: 1Double room in a sharing apartment with me JORGE AND OCCASIONALLY I can have other guests in the other bedroom.  (2 bedroom in this apartment are for Airbnb guests)  JORGE ME LIVE IN the apartment The apartment has lift.   Is located in the heart of the historic city centre.   Gothic quarter, RAMBLAS.  8 minutes walk from the seaside.  Metro drasanas is just around the corner The KITCHEN is FULLY EQUIPPED with stove, Oven. Big FRIDGE , kettle, Philip's coffee maker, microwave, iron, WASHING MACHINE .  etc Hay ASCENSOR  COCINA GRANDE con MESAS y 4 SILLAS,  PEQUEÑO SALON __________________________________ Es un apartamento grande de 3 habitaciones.  2 se alquila a turistas y una vivo yo. Puedes hacer uso de la cocina, frigorífico y toda la casa. El apartamento está en una calle típica del barrio gótico de Barcelona A lado de la catedral el Puerto y la playa. Se puede ir andando a todas partes.

Gothic quarter, RAMBLAS.  8 minutes walk from the seas
neighborhood_overview: El APARTAMENTO está en pleno  BARRIO GÓTICO al lado de la CATEDRAL y de las RAMBLAS  Es el CENTRO HISTÓRICO de Barcelona La zona más bonita
notes: Two single bed size 90x190 and 105x190 Bathrooms to share with shower. Share only with 1 person
transit: Metro DRASSANAS is 4  walk minutes from the apartment  The best way to get to the apartment from the airport is: 1-Get the airport bus[5€] to plaza Cataluña and walk 20 minutes down the RAMBLAS  (Total time 1h)  2- get airport bus [5€] to plaza españa and get metro[2€] to DRASSANES +walk 4 minutes to the apartment  (total time 50 minutes)  The apartment has automatic password door. If you arrive before 2 pm you can come arround the apartment and drop  you luggage Do it in the entrance (cleaning time is between 11 am and 2pm)  be very discreet and quiet.  Probably people is sleeping.  (TO DROP OFF THE LUGGAGE AND GO)  Come back to  chek-in in the room at 2PM or later
access: ** ATTENTION ** - YOU´LL BE BOOKING THE BEDROOM, NOT THE ENTIRE APARTMENT, ALTHOUGH YOU CAN USE ALL THE FACILITIES. - OCCASIONALLY WE CAN HAVE OTHER GUESTS AT THE OTHER BEDROOM. ! PERFECT HOME FOR QUIET GUESTS! . ATENCIÓN

host.host_about: Friendlly Spanish guy easy going.

name: Habitación doble en el centro de la ciudad
summary: Habitacion doble excelente para pasar un super fin de semana cerca de la playa de barceloneta.Tres lineas de metro y el tren que va directo al aeropuerto.
space: El apatramento es muy luminoso y super centrico
description: Habitacion doble excelente para pasar un super fin de semana cerca de la playa de barceloneta.Tres lineas de metro y el tren que va directo al aeropuerto. El apatramento es muy luminoso y super centrico Tienes disponible toallas y jabon y el toillete es compartido, pero no te preocupes esta perfecto para compartir! El barrio del born es el mejor! tiene el tren del aeropueto cerca tres lineas de metro, supermercados, shopping y la playa a 7' y es perfecto para salir de fiesta... Tiene un aparcemiento de coches en frente, y la comunicacion con todos los trasportes:tramvias, metro, tren y buses. aunque no los necesitas, tienes todo en el barrio

host.host_about: Alegre, entusiasta y muy prestativa. Me encanta ayudar a q conozcan mi ciudad❤️❤️❤️

name: İstanbul Üsküdar  Sweet House in Rent for 4 months
summary: A cute Üsküdar house with garden 2 + 1 is my home :) Üsküdar Dogancilar Park is 3 minutes walk away. At 50 mt from the door you can go to Kadikoy and you can get there by bus in 25 minutes. You can reach the Marmaray, the metro, the ferry pier and the motor scaffolding by a 5 minute minibus or bus journey or a 10 minute walk.
space: A cute Üsküdar house with garden 2 + 1 is my home :) a tiny kitchen that opens onto the garden, a lounge facing the street, and a bedroom with a garden exit. You can use this WiFi to write your text in this area, which can be turned off and turned into a room when you are asked to do it, but I do not turn it off ever so cute :)
description: A cute Üsküdar house with garden 2 + 1 is my home :) Üsküdar Dogancilar Park is 3 minutes walk away. At 50 mt from the door you can go to Kadikoy and you can get there by bus in 25 minutes. You can reach the Marmaray, the metro, the ferry pier and the motor scaffolding by a 5 minute minibus or bus journey or a 10 minute walk. A cute Üsküdar house with garden 2 + 1 is my home :) a tiny kitchen that opens onto the garden, a lounge facing the street, and a bedroom with a garden exit. You can use this WiFi to write your text in this area, which can be turned off and turned into a room when you are asked to do it, but I do not turn it off ever so cute :) When it comes to sleeping, the corner seats which are common in the saloon are opened at the same time and used as a double bed, or it will be waiting for you in a corner in a luxurious double XL XL inflatable bed so that unexpected ones come. I respect the living area of my guests, but they do it when they want The guests have peaceful sil
neighborhood_overview: The guests have peaceful silence even though Üsküdar Istanbul is one of the places with the most active human traffic. The most beautiful sunset is seen from Salacak. In peace you can go to Çamlıca Tepes where you can gaze calmly. It is the place where tolerance has been found for centuries. In Kuzguncuk, the common garden mosque and church is the best example of this. Thousands of lives and tribulations on every street. You can go to Fethi Paşa Korusu by walking from the shore or from Fıstıkağacı and drink tea, coffee and rest your soul. It is worth to visit Beylerbeyi Palace and then sip coffee at a place called Bosphorus. Kanaat Restaurant which you can taste traditional dishes of Ottoman cuisine is at the bottom of your nose. Getting around the Bosphorus and other districts is very simple with transportation facilities.
notes: I have 3 cats in my house. I am sorry for those who are allergies and especially those who do not like animals. my cats are docile and full of love you can find the curious cases in the photographs
transit: When you leave the house you are 2 minutes' walk away and you can go to Kadikoye from the bus stops. You can reach the Marmaray, the metro, the ferry pier and the motor scaffolding by a 5 minute minibus or bus journey or a 10 minute walk.
access: When it comes to sleeping, the corner seats which are common in the saloon are opened at the same time and used as a double bed, or it will be waiting for you in a corner in a luxurious double XL XL inflatable bed so that unexpected ones come.
interaction: I respect the living area of my guests, but they do it when they want

host.host_about:
Let's come to AirBnb because I want to travel the world, get to know new cultures, meet new people and develop foreign language, and I also have a chance to make money for my journey on this route. Who knows, maybe I can be a guest in your city one day :) I am fed vegetarian and I am very happy with my pets. We can go somewhere in the city if we can create opportunities for the rest of the time. It will make me happy to host backpack travelers.

Gelelim neden AirBnb çünkü dünyayı gezmek yeni kültürler tanımak yeni insanlarlar tanışmak ve yabancı dilimi geliştirmek istiyorum hem bu sayede yolculuğum için de para kazanma gibi bir şansım oluyor. Kim bilir belki ben de bir gün sizin şehrinizde size misafir olabilirim :) Vejeteryan besleniyorum ve evcil hayvanlarımla çok mutluyum. işten arta kalan zamanda fırsat yaratabilirsem şehirde bir yerler gidebiliriz. Sırt çantalı gezgin kadınları misafir etmek beni mutlu edecektir.

name: Mr. world traveler
summary: Very spacious rooms with sun light all day, All guests will have full access to the entire place kitchen, laundry room, living room, and Garage everything is fully equipped. I just go home to sleep and shower . I will garanti you a pleasant and relaxing stay .
space: Prefect for friends, couples, or just by yourself, you will fill like home in no time
description: Very spacious rooms with sun light all day, All guests will have full access to the entire place kitchen, laundry room, living room, and Garage everything is fully equipped. I just go home to sleep and shower . I will garanti you a pleasant and relaxing stay . reviews.comments:
C'était mon premier expérience! J'ai beaucoup apprécié l'ouverture d'esprit de Joe, d'aider ou expliquer qqch! Il a une appartement avec deux chambres qu'il loue, la literie est très confortable, il y a un petit balcon dans chaque chambre, une grande cuisine et un salon. L'appartement se trouve à 15 minutes à pied de la plage! La plage est fantastique! Il y a une piscine avec l'eau de l’océan à coté. Vous avez la possibilité de se balader jusqu'aux villages qui sont à cote! Vraiment c'était fantastique!   
Очень классный хост! В квартире две комнаты, салон и большая кухня. 15 минут хотьбы от пляжа, на пляже есть тропинка, которая ведет в соседние города. Отлично так пройтись или пробежаться по ней! Жо, веселый и доброжелательный, расскажет обо всем с радостью! У него еще и классный бар есть. 
В общем всем рекомендую и сама вернусь еще!

Joe est un hôte très gentil et qui rend service dès qu'il le peut. Le logement est un peu éloigné de Porto, pour s'y rendre il faut prendre le train (20-30min). Il est assez proche d'une agréable plage Espihno. Nos vacances se sont très bien passé chez Joe !
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Joe est un hôte sympathique, serviable et disponible. L'appartement est grand, spacieux et bien équipé. Il est bien situé (à pied, 10 minutes de la gare de Granja et 15 min. de la plage). L'environnement est assez calme. Toutefois, la faible épaisseur des murs fait qu'on entend facilement les voisins. 
Attention: les matelas des lits sont très durs (certains apprécient, d'autres pas). Le WiFi est de qualité moyenne. La box TV Android fonctionnait très mal, voire pas lors de notre séjour. Et la propreté des WC (bonne) aurait pu être meilleure néanmoins.

We spent just under a week in Joe's appartement. Joe is a nice host, however, there were some factors that other guests should be aware of.

Firstly, we expected to be alone in the apartment since the description said 'entire flat' but the host is present at night and in the morning. He's not around in the afternoon and evening though. The two bedrooms were spacious and joe lent us towels. Additionally, the description mentioned that there would be AC but there was not and the rooms were pretty hot. 

Secondly, Porto is about 30 minutes away via train but trains aren't very frequent. It's about 10 mins to walk from the apartment to the train station. Joe lent us train cards for our stay. 

The neighbourhood is quite noisy at night with dogs barking, so we'd recommend bringing earplugs if you get easily woken up.
The room was good.

O preço é um pouco elevado. O proprietário é simpático. Pensavamos que iamos ficar sozinhos tal como é indicado no anúncio mas o proprietário também lá dorme.  Não tem vista para o mar,  e a praia ainda fica longe.

Très Déçu d’avoir loué un logement entier pour 4 personnes et que même si monsieur est aimable, il viennent dormir.dans ce cas là il faut marqué que vous louez des chambres et ne pas demander un supplément de 10 euros pour ma conjointe en liquide alors que ma location de logement entier était pour 4 voyageur.

name: 2633 - AB Barceloneta - Artistic Style Apartment - Beachside apartment for 2 with balcony and WiFi
summary: This contemporary apartment is located in the Barceloneta district, just steps away from the beach and the Mediterranean Sea, offering a balcony, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Parc de la Ciutadella and the Arc de Triomf are just over 15 minutes’ walk away, and the city’s picturesque  Old Town is under 1km away where you can find the Picasso Museum, the Basilica de Santa Maria del Mar and the Palau de la Música Catalana. Barceloneta metro station is just 700 metres away.   The apartment accommodates 2 people, containing 1 double bed. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, hob cooker and large fridge freezer. The apartment also contains a washing machine, flatscreen TV, and central heating.  Within a short walk you will find plenty of museums, restaurants, bars and shops. This neighbourhood is a great choice for those interested in the beach, local culture, landmarks and city stays. Metro: Barceloneta (L4)

house_rules: The client must pay one month's rent as a security deposit upon check-in.  Utility charges for monthly rentals are not included in the total cost of the rental. Utilities: You will be charged a minimum monthly rate for utilities such as gas, electricity, water and Internet according to the size of the apartment: 1 bedroom – 120€; 2 bedrooms – 200€, 3 bedrooms – 250€, 4 or more bedrooms: 300€. At the end of your stay we will check the bills and if there are any outstanding amounts that have not been covered by your monthly payments we will deduct these from your deposit.

host.host_about:
We are Robbie and Kay and we work in the real estate industry. The name of our company is AB Apartment Barcelona and what we aim to do is offer all of our guests the opportunity to live in Barcelona whether they are settling in the city, starting your own business, moving jobs or looking forward to start a new life. 

Unfortunately renting in an apartment in Barcelona can be a difficult experience, but with us you are in good hands :). Combined we have over 15 years of experience in the industry and our agency AB Apartment Barcelona manages over 400 apartments. If you have any problems finding accommodation, we will surely be able to help you!

The night we arrived, there was a fire in the neighbourhood and it made getting onto the street the Airbnb is located on an extremely stressful process. Obtaining the keys/check in/parking required several steps which added to the stress we were already experiencing (I imagine that the check in process would not have been so stressful under normal circumstances but the check in process could have been simpler - just something to be aware of). 

Having said that, the apartment itself is lovely (very spacious and clean) and the hosts were extremely helpful and responsive once we were checked in. They were flexible and made our stay comfortable. The space is located near metros and is walkable to major downtown areas and attractions.

We had a bad experience. Arriving in Montreal, we found the key not in the designated location. Upon calling the host we were told that our unit was unavailable due to flooding. Despite booking months in advance, we only were sent an email hours before our expected arrival (which was not useful due to being out of range). We were then told that no other unit was available and that they "were having a bad day, too". We had to scramble to find a last minute hotel.

Perfectly located 2 big bedrooms apartment plus a huge living room in the center of TST (next to TST Station). Within a 1 minute walk, you will reach *exit D and *exit N2 of the TST MTR station.
space: Artistic decorated huge apartment for maximum 12 persons. Brilliantly located next to TST Station (exit D and exit N2). The apartment has a spacious living room with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen. All rooms have airconditioning units. The apartment is an excellent place to stay if you'd like to explore everything that Hong Kong has to offer: I offer a clean, fully equipped private apartment which makes your stay worthwhile. My modern styled apartment is equipped with new and modern household furniture and is nicely designed.  Conveniently located in the center of TST. All decorations and fittings have been completed. neighborhood_overview: My apartment is located in the center of TST, nearby the famous Cruise Terminal and shopping arcade. Surrounded by lots of restaurants and bars. Walking Distance - Short distance by walk, there is a 24/7 McDonalds and a 24/7 supermarket. - In the same street, there many famous Asian and Western restaurants. - Within 1 minute to exit B2 (K11 Mall) of TST Metro Station. - 5 minutes to the very famous bar street "Knutsford Terrace". - 7 minutes to Harbour City / Cruise Terminal. - 8 minutes to 1881 Heritage and Culture Center. - 8 minutes to the Space- & Science Museum. - 8 minutes to Avenue of Stars and Star Ferry.
notes: After you arrived in Hong Kong, please contact me and I will give you your personal electronic code to check-in. Please note: - Keep clean as it were your own home.  - Turn off the shower water heater after use and always turn electricity off when out of apt. - No smoking  - No Pets
transit: Within walking distances, you get access to any form of transport you can think of to your sightseeing locations in Hong Kong. Public Transportation - 1 stop from Admiralty (to take the tram to Victoria Peak) - 1 stop from Admiralty (Pacific Place) - 2 stops from Central (IFC - Central Business District) - 2 stops from Central (Ferris Wheel) - 2 stops from Central (SOHO - Lan Kwai Fong) - 2 stops from Wan Chai (Golden Bauhinia Square and HKCEC) - 3 stops away from Causeway Bay (Times Square) From Hong Kong Airport to the apartment: - Take the bus (A21) from HK Airport, and step out at bus stop in "Cameron Road" on Nathan Road, then it is a 3 minutes walk to the apartment (HK$33, approx. 60 minutes). - Take the HK Airport Express from the airport to Kowloon station. Then take the free airport express shuttle bus (K4), step out at bus stop "Park hotel", then it is a 3 minutes walk to the apartment (HK$ 90,  approx. 45 minutes) From Mainland China: By train: Take the train from Lok Ma Cha
access: The entire apartment is available.
interaction: I'm always available in case you need any help. If you send me your travel plans, I can let you know what kind of transportation is most convenient and which is the quickest way, and directioans. For your convenience I can try to help you and pre-arrange at your costs: Arrange airport pick-up from airport (upon request, calculated by day) Arrange car transport for your sightseeing (upon request, calculated by day) Convenience airport Check-in in Town:- In the case that you have an evening departure flight:  Please note that you can check in your luggage at anytime during the same day as your flight at the Airport Express station, which is located at Kowloon Station or Hong Kong Station. That way you would be free to explore the city on your last day, not having to worry about your luggage or rushing to the airport since you have already checked in, you will not have to be at the airport as early as everyone else. All airlines flying from Hong Kong airport offer In Town check in, EXCEPT

非常好的体验!就在K11旁边,地铁2分钟就O到啦!周围有7-11莎莎万宁同埋香港嘅一啲日常饮食店,晚上我哋周围逛的时候仲发现在美丽华后面既一条酒吧街,可惜当晚太饱无加入一起high~讲翻间民宿,虽然电梯比较旧有少少心惊惊,但我哋到达那晚楼下嘅保安叔叔好nice,老港人嘅可靠感｡上到楼入咗房之后简直系另一个世界,房屋系香港民居来讲算非常大啦,屋入边嘅设施非常齐全同照片一模一样,厨房入边嘅用具简直满足可以自己开餐嘅需要!同行朋友们都觉得寝具非常舒适,下次来一定会拣翻呢间!Btw,房东非常nice,我地走的那天,误会左房东的意思,延迟了checkout~耽误左房东整理清洁时间~真系好抱歉啊
挺好的,适合多人旅游,特别是青年人,环境挺好的,在香港这公寓真的很不错,地铁口出来就到了｡有点不好就是电梯好老,坐了好怕怕哈哈,但是其实没什么问题的,一切都满意,房东也很好,我们还提前到提前进去休息了｡
very good place! nice location!

The location is perfect... Walking distance from anywhere. The station exit D2 is literally 1min walk from the apartment. The place is surrounded by huge malls and many restaurants and food. The airport shuttle bus is 10mins walk away and from my experience you don't really need any taxi's there either go underground or walk! Previously reading other people's reviews about the lift to the apartment... It's not as bad as people are saying! These lifts have an maintenance contract and are maintained... We had no issues going up or down. I'd definitely be back to this apartment and will recommend it to my friend's and family. Just to summarise the apartment has a single bedroom with a bunk bed and a double room with 2x king size beds. There is one shower/toilet which could be a pain between a large group! And then there is a large living room with huge sofa's which also turn into beds. And lastly there is an kitchen. Very modern looking compared to the ground floor entrance hall to the lift!
Nice place to stay. It's highly recommended.

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.comments:
O espaço do Paulo é maravilhoso, recém remodelado com muito bom gosto. As acomodações são ótimas e a cozinha é muito bem equipada. O espaço é perto do metro, com ótimos acessos à região central de Gaia e ao Porto. 
O melhor de tudo foi a hospitalidade dos anfitriões. Paulo teve um cuidado muito grande para que não faltasse nada para a nossa estadia, e nos recepcionou como se fôssemos da família. 
Recomendamos muito! Com certeza o melhor lugar em que eu já me hospedei

Melhor apt em Gaia!! Se tivesse como avaliar em 6 estrelas, o faria.

O que vc procura em um apt??
Nao pagar muito para morar bem?  ✓
Estar bem localizado, perto de tudo, inclusive do metro, e ao mesmo tempo num locar tranquilo, silencioso e agradavel?  ✓
Um excelente host, que faz de tudo para que sua estadia seja a melhor possivel? ✓
Que seja um apt super agradavel, amplo, com boa temperatura, boa vista, bem iluminado, bem decorado e confortavel, literalmente com TUDO o que precisa?  ✓
Poucos vizinhos e ninguem para lhe chatear?  ✓

Enfim, super recomendado, em todos os aspectos, e ainda me arrisco a dizer que seria bem dificil achar um host melhor e mais atencioso do que o Paulo.

When I arrived at the airport Paulo was there to pick me up which I really appreciate as the airport isn't that close. Paulo drove me to the apartment and when we were driving to there he showed me some things in Porto and he explained me where everything was and how to get there. Once we were at the apartment he showed me the apartment and told me where I can find everything. After I dropped my suitcase at the apartment Paulo took me with him and helped me with the groceries and took me for lunch which was really nice as a first day there. Late in the afternoon when I got back at the apartment. 
The apartment was very clean and the beds also already were made. There even was coffee already for the espresso machine so I didn’t have to buy it myself! What also was nice of the apartment is that it’s really close to the metro which will bring you very fast to Porto.
 In the two weeks I stayed in Porto I've seen Paulo several times. His hospitality and friendliness  plus the amazing apartment really made me feel like home. After one week of staying in the apartment Paulo and Carla (his wife) even came to clean again which was very kind of them. Paulo also made sure if I had everything I needed at the apartment which I really appreciated. 
I really wish I could have stayed longer at the apartment. But in the future I will definitely come back to it. I recommend this apartment to everyone as the apartment is beautiful and the price for two weeks was really good aswell. It truly were a unforgettable two weeks for me. Thank you so much Paulo and Carla!

name: Spacious 4 BR Apartment on Plateau + Terrace
summary: Amazing and renovated 4 bedroom apartment, at the heart of the Plateau. It can welcome up to 8 person, and it is ideally located, seconds away from everything you need (shops, café, bars, restaurants..), 5 minutes ride from downtown, and steps away from the famous Mont-Royal Park.
space: The apartment is located at the heart of the Plateau, the tendriest place to be in Montreal! It is a very bright and renovated 4 bedroom apartment, on the ground floor. All the bedrooms are spacious, features double beds, blankets, pillows, sheets, dressers, chairs, and bed side tables. The bedroom 4 doesn't have a window. The terrace is nice, perfect if you want to relax after a day out or to get a lunch.  The kitchen is spacious and has everything you need to cook, and enjoy a good meal with its big dining table. The bathroom is renovated. The hand towels and bath towels are included. A crib can be provided for the stay if requested upon booking the apartment.
description: Amazing and renovated 4 bedroom apartment, at the heart of the Plateau. It can welcome up to 8 person, and it is ideally located, seconds away from everything you need (shops, café, bars, restaurants..), 5 minutes ride from downtown, and steps away from the famous Mont-Royal Park. The apartment is located at the heart of the Plateau, the tendriest place to be in Montreal! It is a very bright and renovated 4 bedroom apartment, on the ground floor. All the bedrooms are spacious, features double beds, blankets, pillows, sheets, dressers, chairs, and bed side tables. The bedroom 4 doesn't have a window. The terrace is nice, perfect if you want to relax after a day out or to get a lunch.  The kitchen is spacious and has everything you need to cook, and enjoy a good meal with its big dining table. The bathroom is renovated. The hand towels and bath towels are included. A crib can be provided for the stay if requested upon booking the apartment. You will have full access of the apartment, as
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is amazing, as the apartment is located in the center of the Plateau, the trendiest place in Montreal. Everything is close by : just a few steps from cafés, bars, restaurants, grocery stores (a supermarket just 100 meters from the apartment). The apartment is on a residential street, so it is very calm at night.  The apartment is just 5 min walk from the Jeanne Mance Park, which is the perfect place to chill during the summer or winter if you like iceskating.  The Mont Royal Parc is very close too, and if you want to go downtown, it will take you a few minutes walking, or faster with public transportation.
notes: PARKING If you think you will use your car while in Montreal, you can still park it on the commercial streets during the following hours (max 3 hours each time, 3$ per hour): Monday to Friday 9am to 9pm  Saturday 9am to 6pm  Sunday 1pm to 6pm You can also find free street parking (not a lot though) in the residential streets, and there are 2 parking lots nearby (I will send you the info once the place is booked). CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT When there is someone before or after you :  Check-in is at 3pm  Check-out is at 11am.  Please contact me if you want to have an early checkin, or late checkout (I can't guarantee it, except if I say it's okay).
transit: The metro is pretty close (Mont-Royal Station, less than 7 minutes walk), and you can take the bus 55 or 80 which takes you downtown 10 minutes. The bus 11 which can take you at the top of the Mount-Royal within minutes.
access: You will have full access of the apartment, as no one will be there except you and your group.
interaction: I can be reached almost 24/7, via Airbnb, before your arrival and during your stay.
house_rules: - Please leave your shoes in the entrance, otherwise, because of the snow/the dirt, the apartment will get dirty really fast. - Also appreciated that you do not leave dirty dishes in the sink to add to the normal cleaning of the apartment. - Please communicate your check-in and check out needs. I will try to accommodate, but generally check out is in the morning and check in is in the afternoon unless the place is empty.

reviews.comments: yay
very hospitable place. very quick replies
Excellent location!!! Jeanne mance parc is a 10 min walk. Hit the Tam tams on Sunday if you have a chance. Mano communicated with us promptly as he was very accommodating. Highly recommend.
Bon appartement en rdc avec une petite cour intérieure privée. L’appartement est idéalement situé dans Montréal. Séjour parfait avec un couple et 3 enfants. Tout est à côté !!! Merci Mano

name: The Aloha Studio in Sunny Kihei, Maui!
summary: This beautiful unit in Kihei includes all the essentials for a comfortable stay. Kihei Bay Surf is conveniently located in the quiet side of Kihei by Kalepolepo Beach where you can enjoy picnics, and beautiful sunsets. The unit is less than 10 min away from shopping and restaurants. The complex includes a pool, bbq area, tennis courts, and coin operated laundry room. This is a fantastic way to enjoy Maui at an affordable price. We also have a Jeep available to rent if interested. Aloha!
space: The space is a 450 sq foot studio unit with a queen size bed, kitchen, and bathroom available. The unit is a first floor air-conditioned unit. The decor has a bohemian flair that is tasteful, and comfortable. Save money by cooking meals. There is a full use kitchen, with pots and pans, plates, utensils, fridge, stove, and microwave. There is also some beach necessities available, and a small patio area to relax.
description: This beautiful unit in Kihei includes all the essentials for a comfortable stay. Kihei Bay Surf is conveniently located in the quiet side of Kihei by Kalepolepo Beach where you can enjoy picnics, and beautiful sunsets. The unit is less than 10 min away from shopping and restaurants. The complex includes a pool, bbq area, tennis courts, and coin operated laundry room. This is a fantastic way to enjoy Maui at an affordable price. We also have a Jeep available to rent if interested. Aloha! The space is a 450 sq foot studio unit with a queen size bed, kitchen, and bathroom available. The unit is a first floor air-conditioned unit. The decor has a bohemian flair that is tasteful, and comfortable. Save money by cooking meals. There is a full use kitchen, with pots and pans, plates, utensils, fridge, stove, and microwave. There is also some beach necessities available, and a small patio area to relax. Entire space. The neighborhood of North Kihei is the quiet side of Kihei. It is less tourist
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood of North Kihei is the quiet side of Kihei. It is less touristy than  South Kihei. It is always sunny, and there are two shopping areas less than 10 minutes away (Azeka & Piilani Village Shopping Center). Beaches across the street.
notes: Self check in. Parking permit must be displayed on car visor.
transit: The best way to get around would be by renting a car. However, if that is not an option there is a bus system, and ride share available (Uber, Lyft).
access: Entire space.
house_rules: Check in: 3PM Check out: 11AM Parking permit must be displayed in vehicle. There will be a $25 fee if lost.  No Smoking No Partying No Pets

host.host_about: We love to travel, and enjoy visiting different cities around the world. We understand it is expensive to travel, that is why we joined the airbnb community. We love hosting, and meeting new people, and we love staying in airbnbs around the world.

reviews.comments:
A lovely little appartment at Kihei. We enjoyed out stay here for three nights. The apartment is well decorated and meets all needs fot a couple. You can feel that the owners take good care and keep it well maintained. We even hot some fresh water and a local pineapple in the fridge upon arrival. The walls aren’t very well isolated and depending on your neighbors you might hear them.
I believe that the base price is fair, but found that adding a sevond person (which almost doubled our total) is a pretty steep rise...

We would anytime return and stay at this place...
We had a great stay in the studio!  Sofia was super responsive in replying my messages and so thoughtful. Will definitely recommend this place!
Best location for vacation next to everything the ocean is literally next too you recmond to anyone and everyone
Philippe & Sofia were super nice to us and responsive. They helped us in every way they could. Bed was super comfy! Exactly what we needed after a full day in the heat. We loved it!
The location was convenient, and the apartment was perfect for my stay. The only downside was that the parking permit was missing when I checked in, and it took a few days to get a replacement.

This place has everything you need. It was very convenient. If you happen to forget something they will have it there for you to use. From the beach equipment to the toiletries. It was great having a kitchen to use.  Location couldn't have been better. It is a lot closer to places than the main drag is. The neighborhood is really nice and safe. We drove the whole island and it is definitely one of the nicer\hip areas. Great places to eat close by. I'm so happy I booked this place instead of one of the hotels. A+

The first day we arrived, we noticed the toilet seat was falling off the hinges. We figured it wasn't a big deal and would just be careful sitting down. A few hours after checking out they sent us a bill for a new toilet seat. Looked like regular wear and tear over time, but they wanted us to foot the bill. These guys were rude and accusatory. Just hope the a/c doesn't go out while you're there.

Everything was as advertised. The apartment was clean and the hosts left some bottled water and snacks which was really appreciated as I  arrived late in the evening. They were quite responsive to my questions. It's an ideal spot for a max of two people. Basic cooking facilities available, which is useful to manage the cost.

Great Location, Very Quiet Area, with a Rooster as your alarm. If you have an issue with this, sorry to warn you but these little friends are all over Maui, Where ever you go.  Near the Beach Park. Place was Clean and had a Nice soft bed to relax in after a all day of exploring. Phillippe and Sofia communication was awesome. Definitely only booking with them from here on out when I revisit.

Our stay in Philippe & Sofia’s place was amazing! It was clean, quiet, functional and a  great place to base yourself for your exploration of Maui. The place has everything you need including a eski (Aussie name for cooler) which we used every day. Host communication was quick and helpful. We would suggest having a car as it made our stay in Kihei much easier, efficient and allowed us to explore a lot of Maui. We would stay here again.
Neat, quiet, stylish place. Very close to the beach!
This was a perfect little place. Great location! Quiet yet not far from everything.

Very nice cozy and stylish place with everything you need. Beach is just across the road so no need to drive anywhere if you want to go for a swim. Very comfortable bed and quiet neighborhood, except for occasional morning roosters :) there’s some beach equipment to borrow if needed, very convenient. Stores close by. Very recomended!

We can’t say thank you enough for such a wonderful stay! The studio was gorgeous, well kept, and there were so many thoughtful touches! Being in Kihei was the perfect spot for us, the local beaches and restaurants are unparalleled and it was an easy drive into Lahaina and Wailea. Our next trip to Maui will definitely include another stay with Philippe and Sofia! ❤️
Great studio , perfectly located

Philippe and Sofia offer a beautiful unit in a great location! The unit was immaculate when we arrived and Philippe and Sofia were more than happy to answer any questions we had prior to and throughout our stay. Highly recommend to anyone staying in Kihei!

Location molto vantaggiosa in una posizione strategica. Parcheggio privato. Dimensioni alloggio ottime per soggiorni di breve durata. Completamente accessoriata di tutto il necessario per cucinare e soggiornare. Proprietaria disponibile e rapide nelle risposte sa aiutare il cliente.
This was a wonderful place to stay , right in the middle of west Maui. Incredibly easy to check-in and great clean space. Thank you Philippe & Sofia!

The studio was much larger than expected and very well equipped. Philippe & Sofia were super quick to respond, so much so that when I messaged them to say the batteries of the TV remote were no longer working, we got replacement batteries within 15 minutes. Couldn't have had better service at a 5* hotel.

The size of this apartment is deceiving in pictures, it is much bigger than I expected! The location is great to access all areas of the island and the complex's amenities leave you needing nothing but to enjoy your time in Maui. Would 100% book again!
The place is ideal for a two person getaway in Maui. It’s close to a ton of stores and across the street walking distance to a beach.
Easy to find and it has everything you need, and more. We felt at home and walked to the beach early each morning. Love the decorating and beautiful orchids. We would definitely come back to stay!
Great unit in Kihei. Bed is really comfy. Everything is clean. Had a great time there.
The location is perfect! The layout of the home is comfortable and makes you feel right at home! Perfect price for a great place!
Wonderful place with all the essentials! Right across from the beach and conveniently located to drive to different places of Maui.
Great location (beach across the street) with minor downsides (apartment seems to has been in use for quite a while). Very soft bed.

This place is in a great location! Less than a 15 minute drive to the Maalaea harbor (where a lot of the snorkel excursions take place). You can walk right across the street to the beach and have the best shaved ice a mile down from Ululani’s (must have!). Overall great experience, thanks!
Great location in Kihei, place was accurately described, check in and out was easy and convenient. Would stay again!

Lieber Philippe und Sofia, wir haben zum ersten Mal mit Airbnb gebucht und es hat uns sehr gut in eurer Wohnung und auch in Kihei gefallen, es ist alles so liebevoll eingerichtet, nahe zum Zentrum, nahe zum Strand, die Grösse für zwei Personen ist ideal. Wir würden diese Wohnung auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen. Danke und liebe Grüsse Martha

The Aloha Studio was a great place to stay at for our first time in Maui. The location was perfect for exploring all parts of the island and just what we needed to come back and recover at after our longs days out in the sun. The beach across the street was also lovely for watching the sun set at the end of the day. Mahalo!
This place was great.  Easy check in and good location. Provided extras like chairs and coolers and beach towels. Would recommend.
Unit was sparkling clean and in a great location in Kihei.  Hosts were very friendly and responsive.  Would definitely recommend.
This condo is in a great location, close to many parks, beaches, and restaurants! The condo is a bit dated, but overall clean and comfortable place to rest after a long day of adventures!

Nice Home! Outstanding Location! Certainly Meets Expectations. Exactly as described. The attention to detail from these hosts and the value for the location sets this home apart! Thanks again for allowing us to stay in your home, it was a great addition to our trip.
