We enjoyed our stay at the Jungle Hut. Liz was not on the island -- but she was very communicative and helpful via email/phone before, during, and after check-in. The place is located perfectly between Hilo, Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park, and the Puna/Pahoa side of the Big Island. Liz offered some great recommendations for activities and places to visit -- if you're in the area on a Wednesday night, make sure you follow her advice to go to Uncle Roberts Kawa Bar (what a scene!). We really enjoyed our time visiting the area.

The Jungle hut is a nice and comfy place very well located in a small town near Hilo.
Everything was clean and well mantained.
Liz is extremely kind and gave us excellent tips on where to go in the Island. She's prepared a full schedule proposal for our vacation and we didn't regret following it at all!
Definitely recommended!
Mahalo

Liz is a wonderful wealth of local information. She is kind and communicative. She provided us with an itinerary for our five days on big island. 

The hut is an amazing place to ground yourself. There are fruits available from the trees right outside the door! Frogs and geckos sing to each other during the night. It is really magical. 

We learned a lot on our trip about lava, people, ecology. It was all because of the wonderful information given to us by Liz.

What a gorgeous stay ! Artistic colors and decorations make one feel very at home ! Thank you for chocolates on the tiki bar and so great to have washer / drier right there . We loved your comfy pillows and large comfortable couch . Thanks for tips on things to do . Happy 2018 !!

Spent 4 nights over the new years at Liz's place in the Big Island. The apartment was really spacious...much bigger than expected. We really enjoyed the comfy bed and the exta space (2 couches!) as well as the indoor washer and driers. Great place to act as the home base for exploring the island. We really enjoyed Liz's detailed, personalized suggestions/plans for our trip. She even researched and sent us list of NYE parties to go to. Great host!!

It was an extraordinary experience for us to stay in Liz's place. We enjoyed every minute in this apartment. Her hospitality and recommendations as well as the best equipped apartment I've ever seen since doing AirBnB makes us still smile when we think of our time on Big Island of Hawaii. Thank you Liz.

Liz’s local knowledge and suggested itinerary of places to go and things to do made up a large part of our time on the Big Island and now we have some incredible memories that will last us a lifetime!

The Jungle Hut has a magic to it, nestled at the end of a rural road, on a clear night, you’ll see stars you’ve never seen before. At the same time, it’s not more than a few minutes drive into town.

Would love to visit again.
Great Experience

The house is well decorated, clean and tidy. You get everything u need in the house. The location is great if u wanna plan ur touring around Hilo area. It is around 30mins drive to the national volcanoes park. And liz has been very nice to me and provided every detail information about tourist attractions nearby. Next time I come to big island, I will definitely choose Jungle Hut again! Thanks liz. I had a great time in big island.
The house was perfect, Liz gave us a list of things to do in the area before we arrived.  Even though it rained, Liz had umbrellas and flash lights available for us to use that was really helpful.

Loved Liz’s place, she gave us a fabulous itinerary for what to see and do. Lots of space and a washer and dryer made this one of our best places yet, the wildlife can be a bit noisy but we loved it! Wine and chocolates when we came in made for a very warm welcome!

Liz was really nice and provided great local tips, which we found really useful. Liz also provided a detailed itinerary based on the days we were staying, which was really a very sweet and personalised touch. Liz also provided very detailed directions to the address, and provided check-in instructions before the trip so that we had no problems with check-in despite not having data/wifi when we landed. The location is approximately 25 minutes from Hilo, and 2 hours from Kona. 

However, there were heaps and heaps of mosquitoes in the house despite the windows and doors being closed. We also spotted a cockroach on the ceiling, and lizards behind the ornaments on the wall. However, note that this is located in the middle of a rainforest environment and hence some insects are to be expected. However, there was a dead lizard under the AC.

The house was a little too dim and smelt slightly musty. However, Liz's place is very well equipped with utensils and it felt like staying at a friend's place which was great.
首先要提醒一下各位来到夏威夷岛的朋友们注意岛上的气候,大岛在科纳一侧长年能够有阳光日晒,但希洛一侧总是下雨,Liz的房子在希洛一侧,而且是一楼,所以不可避免地会有一些发霉的气味｡房内设施齐备,但是退房的如果不彻底打扫的话还要支付额外的清洁费用｡我们入住的时候两人都出现了不明原因的过敏,所以体质较差的朋友最好选择科纳附近,或者库克船长镇的房源入住,那里有不错的阳光日晒｡

Nice, quiet and relaxing place to retreat to after days full of adventures. Even though it’s located in the outskirts of a neighbourhood, it still feels like you are in the middle of the jungle. So I understand why it’s called the jungle hangout :)
If you aren’t sure about what to do during your stay, the host also provides you with lots of information so you get inspired.

Liz went above and beyond to help us plan our stay with ideas of places to visit and things to do and tips about local events. Her place was exactly as described. Communication was excellent. Would visit her place again.

Great place for spending time in nature, listening to the sounds of the tropical forest, waking up to the melodies of roosters and having breakfast with lychee's collected from your own backyard. 

Liz is a helpful host and attended to our requests in a timely manner.

Only drawback was a strong mildew odor in the entire place.

Liz is a fantastic host with a great home in the rainforest. It was awesome listening to the tree frogs and rain at night. She also was super helpful with suggestions of things to do on the island and made a clear effort to make our stay enjoyable.

Just double check to make sure that AC or air cooling is available because the high heat and humidity are brutal.

A true treasure of an Airbnb. Funky decor and great hospitality, with a complete range of amenities and awesome tips from the host for what to do on the island. Huge space. Would stay again, would definitely recommend.
Funky place with a jungle feel. Pretty centrally located between Hilo and Pahoa but nothing in walking distance. Great place if you have a car though!

host.host_about: 我是一名室内设计师,热爱生活,热爱旅游,对细节要求比较高,希望我的家也能带给你更细致的入住体验

reviews.comments: Location is great.

Nice one bedroom apartment in a new building, which provide swimming pool and gymnasium. It looks as good as the photos, modern and stylish. However, it does have a little bit noise due to the train line nearby. Great location with easy access to metro station (5 mins walking), and close to shops and restaurants in Mong Kok.
房子地點,環境很好,值得信賴,會再入住｡

I stayed at this flat almost 3 weeks due to business trip. The location is closed to MTR station. First time when I checked review there is some noise due to train beside of apt from early in the morning to late night time, but It is ok for me.
And the host very quickly responded from my inquiries, and very nice.
Hopefully I will get a chance to stay at this flat again.
非常棒的一次体验,公寓位置很好,走到地铁站几分钟,楼下吃喝逛都很多｡公寓环境非常棒,大楼保安每天帮忙开门问好,去了很多次香港,这次住宿最满意啦!希望以后还有机会入住

reviews.comments: Great place to stay in Montreal if you want to be close to downtown but avoid the hustle and bustle. Beautiful view of the river from the top floor of the building. A very quaint, clean and quiet apartment with a lot of charm. Would definitely stay there again.
Great apartment, very beautiful view, near downtown, bus station in front, quiet, hospitable host,everything was cleaned .

name: Elegant Plateau #6, WiFi & A/C
summary: This elegant condo faithfully maintains the very best of the original construction. Fully renovated.The Plateau area is characterized by brightly colored houses, cafés, book shops, and a laissez-faire attitude. It's the location of some famous attractions on Saint Laurent Boulevard, including Schwartz's Deli (famous smoked meat) and a weekend street fair during the summer that sees extremely crowded streets. In 1997, Utne Reader rated it one of the 15 "hippest" neighbourhoods in North America
space: With WiFi & Air Condition. Fully renovated.
description: This elegant condo faithfully maintains the very best of the original construction. Fully renovated.The Plateau area is characterized by brightly colored houses, cafés, book shops, and a laissez-faire attitude. It's the location of some famous attractions on Saint Laurent Boulevard, including Schwartz's Deli (famous smoked meat) and a weekend street fair during the summer that sees extremely crowded streets. In 1997, Utne Reader rated it one of the 15 "hippest" neighbourhoods in North America With WiFi & Air Condition. Fully renovated. Overlooked by the eastern face of Mount Royal, the borough is served by part of the orange line of the Montreal metro, including Sherbrooke, Mont-Royal, and Laurier stations. Important features of the borough include the Hôtel-Dieu de Montréal, Lafontaine Park, and Jeanne Mance Park. The borough is largely composed of the well-known Plateau neighbourhood, famous for its bohemian reputation and characteristic architecture. The neighbourhoods of Mile End,
neighborhood_overview: Overlooked by the eastern face of Mount Royal, the borough is served by part of the orange line of the Montreal metro, including Sherbrooke, Mont-Royal, and Laurier stations. Important features of the borough include the Hôtel-Dieu de Montréal, Lafontaine Park, and Jeanne Mance Park. The borough is largely composed of the well-known Plateau neighbourhood, famous for its bohemian reputation and characteristic architecture. The neighbourhoods of Mile End, Côte Saint-Louis, and Milton-Parc (including the McGill Ghetto) are also located in the borough. Montreal's Little Portugal neighbourhood is situated in the western portion of the borough.
house_rules: - no shoes in the apartment

host.host_about: Hello. Im mother of 3 amazing kids. Love my family. I really enjoy providing ARBNB service and making sure that everything should be perfect and great. And I love the fact that my guests are happy in my apartments and would love to comeback.  Thank you

reviews.comments: Beware that the apartment is small! No A/C and only one window in the main bedroom. It was kept very clean but didn't have toilet paper upon arrival. Irina told us she'd reimburse us if we purposed it ourselves. The location is great in the Plateau and walk-able to the mile end and plenty of restaurants and shops.

The stay was wonderful. Cute small newly renovated apartment. Was super convenient to downtown. The apartment was also in a great location as it was walking distance to many shops and restaurants. Irina was super flexible with check-in. Highly recommend if your looking for a quiet spot. Perfect for a couple.
Surroundings’ are very good. The flat has only 1 windows which made it uncomfortable as it was a very hot period in Montreal.
Great location and perfect for a couple ! Would definitely recommend to others. Thanks Irina!
La ubicación es excelente!!!

Irina’s place is very chic and modern. It is located in the heart of the plateau close to restaurants, parks and bici bike stations. It should be noted that it is not air conditioned and can be uncomfortable in warm weather.
Appartement superbe, bien équipé , bien placé, parfait pour passé un séjour sur Montréal.
Was a great place for a weekend trip! Would recommend for a small group and would definitely stay there again!
Great clean and stylish spot, close to a couple excellent breakfast cafés
Perfect stay of 7 weeks. Wonderful apartment, perfect emplacement, Irina is very reactive
Irina's place was in a great location and just as expected. Would stay again.
As described! You won't have any negative surprises.
Allez y les yeux fermés! Petit, certe! Mais il y a tout! Très bien placé!

L’emplacement de logement était vraiment parfait, petit problème, certaines informations étaient manquantes. D’autre part il n’y avait aucun outil ou produits pour nettoyer l’appartement, ni pelle, ni balayette, ni aspirateur. Les parties communes sont sales et dans un très mauvais état.
L’appartement est bien équipé et propre.

Fantastic location in a cozy & secure space. Compact studio unit has everything you need, recommended for solo traveler or couple. Photos are accurate & although in an older building, the actual studio apt has everything renovated and as of Dec 2018 appears brand new. Super clean too!

Everything was great, host was very responsive. Very clean unit and common areas!! Very stylish!! Well equipped!! Everyone enjoyed their stay. The amenities are great, very comfortable apartment! Close to everything. We would definitely recommend staying this place.
Enjoyed my stay. Would recommend

This location is ideal, wonderful and close to everything you need. It was also very clean and comfortable with all the amenities (including utensils and dishes) you could need.  Irina is a great host (and the check-in was easy). Highly recommend!

What a wonderful location! Perfect distance from the Metro and so much to see, smell and taste. Stumbling upon a jazz trio less than a block away on a Monday night is as good as it gets. The place is wonderful – stylish, equipped, clean – for any couple looking for a taste of Montreal.
Very clean, very efficient and good sleep as the bedroom is located on the quiet backlane, not on the front street

name: Beach living in Dee Why
summary: Modern, light and walking distance to Dee Why beach. This spacious and well equipped 2 bedroom apartment is perfect for either a short or long stay. Walking distance to cafes, shops and transport as well as secure parking. If you are after the beach lifestyle in Sydney within 30 mins of the city, this is the perfect location.
space: This apartment has a fantastic balcony to soak up the sun and admire the district views.
description: Modern, light and walking distance to Dee Why beach. This spacious and well equipped 2 bedroom apartment is perfect for either a short or long stay. Walking distance to cafes, shops and transport as well as secure parking. If you are after the beach lifestyle in Sydney within 30 mins of the city, this is the perfect location. This apartment has a fantastic balcony to soak up the sun and admire the district views. Guests can contact their host through out their stay for enquiries regarding the property or locality. Dee Why is a family orientated suburb within easy reach of Sydney CBD. It borders Brookvale, North Curl Curl and is @ 20kms from the city. Best transport option is by train and bus. It will take @ 60 mins and will take you to Central station.

name: Você quer praia @?
summary: Apartamento conjugado confortável e aconchegante, prédio com saída para praia de Copacabana e para Av Nossa senhora de Copacabana, farto de condução, mercado, farmácias, bares e restaurantes! 10min a pé para o arpoador e Ipanema!
space: O apartamento inteiro, quando recebo os hóspedes entrego a chave e retorno somente para o checkout.
description: Apartamento conjugado confortável e aconchegante, prédio com saída para praia de Copacabana e para Av Nossa senhora de Copacabana, farto de condução, mercado, farmácias, bares e restaurantes! 10min a pé para o arpoador e Ipanema! O apartamento inteiro, quando recebo os hóspedes entrego a chave e retorno somente para o checkout. Se tratando de um conjugado, todos os ambientes  são compartilhados e utilizados por todos! Saio para trabalhar cedo de seg a sexta, durante a noite estou disponível. O bairro é bem turístico, pertinho do forte de Copacabana, Pedra do Arpoador e praia de Ipanema, faço todos esses trajetos caminhando! O prédio fica em frente à praia, só descer e já está no calçadão de Copacabana com varias opções de quiosques, bares e restaurantes! O transporte que mais utilizo e mais seguro é o metrô a estação próxima é a general Osório saída D Sou tranquilo, receptivo e espero que sintam-se a vontade!

reviews.comments:
Localização maravilhosa em frente ao mar e perto de mercados e restaurantes. 
Casa super limpinha e muitoo confortável! 
Anfitrião é um amor de pessoa, responde super rápido e é super flexível com o horário do check in. Eu amei ficas hospedada lá!

Uma ótima localização para quem gosta de praia... Dá pra fazer todo o percurso de Copacabana e Ipanema a pé mesmo... Muito atencioso o Francisco, sempre respondendo prontamente minhas dúvidas sobre a cidade. A pessoa tem muita liberdade, pois ele fica o dia todo fora.
Nice place with a great location. Near to Ipanema and copacabana beaches. Francisco was kind with us.
Ótimo anfitrião. Ap aconchegante e realmente de cara pra praia, boa localização. Espero voltar em outra oportunidade
Mesmo que rápida a estadia foi ótima. Bem localizado, limpo e organizado! Francisco foi um anfitrião muito atencioso
Tudo perfeito. Parabenizar pela agilidade no retorno das mensagens e dicas, pela limpeza da casa, pela localização incrível. Tudo maravilhoso.
Francisco foi bem atencioso, ótimo anfitrião
Apartamento simple, mas muito bem localizado. Tudo limpo e de bom gosto.

Ótimo espaço, muita hospitalidade e atenção. 
Lugar aconchegante e bem localizado. Prédio em frente a praia e perto de vários lugares, como: Copacabana, arpoador, Ipanema e etc. Valeu muito a pena!
Espacio pequeño aunque bien ubicado. Buena relación costo beneficio

O apartamento é muito charmoso, aconchegante, a localização é ótima de cara pra praia, comercio farto em volta, Francisco foi extremamente atencioso, aconteceram alguns contratempos alheios a nossa vontade, mas ele solucionou tudo prontamente, fazendo com que tudo transcorresse com a maior tranquilidade possível, enfim minha viajem foi maravilhosa!

Tivemos uma ótima estadia com o Francisco.. Super gentil e sempre respondendo rápido. o apartamento é muito mas muito bem localizado, na beira da praia (só atravessar a rua). tudo que precisamos fazer foi com o Bike Itaú, várias estações no entorno. O apartamento é pequeno mas ideal para quem quer conhecer o Rio e ter um local arrumado e acessível para dormir. tudo estava limpo e organizado quando chegamos. Super recomendo!!
Apartamento muito bem localizado, bom para quem quer ficar perto de tudo em Copacabana!
Todo excelente!! Súper recomedable

Francisco é sensacional, nos ajudou em tudo que foi necessário, atencioso, cuidadoso, prestativo. O apartamento é muito bem localizado é só atravessar a rua e já está na praia, próximo ao posto 5 que adoro, em fim tudo ótimo, super indico.
muy acogedor, chico pero muy cómodo, excelente ubicación
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Si buscas estar a metros de la playa  por un costo razonable es buena opcion.
Pequeno, mas bem localizado. Recomendo

Francisco é super tranquilo, a localização é muito boa e tem tudo que você  precisa perto.  Não é luxuoso mas tem todos os aparatos necessários no apartamento. Obrigado por disponibilizar seu espaço a nós Francisco. Até a próxima.
apartamento de ótima localização.
Es muy buena la ubicaciones. y Francisco nos ayudo mucho y estuvo muy atento a nuestras inquietudes.

el departamento era lo que esperabamos, es pequeño pero perfecto para turistas con todo lo escencial para estar comodos, los conserjes muy amables y nuestro anfitrión muy dispuesto a ayudarnos en todo!
totalmente recomendable ;) :D

Muito boa a acomodação, ótimo lugar perto de tudo, muito aconchegante, espero voltar mais vezes! =)

I can’t recommend this home highly enough.  It’s in a perfect location, close to shops and buses into town.
The house itself is lacking NOTHING!
It’s a lovely airy place with all the things you could need to just relax and chill.

An absolutely stunning house with everything you could possibly need. Our family had an amazing time and our children loved the pool. The house is brilliantly located!
The host is fabulous to deal with - always contactable and super helpful!!

We enjoyed our stay overall. On our first night (nye) we couldn't do our hair as there wasn't a hair dryer in the house, but Debbie dropped one off on the next morning. 
The linen on one of the beds had some stains, so we had to washed it before using it.
The house is beautiful and is well located.

My family and I stayed at Michel’s place and it was lovely. The location is very good and close to everything. The parking space was really handy. The house was spotless and had everything we needed. Communication with Michel was seamless. Overall, a very positive experience.
Michela and Mario were quick to respond to my needs. Place is pristine and perfectly located in Downtown as i needed to be close to Concordia.
The location was wonderful.    Better than what I expected.

The place was very clean and very comfortable to stay in. It was the perfect place to stay while visiting Montreal. Michela was very helpful and answered all questions promptly. I highly recommend staying here.

Amazing condo and the views are amazing!  Great amenities with the gym and pool! So close to all the great venues on crescent!  Would love to stay again next time!

Oh and the nespresso machine was definitely a bonus!!

Absolutely excellent experience at this AIRBNB. The hosts went over and above to help us with our bag storage as we arrived too early for check in. The location was perfect and the space itself was beautiful and cozy. Brand new condo that is very tastefully decorated. Will definitely stay here again !!

great apartment downtown Montreal. 
next door is bell centre, don't miss to see a hockey game. public transport in 1minute distance, many places for breakfast or dinner and shopping as well as sightseeing in walking distance.
Mario and Michaela are very friendly and helped to make it great three days in Montreal.

Imagine swimming in an indoor pool in the sky while its snowing outside. Pretty epic. Apartment itself had all modern fixtures and conveniences, but no microwave or toaster oven. Futon couch is probably great for travelers intending  to use it as an additional bed, but as a couch it leaves a bit to be desired. Also, TV has no cable or other service (not even OTA coverage), so bring an hdmi cable to plug in your computer. Amazing location, super close to many bars and restaurants and convenient to many points of interest.
Perfect communication, very nice and perfect condition of the apartment. Highly recommanded. Super location and the parking is a big plus

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Era una habitación pequeña pero con el espacio suficiente para una persona. El baño y la cocina tal cual lo muestran en las fotos. La limpieza es un must. La ubicación es genial, en la esquina hay una parada de la línea G de subte. Hay varios lugares para comer y salir a beber cerca. 
Lo único que no sabía con antelación es que era un 4to piso; para mi no fue problema, pero creo que deberían comentarlo.

Man oh man!! I don’t know where to start .. this place is amazing!!! As soon as I got off the train the house was right across the street .the key pad system was easy and simple to do and the apartment was so clean and stylish ! The highlight for me was the creativity of the bathroom despiser that is used for the soap and shampoo! I highly recommend this place and will definitely be back!

This place is a real find. Old historic brownstone right across from the subway and half a block from great bars, restaurants, and coffee shops. The host was awesome and made sure my stay was comfortable and responded to texts quickly. The room was clean and comfortable. Thanks for having! I’ll definitely stay again when in Brooklyn.

I travel to Manhattan pretty regularly for business, but was on a pretty tight budget for this trip. I've stayed at some SCARY hotels that cost $300+ a night so needless to say I wasn't expecting much when I forked over $60 to stay at Reina's place. 

WOW was I wrong!! Of all the places I've stayed in NYC, this was my favorite. It was IMMACULATELY clean, the bed was comfortable, and in a fantastic location. I've always been terrified of the Subway, but this forced me out of my comfort zone and in 24 hours I felt like a pro. 

My only concern was after reading previous reviews, it was mentioned that the individual rooms didn't have locks. That is NOT the case now!! My room had it's own key, and I felt very safe leaving my laptop, and other work materials in the room. 

I never got to meet Reina, but thank you so much for a great stay. I will FOR SURE be back again!

Wonderful stay, G train is a few steps away, grocery store literally in front of the building, many coffee shops and bodegas around the area. Reina is very kind and quick to respond. I don't recommend this place if you can't handle climbing stairs.  Overall I give this place a solid thumbs up!
Bien comunicado y muy, muy limpio. La habitación es pequeña y eso hace que el calor se encierre un poco, pero se soluciona. Reina es muy clara en sus instrucciones. Muy bien por el precio.
Close to public transport!
Very nice room !

The apartment and the room were clean and corresponding to the description. The location is also good, few minutes from subway station.
The only drawback of our stay was missing AC (included as per description). Moreover the window was oriented to a closed shaft (so no fresh air from outside). During hot summer days, the room temperature was very high, and with no fresh air from outside the sleep and overnight stay was very unpleasant.
Everything is fine except for the windows.

Unser Aufenthalt bei Reina war ok. Die Wohnung ist mit der U-Bahn gut zu erreichen und der Check-in selbständig über eine Schlüsselbox - unkompliziert und problemlos abgelaufen.

Über schiefe Treppen geht es in den dritten Stock, dort ist die Wohnung. Alle wesentlichen Dinge sind gut beschrieben und wichtiges in der Wohnung nochmal beschriftet. 

Es gibt 4 Airbnb-Zimmer und das Zimmer des Live-in Gastgebers, der allerdings nicht immer zuhause ist. Die Male, die wir ihm begegnet sind, war er sehr freundlich.

Es wird viel Wert auf Sauberkeit gelegt.

Das einzige was den Aufenthalt für uns etwas unkomfortabel gemacht hat, war, dass es sehr warm in unserem Zimmer war (>30°C). Es gibt keine Klimaanlage - für uns ok, wenn man das Fenster öffnen kann (haben zuhause auch regelmäßig mal über 28°C). Leider ging das Fenster in einen Schacht, von dem aus nur noch wärmere Luft ins Zimmer kam. Der Ventilator hat bedingt geholfen. Am Ende war die Lösung offene Tür+ Ventilator ok.
Great place, close to the subway (G line) and very affordable. Place is super clean and modern, comes with all you need. Very quiet place to rest after discovering the city.

Reina's place is in a nice neighborhood. It's a short walk from the subway and her instructions to get in were easy to understand. The apartment is clean and provides everything you need, it does however lack some kind of personal touch in my opinion. All in all it was a good stay.

Basic but clean room in good proximity to subway and restaurants. Bathrooms and kitchen were clean as well. We did not meet Reina, but her brother in law lives there and greeted us when we arrived. The air conditioner was great as it was a hot few days in New York. Some light came in from the neighboring room, so bringing an eye mask is recommended if you need a very dark room to sleep.

The building is a little run down, but the apartment is nice. Our room was a little plain, but the kitchen and bathrooms were very nice, and for the money, it’s definitely recommendable. A perfectly acceptable place to come home to after exploring the city.
Vous pouvez réserver sans crainte, bien situé à Brooklyn, métro juste à côté qui vous emmène directement à Manhattan. Le logement est climatisé, salle de bain et cuisine très propre !
The room was great, had an A/C unit in the room that was a huge plus!!!  The bed was very comfortable, I would definitely stay here again!  Thanks Reina :)
Great apartment with extreme organization and cleanliness. The locality is also a good point, because the metro is practically in front of the building. I hope to come back other times!
The stay was exceptional. Great location to get a real feel of Brooklyn and amazing amenities. The place was perfect for my stay!

Staying at Reina was ok. The bed was fine, bathroom clean. Check in was easy, but we didn't see anyone else than other guests, that said it didn't bother us. Luckily there was a cooler in the room otherwise we wouldn't have survived any nights with that heat! But be prepared with ear plugs because it is very very noisy.  The big down side of the room is that, for some reasons, there are 2 windows in the room that give on the corridor and communal area, meaning you have no intimacy whatsoever in the evening if the lights are on! I didn't understand why there were no black curtains or something... It was really frustrating. Also, on our last night, the wifi was turned off, which was really annoying as I was relying on it entirerly to contact my family :(
Reina was so helpful and accommodating on our visit! Our room was great and the place was in a great location! Definitely recommend staying with her

If you are looking for a clean space to sleep for a good price than this is the right place!
It is clean, air conditioned and has a great connection to the subway.
The house is more or less in a bad shape, but I need to say that pretty much the whole city looks like this. Maybe I just have different standards, so I don't want to give it a bad rating in any crucial way!!

As others have mentioned the building and stairway up to the apartment is a little rough, but the actual Airbnb is great! Very clean and stylish. As for our room, nothing worth complaining about, and we had a very easy and comfortable stay.

thank you very much 
it was really nice room 
fitted what i was looking for

We had an amazing stay here. The subway is almost at your doorstep and the flat is very clean. There is a big fridge you can use in the kitchen. Reina provided very detailed descriptions for checkin and checkout which was very appreciated and was very responsive in general. I would definitely stay here again!

Reina has a wonderful & extremely conveniently located space! quiet & clean & cozy (: 
highly suggest staying here if visiting nyc! hope i'll be back soon !!
La ubicación es excelente, queda cerca del metro, es seguro. Lo que no me agradó fue que es un departamento con muchos dormitorios y te toca compartir el baño con los huéspedes

Nice room, very basic but clean. Close to train. Check in was a bit difficult as there were no keys in lock box and host was very kind but a bit slow to respond and had to reach out to “live in host” to get us keys. Overall good value!
Lovely & neat placeWorth the money

Muito próximo ao metrô, literalmente só atravessar a rua. Tem um mercadinho na frente o que facilita se você quiser comprar algo, tem um KFC bem na esquina também que ajudou muito nos dias mais corridos. O único problema são os 4 lances de escada, subir com as malas e depois descer no primeiro e último dia foi difícil, mas sem duvidas isso não me impediria de voltar a me hospedar lá.

- Good price for a small cozy place
- Conveniently close to a transit station
- Communication was very prompt
- Self check-in via lockbox was very convenient
- Hosts were welcoming

Best value for short stay in Brooklyn. We only stayed one night so we didn’t have time to get too comfortable. The room was a little strange in that there were two windows into the bedroom with transparent curtains and you could see in the bedroom from the main hallway. Anyone going to the bathroom or kitchen could see in our room if we had the lights on. The door had a lock but it was warped so it didn’t actually lock. Other than that, the bed was really comfortable,  the room was clean and the location had plenty of options for food. 

It was perfect for one night but I wouldn’t have felt comfortable for much longer due to the windows and lock.

The location is good, near the subway station, the room is small but for what you pay, it's fine. The only drawback is that you have to take off your shoes and leave them outside the apartment, which may cause me a muscle contracture.

I loved staying here, the hosts are nice, the place is clean, and the location"s great too. When we had to check in a bit later the hosts replied quickly and when we had trouble with the door, they sent in someone to come fix it the next morning! Plus, there's cute cafe's, a bookstore, and pharmacies nearby so we could just grab a quick bite or buy anything else we needed.
It's a good apartment and two big clean bathrooms, however heating in this system make a lot of noise.

4 stars because we couldn't access the building for an hour due to missing keys in the lock and the radiator made loud noises. Everything else was fine without any problems. Reina was very nice and responded fast.
At the beginning the bathroom was very clean but during our stay it was never cleaned (perhaps because the live-in host was on vacation during that time).

Reina's place was very near the Subway station and was extremely spick and span. The space is a very simple room with a comfortable bed and some tables. Kitchen is accessible to guests and the bathrooms were very clean as well. Generally, it was a good stay.

Hospedarse en esta casa fue increíble!! Desde el primer momento nos trataron increíble, tuvimos un problema con la caja de las llaves y llamamos a los números que nos dieron, nos lo solucionamos enseguida y eso que era muy tarde. La casa muy caliente y genial. Muy limpia, silenciosa y acogedora. 
Muchísimas gracias por todo. Tuvimos la gran suerte de tener la habitación D, teníamos dos zonas privadas, una con una mesa un espejo y 4 sillas que daba a nuestra habitación -donde estaba la cama y una mesa de noche. Por las noches podías cerrar la habitación de fuera y se quedaba una habitación enorme. 
La ubicación espectacular, literalmente a 15-20 minutos de lower manhattan (mi parte favorita), la parada del metro a menos de 5 minutos. Si volviera a NYC repetiría sin lugar a dudas. Muchas gracias de nuevo!! Antonio y yo quedamos enamorados.

Reina is a great host, very helpful! The place is nice and clean. The bathroom is very clean!! (thats the most important thing that i look for when finding an airbnb) Its very close to the subway station which is convenient.

Great value! Super clean, well-located, and super responsive hosts. The subway is literally around the corner and the area has good bars and coffeeshops just a short walk away. One thing is the room we stayed in was extremely hot (even in February), and the windows opened to an enclosed skylit space rather than the outside, so there was no fresh/cold air to let in. That said, when we inquired about turning off the radiators, etc. after the first night, Reina was so helpful, responded quickly, and even followed up to check if we were able to resolve the issue. Would totally recommend this place to anyone visiting from out of town who is looking to check out the neighborhood and/or commute between Brooklyn and Manhattan.
